description:
Fostering collaboration on Sustainable Agriculture, Food and Energy which will be held from 17-20 November 2015 at Nong Lam University Ho Chi Minh City, VIETNAM. This conference is the third conference after the 1st International Conference on Sustainable Agriculture, Food, and Energy (SAFE2013) in Padang, Indonesia (12-14 May 2013) and the 2nd conference SAFE2014 in Bali, Indonesia (17-19 September 2014).

For application and  more information in detail:
http://safe2015a.safetainability.org/

Chuong trình dụ kién két thúc lúc 18g. Trang phục tụ do hoạc áo các họi cỏ dọng vien. Mõi tình nguyẹn vien mang theo mọt dụng cụ dọn dẹp vẹ sinh và cọ vẽ. Lien lạc qua só 0902848163 (gạp Tí Thong Minh).

--- 

Kinh gui quy anh chi sinh vien tai Tp.HCM,

Chung toi la mot nhom co dong vien bao gom cuu sinh vien DHQG-HCM va mot so truong dai hoc, tung cong tac voi mot so hoat dong giao luu van hoa ASEAN & quoc te trong pham vi thanh pho. Hien chung toi co thuc hien trang thong tin giai bong da U21 quoc gia & quoc te nham xay dung van hoa co dong the thao doan ket, ky luat va dam da ban sac dia phuong cho thanh nien Viet Nam noi chung va gioi sinh vien Tp.HCM noi rieng. 

Vua qua tai vong chung ket Giai Bong da U21 Quoc gia Bao Thanh Nien, trong luc lam phong su ve cac nhom co dong vien chung toi co duoc biet rat nhieu ban sinh vien DHQG-HCM va mot so truong dai hoc voi dong phuc den co vu rat nhiet tinh vo tu cho cac doi bong tre, tuy khong co su to chuc mang tinh cach doi ngu. Nhieu ban sinh vien khac tham gia phat nuoc va dung cu co vu cho gan 2000 khan gia tren san van dong Thong Nhat. 

Chung toi mong muon tiep tuc dong hanh cung ban to chuc va cac to chuc thanh nien tap hop nhung ban sinh vien yeu thich co vu the thao hoac truyen thong cho cac ban sinh vien nao toi san cung chung tay lam doi hinh co vu cho doi bong dai dien cho Thanh Nien Viet Nam (U21 Bao Thanh Nien va U21 HAGL). Doi hinh “Sinh vien Tp.HCM co dong giai U21 quoc te" cung the hien tinh than hoi nhap, than thien va doan ket voi thanh nien ASEAN & quoc te thong qua viec lam co dong vien trung lap co vu cho nhung doi ban khi doi nha khong thi dau nhat la cac nuoc ASEAN (Thai Lan, Myanmar, Singapore). 

Truoc giai dau, doi hinh nay tham gia cac hoat dong tinh nguyen nham cai thien my quan va tao dau an cho dia diem to chuc giai U21 quoc te la khu vuc xung quanh san van dong Thong Nhat. 

Trong giai dau, doi hinh nay se tap trung xuyen suot o trung tam o khan dai B san van dong Thong Nhat, lam nhom nong cot cung cac doi hinh co vu cua Hoi co dong vien bong da Viet Nam (du kien o khu vuc khan dai D) va nhom co dong vien U21 HAGL truyen cam hung cho hang ngan khan gia xem truc tiep va hang trieu khan gia xem qua truyen hinh.

Noi dung va hinh thuc co vu chung toi dang nho cac ca nhan co chuyen mon lien quan nghien cuu xay dung (gom bai hat co vu the thao, bai hat co dong cua phong trao Doan thanh nien, dong tac co vu, kich ban co vu xuyen suot 90 phut, mau ao thong nhat la ao DHQG-HCM dong hanh cung giai hoac ao xanh thanh nien ket hop khan co vu Viet Nam) va neu duoc ho tro chung toi se tien hanh tap truoc giai voi cac ban sinh vien chu chot. 

Tinh than cua chung toi la van dong su ung ho cua cac ca nhan co quan to chuc tai tro cho van hoa co dong the thao va su tham gia cua cac ban sinh vien co mat tren san va co dieu kien mua ve vao san khu vuc khan dai B (du kien 100.000d/ve/tran) do hien tai chung toi khong co nguon tai tro nao dang ke ma tu luc chia se chuyen mon lien quan va tinh than truyen lua cua minh la chinh. Nhan thuc duoc truyen thong nhiet tinh cua sinh vien thanh pho trong cac hoat dong cong dong, trong truong hop duoc ban to chuc ho tro chung toi se to chuc mua ve voi gia thap hon gia goc tao dieu kien cho nhieu sinh vien hon tu cac truong den tham gia co vu giai U21 quoc te.

Cac ban sinh vien khong thuoc Dai hoc Quoc gia Tp.HCM va cac truong chinh thuc gui doi hinh di co dong giai U21 quoc te co the tien hanh dang ky ca nhan de tham gia cac doi hinh co vu theo bieu mau dien truc tiep qua mang tai dia chi: https://codongvien.wordpress.com/2015/11/10/dang-ky-tham-gia-cac-doi-hinh-co-vu-cho-giai-bong-da-u21-quoc-te-bao-thanh-nien/ (luu y phai dang nhap vao tai khoan Google moi thay bieu mau)

Voi y tuong nay chung toi tin tuong muon dong gop mot gia tri cho thuong hieu thanh nien va sinh vien Tp.HCM luon nang dong voi be day truyen thong dong hanh cung cac su kien lon cua thanh pho va dat nuoc, dien hinh nhu Dai hoi The thao Dong Nam A (SEA Games 2003), Hoi nghi Thuong dinh Hop tac Kinh te Chau A Thai Binh Duong (APEC 2006), Dien dan Kinh te The gioi ve Dong A (World Economic Forum on East Asia 2010)... chung tay xay dung mot quoc gia Viet Nam doan ket va thinh vuong voi nen van hoa co dong the thao dam da ban sac dan toc.

Hen gap lai tren san van dong Thong Nhat. 

Tran trong.

Ban co tung mo uoc tro thanh mot CEO noi tieng?

Ban co muon biet nhung CEOs noi tieng noi gi ve cong viec ho dang lam?

CEO Talk la mot chuoi nhung buoi chia se cua cac CEOs noi tieng tai Viet Nam do Apollo 360o to chuc, day cung la mot phan trong tien ich Career Boost ma Apollo muon mang den cho nhung hoc vien hien tai va cac khach moi tham du, giup ho dinh huong nghe nghiep va tu tin hon cho cong viec trong tuong lai.

Hay den tham gia cung chung toi & lang nghe nhung chia se tu ong Pham Hong Hai - Tong Giam Doc HBSC Viet Nam.

Ngay: Thu ba, 17.11.2015

Thoi gian: 18g30 – 20g00

Dia diem: Tang 4, 58 Pham Ngoc Thach, Quan 3, Thanh pho Ho Chi Minh

Cho ngoi gioi han, vui long DANG KI tai link sau: https://goo.gl/D1HBJT

Pham Hong Hai duoc bo nhiem lam Tong Giam doc Ngan hang trach nhiem huu han mot thanh vien HSBC Viet Nam vao ngay 1 thang 12 nam 2014. Ong la nguoi Viet Nam dau tien giu chuc vu cao nhat tai HSBC Viet Nam. Ong Pham Hong Hai gay duoc su chu y va kinh trong trong nganh tai chinh ngan hang Viet Nam. Ong la nguoi Viet dau tien duoc bo nhiem lam Giam doc Khoi kinh doanh ngoai hoi va thi truong von cua HSBC Viet Nam vao nam 2004, Giam doc Khoi nghiep vu ngan hang toan cau, kinh doanh ngoai hoi va thi truong von (GBM) vao nam 2012.

Duoi su lanh dao cua ong, GBM tro thanh mot trong nhung phong kinh doanh lon va mang lai loi nhuan lon nhat trong so cac ngan hang nuoc ngoai tai Viet Nam. Ong Hai duoc Cong doan Ngan hang nha nuoc Viet Nam trao bang khen cho nhung cong hien cua ong doi voi nganh ngan hang Viet Nam trong giai doan 2011 toi 2013.

-----

Have you ever dreamed to become a famous CEO?

Would you like to know what a CEO talks about their life and work?

Come and attend Apollo English 360o “CEO TALK: FROM A TRADER TO THE CEO OF HSBC VIETNAM" by Mr Hai Pham Hong

Date: Tuesday, November 17th, 2015

Time: 6.30pm – 8.00pm

Venue: 4th Floor, Apollo 360 PNT – 58 Pham Ngoc Thach, District 3, Ho Chi Minh City

Seats are subject to availability, follow this link for REGISTRATION: https://goo.gl/D1HBJT

Pham Hong Hai became the new Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of HSBC Bank (Vietnam) Ltd on 1st December 2014. He is the first ever Vietnamese person to head operations at this Vietnam’s leading foreign-owned bank.

Hai, a well-known and respected figure in the country’s banking and finance sector, is also the first ever Vietnamese national to be appointed head of Global Banking and Markets (GB&M) in 2012. Under his leadership, GB&M developed into one of the largest and most highly-regarded franchises among foreign banks in Vietnam.

Hai personally received a Certificate of Merit for excellence from Trade Union of the State Bank of Vietnam for his contribution to the Banking industry of Vietnam between 2011 and 2013

Mundo Lingo Free Language Exchange: (Tieng Viet ben duoi)

Suscribe to be updated on upcoming events: 
https://www.facebook.com/MundoLingoVN/events
Keep in touch with everyone at the Saigon Group:
fb.com/groups/ML.Saigon

:::Who we are:::
We're a group of people from a variety of different countries that meet once a week to chat, meet new people and practice speaking languages.

:::How it Works:::

We have little flag stickers from over 100 countries / regions. The first flag is your native language and goes at the top. The rest follow in order or ability. It's open to all nationalities and languages and you can talk about anything you like. You don´t have to be an advanced speaker, or even speak a second language - its for all levels!

:::Our spot:::

Our events are free for participants, and always will be. When you arrive just ask at the bar or look for the table with the flags. If you’re shy, send a message to us first and feel free to ask for any information.

The Reception and Drink Specials 7 - 9pm 

See you on Tuesday!

Giao luu trao doi van hoa va ngon ngu voi Mundo Lingo:

::::Chung toi la::::
Chung toi den tu nhieu quoc gia khac nhau, moi lua tuoi va giao tiep da ngon ngu. Moi nguoi gap nhau hang tuan de giao luu, mo rong moi quan he va thuc hanh giao tiep rat nhieu ngon ngu khac nhau.

::::Tham gia nhu the nao::::
Chung toi co hon 100 mau la co nuoc va vung lanh tho khac nhau.
Khi moi buoc vao, hay nhan nhung la co va dan chung len ao ban bat dau tu la co dai dien cho dat nuoc que huong ban den la co nuoc dai dien cho ngon ngu ban muon noi tu muc do giao tiep tot nhat den co ban nhat o phia duoi. 

::::The Bar:::
Su kien mien phi cho tat ca moi nguoi tham du va se luon nhu vay.
Tiep don khach 19h-21h
Uu dai dac biet cho thuc uong va an nhe: tu 7h den 9h

Ban co the tim thay thong tin ve cac su kien khac dien ra khap noi tren the gioi tai www.mundolingo.org

Hen gap ban vao thu ba!

REACHES (Chicago/US)

Reaches is the solo moniker of Chicago based, multi-instrumentalist Justin Randel. The avant-pop of Reaches' debut album "I Am Alive And Well" has the wide-eyed, exploratory spirit of early 80s popular music, but without dipping into the same cliches and tropes of the era. Asymmetrical synth melodies dance over a bed of off-kilter electronic ostinatos, sounding simultaneously familiar and alien, infectious yet disorienting. The juxtaposition between the cool and calm production and the raw emotionality of the vocals, which range from cheekily playful, to heartbreakingly devastating is like an aural accompaniment to the dizzying cinematic technique dolly zoom. In the end, the technique creates an emotional effect that can be rare in electronic music.  Justin Randel's primal, uninhibited warble recalls a more unhinged, more psychedelic Ian Curtis, going from brooding to manic in seconds. At its heart, "I Am Alive And Well" is compelling pop record, delivered in a surrealist, weirdo package.

LOADS OF NOTHING

Loads Of Nothing is a french dj and live performer. Inspired by the european and american underground electronic music scene, he has been performing in many venues and clubs in Asia over the past 10 years. Now based in Saigon he is here to deliver the best electronic music.

★★★

REACHES (Chicago/US)

Reaches la biet danh duoc dat cho nhac si, nhac cong Justin Randel tu Chicago. Album dau tay ve dong nhac Avant-pop cua Reaches : "I Am Alive And Well" mang tinh than kham pha, tim toi cua nhung bai nhac pho bien vao dau thap nien 80 nhung khong hoan toan chim sau vao ngu y va cac an ban tuong tu cua thoi dai. Giai dieu bat doi cua loai dan tong hop nhay mua tren chiec giuong cua nhung tieng bass dien tu don dap lien tuc, nghe co ve vua quen ma vua la. Su ke nhau giua nhung san pham tuyet voi, diem tinh va xuc dong cua nhung giong ca voi nhau, tu mot chut ngo ngao, vui tuoi den mot chut buon ba, sau lang nhu mot ban hop tau duoc vang len tao cam giac chong mat nhu the su dung "dolly zoom" trong phim anh. Cuoi cung, ky thuat tao nen mot hieu qua cam xuc co the noi la hiem co trong am nhac dien tu hien nay. Thuo bat dau cua Justin Randel, tieng hot khong bi bo hoang da goi lai mot Ian Curtis dien dien, lang lang, moi thu di tu suy tu den mat tri chi trong vai giay. Trong trai tim cua no, "I Am Alive And Well" la mot ban Pop hap dan, dan ta toi mot khong gian sieu thuc, ky la.

LOADS OF NOTHING

Loads Of Nothing la 1 DJ trinh dien live nguoi Phap. Lay cam hung tu dong nhac dien tu duong pho cua Chau Au va Chau My, anh da trinh dien rat nhieu tu diem va hop dem tai chau A hon 10 nam qua. Va gio se la luc anh ay se mang nhung ban nhac dien tu tuyet voi nhat den voi Sai Gon.

★★★

HAN DANG KY: 23H 13.11.2015
---------
“Nam 2015 la nam nong nhat trong lich su”
“Viet Nam: Mot phan dong bang song Cuu Long se bien mat?”
“Maldives: Ca nuoc phai di ti nan vi bien doi khi hau”
“Tong thong My keu goi: Bien doi khi hau la thach thuc lon nhat”

Bien doi khi hau la co thuc. La mot nguoi dan, ban khong muon ganh chiu nhung tac dong khi hau nghiem trong! La mot lanh dao, ban co the lam gi?

NGAY MAI BAT DAU TU HOM NAY. GIOI TRE KHONG CHO DOI!

Cuoi thang 11 toi day, Hoi nghi cac ben tham gia Cong uoc khung cua Lien Hop Quoc ve bien doi khi hau lan thu 21 (COP21) se dien ra tai Paris. Day la su kien mang tinh chat quyet dinh doi voi cuoc chien chong bien doi khi hau toan cau, voi muc tieu dat duoc mot thoa thuan quoc te nham gioi han nhiet do trai dat nong len khong qua 2°C dong thoi keu goi dong gop tai chinh cho Quy Khi hau Xanh ho tro cac nuoc dang phat trien ung pho voi bien doi khi hau.

Khong can phai la lanh dao quoc gia hay phai den Paris, ban cung co the trai nghiem cam giac tham gia dam phan bang cach dang ky tham du

HOI NGHI MO PHONG VE BIEN DOI KHI HAU – MINI COP 21

Tai su kien, 50 ban tre se nhap vai dai dien lanh dao cua hon 10 quoc gia va Lien hiep quoc de cung thuong thuyet ve cac giai phap khi hau toan cau. Day la co hoi de cac ban tre hieu duoc nhung thach thuc ma the gioi dang phai doi mat truoc them hoi nghi, boi canh dam phan cung nhu quan diem cua cac quoc gia. Day la co hoi de cac ban tre - nhung lanh dao tuong lai dat minh vao vi tri dung dau trong viec giai quyet nhung van de cang thang nhu muc tieu cat giam khi thai hay muc cam ket dong gop tai chinh cho Quy Khi hau Xanh. Va ngay mai bat dau tu hom nay, gioi tre se cung chia se trach nhiem, y thuc va hanh dong tich cuc de cuu khi hau.

Ngay sau dam phan la Le trao giai nha dam phan xuat sac va tiec chieu dai tai khach san Sai Gon, 47 Dong Du, Quan 1, thanh pho Ho Chi Minh tu 15:30 toi 18:00 gio cung ngay. Ba (03) ca nhan the hien xuat sac nhat se nhan duoc nhung chiec xe dap tre than thien voi moi truong. Tat ca thanh vien tham gia dam phan se duoc trao tang chung nhan tu phia doan Lien minh chau Au.

Su kien co su tham gia cua Dai dien Phai doan Lien minh Chau Au tai Viet Nam, cung nhieu khach moi den tu cac co quan nha nuoc, cac to chuc phi chinh phu cung nhu cac co quan thong tan bao chi khac.

TRINITY COLLEGE – CON DUONG DEN DAI HOC MELBOURNE

Tran trong kinh moi quy phu huynh, cac ban hoc sinh den tham du buoi phong van truc tiep voi Thay Ben Wayrne, giam doc tuyen sinh cua Trinity College.
Thoi gian: 16h – 18h ngay 18/11/2015
Dia diem: Van phong AVSS HCM – 99 Nguyen Binh Khiem, P. Da Kao, Quan 1, TPHCM
Hotline dang ky: 0912 98 94 90
Email: avsshcm@theavss.net 
FB: AVSS HCM

 ------------------------------------------------------
Trinity College – Canh cua rong mo 
 Trinity College la con duong tot nhat de chuan bi cho ban buoc vao Dai hoc. 
Trinity College nam ngay trong khuon vien cua Dai hoc Melbourne, thuan loi cho hoc sinh, sinh vien  trong viec tiep can co so vat chat cua truong . Sinh vien hoc tai Trinity College duoc dao tao, ren luyen cac ky nang thuc tien va co ban nhat tu cach trinh bay van de mot cach thuyet phuc, phuong phap hoc hieu qua, den su tu lap, tu tin trong giao tiep. Tai Trinity College, ban se duoc chuan bi ky luong cho chuong trinh dai hoc thong qua cac ky nang:
- Phan tich bien chung (Critical analysis skills)
- Nghien cuu (Reseach skills)
- Tu duy doc lap (Independent thinking skills)
…va nhieu mon hoc co tinh ung dung cao khac.
Tot nghiep Trinity College, ban co the theo hoc bat ky truong Dai hoc nao khac tai Uc.
Rieng voi sinh vien Viet Nam, hau nhu 100% cac ban tot nghiep tu Trinity College deu duoc tiep tuc hoc tai Dai hoc Melbourne.
 
  ------------------------------------------------------
 
Truong Dai hoc danh gia tai Uc – University of Melbourne
University of Melbourne lien tuc dung dau xep hang nhung Dai hoc cua Uc va dang giu vi tri thu 33 toan the gioi (The Times Higher Education World University Ranking 2014 – 2015). Tot nghiep Dai hoc Melbourne dong nghia voi viec ban se tro thanh doi tuong duoc cac nha tuyen dung toan cau san don. Voi nhung khu hoc xa rong rai va trang thiet bi hien dai bac nhat, truong cung cap chuong trinh hoc da dang voi hon 200 nganh hoc. Neu ban co dam me theo duoi nganh Tai chinh, Thuong mai, Cong nghe thong tin hoac nganh Y, University of Melbourne la su lua chon hang dau. Hien co 44,000 sinh vien dang theo hoc o day voi khoang 27,000 du hoc sinh quoc te. Ben canh do, University of Melbourne con dung dau ve ty le hai long cua sinh vien ve co so vat chat cung nhu chat luong giang day cua nha truong. 
 
 
  ------------------------------------------------------
 
AVSS (Australian Visa & Student Services)
 
La to chuc giao duc hang dau tai Uc ho tro du hoc sinh du hoc tai Uc tu nam 1996 voi 12 chi nhanh tai cac nuoc Dong Nam A va 4 van phong tai 4 thanh pho lon cua Uc.
AVSS cung cap dich vu tu van chinh xac va nhiet tinh; ho tro cac ban hoc sinh, sinh vien khong chi o Viet Nam ma con tai Uc. 
 
 ------------------------------------------------------

Are you interested in studying in the U.S. but have no idea where to start?  Then, this event is for you!  To kick off International Education Week 2015, the U.S. Consulate will be organizing a full-day’s orientation for Vietnamese parents and students.  This event is designed not only to guide Vietnamese students through the decision making process of studying in the U.S., but for those wondering what kind of jobs they can get in Vietnam after studying abroad, you will also hear about employment opportunities in Vietnam. Consular Officers, EducationUSA advisors, professionals in various industries and local alumni will be there to answer questions about visas, financial aid and career opportunities. Don’t miss it!

MORNING
0800 - 0830 | Students Arrive for Registration
0840 - 0845 | Brief Welcome and Outline of Day
0900 - 1000 | Demystifying the Student Visa Application Process (Consular Officer)
1000 - 1045 | Your 5 Steps to U.S. Study:
Research Your Options/Finance Your Studies/Complete Your Application/Apply for Your Student Visa/ Prepare for Your Departure (EducationUSA Advisors)
1045 - 1100 | Coffee Break
1100 - 1200 | Mini Fair: Government Scholarship and Exchange Programs & Available resources at the Consulate (YSEALI/Fulbright/Humphrey/UGRAD/American Center & EducationUSA) 
Format: Mini Fair
Program intro & materials distributions
American Center services/activities, membership card registration
EducationUSA onsite advising

AFTERNOON
1300 - 1330 | Registration
1400 - 1410 | Remarks from Consul General Rena Bitter
1415 - 1515 | Vietnamese Workforce: Projected Career Trends in Vietnam  
1515 - 1530 | Coffee Break
1530 - 1700 | Round-table discussion with alumni of U.S. institutions: Study in the U.S. and Career Opportunities
1700 | Program Ends

This activity is an introduction to the Art of Poi Spinning. 
The class is open to beginner. Group of 10 people maximum.

Session 1: November 18th – Understanding the spinning geometry
During this first session you will learn how to understand the geometry of Poi Spinning
This is the most important step to make sure that you will progress in the right direction in the future. 

Session 2: November 25th – Basic Moves & Direction changes 
During this second session you will learn the basics of direction changes. This will bring you more freedom and will help you to spin in a natural way

Session 3: December 9th – Introduction to Fire Spinning
During this last session you will get to try to spin real fire. After learning about the fire safety procedure, you will experience your first fire spinning. Emotion guaranteed.

Price: 50.000 vnd per class, material included.

About the teacher:

Morgan Mugnier started to spin poi in 2007 during a trip to south America, then he did his first shows in Vietnam back in 2009. In 2010 he co founded Ultimate Fireshow Experience in China with his partner Jeremy. Since then they’ve been spinning fire from Spain, France & Switzerland to Thailand, Singapore, Philippines, China and now Vietnam since 2013.

*winner of iTunes 'Hip Hop Album of the Year' 2012

***************************************************************************

Loud Minority and Pasteur Street Brewing Company are delighted to announce that award-winning hip-hop artist, ODDISEE will be taking in Saigon on his maiden Asia tour this November.

Winner of iTunes Hip Hop Album of the Year award in 2012, Oddisee (Amir Mohamed) is the son of Sudanese and American parents, and was born and raised in the United States capital city of Washington DC, spending hot summers in Khartoum learning Arabic and swimming in the Nile.

Growing up amidst the sounds of New York hip hop, his father playing Oud, Go-Go, and gospel, Amir took his first steps as an MC/producer in the analog basement studio of his legendary neighbor, Garry Shider (Parliament, Funkadelic). 

Though Oddisee has gone on to perform with The Roots, produce for Freeway, Jazzy Jeff, Little Brother, De La Soul & Nikki Jean, and collaborate with Kendrick Lamar, J Cole, Flying Lotus, Hudson Mohawke and Kev Brown, his proudest moment was the birth of his critically acclaimed group The Diamond District with fellow Washingtonians X.O. and yU.

Oddisee’s debut album "People Hear What They See" (released June 2012) is a culmination of the duality of his life experiences, from DC internal politics to third world struggles, the line between love and selfishness, and the personal conflict between self-sabotage and progress set to a backdrop of intricate drums, lush instrumentation, and soul-stirring harmonies. It has received widespread acclaim at a time when the genre seems to have lost its way among a sea of self-aggrandizing and petty squabbles.  The album hit the billboards in both North America and Europe in June 2012 and was supported by large tours taking in over 70 cities.

Oddisee’s 2015 follow-up, The Good Fight, picks up where his debut left off and takes the listener on a more soulful jazz tip with a rich musicality while the lyrical content remains poignant and grounded in reality. His idiosyncratic delivery is unmistakable and true to his identity, even rapping in Arabic on ‘A List of Withouts’.

As one of the most exciting and ground-breaking artists in hip-hop today, we are extremely excited that this prodigious talent will be gracing the Loud Minority stage on 17th November at Cargo.

* Chu de: Yeu to ca nhan va gia dinh quyet dinh viec trao quyen o nguoi phu nu (TS. Le Ngoc Uyen va ThS. Nguyen Ngoc Danh)

* Thoi gian va dia diem:
11h00, thu Nam, 19-11-2015
Hoi truong H.001, Khoa Kinh te UEH

* Tom tat:
Phu nu dong mot vai tro quan trong trong gia dinh, trong cong dong va trong xa hoi. Phu nu co thien chuc la sinh con va cham soc con nho. Nhung nguon luc ma ho co the huy dong de thuc hien nhiem vu nay se quyet dinh viec pha vo vong luan quan cua ngheo doi tu the he nay sang the he khac. Tuy nhien phu nu thuong bi thiet thoi hon nam gioi trong giao duc, cham soc suc khoe, tiep can voi cac nguon luc… Khi xa hoi ngay cang phat trien thi phu nu phai duoc trao quyen va dau tu nhieu hon. Co nhu the ho co the phat huy manh me vai tro cua minh trong viec giam ngheo. Trao quyen cho phu nu la mot qua trinh dong dien ra tren nhieu linh vuc: kinh te, xa hoi, van hoa, gia dinh/ca nhan, phap ly, chinh tri va tam ly. Viec trao quyen cua phu nu ngay cang duoc uu tien quan tam trong linh vuc kinh te va xa hoi. Hon nua, viec thuc day binh dang gioi va trao quyen cho phu nu la muc tieu dung thu ba trong cac Muc tieu Phat trien Thien nien ky (MDG). Xu huong nay dang dan chiem tam quan trong trong viec lien ket mot cach hop li va tich cuc giua su ngheo kho va khong co duoc trao quyen, boi vi khong co kha nang cung cap cac nhu cau co ban thi se khong co kha nang thuc hien nhung su lua chon co y nghia (Malhotra et al., 2002; Abdel Mowla, 2009). Muc tieu cua nghien cuu tim ra cac yeu to anh huong den muc do trao quyen cho phu nu tai Viet Nam. Nhom nghien cuu su dung bo dũ lieu dieu tra ve nguon luc ho gia dinh Viet Nam (VAHRS) nam 2012 de phát hiẹn các nhóm yéu tó cá nhan và gia dình ảnh huỏng dén viẹc trao quyèn cho phụ nũ tại gia dình. Két quả nghien cúu giúp các co quan nhà nuóc xay dụng các chính sách phù họp dẻ thúc dảy trao quyèn cho phụ nũ, giúp họ phat huy manh me vai tro cua minh trong tham gia chính trị, kinh té và viẹc sủ dụng và phan bỏ các nguon lục . 

* Nguoi trinh bay: 
TS. Le Ngoc Uyen hien la giang vien tai Khoa Kinh te, Dai hoc Kinh te TP.HCM. TS. Uyen chuyen giang day va nghien cuu ve kinh te phat trien. 
ThS. Nguyen Ngoc Danh la giang vien tai Khoa Kinh te, Dai hoc Kinh te TP.HCM. ThS. Danh hien cung dang la Nghien cuu sinh tai Chuong trinh Phap-Viet ve dao tao quan ly (CFVG).

The "Beaujolais Nouveau" celebration will take place for the second time in HCMC at the rooftop bar Ontop of the Novotel Saigon Center.

This typically French tradition, taking place every year on the third Thursday of November, marks the end of the annual grape harvest and the release of the “Beaujolais” popular red wine.

We are glad to invite you to come and celebrate the tradition in Vietnam and strengthen friendship between Vietnam and France.

Entrance fee (including a free-flow of Beaujolais Nouveau and canapes):
- Presale (until November 18th): 650,000 VND
- Onsite: 800,000 VND

Points of sale:
► CCIFV office: Landmark Building 15th Fl., 5B Ton Duc Thang, District 1 (Everyday from 9am to 6pm)
► Vin Descombe Shop: 118 D2 Street, P.25, Binh Thanh District (Everyday from 9am to 7pm)
► UFE Reception Desk, Le Terroir: 30 Thai Van Lung, District 1 (Every Monday from 12:30pm to 2pm)

We are looking forward to seeing you there to celebrate the tradition!

Dear friends,

Our next NetworkGirls Evening Event will take place 6:30 to 9:00pm, Thursday evening, November 19th, at the Social Club at the (new) Hotel des Arts Saigon in District 3. Please reserve your spot (via email) by Tuesday the 17th if you plan to attend.  

Cost: VND 500,000 per pax, including tax and gratuity. 
 
The Social Club at Hotel des Arts is offering us an assortment of delicious food and beverage, including:

-Tuna tartar on sesame crackers,
-Mushroom arancini lollipops (vegetarian),
-Crispy chicken wonton,
-Feta and cherry tomato (vegetarian),
-Chicken sate skewers,
-Coffee choux for dessert, and,
-House wine (selection of reds and whites), beer (Saigon Special, Heineken), and soft drinks. 
 
Reservations by email are required and once confirmed a 100% charge will incur. Payment will be received on-site and an administrator shall follow-up with you for a no-show fee. Cancellations will be accepted at least 48 hours before the event date. Kindly send your confirmation of attendance to Van at NetworkGirlsHCMC@gmail.com no later than 12:00pm on Tuesday, November 17, 2015, so we can let our generous venue know an accurate headcount.  
 
Sincerely,
 
Pam, Rachel, and Van

• Ticket entrance : 60.000 VND (01 drink included)

During the national tournament, lots of students coming to cheer for the young teams around Vietnam.

The Youth Supporters Group will organize these students again as a special team to support for the international tournament in which a selection team from the national tournament as U21 Vietnam will compete together with current champions U21 HAGL (Hoang Anh Gia Lai) and 4 international teams from ASEAN (Thailand, Myanmar, Singapore) and South Korea.

The team will not only support for Vietnamese teams but lend a hand to supporters of ASEAN teams during the tournament as well through this channel: https://www.facebook.com/1670549586517932 or http://aseansupporters.wordpress.com

REGISTRATION AS INTERNATIONAL SUPPORTERS 

For Vietnamese supporters: https://codongvien.wordpress.com/2015/11/10/dang-ky-tham-gia-cac-doi-hinh-co-vu-cho-giai-bong-da-u21-quoc-te-bao-thanh-nien/  

For ASEAN supporters: https://aseansupporters.wordpress.com/2015/11/11/registration-as-international-supporters-for-thanh-nien-intl-u21-football-tournament/

Closing ceremony

INFORMATION FOR AUDIENCE

Venue: Thong Nhat (Unification) Stadium
Maximum pax: 25000-30000 seats

- A Stand (Nguyen Kim gate): for press (A2), VIP (A1), audience (A2, A3, A4, A5) and supporters for away teams (A2, A3). Ticket price: 150.000d/pax (~7USD)

- B Stand (Dao Duy Tu gate, with flag poles, opposite to A Stand): for audience and general supporters. Ticket price: 100.000d/pax (~5USD).

- C Stand (Dao Duy T gate, with scoring boarch): for audience and supporters of U21 HAGL. Ticket price: 50.000d/pax.

- D Stand (Tan Phuoc gate, opposite to C Stand): for audience and supporters of U21 BTN and U21 HAGL. Ticket price: 50.000d/pax .

Thanh Nien U21 Int'l Football Championship to kick off in November

Reigning champion Hoang Anh Gia Lai Arsenal JMG may need its best players to defend its U21 International Football Championship title when the tournament kicks off in Ho Chi Minh City on November 20.

The 9th annual event, organized by Thanh Nien Newspaper, has attracted several strong teams, including those from Malaysia, Myanmar and South Korea. 

More teams from Australia and Thailand are considering joining, organizers said.

“Myanmar will send the team that has competed at the recent U20 World Cup in New Zealand, with seven new players who won the silver medal at last month’s 28th Southeast Asian Games in Singapore,” said Tran Quoc Tuan, deputy chairman of Vietnam Football Federation.

“Meanwhile, South Korea may send the team that defeated Vietnam 6-0 at the U20 World Cup qualifying round. It will be a tough competition with many strong players,” he said.

The championship will kick off at Ho Chi Minh City’s Thong Nhat Stadium, from November 20-30.

A domestic version of the tournament will be held at the same venue from October 20-30 to select two best local teams to play at the international event.

A total of 25 teams nationwide will be divided to four groups to select seven teams. Together with the host team of Ho Chi Minh City, these seven teams will then play in the final rounds.

http://www.thanhniennews.com/sports/thanh-nien-u21-intl-football-championship-to-kick-off-in-november-47726.html

Trai nghiem dem tiec ruou thuong hang voi ca huong phi le nuong pho mai va ot chuong (ket hop voi ruou sam banh Moet Imperial), banh bot Y nhan tom hum va mang tay tron Cous Cous (ket hop voi ruou sam banh Moet Rose), thit be dung voi gan ngong ap chao vi giam balsamic (ket hop voi ruou sam banh Grand vintage 2004 - 2006). Dragonfly Theatre Company are proud to present their hilarious upcoming play "Lawrence and Holloman"  by acclaimed playwright, Morris Panych. 
 
How is it that some people can have so much going for them 
and other people not a thing going for them at all? 
 
A hapless nerd and a loquacious salesman, meet by chance.  Thus starts the story of the pathologically pessimistic Holloman and his perennially optimistic colleague, Lawrence. From this fleeting encounter, the incredulously bizarre plot of their insignificant and meaningless lives unfolds in this deliciously dark comedy.

Friday 20th November
Saturday 21st November

Bac thay mix nhac Disco, House va Techno den tu Berlin se quay tro lai thanh pho lan thu hai – va lan dau tien tai dia diem moi cua The Observatory – trong mot dem nhac hiem co voi nhung am thanh dien tu duoc hoa tron muot ma, hoan toan duoc tao ra de lam rung dong san nhay.

La chu hang dia White Record & Rimini va la mot nhan vat noi tieng cua Cau lac bo Berghain/Panorama Bar o Berlin, OSKAR OFFERMANN con la mot nha san xuat am nhac va DJ ten tuoi. Su dung ca nhung thiet bi va phuong phap san xuat am nhac ky thuat so va analog, nhung sang tac cua Offermann the hien tiem nang cua am nhac dien tu, vua chua day xuc cam cua tam hon vua loi cuon do may moc dem lai, trong khi do nhung buoi bieu dien cua anh mang den ca mot vu tru cua am thanh duoc sang tac bang tri tuong tuong giau co, da dang va la thuong cua con nguoi.

Voi the manh vuot troi nay khi bieu dien, anh duoc danh gia la mot nghe si rat nang dong trong nen am nhac dien tu dang bung no o Chau Au, va anh se tro lai The Observatory lan nay de cong hien cho nhung khan gia mot dem nhac soi dong, manh me va day loi cuon.  

Moi ban den dem nhac de cam nhan suc manh cua am thanh.

Ho tro boi KIN (The Observatory)

Chuong trinh bat dau: 10PM/ Mien phi truoc 11PM/150.000VND sau 11PM

___________________________________________________
THONG TIN NGHE SIOSKAR OFFERMANN (WHITE, Rimini, Mule, Berlin)

2010 la mot nam thanh cong cua Oskar Offermann. Oskar, mot nhac si song o Berlin va lon len o Frankfurt, la cai ten thuong xuyen xuat hien tren bang xep hang nhac Deephouse tai nhieu cua hieu. Nguoi ta biet den anh la mot nghe si bat dau truong thanh, duoc san don boi nhung cong ty, dai ly booking DJ khap Chau Au.

Va khi hang dia “WHITE” cua anh phat trien tro thanh mot noi gui gam tin cay cua cac DJ, thi danh sach nhung nguoi ung ho anh khong ngung keo dai them mai.

Trong nhung buoi bieu dien cua minh, Oskar tap trung choi Deephouse va Disco. Voi cam nhan tinh te danh cho nhung bai hat va giai dieu, cac dem nhac cua anh luon luon tran day nhung am thanh va giai dieu nguyen so, loi cuon. Viec xuat ban album dau tay “Do Pilots Still Dream Of Flying?” da khien anh hoan toan tro thanh mot nha san xuat am nhac va DJ day sang tao. 

Moi cac ban vao xem cac duong link sau:

http://www.oskaroffermann.com/
http://www.facebook.com/OskarOffermannOfficial
http://www.residentadvisor.net/dj/oskaroffermann
http://www.soundcloud.com/oskaroffermann


_____________________ ENGLISH______________________

The Berlin-based Disco, House and Techno mix maestro is returning to our city for the second time - and to the new venue for the first - in what will definitely be a night of rare, seamlessly mixed electronic sounds absolutely designed to get the floor shaking. 

Boss of the White Record label & Rimini and a well-known figure of the Berghain/Panorama Bar in Berlin, OSKAR OFFERMANN is a production and DJ force to be reckoned with. Using both digital and analog instrumentation and approaches, Offermann’s productions are exposes of the potential for electronic music to be both soulful and hypnotically machine-like simultaneously, while his sets reflect the galaxy of sound that has been produced by the rich, diverse & often strange ecosystem of human imagination. 

This power on the dance floor has established him as a highly dynamic figure in the exploding European electronic music scene, and he’ll be coming back to show us how he does it once again. 

Sound Power. 

Support by KIN (The Observatory)

doors 10pm / Free before 11PM / 150K after

___
BIO

OSKAR OFFERMANN (WHITE, Rimini, Mule, Berlin)

2010 was a good year for Oskar Offermann. The Berlin resident and Frankfurt grown up Oskar, was constantly in the Deephouse charts of many stores. His reputation as an artist began to grow, followed by DJ bookings all over Europe. 

But also his record label "WHITE" developed into a sureshot for DJs with a reliable sense of style. The list of supporters is endless.

In his DJ Sets, Oskar focuses on Deep house and Disco. Often raw, always groovy and with a sense for songs and melodies. With the release of his debut album „Do Pilots Still Dream Of Flying?“ he has fully arrived as a creative producer and DJ.

This month at Startup Grind Ho Chi Minh City, we welcome Mr Mike Cassidy, a vice president at Google and Project Leader on GoogleX Project Loon (balloon-powered Internet for everyone).
Join us to learn amazing stories from our fireside interview with Mike, "Startup King" as named by USA Today with 4 consecutively successful startups under his belt prior to joining Google.

Check out his personal site at: http://mikecassidy.me/
Get your tickets at: http://bit.ly/sughcm13
 
Agenda:
+ 5.30pm: Open door and networking time
+ 6.00pm: Fireside interview with Mr Mike Cassidy
+ 7.00pm: Networking Time
 
Tickets:
+ Early Bird: VND 150,000
+ Standard: VND 200,000

Yummy food and drinks will be provided. The interview will be conducted in English.
=====
About the speaker:
 
Mike Cassidy is a Vice President at Google.  He is currently the Project Leader on GoogleX Project Loon (balloon-powered Internet for everyone).   Prior to joining Google, Mike was the Co-Founder and CEO of four start-ups: Ruba, Xfire, Direct Hit, and Stylus Innovation.  

Ruba helped travelers share their favorite places and was acquired by Google.  Xfire helps gamers play online with their friends and was acquired by MTV for $110 million.  Direct Hit was a revolutionary search engine whose customers included MSN, Lycos, AOL, etc. and was acquired by Ask Jeeves for $500 million.  Stylus Innovation’s flagship product was computer telephony software Visual Voice.  Artisoft acquired Stylus for $13M. 

Mike has a BS/MS in Aerospace Engineering from MIT.  He graduated from Harvard Business School.  He studied jazz piano at Berklee College of Music.  

He has been an advisor to From the Top, Jazz at Lincoln Center, Endeavor.org, and numerous startup companies.  He was selected for the DEMO Lifetime Achievement Award, nominated for a Webby award, and named a Forbes E-gang Trendsetter.  His startup products have won PC Magazine’s Top 100 Websites, Computer Telephony Product of the Year, CNET Editor’s Choice, PC Magazine’s Editor’s Choice, and many other awards.

Le hoi truyen thong EFAIR2015 se duoc to chuc vao ngay 21 thang 11 nam 2015, voi cac hoat dong du kien nhu sau: 

EF Gallery Walk: trien lam hinh anh cua khoa, cuu sinh vien va sinh vien qua cac thoi ky. 

EF Share: chia se va gop y ve chuong trinh dao tao cua cac nha tuyen dung va cuu sinh vien. 

EF Connection: gap go chia se kinh nghiem giua cuu sinh vien va sinh vien.

EF Gala- Alumni Reunion: dem van nghe giao luu cac the he cuu sinh vien va trao hoc bong cho sinh vien dang hoc tap tai khoa.

Ban than men,

Xin phep duoc ke ban cau chuyen: co mot nguoi phu nu tre, thanh dat, la mot giam doc kinh doanh cua mot khach san nam sao co tieng tai Sai Gon, be ngoai chi xung tam voi nhung chuc danh ma nguoi ta trao tang cho chi, voi thu nhap ma khien ai cung phai ghen ti. Tuong chung nhu vay se dem lai su vien man hanh phuc vi chi da dung duoc o mot vi tri ma khien nhieu nguoi mo uoc khong chi rieng phu nu.

Nhung ket thuc hon 8 tieng lam viec, chi tro ve nha va bien thanh mot nguoi hoan toan khac: met moi, so hai, dau tranh noi tam, dau tranh voi nhung mau thuan cua gia dinh lien tuc, khien chi bi stress nang ne va dan den chung thoat vi dia dem nghiem trong. Va ngay hom sau chi lai khoac lop vo chung chac, manh me de tiep tuc cong viec giam doc cua minh. Mot thoi gian keo dai chi hoan toan kiet suc va can benh ngay mot nang khien chi phai tim gap den nhieu bac si va tra ve chi nhan mot tin set danh la phai mo ngay de can benh khong the keo dai nua.

Va luc nay chi suc tinh, chi nhan ra minh da huy hoai cuoc song minh den muc nhu the nao chi vi chon kin nhung noi dau ca ve the xac va tinh than, tu do chi tiep tuc tiep xuc duoc voi nhung kien thuc moi, lao vao tim hieu chuyen sau ve NLP, chua duoc can benh cho minh va ket noi lai voi gia dinh, cuoc song va giup cho hang tram con nguoi co chung hoan canh thoat duoc nhung mo roi ren va nhung ton thuong hoa nhap lai voi cuoc song.

Cau chuyen tren chinh la doi thuc cua Carla Phuong Cao - Nguoi se truc tiep giang day khoa hoc NLP - Live With Power sap duoc to chuc tai cong ty Con Bao Trieu Phu vao ngay 21 & 22.11. 

Khoa hoc dac biet o cho: 
Neu ban tu nhan minh la mot con nguoi hoan toan hanh phuc, tu luc au tho cho den hien tai ban deu song trong cuoc song mau hong, thi that tuyet voi, chung toi chuc mung cho may man cua ban va xin khang dinh khoa hoc nay khong phu hop cho ban.
NHUNG doi voi nhung ban chua duoc may man nhu vay:
-	Gap ton thuong ve tinh than: mat mat gia dinh, ban be, ban doi, con vat nuoi hoac mot chan thuong tam ly tu thuo xa xua.
-	Gap ton thuong ve the xac: dang gap phai nhung can benh dang ngay dem day vo tam hon va con nguoi ban.
-	Chua xac dinh nguyen nhan tai sao den hom nay ban van chua co duoc Hanh phuc tron ven.
-	Ban am anh so hai va luon nghi minh se that bai
-	Ban chua biet kiem soat cam xuc va hay bi cam xuc tieu cuc tac dong

Vay thi Ngay hom nay, hay giup chung toi mot viec, hay dang ky cho minh khoa hoc NLP - Live With Power. Chi trong 2 ngay, voi tat ca tam huyet tu mot nguoi da vuc day tu nhung ton that ve tam ly va the xac co the co duoc hanh phuc moi ngay nhu hom nay - Carla Phuong Cao se tan tinh chua lanh va xoa sach cho ban.

– Binh Loi. 

- Dong thoi du an Lavita Garden con ket noi voi ga so 10 - ga Binh Thai (Lavita Station) cua tuyen metro Ben Thanh - Suoi Tien (chi cach 1 phut). Theo ke hoach, tuyen metro se duoc hoan tat vao cuoi nam 2017. Do do, viec di chuyen cua cu dan chung cu LAVITA GARDEN vao trung tam Thanh pho se duoc thuan loi va kinh te hon.

Ban than men,

Toi biet den mot nguoi me vua sinh xong dua con thu 2, phai tu minh trai qua 2 nam tu ki am thi ma khong biet cau cuu ai, dieu nay khien co co cam giac cam ghet chinh dua con minh vua sinh ra.
 
Dieu gi khien nguoi me nay hanh dong nhu vay?
 
Toi biet den mot ban tre luon noi doi ve cuoc song cua minh voi moi nguoi xung quanh chi vi ap luc tu phia gia dinh, dieu nay khien co phai tu vat lon voi nhung cam xuc tieu cuc ben trong minh ma khong the chia se cung ai, co bi tram cam trong suot 4 nam troi.
 
Dieu gi khien ban tre nay tro nen nhu vay?
 
Bo mon khoa hoc NLP co the giai dap nhung cau hoi tren!
 
Ban than men,
 
Han ban dang tu hoi vi sao VietPeaks lai gioi thieu den ban bo mon khoa hoc nay?
NLP la mot mon khoa hoc khong phai ai cung co the giang day duoc, vi no co the keo theo nhieu he luy khac neu ban khong duoc huong dan mot cach ti mi va co tam.
NLP la mot mon hoc khong the giang day qua sach vo, nen toi khong the gui tang ban mot bo tai lieu nao ten goi NLP.
Toi se gioi thieu den ban mot khoa hoc ma toi da duoc chung kien su thay doi cua rat nhieu nguoi tu day. Khoa hoc duoc truc tiep giang day tu nguoi phu nu phai song cung luc song 2 cuoc song khac nhau:
Mot la cuoc song thanh dat va giau co.
Mot la cuoc song chiu nhieu ap luc, phai lien tuc dau tranh noi tam, dau tranh voi nhung mau thuan gia dinh.
Chi da phai nho den NLP de vuot qua nhung noi am anh, su met moi, mau thuan gia dinh, tham chi la can benh vi chiu qua nhieu ap luc. Nho NLP, chi da co the lay lai can bang cho cuoc song cua minh, khac phuc tat ca nhung van de trong cuoc song.
Khoa hoc NLP can ban cua Master NLP Carla Phuong Cao se giup ban co the hieu ro nhat cach thuc de nhan ra duoc phan cam xuc an sau ben trong ban, dang chi phoi cuoc song cua ban mot cach de dang nhat.
Voi chinh trai nghiem cua minh, chi Carla Phuong Cao se giup ban vuot qua nhung cam xuc khien cuoc song cua ban bi co lap theo chinh cach ma chi da vuot qua.
Ban se khong phai mot minh vat lon voi mo cam xuc hon don, ban se khong phai tu minh nem trai nhung khoang thoi gian khung hoang ma chinh ban than ban khong biet dieu do den tu dau.
Cau chuyen tren chinh la doi thuc cua Carla Phuong Cao - Nguoi se truc tiep giang day khoa hoc NLP - Live With Power sap duoc to chuc tai cong ty Con Bao Trieu Phu vao ngay 5 & 6.12. 

Khoa hoc dac biet o cho: 
Neu ban tu nhan minh la mot con nguoi hoan toan hanh phuc, tu luc au tho cho den hien tai ban deu song trong cuoc song mau hong, thi that tuyet voi, chung toi chuc mung cho may man cua ban va xin khang dinh khoa hoc nay khong phu hop cho ban.
NHUNG doi voi nhung ban chua duoc may man nhu vay:
-	Gap ton thuong ve tinh than: mat mat gia dinh, ban be, ban doi, con vat nuoi hoac mot chan thuong tam ly tu thuo xa xua.
-	Gap ton thuong ve the xac: dang gap phai nhung can benh dang ngay dem day vo tam hon va con nguoi ban.
-	Chua xac dinh nguyen nhan tai sao den hom nay ban van chua co duoc Hanh phuc tron ven.
-	Ban am anh so hai va luon nghi minh se that bai
-	Ban chua biet kiem soat cam xuc va hay bi cam xuc tieu cuc tac dong

Vay thi Ngay hom nay, hay giup chung toi mot viec, hay dang ky cho minh khoa hoc NLP - Live With Power. Chi trong 2 ngay, voi tat ca tam huyet tu mot nguoi da vuc day tu nhung ton that ve tam ly va the xac co the co duoc hanh phuc moi ngay nhu hom nay - Carla Phuong Cao se tan tinh chua lanh va xoa sach cho ban.

Cac “chuong ngai vat” thu vi dang cho don cac ban hang tuan. Hay theo doi event moi ngay va keu goi ban be cung tham gia ngay nhe! 

DAU TRUONG SINH TU
Cac cau hoi cua thu thach thu hai "Dau truong sinh tu" se duoc tiet lo tren event vao 12h trua cac ngay 7,9,11,13/11/2015.

Rat nhieu thu moi dac biet cho buoi cong chieu cua bo phim tai Ha Noi va TP.HCM dang cho doi “chu nhan” cua minh.

Benh tim mach da va dang la van de suc khoe duoc quan tam hang dau tren the gioi voi ty le tu vong va tan phe dung hang dau. Uoc tinh cua To Chuc Y Te The Gioi (WHO) cho thay, hang nam co khoang 17 trieu nguoi bi tu vong do benh tim mach.

Nham gop phan cham soc, nang cao suc khoe cho nguoi dan va tao dieu kien cho cong dong co co hoi tam soat phat hien, du phong va dieu tri som cac benh ly ve tim mach . Cong Ty TNHH MTV OneHealth va To Truyen Thong - Giao Duc Suc Khoe (T3G) Benh Vien Da Khoa Hong Duc cung phoi hop to chuc chuong trinh Hoi Thao“Tam soat Benh ly tim mach” tai hoi truong Benh Vien Da Khoa Hong Duc. Bac si Chau Khac Tuan se tu van mien phi ve nhung benh ly lien quan den tim mach nhu:

- Benh mach vanh 
- Tai bien mach mau nao
- Benh dong mach ngoai bien
- Benh van tim hau thap tim
- Benh tim bam sinh
- Phinh dong mach chu
- Benh viem co tim

Ngoai ra, ban to chuc chuong trinh se danh nhung uu dai cho quy khach tham du hoi thao nhu:

1. Tang 150 phieu kham chuyen khoa tim mach
2. Tang 10 phieu sieu am tim 
3. Tang 10 phieu kham tong quat tim doi voi khach hang tham gia the hoi vien an toan suc khoe tai chinh tai buoi Hoi Thao 21/11/2015.

Cac phan qua tren ban se duoc nhan sau khi ket thuc chuong trinh hoi thao, doi voi cac phieu kham benh mien phi ban se duoc kham truc tiep tai benh vien da khoa Hong Duc.

De duoc tham gia hoi thao quy khach vui long lam theo nhung huong dan sau:

Tai chinh cho startup la nhung kien thuc thiet yeu ma nhung nha sang lap phai biet de quan ly nguon tien mot cach hieu qua tu nhung ngay dau thanh lap. Quan li dong tien con la mot chien luoc kinh doanh can duoc phan tich ki luong va xay dung. Nhung nha sang lap phai kiem soat duoc tai chinh cua doanh nghiep trong giai doan khoi dung. Day la mot trong nhung mau chot thanh cong sau nay. 
 
Voi su tham gia cua Ts. Ngo Minh Hai, Managing Partner cua quy dau tu Viet Nam Thinh Vuong (PVNi). Anh cung tham gia giang day tai khoa Ngan Hang cua Dai hoc kinh te THHCM. Ngoai ra anh con la nguoi viet ra chuong trinh giang day cho chuong trinh 100 Hat Giong Doanh Nhan tai Da Nang. 
 
Qua Workshop Tai Chinh cho Nha Sang Lap nay, cac founders se co duoc: 

- Khai niem co ban ve tai chinh trong startup. 
- Dieu hanh, quan ly co tinh toan voi nguon tien. 
- Nhung thuat toan de toi uu viec su dung ngan sach. 
- Du doan ke hoach dai han. 
- Bao cao dinh ky voi nha dau tu

Voi nhung bai tap cu the, SHIELD mong muon mang lai nhung gia tri dich thuc nhat cho Startup cua ban.
Hay dat ve tai: https://ticketbox.vn/event/startup-essential-finance-for-founders-50628

Voi hon 9 nam kinh nghiem trong linh vuc nhan su va le tan chuyen sau, Jolie Siam mang den cho ban lop "DISC - Thuat thau hieu long nguoi".

What do you usually do on Saturday night? Go for coffee with friends? Chat-chit? Spend time with your family??? Yes, a lot of things to do. BUT WE HAVE A VERY SPECIAL PROGRAM FOR YOU TO JOIN: Giving Food to the Homeless on Saturday night November 21, 2015 (17:00 we prepare the food; 21:00 we go out and deliver to the homeless around HCMC)

Benh tim mach da va dang la van de suc khoe duoc quan tam hang dau tren the gioi voi ty le tu vong va tan phe dung hang dau. Uoc tinh cua To Chuc Y Te The Gioi (WHO) cho thay, hang nam co khoang 17 trieu nguoi bi tu vong do benh tim mach.

Nham gop phan cham soc, nang cao suc khoe cho nguoi dan va tao dieu kien cho cong dong co co hoi tam soat phat hien, du phong va dieu tri som cac benh ly ve tim mach . Cong Ty TNHH MTV OneHealth va To Truyen Thong - Giao Duc Suc Khoe (T3G) Benh Vien Da Khoa Hong Duc cung phoi hop to chuc chuong trinh Hoi Thao“Tam soat Benh ly tim mach” tai hoi truong Benh Vien Da Khoa Hong Duc. Bac si Chau Khac Tuan se tu van mien phi ve nhung benh ly lien quan den tim mach nhu:

- Benh mach vanh 
- Tai bien mach mau nao
- Benh dong mach ngoai bien
- Benh van tim hau thap tim
- Benh tim bam sinh
- Phinh dong mach chu
- Benh viem co tim

Ngoai ra, ban to chuc chuong trinh se danh nhung uu dai cho quy khach tham du hoi thao nhu:

1. Tang 150 phieu kham chuyen khoa tim mach
2. Tang 10 phieu sieu am tim 
3. Tang 10 phieu kham tong quat tim doi voi khach hang tham gia the hoi vien an toan suc khoe tai chinh tai buoi Hoi Thao 21/11/2015.
Tham du chuong trinh khach hang con co co hoi so huu may do huyet ap co tay DK39 tu nha tai tro Hung Hy.

Cac phan qua tren ban se duoc nhan sau khi ket thuc chuong trinh hoi thao, doi voi cac phieu kham benh mien phi ban se duoc kham truc tiep tai benh vien da khoa Hong Duc.

Sau 2 dot to chuc thanh cong cua cuoc thi "Manh ho VANH DAI XANH" Lan I vao ngay 19/9/2015 & Lan II vao ngay 24/10/2015, VANH DAI XANH tiep tuc to chuc cuoc thi lan III vao ngay 21/11/2015. VANH DAI XANH xin nhac lai the le va cach thuc tham gia nhu sau:

I. Hinh thuc thi: uong 01 chai bia Tiger nhanh nhat co the. Nguoi uong xong chai bia dau tien se la nguoi chien thang. Truong hop bi do bia ra ngoai, bi uot ao do bia tran, con bia can trong chai se bi loai. Sau tin hieu cua trong tai, nguoi nao dat chai bia xuong ban truoc ma khong pham quy se chien thang. Trong truong hop co nhieu nguoi cung hoan thanh nhanh nhat thi nhung nguoi do se tiep tuc thi cho den khi co nguoi chien thang. Ban To chuc se co may quay phim de xac dinh cac truong hop pham quy va xac dinh nguoi chien thang mot cach cong bang nhat co the.

II. Thoi gian to chuc: 01 thang 01 lan vao ngay thu 7 cua tuan thu 3 hang thang.

III. Doi tuong du thi: nguoi du 18 tuoi tro len, khong phan biet quoc tich, dan toc, ton giao, gioi tinh, …

IV. So luong du thi: 20 nguoi thi 01 lan moi thang. Nguoi chien thang trong thang se khong duoc du thi cac thang tiep theo. Nhung nguoi chien thang hang thang se duong nhien duoc du thi trong cuoc thi chung ket vao cuoi nam voi danh hieu “Sieu ho Vanh Dai Xanh”.

V. Thoi gian dang ky: tu 18 gio 00 ngay 15 hang thang. Ban To chuc chi uu tien cho 20 nguoi dau tien den dang ky tai am thuc Vanh Dai Xanh: 9 – 11 duong 270 Cao Lo, phuong 4, quan 8, TP. Ho Chi Minh. 

VI. Dia diem thi: am thuc Vanh Dai Xanh: 9 – 11 duong 270 Cao Lo, phuong 4, quan 8, TP. Ho Chi Minh.

VII. Thoi gian thi dau: 19 gio 00 ngay thu 7 cua tuan thu 3 hang thang. Khi den dang ky, nguoi du thi se duoc cap the tham gia hoi thi trong do se ghi ro cac thong tin ve ngay, gio, dia diem, hinh thuc thi, …

VIII. CO CAU GIAI THUONG:
1. Giai “Manh ho Vanh Dai Xanh” moi thang:
- 500.000VND tien mat
- Phieu qua tang am thuc Vanh Dai Xanh tri gia 500.000 VND.
- Huy hieu manh ho
2. Giai “Sieu ho Vanh Dai Xanh” cuoi nam:
- 1.000.000VND tien mat
- Phieu qua tang am thuc Vanh Dai Xanh tri gia 1.000.000 VND.
- Huy hieu sieu ho

Welcome to the German Ball 2015, inspired by the 1920’s this event promises to carry on the tradition of the first Ball in 2013.

Supported by prestigious brands including Becks, Bosch, Rodl & Partner, Deutsches Haus Vietnam, Emirates, B. Braun, Samhammer, TerraVerde and Viet Thuong, the Saigon’s second German ballroom dancing event in old European tradition promises to be a memorable evening and aims to become an annual highlight of the German social calendar. The program of the event includes a Champagne reception, classic ballroom dancing, and first class entertainment by two German bands and an exquisite gala dinner. Come and attend the upscale German Ball Saigon where you can entertain your business partners and friends as well as promote your brand to a discerning audience.

In a nutshell
Date:                21th November 2015, 6.30pm
Venue:            InterContinental Asiana Saigon
Bands:             Backhaus & Princess Cut
Host:                Lamou Van Lam Vissay
Dress code:    Black Tie
Ticket price:     3,500,000 VND
Ticket info:       Ms Antje Resech resech.antje@vietnam.ahk.de
Organizers:     AHK & GBA

For more information: http://german-ball-saigon.com

Ai da tung den du lich Da Lat chac han da den khu du lich LangBiang va len dinh nui bang cach di bo theo con duong nhua hoac bang xe Jeep. Neu mot lan nua den noi day, hay thu leo LangBiang bang hai hinh thuc khac de kham pha dinh nui huyen thoai du cach moi nay doi hoi ban nhieu suc luc hon nhung se cho ban mot cam giac hoan toan moi la.
Neu di bo theo con duong nhua ban mat khoang 2 gio hoac xe jeep mat khoang 15 phut. Len dinh nui, ngam nhin thanh pho Da Lat va dong Dankia Suoi Vang trong vai phut, di loanh quanh chup hinh roi lai xuong nui, doi voi nguoi tre tuoi chi co the la chua du. Dinh nui co tuong chang Lang va nang Biang ma ban tham quan do chinh la dinh Radar (cao 1929 m so voi mat nuoc bien)- mot trong ba dinh nui cao nhat cao nguyen Lam Vien, hai dinh nui cao nhat trong day LangBiang la nui Ong (cao 2124m) va nui Ba (cao 2167 m), trong do nui Ba chinh la dinh LangBiang o Da Lat ma ban nen chinh phuc.
Hay chon hinh thuc trekking, ban di theo duong mon khong bang phang, van se la di bo nhung ban phai bang qua nhung con suoi nho chay roc rach, rung thong xanh, nhung bui gai, nhung loi di chan day co cao hon dau nguoi…o vuon quoc gia Bidoup – nui Ba. Du khong de dang nhu di bo theo con duong nhua va cung mat thoi gian lau hon (3-4 gio) nhung qua nhung dia hinh nhu vay ban se luu lai duoc nhung hinh anh dep ve thien nhien ky thu. Sau nhieu gio “bang rung, loi suoi” nhu vay, khi len den dinh nui Ba – noc nha cua cao nguyen Lam Vien, nhin bao quat ra khong gian xung quanh, hit tho khong khi trong lanh, ngam nhin Da Lat tu tren cao chac han ban se co cam giac nhu minh la nguoi chien thang cung mot niem vui kho ta. Day co le la mot ky niem sau sac, mot trai nghiem thu vi trong doi.
Hay de chung toi cung ban thuc hien chuyen di day thu vi va nhieu thu thach nay. Clb hoat dong xa hoi Khat Vong Viet han hanh gioi thieu den cac ban chuyen di Da Lat 1 ngay ( 21/11/2015 – 22/11/2015) voi muc dich chinh phuc dinh LangBiang va trai nghiem 1 ngay cung Xuyen Viet. 
Neu ban chua biet Xuyen Viet la gi? Bao gom nhung ai? Hoat dong nhu the nao? Hay den voi chuyen di Da Lat  nay de duoc 1 ngay song la dan Xuyen Viet. Tang kha nang thich ung voi moi truong, tao duoc nhieu moi quan he va hon het nua, biet duoc minh la ai, gioi han cua minh nam o dau. Lieu ban than co the chinh phuc duoc LangBiang khong? Va neu duoc, thi tai sao khong, chung ta se cung chinh phuc dinh Fansipan huyen thoai. 
Noc nha Dong Duong cua The gioi dang cho ban! 
Ngay bay gio, hay cung chung toi chinh phuc dinh LangBiang de thoa suc tre nhe!

Qua day choi!!!!!!!!!

-------------------------------------------------
Please roll down for English !!!
-------------------------------------------------

That la mot dieu ky dieu! Tu noi xa nhat cua giai thien ha va tu nhung bien gioi vo danh cua nghe thuat nhac dien tu va trinh dien hinh anh hien dai ... buoi tiec COME TO DADDY lan thu 7 da tro lai voi chung ta!!!

Come to Daddy luon dem den cac nghe si tien phong voi nhung thu nghiem tao bao trong dong nhac dien tu va nghe thuat thi giac doc dao. Cac nghe si quoc te ky cuu se xuat hien tro lai gom BOTTLESMOKER (ID) va JASE NGUYEN (VN), cung ninja am thanh moi xuat hien SPACE360 (TH) , trong man ket hop day an tuong voi cac phu thuy cua hieu ung hinh anh YEN APUS (VN) va JEAN JOLLY (VN), se tung ra nhung loat tan cong bang am khi kieu ninja day ngoan muc, cung voi cac chieu kungfu cua hieu ung hinh anh day an tuong. 

Cac man trinh dien day lua cua BOTTLESMOKER (ID) la su ket hop cua nhac Dance, ky thuat dieu luyen va chat lieu Pop voi nhung nhac cu khong he Pop nhu do choi va cac thiet bi dien tu da duoc “do” lai. Am thanh cua ho goi nhac den Mum, Manitoba, Tunng, The Album Leaf va Isan. Bo doi Indonesia cung la nhung nguoi ung ho phong trao Copyleft - ban co the tai nhac cua ho MIEN PHI tren mang. Come to Daddy 7 se mang den cho cac ban tat ca cac ban nhac ma Bottlesmoker sang tao doc theo hanh trinh phieu luu cua minh.
http://soundcloud.com/bottlesmoker/
https://www.youtube.com/user/bottlesmokertv

SPACE360 den tu Thailand  la mot su doi moi cua Auttaratt Benz Photongnoppakun. Anh ay cung tao nen mot kich thuoc da dien cua dong nhac dien tu va khong bi bo buoc boi bat cu the loai nao. Do la cach tot nhat de giam anh ay trong mot can phong nhac dien tu. Ong cung la giang vien dac biet tai Vien DCI va ong da tu hoc nhu the nao de tao ra am nhac dien tu tu tuoi 17. Do la ket hop tu su pha tron doc dao cua psyched-ra downtempo voi hieu suat thi giac song psyched-out, SPACE360 hua hen se thu hut nhieu su chu y va so luong fan trong buoi ra mat dau tien cua anh.
http://soundcloud.com/space360
http://space360music.simplesite.com/

Lo and behold! From the farthest reaches of the galaxy and the unnamed frontiers of the media scape returns... COME TO DADDY !!! 

Ever featuring unique, unabashedly experimental, forward-thinking artists exploring electronic music and media performance in fresh yet familiar ways, Come to Daddy 7's international lining up includes BOTTLESMOKER (ID), JASE NGUYEN (VN) are joined by fellow sonic space beatmaker SPACE360 (TH) in glorious tandem with warrior witchdoctors of visual YEN APUS (VN) and JEAN JOLLY (VN) to unleash fantastic waves of grandisonant shurikens and experimental 3D-mapping kungfu. 

BOTTLESMOKER's fiery live performances combine spastic dance moves, madcap virtuosity and undeniable pop sensibility with un-pop instrumentation--consisting of toys, circuit-bent gadgetry and custom-built equipment. Their analog electronic alchemy hints of Mum, Manitoba, Tunng, The Album “Leaf and Isan”. These Indonesian pairs are also adamant copy left advocates--you can download all of their record online for FREE. Come to Daddy 7 will bring us all the exciting new music along the way using the sounds in the places that Bottlesmoker has visited. 
http://soundcloud.com/bottlesmoker/
https://www.youtube.com/user/bottlesmokertv

SPACE360 (TH) is musical alter ego of Auttaratt Benz Photongnoppakun and he creates multiple dimensions of Electronic Music Sound and he confines to no specific genres...It is the best to place him in Experiment Electronic Music and IDM room. He also special lecturer in DCI Institute and he taught himself how to create Electronic Music since the age of 17. Incorporating a unique blend of psyched-out downtempo with tripped-out live visual performance, SPACE360 will be attracting a lot attention and a fast growing fan base his debut performance this time.
http://soundcloud.com/space360
http://space360music.simplesite.com/


JASE NGUYEN (VN) has been producing and pioneering bottom-heavy beats since 2007 with his crew, The Beats Saigon. Flexing funk, hip hop and dubstep chops to vintage Vietnamese Rock drops, his eclectic and innovative stylings have seen him share the stage with the likes of Daedalus, Major Lazer, Gaslamp Killer.

Talkshow

Ban co biet Viet Nam da tung…? 
Co Rung vang, bien bac va duoc xep thu 16 tren the gioi ve nen da dang sinh hoc phong phu. 
Voi he sinh thai gom 11.458 loai dong vat, hon 21.000 loai thuc vat va khoang 3.000 loai vi sinh vat.  
La noi cu tru cua 28% loai dong vat co vu, 10% loai chim, 21% loai luong cu va bo sat tren the gioi,  

Nhung trong thoi gan day… 
Moi nam co khoang 1.500 vu den 2.000 vu buon ban dong vat hoang da trai phep duoc co quan chuc nang ghi nhan, chi chiem 5-10% tong so vu viec buon ban trai phep. 
Hon 147 loai dong vat hoang da tren can, khoang 40 loai con trung canh cung, 90 loai buom va hang tram loai thuc vat dang co nguy co tuyet chung boi hoat dong san ban.  

Vi sao the ?  
Vi “Trong nhung nam gan day viec buon ban bat hop phap dong vat hoang da da tro nen co to chuc hon, sinh loi nhieu hon, pho bien hon va nguy hiem hon bao gio het”   
                                                 - Bo truong Ngoai giao Hoa Ky Hillary Rodham Clinton, 08/11/2012 -  

Cung voi viec phat trien cua he thong Internet, da vo tinh tiep tay cho nan buon ban dong vat hoang da tro nen pho bien, mang tinh chat tinh vi, thuong mai va kho quan ly hon. Uoc tinh co 108 loai dong vat hoang da xuat hien trong cac giao dich buon ban truc tuyen hang nam tai Viet Nam, tieu bieu nhu Sung te giac, te te, culi, ho, mat gau .v.v. 

Va dau do… 
Tren hanh tinh nay, nhung canh tuong dau long van thuong xuyen dien ra:  Do la hinh anh nhung con te giac bi ban chet va mat di chiec sung, nhung con ho bi lay di bo da, nhung con gau bi hut mat den nhiem trung va vo van cac canh tuong dau long cua hang tram loai.  

Vay hien trang Buon ban dong hoang da tren Internet dang nguy hiem va anh huong nhu the nao den cong tac bao ton?

HY VONG  nao cho cac loai dong vat hoang da se nam o dau?

Thanh nien co the ho tro va dong gop duoc gi cho cong tac bao ton va ngan chan nan buon ban dong vat hoang da tren Internet tai Viet Nam? 

Hay nhanh tay dang ky tham gia Hoi thao “Xay dung mang luoi thanh nien giam sat nan buon ban dong vat hoang da tren Internet” duoi su thuc day cua Hiep hoi bao ton dong vat hoang da (WCS Chuong trinh Viet Nam) de cung chung toi ho tro cac co quan chuc, cac mang luoi va to chuc day lui nan buon ban dong vat hoang da.  

Khi tham gia Hoi thao, ban se:  
► HIEU sau sac hon ve tinh trang da dang sinh hoc, dong vat hoang da tai Viet Nam.  
► HANH DONG tot hon cho cong tac bao ton cac loai dong vat hoang da dang bi de doa. 
► LAN TOA manh me hon nhung hanh dong xanh cung cac ban tre khap moi mien dat nuoc.  
► Nhan duoc su HO TRO va HUONG DAN tu cac Co quan, Mang luoi, To chuc va cac Chuyen gia trong linh vuc.  

► ► ►Thoi gian: 
+ Nop don: 14/10 – 01/11/2015
 + Cong bo danh sach phong van: 02/11/2015 
+ Cong bo danh sach tham du: 10/11/2015 
+ Thoi gian to chuc: 22/11/2015  

► ► ►Dia diem: Tp Ho Chi Minh 
(Ban to chuc se ho tro di lai cho cac thanh vien tham du tai khu vuc mien Bac va mien Trung

Ban se duoc chia se boi cac chuyen gia giau kinh nghiem de tim ra giai phap cho chinh minh.
-	Cach de san hoc bong du hoc va cac “TIPS” phong van Visa My thanh cong
-	Trai nghiem lo trinh “Luyen IELTS dat 8.0 – thoa uoc mo san hoc bong & cong viec quoc te”
-	Kham pha chuong trinh “2 TRONG 1”: HOC + LAM dung chuyen nganh tai My. 
Dat duoc diem IELTS cao de san hoc bong khung luon la muc tieu cua cac ban sinh vien xuat sac. Se khong he kho khan neu cac ban biet duoc bi quyet luyen thi hieu qua va kinh nghiem san hoc bong thi co hoi dat duoc thanh tich cao se nam trong tam tay cua ban. 
Dang ky tham gia ngay su kien SHARING DAY “BI QUYET LUYEN IELTS 8.0, KINH NGHIEM SAN HOC BONG KHUNG & THU NHAP NGHIN DO TAI MY”  
De tro chuyen truc tiep cung dien gia:
Ms. Hanh_ tung thanh cong voi hoc bong Thac sy tai Australia va United Kingdom. La chuyen gia luyen IELTS cap toc voi 12 nam kinh nghiem giup nhieu sinh vien dat IELTS cap toc
Ms. Thanh _ Cuu sinh vien du hoc My, hien dang la dai dien cho truong dai hoc Cong lap My de thuc day chuong trinh COOP “2 TRONG 1”: HOC & LAM VIEC TAI MY cho sinh vien Viet Nam.
                               Thoi gian: 8h00 – 10h00, Chu Nhat ngay 22/11/2015
                           Dia diem: Quan Effoc, 369 Nguyen Thuong Hien, P.11, Q.3
Cac ban se duoc kham pha chuong trinh 2 trong 1: “HOC” + “LAM” dung chuyen nganh voi 99% co hoi viec lam tai cac cong ty, tap doan lon tai My.

De co mot lo trinh luyen ielts, san hoc bong va viec lam tai My khong he don gian. Su kien se giup ban co mot lo trinh phu hop nhat. 

Sharing day la noi giai dap moi thac mac cua ban ve bi quyet luyen Ielts dat hieu qua, san hoc bong va cong viec quoc te.

Kinh moi quy phu huynh, cac ban HS-SV dang co ke hoach du hoc My ky thang 9/2016 den phong van truc tiep cung dai dien Dai hoc St.John vao 10h-11h Thu Hai, Ngay 23/11/2015 tai Van phong IDP – Toa nha Star Building, 33 Mac Dinh Chi, Quan 1, TP.HCM 

Vui long dang ky truoc qua dien thoai: (08) 2249 0000, 3835 0133 hoac www.idp.com/vietnam 

Duoc thanh lap nam 1870, Dai hoc St. John la mot truong cong giao noi sinh vien se duoc trang bi nhung yeu to can thiet de hoan thien ban than cung nhu thanh cong khi buoc ra xa hoi. The Princeton Review va cac to chuc xep hang khac da nhat quan cong nhan su xuat sac trong viec dao tao, nhung chuong trinh thuc tap dot pha, nhung co hoi tien phong, su quan tam sau sat den doi song sinh vien va nhung uu dai hap dan danh cho sinh vien quoc te cua Dai hoc St.John. Chat luong cua truong duoc danh gia dua tren tam nhin giao duc xuat sac cung nhu dich vu tien nghi cho sinh vien. Sinh vien cua truong den tu gan 50 tieu bang va 120 quoc gia tren the gioi, theo hoc hon 100 khoa Lien ket, Cu nhan, Thac sy va Tien sy cua cac nganh Nghe thuat, Kinh doanh, Luat, Duoc, Khoa hoc va cac chuong trinh chuyen sau khac. Truong co 3 co so tai Oakdale – New York, co so quoc te tai Rome – Italy va Paris – Phap; ngoai ra con co tru so tai Seville – Tay Ban Nha va cac van phong tren toan the gioi. 

La mot Dai hoc tu thuc cong giao voi khoang 1.300 du hoc sinh bac Dai hoc va hon 400 du hoc sinh bac Sau Dai hoc. St.John hien co cac chuyen nganh giang day: Nhan van, Khoa hoc, Kinh doanh, Duoc, Khoa hoc Suc khoe, Giao duc, Nghien cuu, Luat, Cong nghe Sinh hoc
Du ban thich hoa minh vao cuoc song soi dong cua thanh pho New York hay tan huong cuoc song trong khuon vien truong, ban se luon co nhung dieu thu vi de trai nghiem tai St.John. Truong co nhieu su lua chon da dang ve cac hoat dong va su kien mang tinh hoc thuat, van hoa va the thao. Tu cac hoat dong the thao BIG EAST tai Madison Square Garden den nhung buoi hoi thao cua cac hoc gia tru danh tai truong. Duoc xep hang 4/10 cac Dai hoc co van hoa da dang nhat nuoc My boi U.S. News & World Report, St.John la ngoi nha chung cho sinh vien quoc te, noi moi nen van hoa deu duoc tran trong va ton vinh.

Ban muon tao ra loi nhuan nhieu hon?

Ban muon kiem soat quy thoi gian cua ban tot hon?

Ban muon tiem kiem nhan tai va giu chan nhan vien tot nhat cho doi ngu cua minh?

Hoi thao “6 buoc xay dung doanh nghiep thanh cong” se giup ban tim ra giai phap toi uu va hieu qua cho nhung van de ke tren.

*Hoi thao mang lai cho ban nhung loi ich gi?

– Lam the nao de “LAM CHU” doanh nghiep thay vi “LAM THUE”  cho doanh nghiep.

– Lam the nao de bien hoat dong quang cao va marketing tro thanh mot khoan dau tu thay vi la khoan chi phi.

– Lam the nao de tan dung thoi gian nham toi da hoa hieu qua va loi nhuan.

– Lam the nao de tuyen dung, thuc day, dao tao va giua chan nhan su gioi.

Hay den voi hoi thao “6 buoc xay dung doanh nghiep thanh cong” va dau tu thoi gian cua ban de kham pha va hoc hoi cach phat trien tiem nang cua doanh nghiep.

Hang ngan chu doanh nghiep tai 58 quoc gia tren toan cau da tim thay nhung chien luoc va cong cu dac luc de he thong hoa va phat trien doanh nghiep hieu qua thong qua hoi thao “6 buoc thanh cong”.  Bay gio se den luot ban!

=============================================
Dai hoc Melbourne hien duoc xep hang la truong Dai hoc so 1 cua Australia va hang 33 tren the gioi,  su lua chon hang dau cua cac sinh vien quoc te. Nam trong khuon vien cua Melbourne, Trinity College duoc cong nhan la mot chuong trinh Du bi Dai hoc hang dau cua Australia, dao tao khoa du bi cho sinh vien chuyen tiep len chuong trinh Cu nhan cua Dai hoc Melbourne.

Chuong trinh Du bi Dai hoc cua Trinity la mot chuong trinh dac biet, chuan bi cho cac hoc sinh trung hoc (Lop 11 va Lop 12) cac ky nang va kien thuc can thiet de dat duoc ket qua hoc tap cao nhat trong chuong trinh Cu nhan. 

Moi nam, khoang 85% sinh vien hoan tat chuong trinh Du bi Dai hoc cua Trinity College duoc nhan vao hoc chuong trinh Cu nhan cua Dai hoc Melbourne.  So sinh vien con lai tiep tuc viec hoc tap cua minh tai cac truong dai hoc hang dau khac tai Uc va tren the gioi.

Moi Quy Phu huynh va cac hoc sinh co quan tam den chuong trinh hoc bong nay den gap go truc tiep voi Ong Ben Waymire, Giam doc Cao cap ve Tuyen sinh cua Trinity College tai buoi hoi thao do Cong ty Avenue To Success (ATS) va Trinity College to chuc. - 

Xem them tai: http://ats.org.vn/hoc-bong/chuong-trinh-du-bi-dai-hoc-uc-tai-trinity-college-1905

Dang ky tham du: http://goo.gl/forms/6qcE6Mt5O5

MUC TIEU CHUONG TRINH
Khoa hoc duoc thiet ke nham muc dich cung cap cho hoc vien nhung kien thuc, ky nang va thai do can thiet de phat trien nang luc quan ly & Lãnh dạo trong mot moi truong lam viec chuyen nghiep. Vao cuoi khoa, cac  hoc vien duoc mong doi se co the:

•      Thua nhan, thich nghi va chủ dọng giai quyet hieu qua cac cong viec hang ngay trong vai tro trach nhiem cua nguoi quan ly & lãnh dạo;

•      Thuc hien cac buoc hoach dinh cong viẹc va uy thac cong viẹc hieu qua;

•      Lua chon phong cach lanh dao phu hop;

•      Su dung cac ky nang giao tiep, dong vien de kich thich va thuc day nhan vien lam viec hieu qua;

•      Huan luyen, huong dan tren cong viec va danh gia ket qua cong viec cua nhan vien;

•      Xac dinh cac cach tiep can va giai quyet hieu qua cac su co hoac mau thuan, kho khan trong cong viec;

•      Biét cách xay dụng dọi ngũ nhan vien và dãn dát dọi hoàn thành mục tieu chung.

•      Lap ke hoach hoan thien de nang cao nang luc quan ly cua ban than va dap ung duoc yeu cau cong viec.

Mot cong trinh du lon hay nho va tieu ton thoi gian lan nguon luc nhieu hay it thi truoc tien deu can mot ban thiet ke hoan chinh. Ban thiet ke se the hien duoc het tai hoa cua kien truc su va chat luong cua cong trinh do. Neu mot nha quan ly san xuat duoc vi nhu mot kien truc su thi ke hoach san xuat chinh la ban thiet ke. Trong thi truong canh tranh khoc liet hien nay, cac an so xuat hien lien tuc vi vay cac nha quan ly phai co phuong thuc lap ke hoach san xuat linh hoat de dieu chinh kip thoi cac bien dong tai hien truong.
Nham pho bien phuong thuc san xuat hien dai cua Nhat, VJCC da moi chuyen gia cao cap ve san xuat, ong Shimizu huong dan khoa hoc "PHUONG PHAP LAP KE HOACH SAN XUAT".

Bat dong san la mot trong nhung nganh nang dong nhat cua nen kinh te Viet Nam nam 2015. Su phuc hoi cua nen kinh te cung voi viec khoi dong cac du an giao thong do thi tai cac thanh pho lon, dac biet la he thong tau dien ngam o Thanh pho Ho Chi Minh, cung nhu hang tram cac du an moi khoi cong trong 12 thang vua qua. Doanh so cac du an nghi duong tai cac thanh pho bien va dao cung tang manh. Hoi nghi Forbes Viet Nam 2015 ve Bat dong san voi chu de "Theo dau dong tien" duoc to chuc tai khach san Park Hyatt Saigon se tap trung cac chuyen gia, nha phat trien, nha dau tu cung thao luan ve xu huong, dong chay cua dong tien trong tuong lai sap toi. Hoi nghi huong nguoi tham gia co mot cai nhin toan dien ve buc tranh thi truong bat dong san tai Viet Nam. Hoi nghi cung se kham pha nhung co hoi mang lai loi nhuan tot nhat khi cac nha dau tu do tien vao linh vuc bat dong san. 

Thoi gian: 8:00 - 12:00 ngay 24/11/2015.

The 5th meetup of Vietnamese Gophers is here. It's been awhile from the previous one. This time we will have

+ Networking (20 min)
+ To Go or not to Go? - Nguyen Mau Quang Vu
+ Vim as Golang Editor - Le Ngoc Thach

Remember to bring more gophers there and help us to spread out this message for the sake of community :3 

----
About us:

Founded in 2014, this meetup is the place for all beginner and experienced #golang programmers in Vietnam.

MEETUPS
We meet on the second and fourth Tuesdays of the month. Second Tuesdays are for one or more talks, and fourth Tuesdays are just hackfests, where people bring their laptops and hang out.

Discuss all #golang related topics, meet other developers and other interesting folks. Presentations, workshops, hack-fests and more. Meet other developers, find out about interesting projects and opportunities for work and potential employment. Join the group and you'll get a weekly newsletter with lots of great beginner material.


----
Find us at: 

- FB Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/golangvietnam
- FB Page: https://www.facebook.com/golang.org.vn
- Slack: http://golangvietnam.herokuapp.com/

Muc tieu khoa hoc: Giup doanh nghiep thuc hien dong bo viec hach toan ghi nhan chi phi luong, cac khoan trich theo luong va kien toan hoan thien ho so noi bo, ho so phap ly nham toi uu hoa thue TNCN, TNDN voi khoan muc chi phi nhan cong theo phap luat thue, luat lao dong, bao hiem bat buoc hien hanh.

Loi ich dat duoc: Giang vien va chuyen gia thuc hien phan tich chinh sach, tu van, huong dan va cung cap bieu mau nhu: quy che luong, bang luong, hop dong lao dong, to trinh noi bo, quyet dinh, van ban giai trinh... de hach toan va bao ve so lieu cho khoan muc chi phi lien quan toi nhan cong trong doanh nghiep.

NOI DUNG KHOA HOC

1. Van dung tot Phap luat ve lao dong tien luong, bao hiem, thue TNDN anh huong tich cuc den cong tac ke toan nhan su tien luong, tinh thue TNCN va bao hiem cho nguoi lao dong trong doanh nghiep hien nay.

2. Hop dong lao dong, ho so nhan su, quy che luong/chi tra thu nhap, chinh sach lam ngoai gio... xay dung the nao de "phu hop" giua thuc te, yeu cau phap ly, khai thac toi da nhung diem co loi tu phap luat thue voi chi phi duoc tru cho khoan muc chi phi nhan cong. (?)

3. Kiem soat ho so, chung tu, thuc hien hach toan chi tiet danh muc cac nghiep vu lien quan toi tien luong chinh, cac khoan phuc cap, cac khoan thu nhap tang them, thu nhap lam ngoai gio, tinh & nop thue TNCN, tinh & nop cac khoan bao hiem.

4. Ky nang kien toan hoan thien ho so ke toan thue doi voi nhan su - tien luong, dam bao toi da hoa chi phi nhan su tien luong va cac khoan trich theo luong trong khuon kho phap luat thue hien hanh, ky nang giai trinh va bao ve so lieu ve chi phi nhan su - tien luong - bao hiem truoc cac ky thanh tra thue.

5. Giai dap cac vuong mac, sai tam, tu van phuong an khac phuc tu thuc te cong viec cua hoc vien.

Jonathan Atherton, a veteran of the comedy scene and former presenter of Lonely Planet, will be headlining two stand-up comedy shows this coming week in both Saigon and Hanoi.

The Australian will start his tour of Vietnam on Wednesday Nov. 25 at Game On, 115 Ho Tung Mau, Q1, Ho Chi Minh City (Entrance: 200k, Doors: 8pm) before jetting it up to Hanoi to perform the following day at House of Son Tinh, 31 Xuan Dieu, Tay Ho, Hanoi (Entrance: 200k, Show: 8pm).

This guy's funny. Very funny. He is also responsible for helping create the stand-up comedy scene we now have in Singapore, KL, Bangkok, Phnom Penh and more recently, Ho Chi Minh City.

The ticket price includes a complimentary glass of Fuller’s London Pride or Honey Dew Ale. For more information or to book tables, email nick@saigoninternationalcomedy.com or dan@highway4.com.

Kinh thua quy doc gia! 

Tinh me doi voi moi nguoi trong chung ta han la khong gi sanh noi. Hon chin thang mang nang de dau, me ban cho ta hinh hai de duoc song, duoc cam nhan yeu thuong. Nuoi ta khon lon, truong thanh me khong quan nhoc nhan vat va. Cong lao cua me lon hon be troi, nghia tinh cua me sau hon suoi nguon, bien ca.
La nhung nguoi con cua me, ai trong chung ta cung deu mong muon duoc bao den on me, tron hieu dao lam con. Chu Hieu la bai hoc dau tien cua “Dao lam nguoi”, la nen tang dao duc cua xa hoi.
Cam phuc truoc duc hi sinh cua bac mau tu, tran trong tinh cam thieng lieng cua moi nguoi con danh cho me. Phu Nu Ngay Nay to chuc cuoc thi Viet ve me voi mong muon la noi de nhung nguoi lam con bay to su biet on, chia se nhung cam xuc cung nhu trao gui mon qua tinh than toi me yeu.
Sau 4 thang dien ra, cuoc thi da nhan duoc gan 1000 bai du thi  gui ve tu khap moi mien dat nuoc. Tiep noi su thanh cong cua cuoc thi, Phu Nu Ngay Nay to chuc le trao giai voi mong muon tri an nhung nguoi me, tri an nhung doc gia da dung cam viet len tam su, loi yeu thuong gui den me.
Noi dung chuong trinh

2/ 17:00 – 17:30: Khai mac chuong trinh, van nghe
3/ 17:30 – 18:30: Trao giai cuoc thi Viet ve me, chia se cua dien gia
4/ 18:30 – 19:30: Gameshow, boc tham may man, giao luu

Lan dau tien, mot Dem hoi nghe thuat Hanh dong vi Khi hau hoanh trang mang ten POWER UP do CHANGE (changevn.org) va 350.org Vietnam to chuc se duoc dien ra voi hang loat cac hoat dong hap dan va thu vi danh cho cac ban tre nham huong ung Hoi nghi Thuong dinh ve Bien doi khi hau toan cau COP21 tai Paris cuoi thang 11, dau thang 12 sap toi. Hay xem ban duoc gi khi tham gia mot su kien moi truong lon nhat trong nam nay nhe?

- Gap go, giao luu va dam chim trong khong gian am nhac soi dong va thoi thuong cua EDM, manh me cua Rock va day mau sac cua cac loai hinh nghe thuat khac nhau cung cac nghe si "dinh dam" tai Viet Nam: Thanh Bui, Ha Okio, Hoang Bach, Uyen Linh, Vu Cat Tuong, Tien Tien, Bich Ngoc, Thao Trang, Mai Khoi, Pham Anh Khoa (PAK Band), Nguyen Dinh Thanh Tam, Tang Nhat Tue, My Le, 5 Dong ke, Rapper Tien Dat, DJ Duc Thien va MC Nguyet Anh.

- Trai nghiem cac goc moi truong day hao hung de tim hieu thong tin cac thong tin ve than da, dien kien Phu thuy Than da; lam canh dong chong chong gio, xem hoat canh dam cuoi Trai dat va Nang luong tai tao; xem mien phi cac bo phim y nghia ve moi truong; thu thach ban than voi cac tro choi thu vi ve moi truong;...va hang loat cac hoat dong soi noi khien ban chac chan khong the dung yen.

- Va cuoi cung duoc hoa minh cung hang ngan ban tre yeu moi truong khac trong khong gian Cargo ngap tran sac NEON de cung huong ung, gui nhung thong diep manh me cua gioi tre Viet Nam den COP21. Nho trang bi quan ao, phu kien NEON de khong "le loi" cac ban nhe. :)

Thoi gian: 16:00 - 21:00, thu Tu ngay 25.11.2015.
Dia diem: CARGO Event Space, so 7 Nguyen Tat Thanh, quan 4, TP.HCM (duoi chan cau Khanh Hoi).

Dem hoi nghe thuat Hanh dong vi Khi hau Power Up da nhan duoc su dong hanh va ho tro cua cac doi tac sau: Quy Global Greengrants Fund, Tap doan Dragon Capital, Dai su quan Duc, Lanh su quan Phap, Trung tam LIN, Quy EXO Foundation, Hoc vien Am nhac va Nghe thuat Bieu dien SOUL, RABBAT, TicketBox, Cargo Bar, Think in a Box va Dancenter.
