For the first time, an epic Climate Action Festival under the name POWER UP organised by CHANGE (changevn.org) and 350.org Vietnam will occur with plenty of captivating and exciting activities for young people to respond to the United Nations Climate Change Conference COP21 happening at the end of November and the beginning of December in Paris. Let’s see what you’ll get from participating in this biggest environmental event of the year!

-	Meet, interact and immerse yourself in an energetic and trendy music atmosphere of EDM, powerful ambience of Rock, and a lively feel of different art forms with Thanh Bui, Uyen Linh, Vu Cat Tuong, Tien Tien, Bich Ngoc, Thao Trang, Mai Khoi, Nguyen Dinh Thanh Tam, Ha Okio, Tang Nhat Tue, My Le, 5 Dong Ke, Rapper Tien Dat, The Rock Band PAK, DJ Duc Thien and MC Nguyet Anh.

-	Experience various interesting environmental corners to find out more about coal, meet the Coal Witch; create a field of pinwheels, watch wedding scenes between the Earth and Renewable Energy; see meaningful films about environment for FREE; challenge yourself with fun games about the environment; … as well as many, many other exhilarating activities which will not leave you still.

-	And last but not least, to engage with thousands of other young people who also love the environment at Cargo, which will be filled with NEON colours to respond and send powerful messages from Vietnam youth to COP21. Remember to dress in NEON-colour clothing and accessories to not be “left out”, guys!

Time: 16:00 – 21:00, Wednesday 25.11.2015
Location: CARGO Event Space, 7 Nguyen Tat Thanh Street, District 4, Ho Chi Minh City (Khanh Hoi bridge)

Ticket price*: 
30,000VND/ticket (ONLY for the first 300 tickets)
50,000VND/ticket (for the 301st ticket till sold out)
(*All money generated from the selling of tickets will be donated to CHANGE’s Protecting and Coping with Climate Change fund)

Buy tickets at:
-	Ticketbox.vn (http://bit.ly/powerupvn)
-	Buy directly at universities in Ho Chi Minh City (list of universities to be confirmed)
-	Or at CHANGE office, 5th Floor, 132-134 D2 Street, Ward 25, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City.
Hotline: 0165.425.8897 | (08) 6681 3513 (Mr. An)

What are you waiting for?! Grab those first tickets to participate in a leading environmental event and share information, bring your friends, so you can save the environment together!

We are very lucky and excited to continue our makers meetup with presentations from 2 organizations that support and promote Artisans Makers: Makers meet up:  Artisans Makers 
 
Nguyen Ngoc Tuan - Founder & Co-Owner at Bobi Craft. Bobi Craft create beautiful designed handmade products, with mostly made by premium yarns and wool. He developed an international standard art and craft system, helped unfortunate people (single mom, disable people) to have better living and maximize their education and created jobs and train skills for people with low income, especially less fortunate children.
 
Ho Chi Minh City-based startup is Efaisto which is aiming to create a global maker’s network—starting with Vietnam. Co-founded by a Belgo-French duo, Bernard Seys and Lou-Adrien Fabre, Efaisto is an e-commerce marketplace for anyone to order made-on-demand, personalized clothing, accessories, and eventually furniture from artisans around the world. 

The event is pay what-feels-right. It means that it is up to you to decide at the end of the event how much you want to support Fablab Saigon and the makers community. Contributions are usually between 50k and 100k VND.
 
* This event will be conducted in English.
* Drinks and finger food will be provided.

Lich hoc ca ngay, 2 ngay lien tuc:
Tu 27 - 28 / 11 / 2015 | 8h30 - 17h
Ca toi, 4 buoi toi lien tuc cac ngay:
Tu 04/12 - 07/12 /2015 | 18h - 21h
Dia diem: 10 - Phan Dang Luu - Binh Thanh, HCM

(*) Muc tieu khoa hoc: Giup ke toan vien, nha quan ly trong doanh nghiep co ky nang va nghiep vu tong hop - toan canh tu so lieu ke toan thue, kiem soat ket qua ke khai bao cao thue, lap - doc - phan tich bao cao tai chinh trong quan he doi chieu - giai trinh voi bao cao quyet toan thue hang nam.
 
(*) Loi ich hoc vien sau khoa hoc: 
Co bieu mau ung dung va ky nang thuc hien kiem soat so lieu ke toan thue, du lieu doanh thu - chi phi - loi nhuan - thue phai nop tung quy, nam tai chinh.
Lap - doc - phan tich bao cao tai chinh theo thong tu 200.
Lap, phan tich, van dung nhung diem co loi theo chinh sach vao bao cao quyet toan thue

(*) Noi dung khoa hoc
1. Kiem soat, doi chieu so lieu ke toan ve thue gia tri gia tang. Dam bao khop dung giua ho so, hoa don tai chinh, so ke toan, to khai thue, can doi phat sinh va bao cao tai chinh cuoi ky (Quy/Nam)
2. Kiem soat, doi chieu cac nghiep vu ke toan thanh toan, cong no trong quan he voi chinh sach tai chinh noi bo, quy dinh thanh toan cua luat thue hien hanh
3. Soat xet, phe duyet, kiem tra so lieu ke toan vat tu hang hoa, thanh pham. Dam bao khop dung cac gia tri phat sinh chi tiet, tong hop nhap xuat ton, gia von
4. Ke toan tong hop tien luong, thue TNCN, cac khoan bao hiem, quy che luong, ho so lao dong, bang luong, tinh hinh chi tra luong.
5. Ke toan tong hop cac nghiep vu xac dinh doanh thu, thu nhap, du phong, chi phi ban hang, chi phi quan ly doanh nghiep, tinh thue
6. Lap bao cao tai chinh: Bang can doi ke toan, Ket qua san xuat kinh doanh, Luu chuyen tien te theo Thong tu 200.
7. Phan tich bao cao tai chinh: Phan tich theo chieu ngang va phan tich theo chieu doc.
8. Lap bao cao quyet toan thue, phan tich chi tieu, van dung chinh sach de tang quyen loi doanh nghiep trong mot so truong hop.

(*) Tu van - huan luyen - thuc hanh
1. Kiem soat hoa don, chung tu, ho so va ket qua ke khai bao cao thue bang mau kiem tra dinh ky.
2. Lap bang phan tich, can doi ket qua doanh thu, thu nhap, chi phi, loi nhuan, cac khoan thue theo tung quy va du doan ke hoach quy tiep theo.
3. Thuc hanh kiem soat, kiem tra so lieu ke khai thue tren to khai thue voi chung tu, so ke toan, nghiep vu xac dinh thue GTGT duoc khau tru.
4. Check-List cong viec kien toan, hoan thien ho so ke toan theo yeu cau cua phap luat ve thue hien hanh nham bao ve so lieu ke toan thue khi quyet toan va thanh tra thue hang nam.
5. Lap bang can doi ke toan, bang ket qua hoat dong san xuat kinh doanh, luu chuyen tien te tu so lieu cua bang can doi so phat sinh va so cai ke toan.
6. Thuc hanh phan tich bao cao tai chinh dua theo ket qua thuc hien o buoc tren theo mau goi y cua giang vien va chuyen gia huan luyen.
7. Lap bang quyet toan thue, soat xet so lieu giua bao cao quyet toan thue voi bao cao tai chinh, ho so ke toan thue.

=> Nop khai bao thue dinh ky, ghi so ke toan theo hoa don chung tu nhung nhu the la chua du cho mot ky quyet toan an toan, hieu qua - co loi cho doanh nghiep. Hay kiem soat, danh gia, chac chan con nhieu "van dung phu hop" nua co the thuc hien voi doanh nghiep cua ban.

=> Tham gia khoa hoc de cung giang vien, chuyen gia go roi, giai quyet ngay nhung vuong mac trong cong tac ke toan thue nam 2015 cua ban ngay tu bay gio, truoc khi qua muon.
=> Doi khi chi can phat hien som sai sot, co 1 loi tu van sat thuc va phu hop co the giup doanh nghiep tranh duoc rui ro ma neu khong, co the dan toi thiet hai bang tien hang ty dong.

(**) Nhieu qua tang hap dan cho nguoi tham gia
1. Tang tai lieu khoa hoc gom tai lieu nghiep vu va bo chung tu thuc te de thuc hanh, lam mau
2. Bo dap an, ho so chung tu, bao cao lam mau cho hoc vien hanh nghe sau khi hoc
3. Tang so tay ke toan vien (ban mem): Gom cac luu do nghiep vu ke toan, ke khai bao cao thue, ke toan tong hop, huong dan lap bao cao tai chinh, danh muc tai khoan...
4. Tang bo tai lieu 100 tinh huong vuong mac ve ke toan, thue da duoc giai dap boi chuyen gia va co quan thue
5. Duoc tham gia moi chuong trinh tap huan chinh sach moi ve ke toan, thue (tham gia mien phi) do Start-UP Coaching to chuc hoac dong to chuc).
6. Duoc tang Voucher co gia tri cho cac chuong trinh hoc tiep theo, huong uu dai co dinh 30%

(*****) Giang vien: Th.S Vu Long
Giam doc tu van va dao tao Start-UP Coaching. 15 nam kinh nghiem tu van va huan luyen nhan su ke toan - thue cho doanh nghiep, tu van toi uu thue, giai trinh thanh tra thue, to chuc cong tac ke toan theo yeu cau

Giang vien, chuyen gia huan luyen tai Start-UP Coaching luon san sang ho tro ban sau khoa hoc. Ban co the goi truc tiep hoac email tham van, co the mang theo ho so ke toan thue cua minh de duoc tro giup voi nhung tinh huong kho hoac "nhay cam".

ABOUT YOUR TRIP

Ho Chi Minh City, situated in the southeastern region of Vietnam, is a treasure trove of historical landmarks, ancient architecture, and modern skyscrapers like the Bitexco Financial Tower. Absorb the culture at Giac Lam Pagoda, Gia Long Palace, and the Museum of Vietnamese History. For fun, there's Dam Sen Water Park, Suoi Tien Amusement Park and the Saigon Zoo and Botanical Gardens.

At Ho Chi Minh Agricultural Villages, you'll learn the ins and outs of growing and cultivating a garden, selecting raw fruits and vegetables, and putting all your knowledge to the test with a cooking class. For more adventure, you'll be touring the Cu Chi Tunnel system. Used during the Vietnam War, you'll walk through the labyrinth of dimly lit tunnels, see displays of bobby traps, and have a meal in the underground command center.


WHAT'S INCLUDED

• 4 days and 3 nights at Le Meridien Saigon Hotel, 3C Ton Duc Thang Street, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
• Featuring classic city view room accommodations with a king or double beds.
• See itinerary for meals included.
• Ho Chi Minh Agricultural Villages cooking class.   
• Cu Chi Tunnel Tour.
• A host will be provided when 20 adults have been booked.
• If a hosted trip, a welcome check-in on the day of arrival and welcome reception will be provided to members and their guests.
• Your trip includes 2 airport transfers:
• November 27 between 9 a.m. to 5 p.m.: From Tan Son Nhat International Airport to hotel.
• November 30 between 9 a.m. to 5 p.m.: From hotel to Tan Son Nhat International Airport.
• To take advantage of round-trip airport transfers, you must provide your flight information to the DreamTrips Specialist no later than November 21. These transfers are available only for the airport(s) and dates listed above. Transfers will not be offered if the flight information is not received by the deadline and transfers at any other time will incur a separate charge. Do not email flight information to the DreamTrips Specialist. Air transportation is not included. The closest commercial airport is Tan Son Nhat International Airport (SGN).

For any questions regarding this trip, contact the DreamTrips Specialist at DreamTrips@rovia.com.

Check-in: 3 p.m. Check-out: 11 a.m.


HOTEL DETAILS

The Le Meridien Saigon is sophisticated elegance at its best.

Relax in comfort in a well-appointed room where modern styling and decor creates a refreshing atmosphere. Enjoy city or river views, and 24-hour room service. The hotel provides a fitness center, spa, and indoor pool, and for dining, palate pleasing Vietnamese cuisine, baked goods, snacks, and cocktails are available.

Along with impeccable service, Le Meridien's location beside the Saigon River puts you near shopping, dining, local attractions and entertainment.

Le Meridien Saigon Hotel
3C Ton Duc Thang Street
District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

1st Visual Art Playground in South-East Asia
{ Entry Fee: single day 50.000 VND - two days combo 80.000 VND }

2 afternoons of:
# Artist Talks
# Presentations
# Free Workshops
# Experimental AV Performances

KaleidoSoup aims to be the biggest international meeting of VJs and visual performers in South-East Asia. 

35 Artists from all over the World (Argentina, Mexico, USA, UK, France, Poland, Italy, Australia, Japan, Taiwan, Indonesia, Philippines, Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Vietnam) will gather for sharing the same love for digital art and music .. all will be performed live!

Kaleidosoup shows the power of imagination. 
During this meeting the joining Artists will talk about their projects, they will present other Festivals dedicated to digital arts, they will held short workshops introducing to new softwares, and they will show some experimental project. 

Visual performers are usually the most innovative professionals of the creative industry, and they are invited to share tricks, solutions, insights, projects, knowledge, wrapped up in performances to show and shine. 

This meeting is designed to celebrate innovative forms of performances and is an unmissable occasion for artists and creatives to get inspiration and learn something new. 

KaleidoSoup is produced by Pandora Studio in collaboration with L.A.V. a collective of visual and sound artists based in Ho Chi Minh City, well-founded by Antonio Rosciano (vj paki), Daniel Long (DDL) and Tung Le (Crazy Monkey) and completed by Julien Noyer and Nhan Do (Solid Machine).

WHY SHOULD YOU ATTEND?
Attendees will get up-to-date knowledge and best practices about how to setup a solid test automation framework , while networking with local, like-minded testers.

WHO SHOULD ATTEND?
All senior testing practitioners:  Automation Testers, Project managers, Directors and Managers who are working on or in-charge of Software Quality.

SECTION 1: PRESENTATION

It’s a challenge for anyone in the Test Architect position to ensure that a Test Automation strategy can be setup with an up-and-running automation platform within a short timeline. You might start thinking about tools or programming languages, but in fact, it won’t guarantee your project’s success. It’s debatable about how test frameworks have changed over the last 2 decades, but there are just a few key ingredients to build a test automation framework that will always improve your chances of success.

Don’t waste your time & effort with all of the details. Join us on November, 28th and learn these practical tips for your testing project:

- Key elements to setup a solid test automation framework
- Key indicator should be included in the Execution and Historical Report
- Why & How to automatically execute a Test Suite
- Why & How to setup the Notification when a Test Suite has finished executing
- How to save Execution Time of your Test Suite
- Why & How to setup Test Load Balancer

Language Usage: Vietnamese

SECTION 2: Lean Coffee

Furthermore, this is an opportunity to discuss your burning testing issues and get feedback from other software testing experts from the Ho Chi Minh City in the Lean Coffee discussion after the presentation. (If you're not familiar with Lean Coffee check out leancoffee.org) From our recent participant survey, this is most exciting and valuable session. Check out this article if you want to learn more about our discussion in the last Lean Coffee.

Register your attendace: http://www.hcmc-stc.org/upcoming-event.html#registration-form

Chuong trinh hoan toan mien phi!

Woori han hanh mang den cho cac ban sinh vien buoi hoi thao cung dai dien truong Ngon ngu Quoc te - ILSC den tu Toronto, Canada.

Truong Ngon ngu Quoc te ILSC co nhieu nam kinh nghiem giang day ca tieng Anh lan tieng Phap, cung chat luong dao tao luon duoc danh gia cao. Truong co cac co so nam tai cac thanh pho lon cua Canada nhu: Toronto, Vancouver va Montreal. Voi cac chuong trinh hoc da dang nhu:

+ Communication
+ Business Language
+ University Pathway
+ TOEFL
+ IELTS
+ Work and Study (Co-op)
+ ...

Truong mang den rat nhieu chuong trinh hoc, trong do co chuong trinh Anh ngu lien thong danh cac ban chua du dieu kien tieng Anh de vao cac truong dai hoc, cao dang tai Canada. Hoac chuong trinh tieng Anh thuong mai danh cho cac ban theo hoc va di lam trong linh vuc kinh te.

Dac biet hon nua la chuong trinh vua hoc vua lam danh cho cac ban sinh vien muon trai nghiem ban than va tich luy kinh nghiem lam viec trong cac linh vuc nhu quan tri kinh doanh, du lich khach san, dich vu khach hang... ngoai viec hoc hoi them kinh nghiem cho ban than thi cac ban con co co hoi nhan duoc cong viec thuc tap co luong.

Con cho gi nua cac ban hay den tham gia buoi hoi thao cung truong Ngon ngu Quoc te - ILSC se dien ra vao:

+ Ngay 28 thang 11 nam 2015

+ Thoi gian: 10:00 - 12:00PM

Dia diem: Van phong Woori Viet Nam

Toa nha Sai Gon Trade Center

So 37 Ton Duc Thang, tang 19, phong 1901, phuong Ben Nghe, Quan 1, Tp. HCM.

Cac ban vui long dang ki online qua duong link: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1iLA5pmiygzQoaOtLY4BG3qrhV_mxVPOqqkHWbn69Ya8/viewform

Hen som gap lai cac ban nhe!

Saigon Soul Pool Party
Every Saturday | November 28th, 2015 - May 14th, 2016
10am - 10pm
New World Saigon Hotel
2F, 76 Le Lai, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
»» https://saigonsoul.com ««

Entry Fee of 150,000 vnd | Hotel Guests Free | Drinks 50,000 +

International & Local DJs
Drink Specials * Food Vendors * Prizes Galore
Sun Beds * Towel Rentals * 5 VIP Cabanas

ABOUT US
Your Saturdays in Saigon just got a whole lot better!

Saigon Soul has become an institution for many expats, locals and travellers as the liveliest pool party in the city. Our pool and dayclub are located in the heart of District 1, at the New World Saigon Hotel.  Every Saturday from November 28th, 2015 until May 14th, 2016, you’ll enjoy the finest DJs that Saigon has to offer at our luxurious pool.  From 10am to 10pm we’ve created a tempting cool oasis from the hot Saigon sun.  You’ll be guaranteed a sexy, water fueled event with some fantastic house music and amazing people. What better way to spend a Saturday?

The ultimate in poolside entertainment, Saigon Soul is defined by its great party atmosphere. The pool is one of the largest in Saigon, featuring 25 sunbeds, a multitude of tables & chairs, 30 cushy bean bags and our highly acclaimed, 5 VIP cabanas.  Electrifying beats by our world class DJs set a lively mood as you bask in the ambiance.  Multiple bars and our mouthwatering menus will have you and the other 500+ Saigon Soul party people coming back week after week.  Things can’t get much better than this.

Upscale and chic, yet, down, dirty and outright affordable.  We pride ourselves in not breaking your bank account with drinks starting at a mere 50,000 vnd.  If you want to splash around with some high end spirits and champagne, our vast drink menu will accommodate your most refined tastes.  Booming house music, drink specials, local restaurant food stations, giveaways, hotel promotions, swimwear retailers, beautiful people, a lovely pool with cold drinks, fun people and notorious good times.  What are you waiting for?  See you poolside!

****************************************

WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW
Every Saturday from November 28th, 2015 until May 14th, 2016
We are open from 10am until 10pm with peak hours from 2pm till 8pm.  Arrive early to get a sunbed, bean bag or other prime seating as we operate on a first come first serve basis.

Entry Fee is 150,000 vnd with all New World Saigon Hotel guests free.
Beers are priced at a criminally affordable 50,000 vnd.  We also offer an extensive 5 star drink menu, without the 5 star pricing.  Spirits & Wine start at 100,000 vnd while 750ml bottles of your favorite liquor start at a cool 1.5 million vnd.  Various food vendors will be pool side to dish out great food to keep you going through the day.

Saigon Soul is one of very few establishments leading the charge for underground music fans in Vietnam.  Each event day we bring you the best emerging and veteran International & Local DJs.  A full 12 hours of nonstop musical bliss for you and your 500 new friends.

5 VIP Cabanas are available for your comfort and style.  Booking details can be found on SaigonSoul.com

For more information contact Dallas Waines 
dallas.waines@soulpoolparty.com | 0122 734 8128

***************************************

Gioi thieu
Sai Gon moi thu bay bong dung “tuoi” hon han !

Saigon Soul da tro thanh mot diem den quen thuoc trong cong dong nguoi nuoc Ngoai song tai Viet Nam, trong gioi dan choi Viet va cac du khach nuoc ngoai, noi tieng la noi dien ra nhung party ho boi soi dong nhat thanh pho. Cau lac bo va ho boi toa lac ngay trung tam quan 1, nam trong khach san New World Saigon. Vao thu bay hang tuan tu ngay 28/11/2015 cho den ngay 14/5/2016, ban  se duoc thang hoa cung nhung DJ “dinh dam” nhat Sai Thanh tai khu ho boi sang trong dang cap cua chung toi. Moi ngay tu 10h sang den 10h toi chung toi da kien tao ra mot oc dao xanh mat day cam do giua cai nang Sai Gon oi buc. Den voi chung toi, ban se duoc dam bao mot su kien that hap dan, dam minh trong lan nuoc mat lanh cung cac ban nhac house tuyet voi va nhung con nguoi thu vi. Con gi suong bang tan huong mot ngay thu bay nhu the ?

“Dinh” nhat trong nghanh giai tri ben ho boi, noi den Saigon Soul la noi den khong khi party cuc chat cua no. Ho boi o day la mot trong nhung ho boi lon nhat SG, co den 25 giuong tam nang, vo so ban ghe thu gian, 30 chiec ghe luoi em ai va vo cung hoan nghenh den voi 5 leu cao cap danh cho khach VIP. Nhung tieng beat day kich thich cua cac DJ dang cap the gioi se dua ban hoa minh vao khong khi soi dong bung no mot cach chan that nhat. Rat nhieu quay bar va nhung menu "thay la them" cua chung toi se dan ban cung voi hon 500 tinh do party cua Saigon Soul tro lai day tu tuan nay den het tuan khac. Vui gi hon moi bua tiec la mot thanh cong ngoai mong doi.


Dang cap va sang trong nhu the, nhung chua dau, khong khi van cuc hoa dong, cuc vui va gia ca van cuc phai chang. Tu hao se khong lam cac fan than yeu chay tui voi gia do uong chi tu 50.000 dong. Tat nhien fan nao muon choi mot bua that hoanh trang voi cac loai ruou mui va champagne cao cap thi Saigon Soul cung rat san long, menu do uong phong phu da dang cua chung toi se dap ung duoc thi hieu tinh te cua nhung nguoi sanh uong nhat. Den voi Saigon Soul, den voi nhac House boc lua, thuc uong dac biet, nhung quay mon ngon nha hang Viet, nhung qua tang, nhung khuyen mai phong khach san, cac shop do tam, cac dep trai dep gai, voi cai ho boi that xinh cung nuoc giai khat that lanh, cac anh chang co nang hai huoc va nhung cuoc vui nut tieng. The chung ta con chan cho gi nua nao? Hen gap cac ban ben ho boi nhe !

*****************************

NHUNG DIEU BAN CAN BIET

Thu bay hang tuan tu 28/11/2015 den 14/5/2016
Chung toi mo cua tu 10h sang den 10h toi, cao diem tu 2h chieu den 8h dem. Vi Saigon Soul hoat dong tren nguyen tac “den truoc phuc vu truoc” nen den som de duoc uu tien ghe tam nang, ghe luoi hay nhung cho dep nhe cac tinh yeu.

Ve vao cua la 150.000 dong, mien phi ve voi khach phong o ks New World Saigon. Gia bia sieu lua tinh chi tu 50.000 dong. Chung toi con danh cho quy khach menu thuc uong 5 sao da dang nhung gia rat u la ngan sao. Cac loai ruou mui va ruou vang co gia tu 100.000 dong trong khi anh em nao yeu thich cac the loai ruou manh nguyen chai 750ml, thi gia cung rat dam chi tu 1,5 trieu dong. Cac gian hang am thuc khac nhau se duoc dung ngay ben ho boi de nhung mon an nong hoi nhat giup anh em quay nhiet tinh ca ngay.

Saigon Soul la mot trong rat it cac don vi giu trong trach di dau trong viec dua dong nhac Underground den voi cac fan Viet. Moi ngay su kien chung toi se dem den cac fan nhung DJ “chien” nhat dang noi len trong nuoc lan quoc te. Vui ngay ngat cung 12 tieng nhac nonstop lien tuc voi hon 500 cac chien huu cung chi huong.

5 leu VIP cao cap rat thoai mai va phong cach nay da san sang phuc vu cac fan. Vui long truy cap Khu Vuc Leu Cao Cap cua chung toi cho thong tin chi tiet dat cho.

For more information contact Dallas Waines 
dallas.waines@soulpoolparty.com | 0122 734 8128

Lan dau tien tai Viet Nam, Creativedrinks va cac doi tac cung nhau mang toi cuoc thi danh cac ban thiet ke va cong ty khoi nghiep. 

Su kien nay la su ket hop cua hoi cho khoi nghiep va mo hinh hackathon. Cac cong ty khoi nghiep voi nhung y tuong hoac san pham san co voi mong muon nang cao thiet ke cung nhu trai nghiem cua nguoi dung (UX/UI) co the tim thay duoc nha thiet ke phu hop nhat, nguoi co the thay doi san pham cua minh chi trong vong 4 GIO dong ho! 

Thiet ke thay doi an tuong nhat se doat giai tren toan su kien.

Thoi gian bieu:

Hoi cho khoi nghiep: 9.30 am – 12:00 pm
Thoi gian tien hanh nang cap thiet ke 1:00 pm –  6:00 pm 
Dem danh gia va trao giai  6.30 pm –  9.30 pm   

Nhung li do cac nha khoi nghiep khong the khong tham gia?

- De tim thay nhung nguoi dong sang lap tiem nang
- De cam nhan san pham cua minh sau khi duoc cong nghe hoa
- De duoc gap go va tao moi quan he voi nhung nha khoi nghiep va cac doanh nghiep khac
- De san pham cua minh duoc moi nguoi biet den

Li do cac ban designer khong the khong tham gia?

- De khong bo lo viec gap go nhung nha khoi nghiep tre va hoc hoi kinh nghiem tu ho  
- De tro thanh nha dong sang lap hoac giu mot vi tri quan trong trong cac cong ty moi 
- De thach thuc chinh ban than minh bang cach nang tam nhung thiet ke/san pham san co chi trong mot ngay va tro thanh nguoi chien thang voi nhung giai thuong hap dan.
- De tim kiem co hoi moi cho con duong su nghiep va niem dam me duoc lam viec trong cac cong ty tre.

Hay dang ky qua link duoi day: 

Don dang ky cho cac cong ty khoi nghiep:  http://goo.gl/forms/lNgv8ImBF8
Don dang ky cho designer:
http://goo.gl/forms/xLzNoHT3dc

Le phi tham gia: Moi cong ty khoi nghiep dang ky voi phi 500,000VND cho mot nhom (toi da 4 thanh vien). MIEN PHI dang ky tham du cho nha thiet ke.

Thong tin chi tiet lien he:

Email. vi@studioboconganh.com

For the first time in Vietnam, Creativedrinks together with our partners is putting together to introduce the first creative hackathon for designers and startups in HCMC. 

This one-day competition is a combination of startup fair and hackathon model. Any startup with an existing idea or product that requires UX/UI revamp will join this competition to find their best creative founder/ designer who would transform their product 4 hours!

The most transformed design with good presentation will be the winner of the whole competition.

Agenda:
Startup Fair 9:30am -12pm
Creative hackathon for startup: 1pm-6pm
Judging & award night: 6:30-9:30pm

WHY STARTUPS SHOULD JOIN US?
- Spot your creative co-founders
- Transform your product in just one day
- Network with other startups and entrepreneurs
- Promote your brand to the audiences 

WHY DESIGNERS SHOULD JOIN US?
-To meet startups and learn from their experience
-To become a co-founder or important part of a certain startup.
-To challenge yourself by transforming a prototype or product to the next level within a day and winning amazing prizes
-To look for new chance of career and desire to work in a dynamic environment of startup

Application form for designer: http://goo.gl/forms/xLzNoHT3dc

Robothon duoc biet den la cuoc thi Robotics pho bien danh cho lua tuoi hoc sinh Tieu hoc va Trung hoc, voi chu de hang nam lien tuc thay doi, mang tinh nhan van va giai quyet cac van de hien thuc. Bat dau tu nam 2015, ten cuoc thi cap quoc te chuyen tu DYA (Digital Youth Award) thanh Ngay hoi Robothon Quoc te - Digital Campus International Robothon (DCIR).

Nam 2015, voi thuc trang ve nan pha rung tran lan gay ra nhieu van de anh huong nghiem trong den toan cau, chu de xuyen suot cua Robothon cac cap nam nay duoc lua chon la “Bao ton sinh thai” (ten tieng Anh “Ecowatch”). Thong qua viec giai quyet cac van de, hoc sinh se y thuc duoc tam quan trong cua Rung va thuc hanh nhung giai phap lien quan.

Hay cung cap nhat nhung thong tin moi nhat tai day cac ban nhe!

“Mot giac mo lon tua Canada” – 35 nam ky niem Terry Fox Run

Than gui cac ban va cac thanh vien cua CanCham,

Chung toi rat vui mung duoc thong bao, bat dau tu hom nay chung toi nhan dang ky viec tham gia cuoc chay Terry Fox Run 2015 – ky niem 35 nam! Nam nay, cuoc chay se duoc to chuc vao ngay chu nhat 29 thang 11, 2015, tai duong Tan Trao, tai Phu My Hung, Quan 7 (gio dang ky: 07:00 sang , cuoc chay bat dau luc : 8:00 sang)

Ke tu nam 1997 den nay, trai qua 18 nam va nam nay la nam thu 19 tai TP.HCM, cong dong nguoi Canada cu the la Hiep hoi Doanh nghiep Canada da luu giu va to chuc hang nam cuoc chay Terry Fox Run. Nam ngoai, nam 2014, voi su tham gia nhiet tinh cua hon 16.500 nguoi tham gia da gay duoc tien quy cho viec nghien cuu ung thu voi con so an tuong la hon VND 1.300.000.000. Vi the de ky niem cho nam dac biet 35 nam cuoc chay Terry Fox Run, chung toi khuyen khich tat ca cac cong ty, truong hoc, cong dong, gia dinh va ca nhan de mot lan nua tham gia voi chung toi tren 5km duong chay, di bo, tren xe lan hoac xe.

Hay dong gop theo long hao tam cua cac ban giong nhung nam truoc hoac hon thong qua hinh thuc mua ao phong Terry Fox hoac bang tien.

Chung toi cung se danh gia cao viec cac ban hay can nhac trong viec ho tro tinh than chu khong thuong mai hoa bang cach khong dua hoac hien thi bat ky bieu ngu va / hoac cac dau hieu (ve cong ty hoac to chuc) tren tat cac tuyen duong.

Hay lan toa loi keu goi nay toi cac ban be va dong nghiep cua ban de cung tham gia cho su kien co y nghia xay dung cong dong va giup nang cao nhan thuc trong cuoc chien chong lai benh ung thu . 

Ban to chuc cung xin thong bao voi cac ban rang chi nhung nguoi tham gia duoc phat so chay moi duoc Bao hiem. DIeu kien nay nay duoc thiet lap boi cong ty bao hiem theo su huong dan va cho phep cua Quy Terry Fox Foundation. Vi the tat ca cac ban deu duoc khuyen khich tham gia va hoan nghenh quyen gop  tai bat ky gia tri nao voi chung toi.

De dang ky, xin vui long in mau dang ky (tai ve o day), dien day du thong tin va mang theo so tien ban du dinh quyen gop den mot trong nhung diem duoi day:
Van phong cua CanCham: Phong 305, lau 3, khach san New World, 76 Le Lai, Quan 1, HCMC
Phong kham quoc te West Coast: Lau 1, 71 – 79 Dong Khoi, Quan 1, HCMC
He thong truong quoc te Canada: so 86 duong 23, phuong Tan Phu, Quan 7, HCMC
Learning Strategies - A7-36 My Gia 1, Phu My Hung, P. Tan Phu, Quan 7, HCMC
American School - 172 Nguyen Van Huong, Thao Dien, Quan 2, HCMC
 
De biet them thong tin chi tiet, vui long truy cap website www.terryfox.canchamvietnam.org hoac liec lac voi Ms. Hien Do tai dia chi email: hien.do@canchamvietnam.org / So dien thoai 0903.441.850

"A Dream As Large as Canada"
35th Year Anniversary Terry Fox Run
Sunday, November 29th, Tan Trao St, Phu My Hung, D.7, HCMC

Dear CanCham Members & Friends,

We are pleased to announce that registration is open for the 35th Year Anniversary Terry Fox Run! This year, the Run will be held on Sunday, November 29th, 2015, on Tan Trao St, in Phu My Hung, District 7 (Registration: 7:00am, Run starts: 8am sharp).

Here in HCMC, the Canadian community has been hosting the annual Terry Fox Run since 1997, with last year’s drawing an enthusiastic involvement of 16,500 participants and raising an impressive over VND1,300,000,000. We encourage all companies, schools, communities, families and individuals to once again join us on the 5km Run, Walk, Wheel or Ride.

We also encourage participants to follow past practices regarding donations and we also welcome additional donations through purchases of t-shirts and in-kind contributions.

We would also appreciate your consideration in supporting the non-promotional spirit of the run by not bringing or displaying any banners and/or signs (corporate or commercial) including on the route.

Please spread the word and gather your friends and colleagues for this community building event and help build awareness in the fight against cancer.

The Organizing Committee would like to inform you that the Run’s Insurance Coverage will only cover those participants wearing a number bib. This condition is set by the insurance company in cooperation of the guidelines set by the Terry Fox Foundation. Any Donation Value when registering is welcome.

To register, please print and fill out the registration form, available for download in both Vietnamese and English and bring with your donation to one of our Site Registration addresses below:
CanCham office at R.305, New World Hotel Saigon, 76 Le Lai St, D.1, HCMC
West Coast International Clinic – Level 1, 71-79 Dong Khoi, Dist 1, HCMC
Canadian International School System – No. 86, Road 23, Tan Phu Ward, D.7, HCMC
Learning Strategies - A7-36 My Gia 1, Phu My Hung, P. Tan Phu, D.7, HCMC
The American School - 172 Nguyen Van Huong St, Thao Dien Ward, D.2, HCMC

For more information and registration, please go to the link below: http://terryfox.canchamvietnam.org or contact Ms. Hien at hien.do@canchamvietnam.org / +84.90.344.1850

Hoc vien Quan li Singapore (SIM GE), mot trong so cac truong tu hang dau Singapore, se trao tang 35 suat Hoc bong tri gia 100% hoc phi cua chuong trinh Cu nhan danh cho cac ban HS-SV co hoc luc va thanh tich kha gioi. Thong tin nay se duoc Cong ty Du hoc Hop Diem va Dai dien SIM GE bao cao vao luc 09g00 sang Chu nhat 29/11/2015 tai KS Duxton, 63 Nguyen Hue, Q.1, TP.HCM (hotline 090 133 7726).
 
Hoc bong Cu nhan tri gia 100% hoc phi cua Hoc vien Quan ly Singapore (SIM GE) danh cho tat ca cac ban HS-SV co ket qua hoc tap xuat sac, co ki nang lanh dao hoac dat duoc nhung thanh tich cao trong cac hoat dong ngoai khoa, the thao, nghe thuat. Hoc bong nay khong doi hoi SV phai thuc hien bat ky cam ket nao doi voi nha truong. Vui long dang ki tham du Hoi thao qua Hotline 090 133 7726.
 
Ngoai ra, cac ban HS-SV dang ki du hoc Singapore tai Hoc vien SIM Ge trong nam 2016 se duoc TANG ngay 1 ve may bay, phi kham suc khoe va phi dich thuat ho so.
 
Tai sao chon SIM GE?
 Dat chung nhan Edutrust 4 nam do Hoi Dong Giao duc Tu Thuc cua Chinh phu Singapore cap.
 Duoc binh chon la Hoc vien tu thuc tot nhat 7 nam lien tuc theo AsiaOne People’s Choice Awards.
 Top 3 truong tu thuc duoc yeu thich nhat theo JobsCentral Learning Rankings and Survey 2014.
 Cac truong doi tac nam trong Top 2% DH hang dau the gioi.
 Hoi SV Viet Nam luon ho tro cho cac SV moi qua nhap hoc tai SIM GE.
 
Cong ty tu van du hoc Hop Diem da duoc So Giao duc & Dao tao cap phep so 1803/QD-GDDT-TC trong linh vuc tu van du hoc.

Neu ban dang thuc hien y tuong khoi nghiep cua minh thi co nen dang ky ban quyen, ten thuong hieu truoc khi tung ra san pham hay khong? Tuy nhien neu startup cua ban chet truoc khi dang ky  thuong hieu se lang phi rat nhieu thoi gian va cong suc, trong khi ban co the dung thoi gian do de giai quyet duoc khoi viec.
 
Mat khac neu ban da tung ra san pham, da do mot dong tien vao marketing va chua dang ky thuong hieu thi phat hien mot startup khac dang ky mat thuong hieu thi ban se xu ly nhu the nao?
 
Dac biet hon, khi Viet Nam co the thong qua TPP thi khi do van de so huu tri tue (SHTT) se them phan phuc tap. Trong 30 chuong cua hiep dinh TPP thi co han mot chuong ban ve SHTT. Dieu nay cho thay tam quan trong cua SHTT khi Viet Nam gia nhap vao cac to chuc toan cau. Hon the nua, no cung co nghia rang startup Viet Nam cung co the bi xu ly hinh su neu vi pham luat SHTT trong tuong lai.
 
Vay thi lam the nao de tranh khoi vi pham luat SHTT? Lam the nao de bao ve quyen loi cho khi cac cong ty khac an cap ban quyen, sao chep nhan dang thuong hieu startup cua ban? Nen dang ky thuong hieu truoc hay sau khi da tung san pham ra thi truong?
 
SHIELD cung voi Phans Law se mang den cho cac startup mot su kien ve van de SHTT. Trong su kien nay startup se duoc tim hieu ve nhung cau hoi tren va mot so van de khac nhu:
 
1.Nhung kien thuc startup can phai biet ve SHTT
2.Nhung loai hinh doanh nghiep o Viet Nam va nhung kien thuc ve SHTT lien quan den loai hinh do
3.Lam the nao de giai quyet khi nay sinh tranh chap ve SHTT
4.Nhung tinh huong kinh doanh thuc te lien quan den quyen SHTT
 
Ong ba ta co cau “mat bo moi lo lam chuong”, cac startup hay trang bi kien thuc de xay chuong bao ve cho “bo” cua minh truoc khi bi mat nhe. 
 
Dien gia cua su kien ve SHTT lan nay la LS. Phan Vu Tuan - Truong van phong luat su PHANS
Ngoai ra ong con la Chanh Van Phong Hoi So Huu Tri Tue Tp, HCM, hoi vien Hiep Hoi Nhan Hieu Hoa Ky (AIPLA), Hiep Hoi Nhan Hieu Quoc Te (INTA). Van phong luat su PHANS co nhieu kinh nghiem trong viec tu van luat cho khong chi cong ty lon nhu Tan Hiep Phat ma con lam viec voi cong ty startup lon cua Viet Nam nhu Tiki.

Trong kinh doanh va giao tiep, yeu to van hoa la khong the thieu doi voi doanh nghiep. Tuy nhien luon luon ton tai rao can lon la ngon ngu va trai nghiem de co the so sanh su khac nhau trong cac nen van hoa. Nham tang cuong moi quan he hop tac ben chat giua hai nen van hoa Viet Nam va Nhat Ban, Trung tam Hop tac Nguon Nhan luc Viet Nam – Nhat Ban to chuc hoi thao "SU KHAC BIET VAN HOA VIET NAM - NHAT BAN TRONG GIAO TIEP KINH DOANH". Trong khoa hoc hoc vien se duoc trao doi truc tiep voi cac hoc vien Nhat Ban cung su huong dan cua giang vien voi nhieu nam kinh nghiem song va lam viec o Nhat.
Thong tin chi tiet: http://vjcchcmc.org.vn/businesscourse/1/khoa-hoc-ngan-han.html

Hien nay, gan 1/3 dan so the gioi dang tiep can, su dung va toi uu hoa Internet . Va con so nay se tang len rat nhanh trong nhung nam toi. Da so nhung nguoi su dung Internet deu hieu rang nhung website dau tien khi tim kiem toi mot van de nao do ma ho quan tam la nhung website duoc danh gia cao nhat. Va hien nhien dieu do mang lai loi ich rat lon trong  viec quang ba thuong hieu cho cac cong ty, tap doan la chu nhan cua nhung website do. Tuy nhien, viec dua website cua minh len hang top la mot dieu khong he de dang… Chinh vi the SEO (Search Engine Optimization) chao doi voi day du y nghia nhu ten goi cua no. SEO quan trong boi vi no bao gom hau het cac linh vuc chinh lien quan den Marketing trong kinh doanh va quang cao truc tuyen – no se tao ra nhan thuc, dan den viec mua sam va trao doi cua khach hang, toi uu hoa nhung no luc tiep thi de huong den nguoi mua.
         De tiep can SEO va thanh cong voi SEO la mot qua trinh khong he don gian. Nhieu nguoi chon cach nghien cuu tai nha thong qua nhung trang tra cuu thong tin, sach bao. Nhung ho thuong be tac trong phuong phap hoc cung nhu khong dinh huong duoc minh nen bat dau tu dau.  Chua ke den viec hien nay co rat nhieu nguon thong tin, tai lieu khong dang tin cay de gay nham lan trong qua trinh tim hieu. Vi the, de co nhung hieu biet tuong tan va xac thuc ve SEO, cach tot nhat la ban nen tim toi nhung nguoi da co chuyen mon trong linh vuc nay, nhung nguoi co kha nang dua khach  hang tiep can voi nhung san pham va nhung thong tin ma website cua ban cung cap ra thi truong mot cach de dang va hieu qua nhat.
        Vay lam sao de co the gap duoc nhung nguoi nhu vay. Co mot cach rat don gian cho ban chon lua.  Hay den voi khoa hoc SEO MARKETING ONLINE cua chung toi. Do la chia khoa giup ban mo canh cua  thanh cong mot cach an toan va ben vung.

Ton kho luon la moi quan tam hang dau cua cac doanh nghiep san xuat vi no anh huong truc tiep den thoi gian giao hang va chi phi. Voi cac phuong thuc san xuat hien dai doanh nghiep co the dap ung nhu cau cua khach hang mot cach nhanh chong nhung de tang cuong hon nua do thoa man cua khach hang cac doanh nghiep lon luon duy tri ton kho mot cach hop ly. Nham giup cac doanh nghiep giai quyet van de nhuc nhoi nhat trong nha may ve cong tac quan ly ton kho, VJCC da moi chuyen gia cao cap ve san xuat, ong Iwase huong dan khoa hoc "PHUONG PHAP QUAN LY TON KHO NHAM TANG NANG SUAT NHA MAY".

Ban biet gi ve Render?
Ve co ban, render la thao tac su dung phan mem may tinh chuyen dung de thiet lap, dieu khien cac yeu to tao nen mot phoi canh dien hoa va tien hanh ket xuat phoi canh do voi tat ca cac yeu to anh sang, vat lieu… ra file anh, phuc vu cho cong viec dien hoa. Noi mot cach “binh dan”, day chinh la qua trinh bien nhung hinh khoi “xanh xanh do do” tro thanh nhung phoi canh chan thuc, co du gia tri tham my va tinh chan thuc de minh hoa mot y tuong thiet ke.
Tai Viet Nam, V-Ray cua Chaos Group va 3DsMax la mot cap bai trung xuat hien trong gan nhu moi co may trong cac cong ty tu van thiet ke, thi cong va nhung truong dai hoc. Gan nhu moi sinh vien tai cac truong dao tao nganh thiet ke, dac biet la thiet ke noi that tai Viet Nam va thanh pho Ho Chi Minh noi rieng deu lua chon V-ray lam cong cu de the hien y tuong. 
Trong thuc te hien nay, ki nang su dung va lam viec voi V-Ray trong da so truong hop tac dong khong nho toi nang luc thuc hien cac do an trong nha truong noi rieng va kha nang the hien y tuong trong qua trinh lam nghe noi chung cua cac Designer noi that, dac biet o giai doan ung tuyen va vao lam viec tai cac cong ty chuyen nghiep lan trong cong viec thiet ke tu do.
Noi dung dao tao : sau khoa hoc, hoc vien se co duoc nhung ki nang sau.
•	Su dung V-Ray de tao nguon sang cho phoi canh : Su dung HDRI, V-Ray: Environment.
•	Dien hoa noi that ban dem. Mo phong nguon sang nhan tao bang V-Ray Light, V-Ray IES, Omni Light, V-Ray Light Mtl.
•	Tao View nhin cho phoi canh noi that : Dat va thiet lap V-Ray Physical Camera. Nhiep anh can ban. Khong che phoi sang bang Iso va Shutter Speed.
•	Tao vat lieu co ban voi V-Ray Mtl : Diffuse.
•	Ki thuat Ap vat lieu cho doi tuong. Khong che va hieu chinh mat do vat lieu bang UVWMap, UnWrap Map.
•	Hieu chinh be mat vat lieu co ban voi Reflection, Refraction, Hi-Light Glossiness, Reflect Glossiness. Phan xa la gi? Phan biet Fresnel Reflection va Metalic Reflection, hieu chinh khuc xa voi IOR. Tuong tac giua phan xa va anh sang.
•	Hieu chinh be mat vat lieu nang cao voi he thong Maps : Bump map, Displace map, Opacity map, R.Glossiness Map… Tao he thong Map ho tro kha nang the hien cua vat lieu bang Photoshop.
•	Ki thuat mo phong cac vat lieu thuc te : Kinh thuy, Guong, Inox, Sat, Nhom, Chrome, Vang, Plastic…v.v…Tao cac hieu ung mi thuat dac biet cho vat lieu go, gach, da hoa cuong…
•	Tao vat lieu phuc hop cao cap voi V-Ray Blend Mtl, V-Ray Override Mtl, V-Ray 2-Sided Mtl…
•	V-Ray Frame Buffer la gi? Tai sao V-Ray Frame Buffer lai quan trong den vay. Hieu chinh va toi uu hoa V-Ray Frame Buffer. Su dung cac cong cu tich hop de chinh sua anh truc tiep truoc khi ket xuat tren khung render.
•	Hieu duoc nhung gia tri co ban va quan trong nhat quyet dinh chat luong va toc do Render : Light Cache, Irradiance Map, Color Mapping…..Tinh chinh thong so Render khoa hoc, hieu qua.
•	Su dung nhung tinh nang moi cua V-Ray 3.0 : Render Mask, Render Progressive. Tinh nang Use Embree de toi da hoa thoi gian thuc hien dien hoa.
•	Ki nang xu ly hau ki : thuc hien cac thao tac long hau canh, xoa phong va Retouch can ban bang Photoshop. Su dung Photoshop de dien hoa ban ve ki thuat mat bang, mat dung. Layout do an thiet ke. 
Thoi gian hoc : 5 tuan (15 buoi).
Hoc phi : 2 tr 00 . Hoc vien co hoan canh kho khan co the lien he nhom de duoc huong dan ho tro thanh toan nhieu dot va cac hinh thuc uu dai rieng.
Thoi gian khai giang du kien : 
Thu Tu : 02/12/2015
Thoi gian ket thuc du kien : 8/01/2015

Nhung loi the khi theo hoc tai cac khoa dao tao 3D tai D5 Attic :
1. Tat ca giang vien,tro giang 3D tai The D5 Attic deu la nhung sinh vien/cuu sinh vien chuyen nganh Thiet Ke Noi That, co kien thuc/ky nang su dung 3DsMax va V-Ray dang ke, da duoc kiem nghiem qua thuc te moi truong lam viec thuc te.
2. Giang vien,tro giang 3D tai The D5 Attic deu la nhung Freelancer hoac dang lam viec trong cac moi truong thiet ke chuyen nghiep, co trong tay nhung cong trinh thuc te duoc trien khai thiet ke hoac phac thao bang 3DsMax cung nhu kinh nghiem trai qua day du nhung do an trong chuong trinh dao tao Dai hoc chinh quy nganh Thiet ke noi that.
3. Co so vat chat tot : khong gian hoc tap nam trong khoi lam viec chung cua nhom thiet ke, phong hoc duoc trang bi dieu hoa nhiet do thuong truc, mien phi nuoc uong va ca phe, co bai dau xe rieng, hoc vien duoc thoai mai su dung nhung sach bao, tai lieu chuyen nganh cua nhom trong thoi gian hoc tap tai Gac.
4. Voi tinh than cua mot CoWorking Space. Tat ca thanh vien cua The D5 Attic luon san sang ho tro,thuc day viec hoc cung nhu cong viec cua hoc vien. Tao moi co hoi co the de thanh vien duoc ung dung ki nang ve may vao cong viec thuc te, tu do kiem tra va nhanh chong nang cao nang luc cua minh. The D5 Attic han hoan chao don nhung ca nhan co y muon cong tac voi nhom trong cong viec thiet ke sau khi man khoa hoc.
5. The D5 Attic cam ket ho tro hoc vien vo thoi han ve mat kien thuc va ki thuat ca trong va sau khi ket thuc khoa hoc. Moi thac mac cua hoc vien se duoc giai dap nhanh nhat co the. Cam ket hoan lai 100% hoc phi neu hoc vien khong co ki nang sau khoa hoc.
Ngoai ra, Hoc vien dang ki hoc trong thang 10 se nhan duoc nhung phan qua tu D5 Attic Interior Design :
1. Giam ngay 10% hoc phi cho hoc vien dang ki theo nhom 6 nguoi. 
2. Qua tang tu The D5 Attic: 1 ao thun Polo, 1 so ki hoa.
3. Mien phi toan bo giao trinh phuc vu khoa hoc.

BarcampSaigon is an unconference that was created in the tech community in 2008. Organizers of the event only organized the space and the people from the community were the presenters. That means the quality of the event depends on the community.
 
Barcamps of the past have been wildly successful in introducing new startups, new products, and new ideas as well as connecting like-minded people in the world of technology. And we would love to carry on the tradition this year. The same team that brought you Barcamp Saigon 2013 and 2014 proudly presents Barcamp Saigon 2015. The event will be held on Sunday 29th November 2015.
 
BarcampSaigon la hoi thao mo hinh thanh trong cong dong cong nghe tu nam 2008. Ban to chuc chi chuan bi khong gian hoi thao, va nhung ca nhan trong cong dong la nguoi trinh bay. Chat luong cua Barcamp chinh la thuoc do suc khoe cua cong dong dia phuong.
 
Cac ky Barcamp truoc day rat thanh cong trong viec mang nhung startup, san pham, y tuong va con nguoi lai voi nhau. Nam nay, chung toi mong muon truyen thong nay duoc tiep tuc. Tu nhung nguoi ban da mang den Barcamp Saigon 2013 va 2014, xin gioi thieu Barcamp Saigon 2015. Su kien dien ra vao ngay Chu Nhat, 29 thang 11 nam 2015.

【講演内容】
『なぜ今、シュンペーターなのか』秋元征紘氏 出版記念講演（先着20名）
「イノベーションとは何か」「どうやって起こすのか」を、天才・シュンペーターに学ぶ！ ナイキなど4社の外資系企業の日本法人トップを務め、現在は注目のスタートアップ企業数社の経営に携わるプロ経営者・秋元征紘氏による「イノベーションの授業」。

【イベント詳細】
講師：秋元 征紘氏
日時：2015年12月2日(水) 19:00開演
定員：20名(先着順)

【講演者プロフィール】
秋元 征紘氏
ワイ・エイ・パートナーズ 代表取締役、ジャイロ経営塾 代表。 上智大学経済学部卒業、シドニー大学経済学部修士課程。1970年日本精工に入社、ニューヨーク、トロント駐在等を経て、日本ケンタッキーフライドチキン（日本KFC）へ。その後、同社マーケティング本部長、日本ペプシ・コーラ副社長、日本KFC常務取締役、ナイキジャパン代表取締役社長、LVMHグループのゲラン代表取締役社長、同取締役会長、ゲランSA（パリ本社）執行役員と、欧米企業日本法人のトップマネジメントを歴任。2006年ワイ・エイ・パートナーズを創業。
2008年にはジャイロ経営塾を設立。ベンチャー企業支援、戦略経営コンサルティング、大企業向けグローバル人材研修およびマネジメント研修のプログラムデザイン・実施、数社の社外取締役・顧問等を務めるほか、執筆・講演等を精力的に展開中。著書に『金の社員・銀の社員・銅の社員』（文春新書）、『こうして私は外資4社のトップになった』（東洋経済新報社）などがある。


【書籍紹介】
『なぜ今、シュンペーターなのか』秋元征紘［著］
http://www.amazon.co.jp/exec/obidos/ASIN/4844374362/ 

ケインズと並んで、20世紀を代表する経済学者の一人であるシュンペーター。20代にして独自の経済理論を打ち立てたこの天才は、経済学だけではなく、現代の経営の最重要事項である「イノベーション」をはじめ、「創造的破壊」「企業家」といった画期的な概念を100年も前に提唱したのです。
経済学者としては、ウィーン大学からドイツの名門・ボン大学を経て渡米。ハーバード大学ではサミュエルソン、ガルブレイス、ソローなど、現代経済学における大家やノーベル賞受賞者たちを数多く輩出しました。

シュンペーターの考え方は、経営学・マネジメント論の大家であるドラッカーが引き継いで発展させ、スティーブ・ジョブズのような優れた企業家がまさにその理論を具現化しました。「イノベーション」はいまや、アップルやGoogle、フェイスブックなど、現代のグローバル企業の躍進を支える「成長原理」と言っても過言ではないでしょう。

シュンペーターは、画期的なイノベーションを生み出す「企業家」と、経済の波間に漂いながら経営するだけの「経営管理者」を明確に分けました。
あなたはどちらを目指しますか？

本書の著者は、ナイキやゲランなど4社の外資系企業の日本法人トップを務め、現在はFiNCやCreww、エアウィーヴなど、注目のスタートアップ企業数社の経営に携わっています。
その著者が、シュンペーターの難解な理論を読み解き、ドラッカーや『イノベーションのジレンマ』のクリステンセンの理論、ジョブズの残した足跡などをたどりながら、「イノベーション」の本質を探ります。いわば経営者・ビジネスパーソンに向けた「イノベーションの授業」です。
本書で、これから先の時代を見通す強力な「武器」を身につけてください。

Trien lam quoc te xe hai banh lan thu 4 se duoc to chuc tu ngay 2/12 den 5/12 tai Trung tam trien lam va hoi nghi SECC, so 799 dai lo Nguyen Van Linh, quan 7, TP HCM. Day la noi hoi tu cua nhieu thuong hieu xe dap noi tieng.

Trien lam duoc danh gia co chat luong giao dich cao lien tuc trong vong 4 nam do Cong ty Vinexad (Bo Cong Thuong) phoi hop voi Hiep hoi oto, xe may, xe dap Viet Nam to chuc. Trien lam co dien tich trung bay hon 2.000 m2 se trung bay cac dong xe dap nhu xe dap dien, xe dap dia hinh, xe dap lam bang tre, xe dap mini, linh phu kien cong nghe cao, san pham co chuc nang tiet kiem nang luong va bao ve moi truong, cac loai linh phu kien. Day se la khong gian cua nhieu thuong hieu noi tieng trong va nuoc nhu Giant, Always, Huffy, Thong Nhat, Merida, HKBike, BambooBike, Trek, Terra Motor…
 
Su kien the hien xu huong phat trien cua nganh cong nghiep xe hai banh trong tuong lai. Dong thoi, khu trung bay con co nhieu hoat dong nhu chuong trinh thu xe de khach tham quan co the tham gia va chay thu cac loai xe co mau ma moi va cong nghe tien tien. 
 
Xu the su dung xe dap dang quay lai va tro thanh mot trao luu o hau het cac lua tuoi va lan rong manh me tai cac tinh thanh tren ca nuoc.Cung voi do la su xuat hien cua nhieu dong xe voi nhieu kieu dang mau ma, thuong hieu khac nhau. Doi tuong nguoi dung la thanh nien, hoc sinh, phu nu chu yeu chon cac mau xe dap dien, xe may dien vi nho gon, khong ton nhien lieu, di chuyen nhe nhang va gia thanh phu hop. Xe dap truyen thong cung dang quay lai voi nhieu dien mao thoi thuong voi nhieu chung loai khac nhau. Xu huong di xe dap o cac nuoc phat trien khong ngung tang len. Tham chi dieu nay con la tieu chi de lua chon "thanh pho xe dap" nhu Copenhagen, London, Amstedam, Paris, Berlin, Tokyo…
 
Hien nay, khong kho de ban co the tham gia vao nhom, hoi nhung nguoi di xe dap. Ban chi can xe dap toi nhung diem tu tap thuong thay nhu Ho Tay, ho Linh Dam (Ha Noi); ho Con rua, Phu My Hung (TP HCM); Cau Rong (Da Nang); Tran Phu (Nha Trang) hoac vao facebook, dien dan tham gia cac nhom di xe trong thanh pho, hoac di phuot. Nguoi su dung xe dap o moi do tuoi va "do choi" khac nhau boi xe va cac phu kien di kem co nhieu mau ma, xuat xu va gia thanh. Voi cac tin do "sanh choi" thi xe duoc nhap khau nguyen chiec tu Duc, My co gia tu 50 trieu dong den 100 trieu dong mot chiec. Ngoai ra, do phu kien di kem cung da dang, thay doi theo xu huong, theo thoi gian va theo mua.
 
O giai doan nhung nam 60-70, xe dap duoc coi la tai san, la phuong tien di lai cua nhieu nguoi dan. O Viet Nam, xe dap Thong Nhat la niem mo uoc cua nhieu nguoi, tham chi con la niem tu hao cua nguoi dan Viet Nam khi duoc xuat khau di nhieu quoc gia tren the gioi. Trai qua cac cuoc cai cach trong dau tu san xuat, xe dap Thong nhat da co mat tai cac thi truong kho tinh nhu My, EU, Duc, Tay Ban Nha, Singapore, Malaysia.

La mot trong nhung hoat dong nham chao mung CLB Tinh nguyen HOPE tron 6 nam thanh lap. Thay vi to chuc mot buoi tiec sinh nhat don thuan, chung toi – CLB Tinh nguyen HOPE tai TPHCM quyet dinh dem den cho cac TNV mot buoi da ngoai, vui choi ket hop Teambuilding 2 ngay 1 dem.

Hay tam gac nhung gio hoc cang thang, nhung gio lam viec met moi. Khong phan biet ban la TNV moi hay cu, la sinh vien hay nguoi da di lam. Hay tham gia cung chung toi, hua hen day se la mot chuyen di y nghia cho tat ca chung ta.

Hoat dong nham tao san choi lanh manh, bo ich, giup cac ban trau doi them mot so ki nang khi lam viec nhom, phat huy suc manh tap the. Dong thoi, giup cac TNV nhanh chong thich ung voi moi truong Tinh nguyen, va tiep them ngon lua tinh nguyen trong moi TNV.

Do you love kids and yoga? 

Join instructor Suzanne Vian RCYT, E-RYT, for a meaningful weekend of learning to teach yoga to kids. 
Children are naturally creative and fun loving- help them to channel their energy "mindfully". 

Inspire the children in your life to build strength and stability,  while keeping them engaged and stimulating their incredible imaginations through the practices of yoga and mindfulness. Teach them techniques to calm and center themselves, while cultivating a deeper body and mind connection and mental, physical and emotional balance. 

This experiential training will teach you to share the practice through yoga stories, movement, music and games geared to teach kids how to be more mindful and aware. 

You do not need to be a yoga teacher to teach kids yoga. Anyone can take this course and share what is learned during this training with children, even those new to the practice. 

This 2 day program will explore theory, games, and exercises appropriate for all ages, from toddlers to teens. 
3 hours of course homework will be done on your free time, to support what you learn during your training. 
 -------------------------------------
This Kids Yoga Teacher Training Course was developed for:
Parents 
School teachers
Health care workers
Family members 
Care givers 
Anyone who enjoys children and is interested in finding more meaningful ways to connect with them, while helping them develop wonderful tools for self connection through the practice of yoga and mindfulness. 
------------------------------------

8:30am - 4:30pm Sunday,    6 December, 2015

The objective of this Account Planning course is to provide participants with the process, methodologies and tools for creating strategies for communication and brand building in advertising. For a detailed curriculum, please visit www.worksaigon.com/creativityschool

DETAILS
This event is for the FIRST class in this 6-week course. Six 4-hour sessions in total. You must register through www.worksaigon.com/creativityschool and make payment at WORK Saigon. Maximum 10 students.

MENTOR
Alok Bhute, Senior Strategic Planner, Leo Burnett Vietnam. Before joining Leo Burnett, Alok was a planner at Bates CHI & Partners and an MBA lecturer. He believes in not just creating campaigns but in creating brands. And have helped build quite a few award-winning brands like Samsung.

TRAN TRONG GIOI THIEU: BRIAN TRACY TRUC TIEP TAI VIET NAM

Ban than men,

Brian Tracy  - Tac gia cua hang loat cuon sach kinh doanh kinh dien tren the gioi nhu “100 Quy luat bat bien trong Kinh Doanh”, “Kinh Doanh bang tam ly”, “Ket thuc ban hang don quyet dinh”,… Ong la mot doanh nhan thanh dat, mot trong nhung nha huan luyen bac thay trong kinh doanh tren the gioi. Cac chuong trinh dao tao cua ong co o hon 72 nuoc tren the gioi, ong lam viec truc tiep voi cap lanh dao, quan ly cao cap cua hon 10000 cong ty lon nho tren the gioi. Voi thuong hieu quoc te Brian Tracy International duoc coi la mot thuong hieu dao tao doanh nhan, doanh nghiep lon nhat the gioi va uy tin nhat, cac chung nhan quoc te cua Brian Tracy International duoc cong nhan tren toan the gioi.
Cong ty dao tao quoc te DVH-Bransons tran trong gioi thieu chuong trinh dao tao chuyen sau “KINH DOANH THANH CONG” truc tiep voi Brian Tracy tai TP Ho Chi Minh, Viet Nam. Day la chuong trinh dao tao 100% thoi luong duoc dao tao boi Brian Tracy, mot chuong trinh hieu qua, thuc te da duoc kiem chung danh cho nhung ai muon tim kiem thanh cong trong kinh doanh hien dai. Trong hai ngay nay, ban se hoc nhung chien luoc, ky nang, phuong phap, va ky thuat can thiet dang duoc ap dung boi nhung lanh dao va nha quan tri hang dau tren the gioi.
Chuong trinh nay duoc xay dung dua tren qua trinh lam viec voi hon 10.000  cong ty, bao gom hon 1.000 cong ty lon nhat the gioi o hon 60 quoc gia khac nhau trong hon 25 nam. Ban se duoc chuyen giao nhung phuong phap tang doanh thu nhanh chong, giam chi phi va tang kha nang sinh loi trong moi thi truong. Ban se duoc tiep can nhung y tuong gia tri o ben trong nhung cong ty sinh loi nhat tren the gioi trong tat ca cac nganh kinh doanh hien nay.
Cac chu de duoc dao tao trong chuong trinh:
-	Gioi thieu – Khai mo tiem nang ca nhan va kinh doanh cua ban
-	Phan 1: Tro thanh nha lanh dao tuyet voi (10 muc)
-	Phan 2: Cung cap san pham hoac dich vu tuyet voi (7 muc)
-	Phan 3: Thiet ke mot ke hoach kinh doanh tuyet voi (12 muc)
-	Phan 4: Xay dung ke hoach marketing tuyet voi (18 muc)
-	Phan 5: Tao ra nhung con so tuyet voi (12 muc)
-	Phan 6: Thu hut va giu nguoi tai (12 muc)
-	Phan 7: Hoan thiet mot quy trinh ban hang hoan hao (9 muc)
-	Phan 8: Tro thanh doanh nhan dai tai (5 muc)
-	Phan 9: Tao trai nghiem tot cho khach hang (10 muc)
-	Phan 10: Song cuoc doi tuyet voi (7 muc) 
(xem chi tiet tai http://briantracy.org )
Voi phuong phap dao tao gia toc dac biet, buoi dao tao thu vi va co tinh tuong tac rat cao. Ban se duoc lam viec voi mot nhom 4-5 giam doc dieu hanh khac de tap trung vao moi bo phan quan trong cua doanh nghiep trong 2 ngay lien tuc. Sau khoa dao tao, ban se xay dung duoc mot ban ke hoach hanh dong hoan thien va mot loat chien luoc co the su dung ngay lap tuc de mang lai nhung ket qua kinh doanh tich dang ne hon. Nhieu nguoi tham gia chuong trinh da phan hoi rang doanh so, thu nhap va loi nhuan da tang 30-40% trong vong 60 ngay sau chuong trinh.
Ket thuc khoa hoc ban se duoc nhan Chung nhan Mini MBA co gia tri toan cau do Brian Tracy International cap.
Day la chuong trinh dao tao dang gia nhat trong cuoc doi kinh doanh cua ban!
Hotline: 0917 901910
Hoac truy cap: http://briantracy.org

Hoi cho Thuong mai Quoc te Viet Nam lan thu 13 tai Thanh pho Ho Chi Minh – VIETNAM EXPO 2015 IN HO CHI MINH CITY do Cong ty VINEXAD to chuc dong thoi voi Trien lam Quoc te Xe dap va Linh phu kien – VIETNAM CYCLE 2015 tu ngay 02 den ngay 05 thang 12 tai Trung tam Trien lam va Hoi nghi Sai Gon (SECC) – 799 Dai lo Nguyen Van Linh, Quan 7, Tp. Ho Chi Minh.

Duoc xem la mot trong nhung cau noi xuc tien thuong mai quan trong giua cac doanh nghiep trong nuoc va nuoc ngoai, dac biet la khu vuc Chau A. VIETNAM EXPO tai Thanh pho Ho Chi Minh da thanh cong sau 12 nam to chuc va nam 2014 da thu hut duoc 426 cong ty voi quy mo 450 gian hang den tu nhieu quoc gia va vung lanh tho nhu Ba Lan, An Do, Belarus, Dai Loan, Indonesia, Hong Kong, Han Quoc, Malaysia, Nepal, Nhat Ban, Phap, Slovakia, Thuy Sy, Trung Quoc, Tho Nhi Ky va Viet Nam.

Voi muc tieu tao ra cac co hoi hop tac kinh doanh va la cau noi cho cac doanh nghiep Viet Nam va the gioi, VIETNAM EXPO tai TP. HCM da khong ngung phat trien, voi quy mo va khau to chuc chuyen nghiep. Trong do phai ke den nhung quoc gia va vung lanh tho thuong nien co mat tai VIETNAM EXPO 12 nam lien tiep nhu: Han Quoc, Trung Quoc Indonesia, An Do, Dai Loan.

Dac biet tai Hoi cho nam nay, khu trung bay “Taiwan Exellence” gioi thieu nhung san pham tien tien va sang tao cua tren 40 thuong hieu noi tieng, thuoc cac nganh cong nghiep co the manh cua Dai Loan nhu: may tinh – phu kien ngoai vi/ dieu khien khong day; dien thoai di dong; thiet bi trinh chieu, hoi thao; thiet bi, phu kien nganh dien; thiet bi lap dat trong xay dung; sam lop; o to va phu tung/phu kien; xe may; xe dap va phu tung xe dap; dung cu cam tay;dung cu the thao; van phong pham; hang gia dung; nhac cu.

Co the noi xu huong su dung xe dap hien nay tai Viet nam dang ngay cang tro nen thinh hanh boi nhung yeu to tich cuc nhu: khong gay hai moi truong, giup ich cho suc khoe, tiet kiem nang luong va giam toi da chi phi luu thong. Nam bat duoc nhung yeu to do, su kien dong to chuc “ Trien lam Quoc te Xe Hai Banh (VIETNAM CYCLE 2015)” nam trong khuon kho cua Hoi cho VIETNAM EXPO tai Tp. Ho Chi Minh luon la noi thu hut nhieu nhat cac doanh nghiep va cong chung toi tham quan.Voi quy mo 300m2 trung bay cac san pham: Xe dap, xe dap dien, linh phu kien xe dap, do choi xe dap, … trong do co cac thuong hieu xe dap noi tieng nhu Vietbike, Thong Nhat, Shuaigete, Sun Electric, Fonix… va rat nhieu hang xe nhap khau khac.

Vietnam Expo 2014 don nhan su quay tro lai cua Khu gian hang Quoc gia Belarus voi dien tich trung bay tren 300m2. Viet Nam co the manh ve hang tieu dung, cong nghiep nhe, trong khi Belarus co the manh ve cong nghiep nang va nang luong. Do do hai nuoc co the bo sung cho nhau trong hop tac dau tu va thuong mai. Trong tuong lai gan, sau khi Hiep dinh Thuong mai tu do (FTA) giua Viet Nam va cac nuoc Lien minh Thue quan Nga - Kazakhstan - Belarus ket thuc. Day se la cong cu huu hieu tang cuong quan he thuong mai giua Viet Nam va Lien minh Thue quan noi chung cung nhu giua Viet Nam voi Belarus noi rieng. Viec tang cuong giao luu hop tac thong qua cac su kien thuong mai uy tin cung la minh chung cho quan he thuong mai ngay cang khang khit giua hai nuoc.

Hien nay, An Do da tro thanh mot trong muoi doi tac thuong mai lon nhat cua Viet Nam, trao doi thuong mai hai chieu khong ngung tang nhanh voi toc do tang truong binh quan giai doan 2008-2012 la 12,2%/nam, trong do tang truong xuat khau cua Viet Nam sang An Do dat binh quan 46,3%/nam va tang truong nhap khau tu An Do dat binh quan 1,1%/nam.

Doan thuong mai An Do gom 31 Cong ty do Lien Doan cac to chuc Xuat khau An Do (FIEO) dan dau tham gia trung bay cac san pham nhu: May moc, thiet bi, khoang san; hoa chat, phan bon; nong san, thuc pham; da giay, det may; thu cong my nghe, do trang suc, gia dung… Su tham gia cua cac doanh nghiep An Do tai Hoi cho Vietnam Expo tai Tp. Ho Chi Minh nham khang dinh ro muc tieu va nhung no luc cua chinh phu An Do trong viec thuc day quan he manh me hon nua giua hai quoc gia tren moi phuong dien, va la mot trong nhung chinh sach “huong Dong” cua An Do.

Vietnam Expo 2015 tai TP. Ho Chi Minh con co su tham gia tich cuc cua cac doanh nghiep Viet Nam trung bay, gioi thieu san pham va tim kiem doi tac hop tac kinh doanh. Voi be day kinh nghiem cua Ban to chuc, Vietnam Expo chac chan se dem lai cho cac doanh nghiep su hai long va mo ra nhieu co hoi moi tai TP. Ho Chi Minh – mot thi truong tiem nang va nang dong nhat ca nuoc. Hoi cho du kien don tiep khoang 15,000 luot khach toi lam viec va tham quan.

VinGallery brings you a new event to give you high quality selling opportunities all year round. Since 2012, we have been hosting regular Art Markets on 1 Saturday of these months: APRIL, JUNE, OCTOBER and DECEMBER.

The key thing about VinGallery events is that all the goods must be original, handmade art and craft items in keeping with our philosophy. At each event we will be aiming to offer a balance of products. In particular we are hoping to offer:

• Paintings, drawings, and limited edition prints
• Photography
• Handmade jewellery
• Fashion and accessories
• Ceramics, and sculpture
• Handmade homewares and gift items

The Art Market has become a regular event in the Saigon Calander. We welcome people to join our Lucky Draw to win creative products available at the bazaar. There will also be pop-up workshop for both adults & children throughout the day.

Book for this month: 'Persepolis' by Marjane Satrapi

(SCROLL DOWN TO FIND OUT HOW TO GET A COPY OF THE BOOK)

(synopsis from goodreads.com)

A New York Times Notable Book
A Time Magazine “Best Comix of the Year”
A San Francisco Chronicle and Los Angeles Times Best-seller

Wise, funny, and heartbreaking, Persepolis is Marjane Satrapi’s memoir of growing up in Iran during the Islamic Revolution. In powerful black-and-white comic strip images, Satrapi tells the story of her life in Tehran from ages six to fourteen, years that saw the overthrow of the Shah’s regime, the triumph of the Islamic Revolution, and the devastating effects of war with Iraq. The intelligent and outspoken only child of committed Marxists and the great-granddaughter of one of Iran’s last emperors, Marjane bears witness to a childhood uniquely entwined with the history of her country.

Persepolis paints an unforgettable portrait of daily life in Iran and of the bewildering contradictions between home life and public life. Marjane’s child’s-eye view of dethroned emperors, state-sanctioned whippings, and heroes of the revolution allows us to learn as she does the history of this fascinating country and of her own extraordinary family. Intensely personal, profoundly political, and wholly original, Persepolis is at once a story of growing up and a reminder of the human cost of war and political repression. It shows how we carry on, with laughter and tears, in the face of absurdity. And, finally, it introduces us to an irresistible little girl with whom we cannot help but fall in love

Experience Ho Chi Minh City and it may just be the new holiday destination and shopping stop for you!

Prisma - The night run la duong chay “co 1 khong 2” tai Viet Nam. Duoc dien ra lan dau tien vao nam 2014, su kien da thu hut duoc hon 7.600 nguoi tham du, dac biet la cac ban tre.

Den hen lai len, nam nay Prisma Run se tro lai vao thang 11 nay. Van giu nguyen phong cach ban dau la duong chay vao ban dem, van la su xuyen suot cua am thanh va anh sang, van se mang den mot le hoi am nhac day cam hung danh cho cac ban nhung hua hen Prisma Run 2015 se co nhung thay doi moi nham mang su bat ngo, thu vi va niem vui cho tat ca nhung ai tham gia.

Tham gia vao Prisma Run, ban khong can phai la van dong vien chuyen nghiep, su kien se tao co hoi tap luyen cho nhung ai moi bat dau tham gia chay bo, quan trong hon het hay den de co duoc trai nghiem tren duong chay thu vi nay va cung co nhung khoanh khac dang nho nhat cung ban be va nguoi than cua minh.

Prisma - The night run, duong chay dem duoc to chuc voi quy mo hoanh trang, hap dan, am thanh anh sang se di theo tung buoc chan cua ban, dem hoi am nhac hua hen soi dong hon bao gio het. Hay dang ky ngay de trai nghiem 1 dem hoi tuyet voi cung ban be va nguoi than cua minh nao.

1. Online: http://prismarun.com/

2. Offline: Cty Pulse Active – Lau 8 toa nha Harmony, 47 Phung Khac Khoan, P.Da Kao, Q1, Tp.HCM [Thoi gian 9.30 - 18:00, thu 2 – thu 6]

Prima -The night run is one of a kind runway in Vietnam. First took place in 2014, the event attracted more than 7.600 participants.

This intriguing run will transport the participant into different wonderlands with many themes of colorful lights and music styles, promising to transport your mind, body and soul to a new world in a healthy way. 

At Prisma Run, you are inspired to live each to the fullest, to change in ourselves and others, to live bright in each moment. This is one-of-a-kind nighttime fun run that as darkness falls, the light just gets brighter, the fun more fun, and the awesome memories more vivid. One thing for sure, everyone will have a blast while doing it.

Prisma - The night run is organized with monumental scale. Sound and light will follow all your steps. Sign up now to experience this great festival and share the best moments with your family and friends.

GITA la chuoi chuong trinh khuyen khich su chia se cac chuong trinh thuc te da trien khai tai cong ty cua cac hoi vien voi nhieu chu de khac nhau trong Quan tri Nhan su. GITA duoc to chuc nhu the nao?

•Moi 2 thang VNHR se to chuc chia se 1 chu de.

•Moi chu de se danh cho 5 Hoi vien dang ky som nhat. Moi hoi vien dang ky se duoc moi  1 thanh vien khac (la hoi vien hoac khong phai hoi vien) cung tham gia. Moi hoi vien tham gia (khong phai la khach moi) se chuan bi 1 noi dung chia se trong 20 phut va goi truoc cho Ban toi chuc de dam bao noi dung chia se phu hop.

•Trong cung mot chu de se khong co su tham gia cua cac hoi vien la dai dien cho cac cong ty doi thu cua nhau.

•Chuong trinh se duoc to chuc tai van phong VNHR (hoac van phong cua Hoi vien dang ky) voi thoi luong 3 tieng/ chu de.

Nam 2016 - thoi diem quan trong trong lich su kinh te Viet Nam voi muc do hoi nhap toan cau sau va rong nhat. Cong dong kinh te ASEAN (AEC) se co hieu luc trong vai tuan nua (31/12/2015). Thi truong bay gio khong chi la Viet Nam voi 90 trieu dan ma la ASEAN co tren 600 trieu nguoi tieu dung voi hang rao thue quan gan nhu bang 0%. Hiep dinh Thuong mai tu do voi Chau Au (EUFTA), dac biet la Hiep dinh Doi tac xuyen Thai Binh Duong (TPP) se bat dau co hieu luc trong 2 nam sap toi, cho phep Viet Nam day nhanh viec hoi nhap vao nen kinh te the gioi voi GDP chiem 40% toan cau. 

Dung truoc nhung chuyen bien nhanh chong do, cac doanh nghiep tai Viet Nam can nhan thuc ro nhung tac dong tu ben ngoai den co hoi va de doa trong xay dung chien luoc kinh doanh va hoach dinh ngan sach cho 2016 va cac nam tiep theo. 

Hieu duoc nhung tran tro hien nay cua quy doanh nghiep, Vien Marketing va Quan tri Viet Nam (VMI) mo Hoi thao huan luyen, nham giup cac doanh nghiep co du kien thuc can thiet de lap ke hoach kinh doanh va hoach dinh ngan sach chuyen nghiep, san sang duong dau voi moi truong kinh doanh hoi nhap mang tinh lich su cua kinh te Viet Nam trong 2016 va cac nam toi.

Dang ky tham du: http://goo.gl/forms/RZjBZB2O1C
Chi tiet chuong trinh hoc: http://www.vmi.edu.vn/news/pid/49/search/page/1/id/4510

On this night where anyone is a headliner, featuring many familiar faces that have joined Heart Beat one or more times in the past. Besides a distinguished list of names there will also be an international act we are proud to have for our birthday and his name is MORBECK

FREE until 11PM ▲ AFTER: 150k VND 

▬▬▬▬▬▬INTRO MORBECK = Since his early youth Berlin born MORBECK was involved in the club scene of the German capital. Inspired by 90s Hip Hop and Techno he set up his first studio in 2002 and began producing music of both genres. After working on several projects during the following years he eventually had his first releases on Berlin based label VAULT SERIES in 2010 which gained widespread recognition. More releases (and remixes) followed on labels such as PERC TRAX, SOMA, M-REC and FIFTH WALL. And he played numerous clubs and festivals all across the globe.In 2013 he founded his own imprint CODE IS LAW, as a platform for his own music and for artists who shared his vision and passion for Techno. The love for the art and the striving for versatility can be observed not only in his work for the label but also in his DJ sets. The influences from his past are all coming together now shaping the typical sound: rough, groovy, melodic and constantly evolving Techno as you can hear on his most recent release – the highly acclaimed double EP T.R.I.P.S. (S.

HOUSE & TECHNO EXTRAVAGANZA
►B.A.X LIVE: THE specialist to kick off hopefully another epic night marking the start of our 4th year. Now something different. BAX will play a LIVE AMBIENT set, which is one of the sides of BAX we don’t often see but is in fact the world of BAX, as you can see here: Recording during Heart Beat June 8, 2014. 
►MARCO MEI avidly touring Asia but luckily at the right time at the right place or did he manipulate the situation to just be part of this circus of house&techno?! 
►OKO: will one more play back to back with Marco Mei and his task to weave this story further into the night, embrace his tunes, grab those frequencies and stomp your feet. 
►NIC FORD with the most Heart Beat nights under his belt takes the slot just after OKO. Nic played with Oliver Ho, Andre Kronert, Gregor Welz, Marco Effe and Chris Wolter. As diverse as these all sound, as amazing Nic was able to connect either before or after them. You will see the master at work, or as we like to call him “SIR NIC.” 
►CHRIS WOLTER currently in his melodic phase, but simultaneously producing the darker grooves..what he will do with his slot after MORBECK is not a mystery for anyone that knows Chris..expect to save some energy till the end. 
►1Dan. aka Dan Rodgers was our guest in January this year and will take care of the breakfast shift for those last standers, that can’t stop dancing. He will make it extra difficult to leave the dance floor. Under the spell of 1Dan. 
►VISUALS: EROL - Bringing his own projector this time, no light show will be needed, standing all night besides 7 DJ’s this one man live show called Erol produces the visuals that will entangle with all the soundscapes, it is hard not to get hypnotised by his creations. 
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬Intro Heart Beat This is the 15th installment of Heart Beat. Marking  3 years activating Underground Body Music in Saigon. Doing so as promoter / sound system/ community and nascent label. Heart Beat is introducing house & techno culture to Saigon's nightlife by regularly hosting nights playing classic grooving minimal techno and left and right and in between the whole subgenre spectrum,  you can also expect some deep - minimal and micro and tech house. They just call it "underground body music” 

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬Intro Venue: The Observatory is a nightclub that is focused on underground music and the culture[s] associated with it. Now operating from a new hideaway location with a great view on the skyline and river as well as a sunrise after party experience guaranteed. The venue has just invested in upgrading their already great sound system and added more climate control. IN the region the ‘Obs’ is already legendary in the whole SEA region. Due to the selection of international guest that performed here and the late night opening hours.

►►Come early and never leave, we have a mesmerizing line up for you!

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬Short Bios◀︎ 
# B.A.X. Born in 1989 in Vietnam, Bach was taught to play the piano when he was 8 years old.  At the age of 18 he discovered his passion for electronic music.  In 2008 he started his own project B.A.X.  B.A.X is known for two styles. One goes back longer and is the New Age/Ambient music style, which makes listeners feel relaxed. The other style is House and Deep House sets that B.A.X has been known to play with Heart Beat since 2012. His selection of tracks will make everyone crawl out of his/her shell, as the music becomes the cocoon. Bach started his new label called Feel of Life Records on 01.08.2010. 

#ChrisWolter [GER] hailing from Hanse city Rostock, with a very active scene, as we all have experienced these past 2 years. At least 5 guests from the Rostock area come over to Saigon. Chris is already more than 7 years part of the Vietnamese culture and of course founding father (Papa) of Heart Beat. Releasing his signature sound on Heart Beat’s imprint with his latest techno bomb “Scorpion” following “Bubi”.  Made his debut in 2004 as DJ and in 2008 his first set in Vietnam during the Hanoi Soundstuff Festival. 

#NicFord - Avid record collector, music producer and sound designer, Nic Ford has been playing eclectic dance music old and new at underground parties for the past 15 years. Collaborating with artists to create sound installations, laptop improvisations, studio releases on well respected record labels such as Third Ear recordings, and currently as a solo artist for Deep Booth records and part of Shift Coordinate Points. It is no easy task to blend the cerebral with the soulful – the two tend to stand at opposing corners in the deep house world and producers are often forced to choose one or the other – to mix both is a lofty aim. Link: https://soundcloud.com/nic-ford 

#MARCOMEI Marco currently lives in Taipei, where he dominates the local club scene with European underground vibes: His signature party “Ciao Taipei”, was the local revelation of 2013 and allowed him to become part of an ever growing network of quality artists in Southeast Asia.
Marco is an Italian DJ with over two decades of globetrotting artist experience. Shaped during the early waves of afro and house music he started his career as a DJ back in 1991 and has since played at some of the most memorable events and venues sharing the decks with Roger Sanchez, David Morales, Ralph Falcon, Sander Kleinenberg to name a few.
In 2009 Marco teamed up with Stefano Ugliano (aka 6884) and started duo project “Bicycle Corporation”. The merger of their combined skills as established DJs took off right from the start. With a background in house and techno music their unique productions didn’t go unnoticed. They immediately got signed as part of the 17:44 records group and their music was published on labels such as Alchemy, Miniatures, WL77, GrooveTraxx, Suka, and Revox. So far they have released more than 50 tracks and remixes, ranging from Deep and Tech-House to French House and Techno. Their productions have been greatly supported by a wide spectrum of International DJs like Sneak, Mauro Picotto, Dubfire, Axwell, Danny Tenaglia and Above & Beyond.

#Oko Odessa born Evgeniy Kolyaskin (Oko) began his career (2000) in a very classic way. First, he opened a music store with his brother, after that he hooked up with DJing, radio broadcasts, his signature gigs and art-managing of nightclubs. 
For ten years, Evgeniy has traveled not only all over his homeland, but also became a frequent guest in Russia. Since 2004, performed at the most popular festival in CIS and Eastern Europe - "Kazantip". 
Since 2009 till 2012, Evgeniy lived in Kiev. He has become an active participant in the metropolitan club life, was involved in the establishing of a booking agency, and organized a music festival; moreover, he is a very welcome guest to play at the key clubs of Kiev. 
Since 2010 he becomes a part of a Kiev team of RTS.FM studio – world famous internet radio. 
In 2014 he moves to Asia, and to avoid pronunciation difficulties performs under the name "Oko". Link: MIXCLOUD / https://www.mixcloud.com/kolyaskin_oko

#1Dan [UK]*** (https://soundcloud.com/1-dan)
A producer/DJ of deep house and techno currently based in Asia.
After cutting his teeth on the Leeds techno scene back in the Mid 90’s, Dan moved to London and was enveloped by the deep sounds of the Heart & Soul parties, connections were made through the the legendary record store Marco Lenzi's Eukatech and soon Dan was playing at Londons finest underground parties.
Fast forward; a relocation to Brighton and the infamous free party scene with Positive Soundsystem and Innerfield.
In this time Dan also secured a residency at the Glade Festival Backstage Bar.
After many years of honing his sound and learning the craft, his first release appeared on respected UK underground deep house label; Atmospheric Existence. This was followed up by a rash of releases on the Maltese label Batti Batti.
With support from DJ’s such as Jus-Ed, Huxley, Jay Tripwire, Fred P and many more.
More recently, collaborations with Bittersuite’s Jon ‘Griffin’ Gray have resulted in 2 releases under their Tales Ov Rossi guise with a 3rd marking the launch of UK label, DeepSystems. To round off a succesful 2014, BattiBatti once again call on 1DAN to contribute to the excellent Tribal Roots EP

With Made In House bringing you some of the hottest, boutique events this year we are excited to announce our largest event yet. 

We are proud to officially announce the worlds current bust duo straight from Sweden Axwell /\ Ingrosso, perfroming their world famous “Sun Is Shining Tour” to be performed at the Long Island Castle this December 10th. 

The event will be the first ever hosted inside the famous “Church Compound” creating the most unique event ever in Vietnam. 

Featuring some of the best upcoming international talent, spread over the famous outdoor Tropical Stage and Church Compound. MIH will only be supplying a capacity amount of ***2,500*** tickets, making it the closest you may ever get to see Axwell Ingrosso perform.

O bat ky cong ty nao, Bo phan Kinh Doanh luon la bo phan quan trong nhat cua moi cong ty. La bo phan dem ve doanh thu chinh cho doanh nghiep. Mot cong ty vung manh khi bo phan kinh doanh lien tuc dat nhung thanh tich tot. 
Nhung chung ta biet rang, con thuyen khong the nao tu lai khi khong co mot thuyen truong xuat sac. Cong ty cua chung ta di ve dau phu thuoc chinh vao nhung con nguoi o vi tri giam sat, quan ly hay ca vi tri giam doc.

Chung toi tu hao mang den cho cac doanh nghiep nhung giai phap cung nhu kien thuc kip thoi hay cung co lai mot lan nua nhung kinh nghiem thuc tien de giup bo phan quan ly nhan ra duoc vi the cua minh, cung co lai chat luong cua nhan vien cung nhu giup cho nhan vien hay chinh minh biet duoc minh dang o dau. 
Chuong trinh ap dung theo phuong phap chu dong di lien voi nen kinh te chu dong, cung voi su tuong tac cao de giup tung hoc vien deu dat duoc toan bo nhung loi ich sau khoa hoc. Dong thoi, chung toi tu hao voi la mot trong nhung TO CHUC GIAO DUC voi so luong hoc vien it nhat, nham dem den chat luong hoc tap toi da cho hoc vien, va ung dung nhanh chong sau khoa hoc de phu hop voi loi song nang dong ngay nay.

Chuong trinh Quan ly Kinh Doanh danh cho tat ca cac Truong phong Kinh Doanh dang quan ly doi ngu nhan vien ban hang. Muc tieu cua khoa hoc la de cung cap kien thuc va cac ky nang quan ly giup cac Truong phong Kinh Doanh co the huan luyen va phat trien Nhan vien Kinh Doanh trong tat ca cac khia canh cua hoat dong kinh doanh ban hang.
