Giam sat kinh doanh
Truong nhom kinh doanh
Cap do dieu hanh
.... va cac cap cao hon

➡ GIOI THIEU TRUONG SP JAIN

SP Jain la truong Dai hoc chuyen nganh quan tri kinh doanh dang cap the gioi voi cac co so tai Sydney, Singapore va Dubai. Truong cung cap mot loat cac khoa hoc kinh doanh bac cu nhan dai hoc va thac sy sau dai hoc voi muc tieu la dao tao cac nha lanh dao kinh doanh quoc te cho the ky 21.

Bang cap ma sinh vien truong SP JAIN nhan duoc khi tot nghiep la bang cua Uc va duoc cong nhan tren toan the gioi.

SP Jain duoc xep hang trong so cac truong kinh doanh tot nhat tren the gioi. 
- Duoc tap chi Forbes danh tieng xep hang #19 trong so Cac truong day kinh doanh tot nhat the gioi.
- Chuong trinh MBA toan cau cua truong duoc xep hang #5 tai Chau A trong ban xep hang cua Forbes ve cac truong day kinh doanh quoc te tot nhat nam 2013. 
- Financial Times (Anh Quoc) xep truong nam trong Top 100 cac truong day MBA toan cau tot nhat trong nam 2011 va nam 2012. 
- Nam 2011, SP Jain duoc vinh danh la ‘Best Higher Education Institute to provide Global Student Exposure’ tai Hoi nghi thuong dinh the gioi (World Education Summit).
- Truong cung nhan duoc giai 'Truong day kinh doanh xuat sac nhat chau A' boi CMO chau A trong nam 2010.

➡ CHUONG TRINH HOC BONG TOAN PHAN TU TRUONG SP JAIN

Co hoi nhan 1 suat hoc bong 100% va 5 suat hoc bong 50%

Dieu kien dang ky vao hoc tai SP JAIN: Tot nghiep cap 3, diem trung binh tren 6.5 (Khuyen khich sinh vien nen co IELTS tu 5.5 tro len).

- Vong 1: test Tieng Anh (90p – Reading & Writing)
- Vong 2: Phong van voi Hoi dong tuyen sinh
- Vong 3: Phong van voi Hieu truong

➡ NHUNG LY DO NEN LUA CHON SP JAIN

We are happy to announce that Melting Pot is back with a different spin this year! For those who don't know, Melting Pot is an Art and Music Festival that aims to raise funds for charities such as Saigon Children's Charity and other projects for local children in District 2. 

The Melting Pot stage is a platform for local talent where professional and amateur artists are invited to exhibit their works in music, dance, poetry, art, cooking and more! We will have an action-packed weekend for all of you with surprising entertainment and exhibitions from the talented artists of Vietnam. This festival's lineup focuses on local Vietnamese talent. We have some RAP, DANCE, LIVE BANDS, LIVE DRAMA, ACOUSTIC COVERS AND MORE! FULL LINEUP WILL BE POSTED HERE SOON!

Please stay tuned for more information. For now, mark your calendars because Melting Pot 7 is coming your way on the 5th and 6th of December!

Hanh trinh: 5 ngay 4 dem

Tel: (84.8) 73.06.11.39

ABOUT YOUR TRIP 

Looming near the fertile sprawl of the Mekong Delta, Ho Chi Minh City is a huge, gleaming city with a buzzing and captivating atmosphere. It was called Saigon for centuries, including when, as the seat of the South Vietnamese government, it figured so prominently during the Vietnam War. Its contemporary verve and historical monuments make it one of Southeast Asia’s most satisfying destinations.

Your full-day guided tour of the Mekong Delta will include the fishing villages and evocatively named delta islands of Dragon, Unicorn, Tortoise and Phoenix via the Tien River as well as a trek through coconut plantations and traditional settlements by horse-drawn cart. Top off the day with a rowboat ride out to Thoi Son Island, where, while refreshing yourself with tropical fruit and honey tea, you’ll enjoy a live performance of “Don Ca Tai Tu,” the traditional folk music of southern Vietnam. For a look at another side of Vietnamese heritage, you’ll have a half-day guided tour via jeep of the Cu Chi Tunnels, where you’ll learn about the Vietnam War's legacy.


WHAT'S INCLUDED

•  4 days and 3 nights at Sofitel Saigon Plaza, 17 Le Duan District 1, 70000, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
•  Price is per person and based on 2 adults per room.
•  Featuring superior accommodations with 2 single beds, complimentary Internet, panoramic windows, Sofitel My Bed and Pillow menu, flat-screen TV, DVD player and Lanvin bathroom amenities.
•  See itinerary for meals included.
•  Full-day Mekong Delta tour.
•  Half-day Chu Chi tunnel tour by jeep.
•  VAT and taxes.
•  Resort fees.
•  A host will be provided when 20 adults have been booked.
•  If a hosted trip, a welcome check-in on the day of arrival and welcome reception will be provided to members and their guests.
•  Your trip includes 2 airport transfers:
→ December 18 between 9 a.m. to 5 p.m.: From Tan Son Nhat International Airport to hotel.
→ December 21 between 9 a.m. to 5 p.m: From hotel to Tan Son Nhat International Airport.
•  To take advantage of round-trip airport transfers, you must provide your flight information to the vacation specialist no later than December 4. These transfers are available only for the airport(s) and dates listed above. Transfers will not be offered if the flight information is not received by the deadline and transfers at any other time will incur a separate charge. Do not email flight information to the vacation specialist.
•  Air transportation is not included. The closest commercial airport is Tan Son Nhat International Airport (SGN).

Check-in: 3 p.m. Check-out: 11 a.m.

For any questions regarding this trip, contact the DreamTrips specialist at DreamTrips@rovia.com.


HOTEL DETAILS

he Sofitel Saigon Plaza envelops you in luxury and serenity with all of the thrumming energy of Ho Chi Minh City right at the doorstep.

This beautiful hotel, set along the leafy avenue of Le Duan Boulevard, offers guestrooms that combine French and Vietnamese styles in a highly attractive design. Dine at Cafe Rivoli or L’Olivier, float in the spacious rooftop pool, or indulge in some yoga or massage treatments at the Rendez-Vous Spa.

Let the Sofitel Saigon Plaza sweep you into Ho Chi Minh City luxury!

Sofitel Saigon Plaza
17 Le Duan District 1
70000, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

#GermanEducationFairinVietnam2015
#StudyandResearchinGermany-LandofIdeas
Ban muon hoc tap va nghien cuu tai Duc. Hay den voi Ngay hoi Giao duc Dai hoc Duc 2015 de duoc tu van va tim hieu them ve cac truong dai hoc Duc!
Ngay hoi Giao duc Dai hoc Duc se dien ra ngay 13.12.2015 tai khach san Rex, Tp Ho Chi Minh. Rat nhieu cac truong dai hoc va Vien dao tao cua Duc se tham gia vao Ngay hoi nay.
Hom nay chung toi xin gioi thieu voi cac ban hai truong dai hoc trong so do:
1. Truong Dai hoc Kinh Te va Ky thuat Berlin (www.hwr-berlin.de).
La mot truong Dai hoc Khoa hoc Ung dung lon nhat Berlin, Truong co khoang 70 chuong trinh hoc ve cac linh vuc Ky thuat, Khoa hoc may tinh, Kinh te, Van hoa cung nhu Thiet ke.
2. Truong Dai hoc Kinh te va Luat Berlin (www.hwr-berlin.de).
Truong co khoang hon 150 truong dai hoc doi tac tren toan the gioi. Trong chuong trinh dao tao chung, Truong dac biet chu trong vao viec ket hop giu li thuyet va thuc hanh.
De tim hieu them thong tin ve Ngay hoi Giao duc Dai hoc Duc nam nay, vui long truy cap website: www.daadvn.org/fair!
--------------------------------------------------
Studieren und Forschen in Deutschland - diese und viele weitere Themen findet ihr auf der diesjahrigen deutschen Hochschulmesse am 13.12. im Rex-Hotel, HCMC. Mit dabei sind zahlreiche deutsche Universitaten und Institutionen. Heute stellen wir euch zwei von ihnen vor:
1. Die Hochschule fur Technik und Wirtschaft Berlin (www.htw-berlin.de). Als grosste Berliner Hochschule fur Angewandte Wissenschaften vereint die HTW Berlin rund 70 Studienangebote in den Bereichen Technik, Informatik, Wirtschaft, Kultur und Gestaltung unter einem Dach.
2. Die Hochschule fur Wirtschaft und Recht Berlin (www.hwr-berlin.de). Auch diese Hochschule hat weltweit 156 Partnerschaften. Sie legt besonderen Wert auf gute Verknupfung von Theorie und Praxis in General Management Programmen.
Fur mehr Informationen kommt zur diesjahrigen deutschen Hochschulmesse 2015 am 12. und 13. Dezember (www.daadvn.org/fair)!
--------------------------------------------------
Study and Research in Germany - you can find these and many other topics at this year's German Education Fair 2015 on 13/12/15 at Rex Hotel, HCMC. Numerous German universities and institutions host this event. Today, we introduce two of them to you:
1. Berlin University of Applied Sciences (www.htw-berlin.de). The HTW Berlin is the biggest university for Applied Science, therefore, it combines around 70 degree programs in the fields of engineering, computer science, business, culture and design.
2. Berlin School of Economics and Law (www.hwr-berlin.de). This university has also 156 partnerships worldwide. It
emphasis on a good link between theory and practics in General Management Programs.
For more information visit this year's German Higher Education Fair 2015 on 12th and 13th December (www.daadvn.org/fair)!

VN HAT XII

You kicked it at Turn Up Taiwan in September. You’ve dabbled in Manila Spirits and tasted club glory at AOUC in Hong Kong. But you still dream of chasing plastic one more time before 2015 blends into 2016. Don’t worry. We’ve got you covered. 

Saigon Ultimate Club (SUC) and RMIT Vietnam Ultimate Frisbee Club (RUC) are proud to announce one of SE Asia’s gnarliest annual HAT tournaments! The Vietnam HAT returns for its 12th instalment, and this year, we’re bringing it back to where the heart of Vietnam beats loudest: the urban jungle of Saigon. 

Vietnam HAT XII will be held at RMIT University’s sports fields on December 19 and 20. Come float a silky huck at one of SE Asia’s premiere natural grass fields. When you’re not playing, go cool down under the large covered grandstand overlooking the sports fields and watch other teams cannibalize each other. 

Registration details//
REGISTRATION IS CLOSED. BUT, if you are still interested in registering, please send us a message/email and we will review the available spaces. 

The registration fee is set as the following:
Early bird fee is $70 USD.
Regular fee is $79 USD. 

To qualify for early bird, you can do so in two ways:
[1] Purchase your flight BEFORE November 20th and forward us the confirmation email you receive from the airline to this email. 
[2] PayPal or money transfer by the end of November. If you choose this option, shoot us an email and we'll forward you the details you need in order to accomplish that. Additional note, I realise that the bank and PayPal charges for electronic transfers might make this option unappealing. I would suggest you consider finding a friend or someone you know going to the tournament, pooling the registration costs into one transaction, and forwarding it to us that way.  

If you choose to pay after December, at the registration party, or Saturday morning, you will have to pay the regular fee of $79 USD. 

The individual registration fee will cover the following:
[+] a dope Vietnam HAT XII disc
[+] a dope Vietnam HAT XII jersey
[+] lunch provided for the two days of play
[+] snacks for the finals
[+] water and fruit to fuel your game throughout the weekend
[+] plenty of drinks and plenty of beer for those awkward moments with new friends
[+] a chill Friday registration party
[+] a solid Saturday night party with a sweet theme

Party details//
This year’s party theme will be: GRAFFITI & GLOW
Pack a white shirt for Saturday’s party and be prepared to show everyone your urban art skills. We’ll provide the art supplies, you’ll all be the canvas. By the end of the night, we’ll all have made Banksy proud. (SUC, RUC, and Vietnam HAT XII is not responsible for any interesting body parts or vocabulary words that gets tagged on you.) 

Information about the tournament, including flights and visa applications to hotel suggestions, can be found on our public Google Drive. Find it here:
https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B5QoY-ZkjGaIYnhPNkV3OFZmekU&usp=sharing

If you have any questions or concerns, please don’t hesitate to contact the Saigon Ultimate Club (SUC), the RMIT Vietnam Ultimate Frisbee Club (RUC), or myself. You can also email the Vietnam HAT crew at vietnam.hat.sgn@gmail.com.

Spread the word and invite your friends and fam!

VN HAT XII would also like to give a HUGE thanks to the following sponsors for making this tournament a reality. These guys are helping us provide all the players with some sweet perks:
+ Red Bricks Restaurant
+ Men's Biore Vietnam
+ Ceres Fruit Juice

#vnhatXII #vnhat12 #vnhat2015

- Alex Tat

We not only arrange trips solely by location, but we also arrange trips on various photographic themes. Why would you come all this way to take photos of areas, subjects, and themes that you do not like? With all of our distinctive locations, we found that we have been able to cater to a number of themes. Ultimately no trip has ever been the same. Some photographers may prefer to focus on Photojournalism & Travel Photography themes. Other photographers have been captivated by the rich and dynamic cultures here, which can be seen by focusing on Architecture and Fashion Photography themes. Other photographers have preferred to mix things up and explore our Scenic & Landscape themes which have been paired up well with our Action & Dance themes. But there is no need to pick only one or two, as we can arrange it so that each photo shoot is distinctive and has a different theme.

Sample Itinerary:
Day 1: HCMC SHOOT OUT
- Photo-shoot Location (Traditional Vietnam Wear, Street Wear)
- Mixed Photo-shoot and Life Shoot Location: Cyclo ride starting from Notre Dame Area
- Life Shoot: Cityscape shoot
- Photo-shoot Location (Night Alley Shoot: Street / Club Wear)

Day 2: HISTORIC CU CHI TUNNELS
- Rubber Forest Model Shoot: Traditional Wear, Flowing Dress, Themed
- Cu Chi Tunnels Tour
- Temple Shoot by the Water and Sunset Shoot (Traditional Wear, Aodai)

Day 3: MEKONG PHOTO-JOURNALISTIC EXPERIENCE
- Life Shoot: My Tho/ Ben Tre Waterway Trip
- Setup Life Shoot: Sunset Fisherman Scene

Day 4: - HCMC LIFE SHOOT
- Photo-shoot Location: Dance Fever
- Life Shoot: Chinatown walk in Vietnam

Cost:  $1000/ person/ full trip of unforgettable photo-shoots, fun, and adventure. **
Quantity: maximum 12 people.

** Our price is all inclusive (minus airfare and travel insurance) and includes accommodation*, food and beverage (though we encourage you to explore with your stomach's too!), transportation to sites, a motor bike ride, models & dancers & makeup artist/stylist, guide & translator, as well as continuous lighting equipment. We also arrange transport to your hotel upon arrival if needed (useful if you come in a group). 

*For the accommodation, it will be 2 persons per room. Upgrades to single rooms are available at a cost upon request.*

For detail information, please contact us at contact.us@snapittravel.com

Noi dung chuong trinh la mot bai tap yoga dac biet keo dai 2.5 tieng voi su ket hop cua nhieu bo mon yoga khac nhau nhu Asthanga Yoga, Yoga Mixed, Hatha Yoga, Power Yoga, Pranayama,Thien va dac biet la Yoga Cuoi. Ngoai ra chuong trinh se co them phan huong dan tu tap cac dong tac yoga kho va phan hoi & dap voi cac masters.

Lop hoc se duoc huong dan boi Master Rajesh Choudhary va cac giao vien cua Indian Yogis.

Phan demo se duoc thuc hien boi nha vo dich yoga Chau A: Master Amrita Haldar

Hay nhanh tay dang ki voi chung toi qua indianyogis@gmail.com de xac nhan su tham gia cua ban.

CLB Nguyen Uoc Hong thanh lap Quy ho tro benh nhan ngheo nham khoi tao nguon kinh phi giup do, ho tro cho nhung benh nhan ngheo khong co dieu kien dieu tri benh.

Phan I - Tong quan du an :

- Ten du an: Quy ho tro benh nhan ngheo 
- Chu du an: CLB NGUYEN UOC HONG
- Dieu hanh du an: Ngo Thi Nhu Mai - Chu nhiem CLB
- Muc dich du an: tao nguon kinh phi, thuoc chua benh nham ho tro kham, dieu tri cho nhung benh nhan ngheo tren dia ban dat nuoc Viet Nam. 

- Muc tieu du an: 

•	Ho tro kham va phat thuoc cho 1.000 benh nhan ngheo o cac huyen vung sau vung xa tren khap ca nuoc.
•	Ho tro kinh phi dieu tri benh cho nhung benh nhan ngheo mac benh can dieu tri bang nhung phuong phap ton kem nhu phau thuat hay nhung can benh hiem ngheo nhung co kha nang tri khoi….

Phan II – Doi tuong duoc huong tro cap :

-	Doi tuong duoc huong tro cap cua du an: 
•	Nhung benh nhan ngheo dang can duoc dieu tri khan cap , hoac gap tai nan bat ngo dang can duoc giup do
•	Nhung benh nhan ngheo mac benh hiem ngheo nhung co kha nang tri khoi.
•	Ca nhan: nguoi gia, trung nien, tre em vung sau vung xa thieu dieu kien kham va chua benh.


- Dieu kien de nhan duoc su bao tro:

•	Thuoc dien xoa doi giam ngheo va co giay kham cua bac si ve tinh trang benh.
•	Co giay kham benh nhung van chua duoc dieu tri trong thoi gian dai do hoan canh kho khan.
•	Duoc chinh quyen dia phuong de xuat.
•	Uu tien cho moi gia dinh mot truong hop kham, phat thuoc, dieu tri.
•	Neu truong hop benh nhan da nhan duoc su ho tro khac thi khong duoc ho tro chi phi dieu tri.

Phan III - Lich trinh kham, phat thuoc 2015 (se co lich cu the va goi den cho cac ban )


Phan IV – Nguon tai tro

Quy ho tro benh nhan ngheo xay dung dua tren tinh than thien nguyen mang den nhung niem vui, nhung hy vong song cho nhung benh nhan luon biet dau tranh sinh ton voi benh tat nhung vi dieu kien kho khan nen danh pho thac cho so phan. Vi the nhung dong gop xuat phat tu tam long yeu thuong, chia se chinh la nguon dong luc, suc manh giup quy ho tro benh nhan ngheo hoan thanh su mang cua minh.

Ban dieu hanh du an tran trong tat ca moi dong gop cua quy manh thuong quan va cac to chuc thien chi cung chung toi chung tay gop phan giup cuoc song ngay mot tot dep hon.

LOI GIOI THIEU SU KIEN AN TONG SACH AN SI TOAN THU

Kinh chao quy thien huu!

AN SI TOAN THU la bo sach khuyen thien tung duoc Dai su An Quang het loi khen ngoi cung nhu truc tiep to chuc viec an tong luu hanh len den hang trieu ban. Nguyen tac Han van do tien sinh Chu An Sy bien soan tu khoang cuoi the ky 17, lan dau tien da duoc dich gia Nguyen Minh Tien chuyen dich sang tieng Viet voi nhieu chu giai cong phu, can trong, co the giup nguoi doc tiep can duoc voi nhung tinh tuy Phat hoc vo cung tham sau va mang lai nhieu loi ich lon lao trong cuoc song hang ngay.

Dai su An Quang von la mot bac long tuong trong Phat giao. Ngai da noi ve sach An Sy toan thu va soan gia cua sach la tien sinh Chu An Sy nhu sau:

"Qua that la mot quyen ky thu khuyen thien bac nhat trong thien ha, neu so voi nhung quyen sach khuyen thien tam thuong khac, ha co the sanh cung duoc sao? Long toi van tin chac rang tien sinh han la bac Bo Tat theo ban nguyen ma hien than cu si de thuyet phap do sinh."

"Voi nguoi kheo doc sach nay at nhung tam niem gian doi tan doc se tuc thoi tan bien, ma nhung tam nguyen tu loi loi tha se tu nhien manh me sinh khoi, tu cho suy ngam ma tung buoc dan dan huong thien, ngay cang tien bo sau xa hon, dau khong luu tam den ma tu nhien tam tran tuc cung chuyen dan thanh tri tue thanh nhan, gan nhu co the dat den cho thau triet le sinh tu, vinh vien thoat khoi luan hoi, duoc doi dien kinh le duc Phat A-di-da, tu minh duoc Phat ban loi tho ky."

(Trich Loi tua cua Dai su An Quang)

Bo sach AN SI TOAN THU nay gom bon phan nhu sau:

Phan I. Giang Rong Bai Van Am Chat (gom hai quyen Thuong va Ha)
Phan II. Khuyen Nguoi Bo Su Giet Hai
Phan III. Khuyen Nguoi Bo Su Dam Duc
Phan IV. Khuyen Nguoi Niem Phat Vang Sinh Tinh Do

Voi quy Phat tu da tung xem nhung loi khai thi cua Dai su An Quang va Hoa thuong Tinh Khong thi co le deu hon mot lan duoc nghe cac Ngai khen ngoi va khuyen khich doc tap sach nay. Ban than chung toi cung da nhieu lan duoc nghe gioi thieu va mong moi duoc doc bo ky thu nay nhung tim mai ma van khong thay sach o Viet Nam.

Den thoi gian gan day, that hoan hi thay, co duyen cua quy Phat tu nuoc nha da day du, lan dau tien bo sach AN SI TOAN THU da duoc chuyen dich sang Viet ngu voi nhieu loi chu giai can than, ti mi cua dich gia Nguyen Minh Tien, mot vi cu si thong tue, kha kinh, la dich gia cua rat nhieu tac pham Phat Giao viet bang Han van va Anh van.

Voi mong moi moi nguoi duoc huong nhung loi ich thu thang cua bo sach, nhom chung toi da bat dau thuc hien viec in an tong sach nay. Sach duoc in ra se chi danh cho muc dich an tong (khong mua ban duoi moi hinh thuc) va se duoc chuyen tang mien phi toi nhung ai muon thinh sach de doc.

Thua quy vi, nho loi Duc The Ton da day trong Kinh Phap Cu: "Phap thi, thang moi thi! Phap vi, thang moi vi! Phap hy, thang moi hy!" (Phap Cu 354), chung toi vo cung hoan hi khi duoc thuc hien Phat su nay. Voi tam nguyen duoc san se nhung loi ich lon lao cua viec phap thi den voi moi nguoi, chung toi da tao su kien "An Tong AN SI TOAN THU" nay voi muc dich tiep nhan tinh tai dong gop cho viec thuc hien an tong bo sach AN SI TOAN THU. Tat ca tinh tai thu duoc se dung vao viec in an va chuyen tang bo sach AN SI TOAN THU toi moi nguoi. 

Trong "A Xa The Vuong Tho Quyet Kinh", co cau chuyen ve mot ba lao het suc ngheo kho, voi tam chi thanh da dang cung Duc Phat mot ngon den. Den khi troi sang, Ngai Muc Kien Lien dau dung than thong cung khong lam tat duoc ngon den ay. Duc Phat day: "Ngon den ay la hao quang cong duc cua mot vi Phat tuong lai, khong the lay than thong cua ong ma tru diet duoc." Qua that, viec bo thi hay cung duong Tam Bao, neu duoc lam voi tam chi thanh thi du chi la mot dong tien cung se tro thanh cong duc vo luong khong the dien noi het. The nen, chung toi thanh tam khuyen khich va vo cung hoan hi tan than moi su dong gop ung ho cua moi nguoi. Thay mat cho nhung chung sanh trong tuong lai se duoc thoat kho nho anh sang Phat phap tu bo sach nay, chung toi xin chan thanh tri an quy vi!

Thuc ra day la nhung hien tuong thuoc ve nhung hien tuong dac biet trong tam ly con nguoi. Chung ta thuong nghi rang day la nhung hien tuong ma nen khoa hoc duong dai chua giai thich duoc. Vi vay, nhung su giai thich theo loi dan gian thieu co so co co hoi noi len va la vung dat mau mo cho su phat trien cua me tin di doan.
Do vay viec giai thich cac hien tuong tam linh noi tren la mot nhu cau het suc buc thiet hien nay. Tuy vay viec giai thich cung co nhieu duong giai thich khac nhau. Co nhung cach giai thich mang tinh khoa hoc co co so, co logic va cung co nhieu cach giai thich thieu co so mang mau sac huyen bi, me tin di doan.
Trong khoa hoc “Kham pha tam linh”, cac ban se duoc tiep can quan diem cua ZenLeader trong viec giai thich cac hien tuong tam linh dua tren ly thuyet ve co the con nguoi duoc xay dung tren nen tang cua kien thuc khoa hoc hien nay nhu kien thuc ve vo tuyen, may tinh, mang internet khong day (wifi), song anh sang, vung kha kien… cong them mot chut suy luan va trai nghiem ca nhan cua doi ngu giang vien ZENLEADER.

VE ZENLEADER
ZenLeader là mot thuong hieu dao tao uy tin cua Cong ty co phan tu van va dao tao quan tri tinh than ProSelf. ProSelf da vinh du nhan duoc cac giai thuong, danh hieu nhu: To chuc giao duc uy tin 2015, Top 50 thuong hieu dao tao uy tin hang dau Viet Nam, Thuong hieu san pham - dich vu xuat sac 2015, Top 200 San pham – dich vu hang dau Viet Nam.

ZenLeader khai thac doc quyen he thong cac chuong trinh Thien va Yoga ung dung trong cong viec va cuoc song cua WapoGroup tai Viet Nam. Vói sú mẹnh "Ung dung Thien cho nguoi chuyen tu de nang cao hieu qua cong viec va su man nguyen trong cuoc song" cùng giá trị cót lõi là “Tam” duọc duoc boc lo o 4 khia canh: nọi tam, luong tam, tam huyét, tam mỏ, ZenLeader tin rang, moi nguoi tham du se de dang trai nghiem, hoc hoi va hoan thien minh hon moi ngay, de nhanh chong gat hai duoc thành qua trong cong viẹc.

Cac chuong trinh cua ZenLeader deu tap trung vao viec ho tro hoc vien quan sat va phat trien the gioi noi tam cua minh de chuyen hoa thai do song thong qua viec thay doi he thong the gioi quan, quan niem, gia tri song cua ban than. Nguoi tham du se nang cao duoc nang luc lanh dao noi tam cua minh, tu do co the tu chu, binh tinh dua ra duoc nhung quyet dinh sang suot truoc cac van de trong cuoc song va cong viec.

-	Kham pha tri tue tam linh (SI)
-	Tim lai chinh minh
-	Kham pha tam linh

About Your Trip
Formerly named Saigon, Vietnam’s Ho Chi Minh City offers visitors a lot to explore, from its French colonial architecture and religious pagodas to bustling markets and modern museums.

Your full-day guided tour of the Mekong Delta will include a trip down the Tien River with stops at fishing villages and the islands of Dragon, Unicorn, Tortoise and Phoenix. Other highlights include a trek through coconut plantations and a rowboat to Thoi Son Island, where, while refreshing yourself with tropical fruit and honey tea, you’ll enjoy a live performance of Don Ca Tai Tu, the traditional folk music of southern Vietnam. 


What's Included

4 days and 3 nights at Le Meridien Saigon, 3C Ton Duc Thang Street, District 1 Ho, Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
Featuring guest room accommodations with 1 king bed or 2 double beds and complimentary Wi-Fi.
3 breakfasts, 1 lunch and 2 dinners.
Full-day Mekong Delta tour.
Cruise along Tien River.
Rowing boat excursion to Thoi Son Island.
An In-destination Support Specialist will be provided when 20 or more adults book this trip. Their goal is to ensure you have a great DreamTrips experience from landing to liftoff. They host a welcome reception on arrival day, attend scheduled activities throughout the trip, notify the group of itinerary updates and more.
Your trip includes 2 airport transfers:
January 8, from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m.: From Tan Son Nhat International Airport to the hotel.
January 11, from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m.: From the hotel to Tan Son Nhat International Airport.
To take advantage of round-trip airport transfers, you must provide your flight information to the DreamTrips Specialist no later than December 24. These transfers are available only for the airport(s) and dates listed above. Click here to give us your flight information. Transfers will not be offered if the flight information is not received by the deadline and transfers at any other time will incur a separate charge. Do not email flight information to the DreamTrips Specialist.
Air transportation is not included. The closest commercial airport is Tan Son Nhat International Airport (SGN).

For any questions regarding this trip, contact the DreamTrips Specialist at DreamTrips@rovia.com.

Check-in: 3 p.m. Check-out: noon.


Hotel Details

With its downtown location right along the Saigon River, Le Meridien Saigon makes a scenic and convenient home base for your visit to Ho Chi Minh City.

Guests can relax in comfort and enjoy city or river views from their rooms, or venture to Explore Spa, the 24-hour fitness center, or the infinity-edge indoor pool to swim laps within view of the Saigon River! For dining, the hotel offers the French-influenced Art Cacao for pastries, Latest Recipe for modern international and classic Vietnamese dishes, and healthy spa fare at Explore Bistro & Spa Cafe, along with evening cocktails at Latitude. 

Boasting dedicated, attentive service and a location close to shopping, dining, local attractions and entertainment, Le Meridien Saigon is sure to impress.

Le Meridien Saigon 
3C Ton Duc Thang Street 
District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

Day la buỏi trò chuyẹn dac biet danh rieng cho nhung ai muon nang niu mói quan hẹ hạnh phúc mình dang có, hàn gán mói quan hẹ có nguy co dỏ võ, học cách xay dụng mói quan hẹ bèn vũng ngay tù khi mói bát dàu.
Dac biet dành cho nhung ai dang tim giải pháp dẻ mói quan hẹ có nhieu mau sac va y nghia hon cho cuoc song cua minh. Hoac xa hon, ban dang muon huong toi mot mói quan hẹ tràn dày tình yeu thuong, ám áp cho tát cả nhũng mói quan hẹ khi giao tiép xã họi.
Và dạc biẹt hon cho nhũng ai dang mong muón trỏ thành nguòi giao tiép linh hoạt vói nhũng mói quan hẹ quan trọng trong cuọc dòi bạn – gia dình, bạn bè, dòng nghiẹp, nhan vien, dói tác và cả khách hàng…
Dien giả: Tién sĩ Menis Yousry, là chuyen gia tam lý học hàng dàu thé giói trong lĩnh vục phát triẻn bản than, tam lý trị liẹu cho cuọc sóng gia dình và các mói quan hẹ. Vói cách trò chuyẹn loi cuón, than mạt, ám áp, hóm hỉnh và dọc dáo ong sẽ dén TP. HCM vào tháng 01/2016 dẻ chia sẻ cùng chúng ta nhũng bí quyét “ Tìm lại Tình yeu” dẻ xay dụng tình yeu và mói quan hẹ bèn vũng truòng tòn theo thòi gian.

• Hieu ve tàm quan trọng của nhũng mói quan hẹ trong cuọc sóng.
• Tim ra dau là chìa khóa giúp chúng ta xay dụng nhũng mói quan hẹ thành cong.

CHUONG TRINH TU THIEN 
TP.HCM- DAKLAK - Ngay 15/1/2016

Co com an, ao mac, nuoc uong, duoc di hoc,… la chung ta da giau co va hanh phuc hon hang ti nguoi tren Trai dat nay. Con rat nhieu nguoi thieu nhung thu do. Cuoc song nay, the gian nay day ap, do la noi hoi tu tat ca nhung dau thuong va bat hanh. Nguoi ta noi qua khong sai: "Nguoi an khong het, ke lan chang ra".Trong cuoc song hien tai, lieu con co bao nhieu nguoi chang co mieng an, con co bao nhieu manh doi chui ruc ngheo kho, vao kho dau va khong the chiu dung noi nhung bat hanh trong cuoc doi de buoc qua khoi nghiep chuong nay. thau hieu dieu nay nguoi lam chuong trinh rat mong su se chia cua moi nguoi , va quy an nhan giup do du khong day du ve vat chat nhung se co duoc su yeu thuong, am ap cua tinh nguoi de don nhan duoc nhung mon qua don nhung ven toan hanh phuc.

Ban la sinh vien, hoc sinh. La cong nhan vien chuc, hay la nguoi lao dong binh thuong. Ban dang di hoc,di lam hay la noi tro tai gia. Ban yeu tu thien va cac cong tac xa hoi. Hay tham gia ung ho va keu goi chuong trinh cua chung toi, hay lan toa toi moi nguoi xung quanh ve chuong trinh tu thien toi DAKLAK giup cho dong bao ngheo noi day co mot cai Tet am ap hon. Toi luon chao don ban - du ban la ai! Chung toi tha thiet keu goi su giup do cua quy ban huu, quy manh thuong quan, cac nha hao tam cung tat ca moi nguoi ung ho cho chuong trinh phat qua cho 200 dan ngheo tai KRONG NANG- TINH DAKLAK. Ngay tu bay gio Toi - Ban - va chung ta hay cung nhau gop mot phan nho nhoi ve tinh tai, tinh vat chuyen den 200 ho dan ngheo, giup ho co them niem tin trong cuoc song vi CHO di la NHAN lai !
Rat mong quy thien nam tin nu cung nhu cac nha hao tam trong va ngoai nuoc cung chung toi gop suc va chia se tinh yeu thuong cua minh, danh chut it tinh tai tinh vat ung ho cho nhung manh doi bat hanh 
kinh mong quy vi se mo rong tam tu cua minh se giup do cho doan chung toi duoc hoan thanh tam nguyen.
Nam Mo Dai Tu Dai Bi Quan The Am Bo Tat.

About Your Trip  
Looming near the fertile sprawl of the Mekong Delta, Ho Chi Minh City is a huge, gleaming city permeated with history. It was called Saigon for centuries, including when, as the seat of the South Vietnamese government, it figured prominently during the Vietnam War. Its contemporary verve and historical monuments make it one of Southeast Asia’s most satisfying destinations.

Gain insight into Vietnamese history as well as hands-on knowledge of the country’s cuisine with this DreamTrip getaway to Ho Chi Minh City. You’ll take a day trip to visit HCM Agricultural Villages, a one-of-a-kind setting for exploring the traditional lifestyles of rural Vietnam. You’ll take a Vietnamese cooking class, turning garden-plucked ingredients into classic regional dishes. Another outing takes you on a guided underground tour of the Cu Chi tunnels, a labyrinthine subterranean network that played a critical role during the Vietnam War.



What's Included

4 days and 3 nights at Sheraton Saigon Hotel & Towers, 88 Dong Khoi, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
Featuring standard accommodations with 1 king or 2 twin beds. Complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.
3 breakfasts, 1 lunch, 1 dinner. 
HCM Agricultural Villages tour and cooking class.
Cu Chi tunnels Tour.
An In-destination Support Specialist will be provided when 20 or more adults book this trip. Their goal is to ensure you have a great DreamTrips experience from landing to liftoff. They host a welcome reception on arrival day, attend scheduled activities throughout the trip, notify the group of itinerary updates and more.
Your trip includes 2 airport transfers:
January 22 between 9 a.m. and 5 p.m., timing based on arrival: From Tan Son Nhat International Airport to hotel.
January 25 between 8 a.m. and 5 p.m., timing based on arrival: From hotel to Tan Son Nhat International Airport.
To take advantage of round-trip airport transfers, you must provide your flight information to the DreamTrips Specialist no later than January 8. These transfers are available only for the airport(s) and dates listed above. Click here to give us your flight information. Transfers will not be offered if the flight information is not received by the deadline and transfers at any other time will incur a separate charge. Do not email flight information to the DreamTrips Specialist.
 Air transportation is not included. The closest commercial airport is Tan Son Nhat International Airport (SGN).

For any questions regarding this trip, contact the DreamTrips Specialist at DreamTrips@rovia.com.

Check-in: 3 p.m. Check-out: noon.


Hotel Details

You’ll stay in Ho Chi Minh City’s grand-scale center at the Sheraton Saigon Hotel & Towers, close to such attractions as Independence Palace (also known as Reunification Palace) and the Ho Chi Minh City Municipal Theatre (also known as Saigon Opera House).

Along with its prime location, the hotel offers the Aqua Day Spa, a sauna, an outdoor lap swimming pool and the Sheraton Fitness Center, which overlooks the pool and winter garden. Restaurants at the hotel are include the Level 23 Signature Restaurant & Wine Bar, Li Bai Chinese Restaurant, Mojo Cafe and Saigon Cafe.

Enjoy gatherings with friends at the Grand Tower Lounge, where you’ll find a view of the pool and complimentary snacks.

Sheraton Saigon Hotel & Towers
88 Dong Khoi
District 1, Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam

Travel Date: 27th January - 3rd Feb'2016

This exciting journey takes us through the heart and soul of Vietnam and Cambodia—diverse and fascinating countries steeped in ancient traditions and complex history. From bustling cities and colourful markets to isolated highlands and ancient ruins; tranquil lakes and sleepy beaches to wartime history and grand imperial architecture


Highlights
Historic monuments and the colourful Old Quarter in Hanoi
Emerald waters and limestone islands in spectacular Halong Bay
Ancient architecture and laid-back atmosphere in Hoi An
Bustling streets and markets in Ho Chi Minh City
Experiencing the bustling streets of Ho Chi Minh City
Villages, markets and waterways of the Mekong River Delta
Siem Reap and the iconic temples and monuments of Angkor

HAY DE CHUNG TOI BAO VE BAN THEO CACH TOT NHAT!

Quy Vi Nen Mua Camera o dau???

Quy Vi Nen Chon Lap Dat Camera loai nao?

Ngay nay khi xa hoi phat trien viec lap camera Tan Phu, lap camera tai Tan Binh, lap Camera tai Binh Tan, lap camera tai TP.HCM, noi rieng va toan the gioi noi chung la dieu het suc quan trong. Viec quan ly con nguoi cua doanh nghiep, cong ty, ho gia dinh dang tro nen can thiet trong kinh te xa hoi bien dong nhu bay gio. Voi nhung chuyen di cong tac xa, nhung chuyen du lich dai ngay cua ca gia dinh, doi khi lam ban lo lang, khong biet chuyen gi dang o nha va camera quan sat tai TP.HCM, lap camera Tan Phu la mot giai phap huu hieu cho nhung ngoi nha vang chu, tham chi cho cac truong hoc, cac trung tam kinh doanh, … Da so Doanh Nghiep va Xuong San Xuat dang huong toi viec su dung camera quan sat de quan sat nhan vien lam viec trong cac xuong san xuat cong ty, du ho khong truc tiep o cong ty chi dao nhung van dat hieu qua toi uu. Vay van de cap bach hien nay la ban dang can tim mot cong ty chuyen ban camera quan sat va thi cong lap dat camera gia tot, uy tin, chat luong nhat ! 

Hien nay tren thi truong lap dat camera tai TP.HCM co rat nhieu loai va xuat xu, chu yeu la: China, Taiwan, Viet Nam, Korea, ... Ve chat luong thi luon dung voi cau noi: “Tien Nao Cua Ay”.

Camera Quan Sat la thiet bi dien tu hoat dong 24/24 tu ngay nay qua ngay khac, thang nay qua thang khac, nam nay qua nam khac…. Vi vay, quy vi nen nho tu van de chon lap camera phu hop voi nhu cau su dung va muc dich quan sat cua quy vi.

Neu Quy Vi co y dinh dau tu lau dai 10 nam - 20 nam thi quy vi nen su dung lap dat camera cua Korea, Japan, hoac dong camera Taiwan cao cap chat luong hinh anh cac loai camera nay rat ro net, cung nhu tuoi tho lau dai.

Neu tai chinh han hep thi quy vi nen chon lap camera Taiwan co thong so ky thuat tuong doi tot de it nhat cung dat duoc chat luong hinh anh tuong doi ro de quy vi co the quan sat hieu qua.

Khuyen cao: Quy vi khong nen Lap dat camera gia qua re. Vi muc dich cua camera la giam sat, quan ly va chong trom, dac diem hoat dong cua he thong camera la 24/24 lien tuc nen neu quy vi chon lap camera gia re qua se anh huong den chat luong hinh anh, do ben tuoi tho cung nhu khong dat duoc muc dich quan sat khi do co thay the he thong moi cung rat ton kem rat nhieu.

Voi Uy Tin va Kinh nghiem TREN 10 nam chuyen nhap khau, phan phoi, lap dat camera tai tphcm cac dong camera China, Taiwan, Korea, Japan, Duc, …. 

KHANG ANH khang dinh rang :

“KHONG CO SAN PHAM RE MA CHAT LUONG TOT, CHI CO SAN PHAM CHAT LUONG VA GIA CA HOP LY !”

Vi vay quy khach khong nen vi chon loai lap dat camera gia re qua de roi khong dat duoc hieu qua quan sat, de roi phai thay the camera moi, cung khong nen chon loai cao cap qua de gay lang phi khong can thiet.

VOI TREN 10 NAM UY TIN, KINH NGHIEM LAP CAMERA QUAN SAT, CONG TY CAMERA KHANG ANH CAM KET BAN HANG CHINH HANG, GIA RE NHAT THI TRUONG.

Hay Lien He Voi Cong Ty Camera KHANG ANH de duoc bao gia va tu van mien phi 100% cho he thong camera phu hop voi nhu cau can quan sat va tinh hinh tai chinh dinh dau tu.

Tai Sao Lai Chon Cong Ty Camera KHANG ANH

- Voi Kinh Nghiem, Uy Tin hon 10 Nam chuyen Lap Dat Camera Quan Sat Tai TP.HCM, Binh Duong, Dong Nai, Long An, … Quy vi se thuc su an tam ve chat luong va gia ca ma cong ty camera KHANG ANH cung cap.

- San pham camera quan sat duoc cong ty camera KHANG ANH lap dat, phan phoi, nhap khau truc tiep deu co xuat xu chinh hang Korea, Taiwan dua tren chip va cong nghe Japan co chung nhan CO, CQ day du.

- San Pham Bao hanh 24 thang, Bao Tri Mai Mai 1 doi 1 trong thoi gian bao hanh, xu ly su co sau 2-4h tu khi nhan duoc yeu cau cua khach hang.

- KHANG ANH Khao sat, len ban ve thiet ke bo tri lap dat camera hcm, demo san pham, tu van mien phi 100% tan noi voi thai do tan tam voi moi khach hang.

- Voi he thong van phong bao tri, doi tac co mat khap cac tinh tren ca nuoc se giup quy vi an tam hon ve dich vu cham soc khac hang sau lap dat camera cua KHANG ANH.

Vay quy khach con cho gi nua, hay Lien He Ngay Voi Cong Ty Camera KHANG ANH de duoc bao gia va tu van mien phi 100% cho he thong camera phu hop voi nhu cau can quan sat va tinh hinh tai chinh dinh dau tu tai Tan Phu, Tan Binh, Binh Tan, TP.HCM

Seekordne tripp holmab fantastilisi Kagu-Aasia riike nagu Kambodza, Vietnam ja Tai. Kui eelnevatel aastatel oleme kulastanud teada tuntud paiku nii Tais, Malaisias ja Filipiinidel, siis sel korral avastame hoopis teistmoodi Aasiat, kust loomulikult ei ole puudust seiklustest, fantastilistest randadest ning erakordsetest emotsioonidest. Mul on room teile tutvustada meie reisi seekordset kava:

06.03 Alustame oma reisi Tallinnast Bangkoki poole, lennates algusega Tallinnast kell 12.15 labi vahemaandumise Helsingis.

07.03 Saabume Bangkoki kell 07.25 ning juba kell 10.00 lendame Bangkoki vaiksemast Don Muangi lennujaamast Air Asia lennufirmaga edasi Kambodzasse Siem Reapi. Majutume monusas hotellis Mekong Angkor Palace Hotel ning naudime ohtut.

08.03 Sel paeval kulastame uhte maailmaimest, milleks on Angkori templid (saate lahemalt lugeda Wikipiediast: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Angkor_Wat). Tegemist on kohaga, mille avastamiseks ja labikaimiseks kulub paevi, kuid kuna me soovime avastada ka teisi paiku, siis proovime endasse ammutada voimalikult palju emotsioone, teha tuhandeid pilte ning tunnetada seda majesteetlikku suursugusust, mida templid meile pakuvad. Voimaluse korral laenutame seal jalgrattad, et saaksime veelgi suuremat pindala uheskoos labida. Ohtul naudime kohalikust restos monusat ohtusooki ning varume energiat jargmise paeva pikaks teekonnaks.

09.03 Hommikul on aratus kell 04.00, et alustada paeva enne paikesetousu ning minna vaatama paeva algust kohta, kus paikesekiired tousevad templi tagant, moodustades hingematvaid siluette. Kell 15.45 lendame edasi Cambodia Angkor Air siselennuga Kambodza lounarannikule Sihanoukville. Tegemist vaga armsa ja eksootilise rannakulaga, kus on ennast mugavalt sisse seadnud ka meie omad eestlased. Seega meie sihtkohaks saabki Beach Road Hotel, mis kuulub meie kaasmaallastele. Ohtul naudime ambrijooke mones kohalikus karaokebaaris.

10.03 Rendime rollerid ning teeme piirkonnale tiiru peale, kaime avastame erinevaid randu, soidame labi kohalike kuladest ja elupaikadest, naudime seda paeva taiel rinnal tapselt nii nagu jumal juhatab ja avastame enda jaoks igast nurgatagusest midagi uut ja huvitavat ilma tapset kava paika panemata. Ohtul lahme eestlaste hotelli juurde kuuluvasse TopCat kinno, mis juba oma olemuselt pakub ja erilise atmosfaariga kullaldase elamuse.

11.03 Teeme valjasoidu paadiga Sihanoukville korval asuvale Bamboo Islandile, kus saame nautida terve paeva ringi lonkimist, snorgeldamist, ujumist, votta paikesevanne ja tunda ennast monusalt nagu oleks puhkusel. Kui jaab aega ja on tahtmist, siis votame ka suuna monele teisele saarele, kuid eesmark on siiski kulgeda monusas tempos ja mitte ulearu igale poole tormata. Ohtu veedame mones kohalikus karaokebaaris voi diskos, mis pakub meeleolukaid hetki hommikutundideni.

12.03 Hommikul alustame oma uut seiklust ning soidame minivaniga Vietmani poole Ha Tien kulla ning istume laevale, mis viib meid paradiislikule Phu Quoc saarele. Saarele joudes majutume monusates bungalotes An Binh Resort ja naudime esmast saareelu.

13.03 See paev on meil tais avastamisroomu, kuna rendime rollerid ning seame suuna just nendesse paikadesse, kuhu vahegi hind ihaldab. Eelmisel ohtul oleme paika pannud orjenteeruva piirkonna, mida sel paeval avastame ja votame vastu koik emotsioonid, mis meile teele ette juhtuvad. Phu Quoc on ideaalne ja superhindadega saar, seega saate nautida oma puhkust taie rinnaga.

14.03 Hommikul soidame taas laevaga mandrile kuid nuud siis liigume edasi Rach Gia kulla, kust soidame bussiga Can Tho kulla, kus majutume Kim Tho hotellis ja broneerime ara jargmise paeva paaditripi Mekongi joel. Ohtu vaba nautimaks seda fantastilist Louna-Vietnami linna.

15.03 Hommikul vaga vara kulastame ehtsat Can Tho ujuvaid turge Cai Rang, kus me siis naeme kuidas muuaks monusaid delikatesse nagu rotte, puutoneid seapaid ja muid horgutisi, misjarel on vaga monus soita tagasi hotelli nautima “oiget” hommikusooki :) Kohud tais tuubitud, liigume edasi bussiga Vietnami pealinna Saigoni ehk Ho Chi Minh City-sse. Majutume hotellis Hai Long 5 Hotel ning lasemel linnal ennast kanda ja naudime ohtut mones kohalikus restoranis.

16.03  Sel paeval avastame koike ponevat, mida on pakkuda uhel maailma kurikuulsaimal linnal. Rendime rollerid ning koostame omale sobiliku paevakava, alustades sojamuuseumidest, tunnelisusteemidest ning lopetades kohalike turgude ning pulbitseva ooeluga.

17.03 Hommikul kell 9.45 lendame Air Asia lennuga labi vahemaandumise Bangkokis Louna-Tais asuvale Phuketi saarele. Maandume 14.00. Majutume ja seame ennast sisse ning valmistume jargmiseks paevaks. Vaba kava.

18.03 Phuket. Rendime rollerid ning teeme saarele sona otseses mottes tiiru peale. Kulastame Big Buddha templit, erinevaid randu, Phuket Towni koos oma ahvimaega. Ohtul voime kulastada soovi korral Patongi peotanavat, saades osa nii gogo-baaride kui ka tantsuklubide maagiast.

19.03 Phuket. Vaba paev nautimaks randa, snorgeldamist, paevitamist ja puhkamist ja mida iganes, et anda vaheke puhkust koikidele, kel ringirandamisest vasimus kontides. Ohtul laheme Phuket Towni ooturule, mis pakub unustamatuid maitseelamusi kui ka voimalust ohjeldamatult ostelda.

20.03 Meil on harukordne voimalus saada osa uhe armsa Eesti paarikese pulmapeost, kuhu me koik oleme oodatud. Detailid jaavad ullatuseks :)

21.03 Phuket. Voimalik kasutada paeva nii sukeldumiseks, mone paradiisisaare kulastuseks voi massaazisalongis "oma aja" nautimiseks. 

22.03 Alustame oma kahepaevast privaatreisi Khao Sok rahvusparki. Liigume minivaniga hotellist ca 150 km Krabist pohja poole Khao Soki rahvusparki, mille parliks on Cheow Lani jarv. Paev on tulvil seiklusi nii dzunglimatka naol kui ka seiklusel jarve enda peal. Paeva kulminatsiooniks  on kilomeetrine koopamatk, mis pakub elamusterohke adrenaliinilaengu. Oobime unikaalsetes bambusmajakestes jarve peal ning naudime ohtusooki. 

23.03 Parast varskendavat hommikusuplust ja –sooki laheme edasi 3 tundi valtavale dzunglimatkale, mille raames ronime makke fantasitilist vaadet nautima. Tegemist ei ole lihtsalt metsarajaga, vaid lopu poole tuleb juba mooda toelist mae seina mooda ules ronida. Parast kosutavat lounasooki ja suplust votame tagasi suuna Krabi poole. Hotellis tagasi peaks olema kella 19 paiku.

24.03 Sukeldumispaev koikidele sukeldumisfanattidele. Kuna selle reisi jooksul ei ole me rohku pannud sukeldumistele, siis Krabilt saavad alguse paljud India Ookeani parimad sukeldumissaidid, mistottu oleks patt jatta pea vee alla pistmata. Seega koik kes on litsenseeritud sukeldujad, saavad sel paeval teha 3 sukeldumist. See oleks siis paev merel, lounasoogiga ning kulastame parimat, mida piirkonnal pakkuda. 

Mittesukeldujad saavad omale lubada ka shoppingut voi siis rannapaeva ning samuti on alati voimalus osaleda mones saaretripis, mis kulastab laabruses asuvaid pisikesi lumivalge liivaga paradiisisaari.

25.03 Vaba paev. Kes rannas vedeleda ei soovi, siis voib ka hakata vaikselt oma kohvreid pakkima ohtuse arasoidu eel. Peale lounat kell 15.50 lendame Bangkoki, majutume lihtsas Reno Hotellis ning votame reisi kokku uheskoos mones kohalikus baaris/restoranis ning paneme paika juba jargmise reisi plaane.

26.03 Lendame tagasi koju juba varahommikul kell 9.05 ning jouame ohtuks kella 17.00 tagasi kodusesse Tallinnasse.

Reisi hind sisaldab:
-    Majutust valitud hotellides ja bungalotes kaheses toas.
-    Koiki siselende alates Bangkokist – kokku 5 lendu:
•	Bangkok – Siam Reap
•	Siam Reap - Sihanoukville
•	Ho Chi Minh City - Bangkok
•	Bangkok – Krabi
•	Krabi – Bangkok
-    Koiki transfeere, milles sisaldub ka plaanijargsetel paevadel rollerirent (2 inimest rolleril)
-    Koiki laevapileteid
-    Pikasabalisei paate
-    Angkor Wat templi paevast sissepaasupiletit (lisandub jalgrattarent vastavalt soovile)
-    Bamboo saare trippi Sihanoukvilles Kambodzas
-    Ujuvate turgude trippi Can Thos Vietnamis
-    Kahepaevast reisi Khao Soki rahvuparki, koopamatka, magimatka koos ohtusoogiga
-    Krabis snorgeldamistrippi umbritsevatele saartele mittesukeldujatele
-    3 sukeldumisega trippi Krabis sukeldumislitsentsi omanikele (lisandub varustuse tasu)
-    Railey Beachi trippi Krabis

Reisi hinnale lisandub:
-    Lennupiletid Tallinn – Bangkok - Tallinn
-    Soogid ja joogid, mida pole eelnevalt mainitud
-    Reisikindlustus
-    Sukeldumisvarustuse rent sukeldujatele (ca 20-25 eur/paev)
-    Ooelu :)
-    Viisad

Kuna reis on ka lapsesobralik, siis koik vahegi asjalikud ja seiklushimulised lapsed on oodatud osalema.

This event is still tentative and depends on the number of runners that love to push their limits and are physically fit enough. A relay-run may be considered if enough people are interested.

•	A 128km solo run from Ho Chi Minh City to Ba Ria – Vung Tau; to be done in one day time.

This is for runners that have been training seriously for a long time, know their limits and love to push that limit

BACKGROUND AND MORE INFO

Too many people in Ho Chi Minh City use their motorbike to drive just 100 meters and haven’t cycled even a single meter for many years. There was a time that this was different…..

When I first visited beautiful Vietnam in 1992, Ho Chi Minh City was a lot greener, there were hardly any cars, far less motorbikes and most people enjoyed riding their bikes. 1992 was also the first time I visited Vung Tau.

This year I will be 20 years in Vietnam. I’ve seen great improvements over the years. One of the biggest improvements has nothing to do with actual development but deals with health awareness improvements, especially over the last 4 years. Finally more people (re)discover that physical exercise is fun and healthy.  

Over the last 4 years more people started to cycle, quality bicycle shops enter the city and people, young and old, enjoy running. There are various groups like runclub.vn , SRC and Vietrunners that organize weekly events in their own style and have an increasing number of members (and member of one club enjoy and are welcomes by other clubs as they all ).

Everybody can be a runner and people can push their limits if they focus. Focus in sports helps to focus in daily life. Some of the member of runclub.vn were not able to run 2.5km 1.5 years ago but some of them have now completed their first half marathon, their first full trail marathon (thanks Vietrunners!) and are preparing for the Danang Full Marathon (thank pulse!) and the Sapa 70km mountain marathon. 

In February 2016 I will turn 45 years young. A person is never too old to do some crazy stuff so it is time to push that button a bit harder. This is not a 1, 2 or 3 days run but a ONE DAY run. At this moment there is no official organization supporting the run but if we have enough people interest to join, we hope to turn this into a formal event, supported by sponsors and event development companies, the media and also use this to raise funds for charities and create awareness of the run sport in Vietnam. 

The first people asked to join this event first got big eyes but……….have indicated that they are IN if the event goes ahead.

Please indicate via JOIN or MAYBE if you would be interested and leave a comment, if any.

International open 3-day, 4-stage mountain bike race in the central highlands of Vietnam.

About Your Trip  
Looming near the fertile sprawl of the Mekong Delta, Ho Chi Minh City is a huge, gleaming city permeated with history. It was called Saigon for centuries, including when, as the seat of the South Vietnamese government, it figured prominently during the Vietnam War. Its contemporary verve and historical monuments make it one of Southeast Asia’s most satisfying destinations.

Gain insight into Vietnamese history as well as hands-on knowledge of the country’s cuisine with this DreamTrip getaway to Ho Chi Minh City. You’ll take a day trip to visit HCM Agricultural Villages, a one-of-a-kind setting for exploring the traditional lifestyles of rural Vietnam. You’ll take a Vietnamese cooking class, turning garden-plucked ingredients into classic regional dishes. Another outing takes you on a guided underground tour of the Cu Chi tunnels, a labyrinthine subterranean network that played a critical role during the Vietnam War.


What's Included

4 days and 30nights at Sheraton Saigon Hotel & Towers, 88 Dong Khoi, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
Featuring standard accommodations with 1 king or 2 twin beds. Complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.
3 breakfasts, 1 lunch, 1 dinner. 
HCM Agricultural Villages tour and cooking class.
Cu Chi tunnels Tour.
An In-destination Support Specialist will be provided when 20 or more adults book this trip. Their goal is to ensure you have a great DreamTrips experience from landing to liftoff. They host a welcome reception on arrival day, attend scheduled activities throughout the trip, notify the group of itinerary updates and more.
Your trip includes 2 airport transfers:
March 11 between 9 a.m. and 5 p.m., timing based on arrival: From Tan Son Nhat International Airport to hotel.
March 14 between 9 a.m. and 5 p.m., timing based on arrival: From hotel to Tan Son Nhat International Airport.
To take advantage of round-trip airport transfers, you must provide your flight information to the DreamTrips Specialist no later than February 5. These transfers are available only for the airport(s) and dates listed above. Click here to give us your flight information. Transfers will not be offered if the flight information is not received by the deadline and transfers at any other time will incur a separate charge. Do not email flight information to the DreamTrips Specialist.
 Air transportation is not included. The closest commercial airport is Tan Son Nhat International Airport (SGN).

For any questions regarding this trip, contact the DreamTrips Specialist at DreamTrips@rovia.com.

Check-in: 3 p.m. Check-out: noon.


Hotel Details

You’ll stay in Ho Chi Minh City’s grand-scale center at the Sheraton Saigon Hotel & Towers, close to such attractions as Independence Palace (also known as Reunification Palace) and the Ho Chi Minh City Municipal Theatre (also known as Saigon Opera House).

Along with its prime location, the hotel offers the Aqua Day Spa, a sauna, an outdoor lap swimming pool and the Sheraton Fitness Center, which overlooks the pool and winter garden. Restaurants at the hotel are include the Level 23 Signature Restaurant & Wine Bar, Li Bai Chinese Restaurant, Mojo Cafe and Saigon Cafe.

Enjoy gatherings with friends at the Grand Tower Lounge, where you’ll find a view of the pool and complimentary snacks.

Sheraton Saigon Hotel & Towers
88 Dong Khoi
District 1, Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam

Chao mung ban den voi cong ty TNHH Vi Tinh KHANG ANH!

Ban muon kinh doanh nhung khong san von ?
Ban la mot nhan vien nang dong, muon co them thu nhap ?
Ban la sinh vien, hoc sinh, muon co viec lam them ?
Ban la nguoi ranh roi, muon tim mot cong viec lam them...?

Ban muon lam viec tuy hung, khong bi rang buoc ve thoi gian ?

Hay lien he ngay voi Cong Ty TNHH Vi Tinh KHANG ANH de tro thanh cong tac vien ban hang cua chung toi.

Nham mo rong mo hinh kinh doanh cung nhu tao co hoi tang thu nhap cho cac ban sinh vien nang dong, nhung nguoi ham me cong nghe, thoi trang chung toi tuyen cong tac vien ban hang online voi muc hoa hong, chiet khau cao. Tao moi dieu kien thuan loi cho cac ban ban hang va co doanh thu cao nhat.

Chung toi tin ban se kiem duoc khong phai la 200k / ngay ma ban co the kiem hon the nua. Ban con cho gi nua, hay nhanh tay tham gia dang ky mang luoi cong tac vien voi cong ty TNHH Vi Tinh KHANG ANH de tang thu nhap cho ban than, (trong cuoc song dung bo qua co hoi nao ban nhe, hay nhanh tay nam lay co hoi khi co the, ban dung bao gio nghi ban khong the lam duoc neu ban chua thu bat tay vao lam) cong ty TNHH Vi Tinh KHANG ANH se luon di cung ban tren con duong day kho khan va niem yeu thich kinh doanh cong nghe.

Vay de tro thanh cong tac vien voi cong ty TNHH Vi Tinh KHANG ANH ban phai lam gi ?????

Rat don gian ban chi can gui ho so (ban so yeu ly lich, don xin viec, CV neu ro ve kinh nghiem, qua trinh lam viec cua ban than) ve dia chi mail : info@vitinhkhanganh.com, trong do co anh va so dien thoai cua ban.

Quan trong nhat la so dien thoai cua ban dang ky, chung toi se luu vao he thong va de xac nhan thong tin khi ban gui tin nhan hoac so dien thoai cua khach hang.

1. Quyen loi ban nhan duoc khi tro thanh cong tac vien cua chung toi:

- Huong hoa hong theo doanh so ban hang.
- Mua san pham voi gia duoc chiet khau danh rieng cho cong tac vien.

- Co kha nang lam viec doc lap
- Tham gia tich cuc cac dien dan xa hoi & CNTT de quang ba san pham cho Cong Ty TNHH Vi Tinh KHANG ANH.

Ban con nghi van ve van de hoa hong va chiet khau ??????????????

Cac ban lo khi gioi thieu khach den cong ty Vi Tinh KHANG ANH ma cong ty khong trich hoa hong cho ban ? Dieu nay qua de de kiem tra. Khi cac ban cung cap cho cong ty Vi Tinh KHANG ANH so dien thoai cua khach hang, cong ty se tien hanh kiem tra lai thong tin roi giao hang cho khach hang. Neu ban muon biet cong ty co ban duoc hang cho khach hang khong cac ban chi can goi lai cho khach hang xem da nhan duoc hang tu cong ty Vi Tinh KHANG ANH chua la duoc ( thuong thi khi giao hang xong cong ty se chu dong lien he lai voi ban de thong bao giao dich thanh cong va so tien chiet khau ban duoc huong tu san pham do)

Cong ty Vi Tinh KHANG ANH cam ket trich dung so tien hoa hong va chiet khau cho ban, chung toi luon huong toi su hop tac cung nhau phat trien cung hop tac nen cac ban co the yen tam 100% voi nhung cam ket cong ty Vi Tinh KHANG ANH da dua ra . Cung da co rat nhieu cong tac vien da tham gia va thuc te cho rang ho kiem duoc khoan tien khong nho tu viec hop tac voi cong ty Vi Tinh KHANG ANH. Hay tham gia voi chung toi ngay hom de chung to nang luc cua minh.

Tien hoa hong va chiet khau cac ban co the den truc tiep den cong ty de nhan, hoac cac ban cung cap cho cong ty so tai khoan cua ban chung toi se gui qua tai khoan cho ban. Thuong thi thanh toan tu 300k tro len chung toi se tien hanh chuyen khoan cho ban, neu ban duoc 50k-200k chung toi se theo cung ban theo doi den 300k chung toi se tien hanh chuyen khoan cho ban.

Luu y: Khi ban duoc hang ban nen luu thong tin cua khach hang lai, nhu ngay ban hang, so dien thoai, san pham khach hang lay, gia san pham de neu ban khong lay duoc ngay con doi chieu lai voi cong ty cho chinh xac nhat.

Day la cong viec khong doi hoi qua nhieu thoi gian cua cac ban ma dem lai cho cac ban nhieu quyen loi thiet thuc.

I/ Loi gioi thieu:
 
O dau thiet ke phong net bootrom ..?

Hien nay mo hinh phong net bootrom khong dung o cung dang hau het chiem linh cac phong may internet - game hien nay. Ben canh su bung no cong nghe thi hau het cac chu kinh doang Phong Net dang co tiep can thi hau nhu gap kho khan vi Quy Khach khong ranh ve tin hoc. 

Cong Ty KHANG ANH COMPUTER voi HON 10 nam kinh nghiem lam ben may tinh. Doi ngu nhan vien nhieu nam kinh nghiem. Da va dang thi cong nhieu du an Phong Net Tiem Game va co so ha tang cac toa nha hay he thong mang noi bo cua cac doanh nghiep hay cac cong ty lon. 

Chung toi tu hao da gop phan lam nen su thanh cong lon va ten tuoi cua cac Phong Net Tiem Game ma KHANG ANH da thi cong, Cac Phong Net, Game cao cap, lon, nho, hay cac cong trinh lon. 

II/ Dich Vu Tu Van Lap Dat Phong Net Tron Goi:

- Hien nay mo hinh phong Net Bootrom khong dung o cung dang hau het chiem linh cac phong may Internet -Game hien nay. Ben canh su bung no cong nghe thi hau het cac chu kinh doanh Phong Net dang co tiep can thi hau nhu gap kho khan vi Quy Khach khong ranh ve tin hoc. 

Cung la don vi da va dang kinh doanh Phong Net nen Chung Toi mo ra mot huong di moi cho cac chu phong net co y dinh kinh doanh, co von va chuan bi dau tu cho phong net an tam khi den voi Chung Toi. Tu van lap dat trien khai he thong kinh doanh phong Net khong dung o cung.

- De hieu ro hon ve cong nghe Bootrom, va lua chon Doi Tac cho phu hop. Chung toi se dua ra mot so uu diem nhu sau:

III/ HE THONG PHONG NET BOOTROM KHONG O CUNG:

1/ Mo Hinh hoat dong:
 
-  Su dung 01 may chu chuyen dung( may Sever ) chua he dieu hanh( Windows ), Chua Game, cac chuong trinh ung dung.

- Cac may con ( may tram ) khong dung o cung, se su tai game tu may chu (may sever) ve.

- Ha tang co so mang (Bao gom Switch + Cap mang 1000Mbp/1Gb) Giup may con khoi dong va choi game nhanh gap 10 lan.

2/ Uu Diem Phong Net Bootrom Khong O Cung:
 
- Tiet kiem chi phi dau tu khong phai mua o cung(HDD) cho may con(may tram).

- Update Games dong loat + Tu dong Up game cho tat ca cac may con(may tram).

- Khong lo lang ve Virut hay loi Windows (vi may con khong co o cung).

- Them game tu may Tinh Tien cho tat ca cac may con(may tram).

- Tiet kiem dien nang, Giam do nong khi may chay khong o cung.

- Khong can thue IT hay cac dich vu bao tri phong net khac( chung toi se su ly trong 1H)
.....Va rat nhieu tien loi khac ma Bootrom sever mang lai.

IV/ Chuong trinh khuyen mai Khach hang:

- Bang hieu phong net game theo dien tich mat tien cua Quy Khach

- Tang 1 thung cap mang cao cap + Bich dau mang Dintek 5E chinh hang.

V/ Chat luong, quy cach, nguon goc hang hoa:
 
- Hang hoa, may tinh, thiet bi mua tai KHANG ANH deu xuat su ro rang, co tem nha phan phoi.

- Che do bao hanh theo tieu chuan chinh hang, theo nha san xuat dua ra.

- KHANG ANH cam ket chi su dung cac mat hang hay cac linh kien co ten tuoi noi tieng nhu: Intell, Gigabyte, Asus, Seageat, kingmax.....

VI/ Che do hau mai sau khi lap dat phong Net:
 
- Bao hanh 1 doi 1 trong thang dau tien.

- Khi thiet bi hay linh kien co su co KHANG ANH se cho muon linh kien thay the tuong duong trong thoi gian mang di bao hanh de Phong Net luon hoat dong 24/24H.

Do you love yoga, meditation and wellness? 
Do you want to share your love of being in great health physically and mentally? 
Do you want to become a teacher who truly shines?
Would you like to take part in a training that will transform your life, your own practices and set you on the road towards becoming an instructor who engages and inspires others? 
Do you simply want to learn more, become stronger and more knowledgeable about yoga, meditation and wellness? 

Join veteran yoga instructor Suzanne Vian and guests for this POWERFUL, TRANSFORMATIONAL, LIFE ENHANCING 200 Hour Yoga Alliance Teacher Training Course. 

Suzanne created this wellness, yoga and meditation teacher training course to address the whole person. This course goes way, way beyond learning about just yoga. It was designed for those who want to learn about total wellness and is perfect for students who wish to become teachers who are self aware and inspire. You will learn how to teach with compassion and intelligence, and to connect with your students in a very powerful way.

-----------------------------------------------------------
Time
200 Hour - 4 Week Summer Intensive
4 - 29 July, 2016, Monday - Friday
 8:00am - 6:00pm, District 2
-------------------------------------------------------------

Tuition
To be eligible for the early bird discounted rate, full payment must be received by 11 November 2015.
Early Bird Rate: 2,600USD (see cut off dates for your chosen training, above). No exceptions. 

Standard Rate: 2,800USD

In order for Suzanne to maintain a high level of personal attention for each trainee, spaces are limited. 

If you would like to pay in 2 instalments, a 50% deposit holds your place and the remaining 50% must be paid 30 days prior to the start date of the training. Sign ups 30 days in advance or less, must be paid in full. 

GROUPS OF 3 OR MORE STUDENTS signing up and paying at once receive a 10% discount off the regular price of the course. 

There are no refunds for this course, but if you become unable to attend your selected course, you are welcome to attend from a later date or use tuition towards another training course. If Suzanne cancels for any reason, a full refund will be given.

This is a globally recognized training, accredited with the Worldwide Yoga Alliance.

Kinh thua quy khach,

Cua hang chung toi hien co rat nhieu san pham dang ban co khuyen mai, muc giam trung binh tu 10% – 25%. Chuong trinh khuyen mai nay la lien tuc va dien ra quanh nam. Xin luu y hang tuan, chung toi deu co san pham moi voi gia khuyen mai gioi thieu den quy khach.

Quy khach vui long xem va lua san pham tren trang web cua cua hang tai www.hoavaidep.info

San pham nao co khuyen mai deu co chu “SALE“, co ghi ro gia goc va gia ban dang SALE OFF, dang khuyen mai giam gia. Rat mong quy khach ung ho cua hang chung toi.

Chuong trinh khuyen mai cua chung toi co the thay doi moi ngay

+ Khong phai tat ca cac san pham deu co gia khuyen mai, ma chi san pham nao co chu “SALE” moi la san pham khuyen mai.

+ Moi ngay co the co them san pham khuyen mai

+ Gia tri khuyen mai cung co the thay doi (tang/ giam) ma khong bao truoc.

+ San pham hom nay co the co khuyen mai, nhung ngay mai se het khuyen mai.

Khuyen mai danh cho khach hang quen

Neu quy khach la khach hang quen cua chung toi, hay vao fanpage danh gia san pham va dich vu cua chung toi, chung toi cam ket se giam gia cho quy khach vao cac lan mua hang sau du quy khach co mua san pham gi di nua, ke ca san pham do da khuyen mai roi, thi chung toi khuyen mai tiep, toi thieu 5% khi quy khach danh gia san pham va dich vu cua chung toi tai trang fanpage nay.

Quy khach vao fanpage tren facebook tai www.facebook.com/flowershop.mai
.
Khi dat hang voi chung toi, xin hay noi ro quy khach la khach hang cu ten gi, o dau va da danh gia fanpage cua chung toi voi ten gi, de chung toi lam can cu giam gia cho quy khach. “DANH THUC TIEM NANG BUNG – CHAY DAM ME – THOA SUC SANG TAO – VUON DEN THANH CONG”

Co bao gio cac ban dat cho minh cau hoi :

Toi la ai? Muc tieu song cua toi la gi? Toi hy vong va khao khat dieu gi o tuong lai?

Co rat nhieu ban tre da tim cho minh nhung cau tra loi phu hop voi ban than va da thanh cong! Ben canh do, khong it ban tre van loay hoay tim kiem cau tra loi cho ba cau hoi tren va pho mac cuoc doi cua minh cho so phan. Ho dan dan chan nan cuoc song, ho than phien cuoc doi nay qua bat cong va cuoi cung ho lang phi ca cuoc doi minh…

Thong tin TUYEN DUNG: http://vitinhkhanganh.com/Tuyen-Cong-Tac-Vien-Nhan-Vien-Kinh-Doanh-IT-Lam-Viec-Tai-Nha-Hoa-Hong-Cao-ad177075-779.html

Muc dich Tuyen Dung:

1/ Xay dung ngoi nha chung uom mam cho nhung uoc mo kinh doanh, giau va lam giau, uoc mo thanh cong.

2/ Xay dung cau noi giua cac ban tre dam me kinh doanh va khao khat thanh cong den cac doanh nghiep, dam thay doi suy nghi de thanh cong.

3/ Tro thanh noi de cac ban tre “Bung Chay DAM ME – Thoa Suc SANG TAO – Vuon den THANH CONG” va muon trai nghiem kinh doanh thuc su.

- Su menh: DEM DEN GIA TRI THANH CONG CHO BAN.

- Tam nhin: Noi uom mam cho nhung Doanh Nghiep Tre (Young Business)

- Slogan: SUY NGHI TICH CUC - HANH DONG MANH ME - CAM KET DAT MUC TIEU.

Hay cung Khang Anh COMPUTER Dinh Huong Song Cu The – Quan Tri Cuoc Doi.

-     Thay doi niem tin vao ban than, co thai do va nhan thuc tich cuc.

-    Xac dinh muc tieu va theo duoi uoc mo. Trong cuoc song ai cung co uoc mo, hay luon nuoi duong mo uoc moi ngay va khong ngung hanh dong de bien uoc mo do thanh hien thuc.

-     Dung lang phi cuoc song: Neu su lang phi ve thoi gian, tien bac, suc khoe chi la dang so trong ngan han thi su lang phi dang so nhat la lang phi CUOC DOI.

-     Dieu khac biet lon nhat giua tu duy nguoi giau va nguoi ngheo do chinh la nguoi giau song co muc tieu cu the, dinh huong cuoc doi cua ho di theo mot con duong cu the nhung nguoi ngheo muc tieu song cua ho chi la song cho qua ngay va chang co con duong cu the nao de cho cuoc doi ho di ca. “Neu cac ban muon thanh dat va giau co thi ban phai xac dinh cho minh muc tieu cu the va dinh huong song cu the”.

- Su menh cua Khang Anh COMPUTER: DEM DEN GIA TRI THANH CONG CHO BAN.

Hay gia nhap Khang Anh COMPUTER ngay hom nay!

Trich dan yeu thich:

“Don't ever let somebody tell you that you can't do something. Not even me. You got a dream, you gotta protect it. When people can't do something themselves, they ‘re gonna tell you that you can't do it. You want something, go get it. Period.”

  ( Will Smith - The Pursuit Of Happiness )

“Dung bao gio de ai do noi voi con rang: Con khong the lam duoc. Ngay ca chinh cha. Con co uoc mo, con hay bao ve no. Khi ai do khong lam duoc dieu gi, ho muon noi voi con rang con khong the. Con muon dieu gi do, hay gianh lay no” 

( Will Smith - Muu Cau Hanh Phuc )

Nhan dip ky niem tron 3 nam hop tac, BakerLand xin gui toi quy khach chuong trinh NGAY HOI WILTON nham mang den nhung co hoi mua sam va chuong trinh tri an dac biet hap dan.

I. GIAM GIA  TU 20-60% TOAN BO SAN PHAM WILTON:
BakerLand giam gia toan bo san pham Wilton voi muc chiet khau hap dan, tu 20-60% bao gom: khuon khay, dung cu, phu kien, fondant/gumpaste, duong trang tri…
- Thoi gian ap dung giam gia: 27-29/11/2015.
- Chi ap dung khi mua hang truc tiep tai cua hang BakerLand.

 II. TANG KEO CANDY MELT/HAT RAC TRANG TRI CHO TOAN THE KHACH MUA HANG:
BakerLand se danh tang nhung tui keo candy melt hoac hat trang tri xinh xan cho tat ca nhung khach hang toi mua hang tai he thong cua hang trong 3 ngay to chuc su kien NGAY HOI WITON.
- Thoi gian ap dung giam gia: 27-29/11/2015
-  Chi ap dung khi mua hang truc tiep tai cua hang BakerLand.

 III. GIAM GIA MUA HANG ONLINE HAP DAN:
Voi chuong trinh nay, nhung ai khach hang xa khong co thoi gian qua truc tiep cac cua hang cua BakerLand cung co the nhan duoc chuong trinh uu dai.
Dac biet hon nua, BakerLand se free ship noi thanh tat ca cac don hang va tang 1 lo vani Wilton tri gia 59.000d cho hoa don tu 300.000d tro len khi mua san pham trong danh muc hang Wilton khuyen mai.
- Thoi gian ap dung giam gia: 30/11-4/12/2015
- Chi ap dung khuyen mai tai: http://bakerland.vn/

IV. CUOC THI "I LOVE WILTON":
Voi tieu chi tat ca ai tham du deu co nhan duoc qua tang, cuoc thi se la chuong trinh tri an lon nhat va hap dan nhat ma BakerLand muon danh tang cho tat ca khach hang, nhung nguoi yeu thich lam banh va da su dung nhung san pham huu ich cua nhan hang Wilton.

The le va cach thuc du thi ban vui long xem tai: http://bakerland.vn/cuoc-thi-anh-i-love-wilton-1691.html

Qua thoi gian tai co cau va tap trung vao phan khuc nha pho, nay Realvn chung toi co luong lon khach hang dat tim mua nha khu vuc quan 1 quan 3 va quan Phu Nhuan voi cac thong tin sau : 

Vi tri va uu tien 
-          Cac tuyen duong gom : Dong Khoi, Le Loi, Le Thanh Ton, Hai Ba Trung, Pasteur, Ham Nghi, Nguyen Trai, Ly Tu Trong, Truong Dinh, Vo Van Tan, Nam Ky Khoi Nghia, Nguyen Thi Minh Khai, Bui Thi Xuan, Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Phan Xich Long … 

-          Nhu cau ve nha mat tien, va ca nha thuoc hem xe hoi thuoc quan 3 va Phu Nhuan. 

-          Uu tien mua cac nha  dang co the chap tai ngan hang , hoac nha da tung the chap ngan hang ma van con chung tu luu. 

Yeu cau chi tiet 

Duong Dong Khoi :  co 3 nhu cau can mua 
-          Mua nguyen can, uu tien ben so le, uu tien chieu ngang 4m tro len, neu nguyen can co cung mot chu so huu la uu tien, uu tien vi tri nha co the xay moi, muc gia co the mua 53 ti den 70 ti dong tuy vao vi tri 

-          Mat tien, tang tret va mot lau, uu tien chieu ngang 4m, gia khoang 40 ti. 

Le Thanh Ton : co 4 nhu cau 
-          Nha mat tien hien huu, 4mx18m tro len uu tien 1 tret 3 lau, mot can thuoc khu vuc cho Ben Thanh gia khoang tren 30 ti, mot can khu vuc phuong Ben Nghe gia duoi 30 ti dong. 

-          Hai can nha hem xe hoi, uu tien ngang 4m, co the kinh doanh hoac o, mua theo gia thi truong.   

Pasteur : co 2 nhu cau 
-          Khu vuc doi dien voi khach san Rex va khu vuc tai chinh, gia khoan 33 ti 

-          Nha/biet thu thuoc hem khu vuc quan 3, khu yen tinh, mua theo gia thi truong, uu tien cac nha dang cam co. 

Hai Ba Trung   : co 5 nhu cau 
-          Van phong hoac khach san gia hop ly kha nang mua tu 50 den tren 100 ti 

-          Nha/dat co the lam du an, tren 500m 2 gia thuong thuong 

-          Nha mat tien de kinh doanh khu vuc cho Tan Dinh, theo gia thi Truong   

Nguyen Thi Minh Khai : co 2 nhu cau 
-          Nha mat tien tren 4m, khu vuc hai chieu, uu tien khach san cu, nha cu de cai tao. 

-          Biet thu hem, la van phong va o.   

Nam Ky Khoi Nghia : 6 nhu cau 
-          Khu vuc tu cau Cong ly den Ly Chinh Thang can mot nha mat tien va mot nha pho trong hem (huong ra san bay). 

-          Khu vuc trung tam, tu Len Thanh Ton den Ben Chuong Duong : can mua nha, hoac cao oc voi chieu ngang 8m tro len. 

Bui Thi Xuan – Suong Nguyet Anh : 3 nhu cau 
-          Uu tien mua khach san hien huu 

-          Nha mat tien tren 4m co kha nang xay dung lam khach san. 

Vo Van Tan : can 2 can 
-          Cao oc van phong, hoac dat xay cao oc, thuoc khu vuc tu Ho Con Rua den nga tu Cach Mang Thang 8. 

-          Nha mat tien uu tien ngang 4m va hon 2  lau. 

Phu Nhuan : khu vu thuoc cac tuyen duong Phan Xich Long, cac con duong Hoa Cuc, Hoa Lan, Hoa Phuong … 
-          Nha mat tien, uu tien can thuc ban (gia hop ly) va giay tu san san giao dich. 

-          Uu tien mua nha dien tich ngang tren 8m. 

Nha hem xe hoi quan 1 va 3 : luong nhu cau nhieu 
-          Thuoc hem cac cua cac tuyen duong chinh trong quan 1 va 3 

-          Gia khoan tu 8 ti tro len, uu tien khu vuc yen tinh.

CHANG CO BUA AN NAO LA MIEN PHI, CHANG CO KET QUA TUYET VOI NAO MA KHONG PHAI BO CONG SUC

"Mon qua lon nhat ma ban co the cho di, do chinh la su phat trien cua ca nhan ban" - Jim Rohn

Mot thuc trang rat dang suy ngam hien nay (va khong biet con keo dai den bao gio), do la ty le sinh vien tot nghiep khong tim duoc viec lam rat cao, hoac neu co viec thi cung bi cac doanh nghiep che toi che lui. Do nen giao duc nhu vay, hay do chinh sinh vien khong cau tien? Toi cung tung la mot sinh vien rat doi binh thuong, tham chi chang bao gio dam vo nguc ve thanh tich hoc tap cua minh. Nhung khi ra truong, toi may man khong phai roi vao nhung con so thong ke dang buon kia. Cu nghi den dieu nay toi lai thay dau long!

Moi khi gap sinh vien, toi luon chia se rang ban dang co mot loi the hon tat ca the he dan anh dan chi di truoc, do la THOI GIAN. Nhung kho noi, nhieu ban da som tro nen gia coi, i ach boi ngu quen trong chien thang cua ky thi dai hoc. Ban quen mat cuoc doi con vo so nhung “ky thi” khac nghiet hon nhieu ma diem cua chung khong duoc do bang con so. Giang duong chi la khoi dau cho hanh trinh phia truoc ma thoi. Bon nam dai hoc la mot tai san hay thu xa xi tuy thuoc vao ban. So “von” ban tich luy thong qua viec dau tu vao chinh ban than minh trong bon nam nay se quyet dinh tuong lai.

Toi dang noi den mot loai von rat dac biet, no duoc mang ten “von su nghiep”. Do chinh la su san sang trong tui khon cua ban de co the doi duoc nhung co hoi nghe nghiep tot dep sau nay, hay truoc tien, la co mot thoi sinh vien tuyet voi!

Khang Anh COMPUTER Thong Bao CAN TUYEN GAP 4 NAM/NU NHAN VIEN KINH DOANH CAMERA QUAN SAT (UU TIEN NU) LUONG CAO Tai TP. HCM

- So luong: 04.
- Cap bac: Nhan vien.
- Loai hinh cong viec: Toan thoi gian co dinh.
- Noi lam viec: Ho Chi Minh.
- Muc luong: Luong co ban + 5% hoa hong / hop dong + thuong vuot muc doanh thu / thang.
- Han nop ho so: 30-05-2015.

1. Mo ta cong viec
- Chiu trach nhiem ve chi tieu doanh so, doanh thu duoc giao va cong tac thu hoi cong no. 
- Tim kiem thong tin, tiep can cac khach hang tiem nang, cham soc khach hang theo khu vuc duoc phan cong. 
- Truc tiep dam phan thuong luong, thuc hien cac thu tuc ky ket hop dong voi khach hang.
- Chiu trach nhiem tu van ky thuat, khao sat cong trinh, phat trien viec kinh doanh o dia ban duoc phan cong.
- Phoi hop voi cac bo phan lien quan de nang cao chat luong dich vu khach hang.
- Co phuong tien di lai. 
- Chap nhan cong tac tinh (Khong thuong xuyen). 
- Bao cao ket qua cong viec voi cap tren.
- Biet ngoai ngu la mot uu the.

2. Yeu cau cong viec:
=> 4 nhan vien lam viec tai Tp. HCM.

- Tot nghiep Trung cap tro len.
- Ky nang lam viec doc lap va theo nhom tot.
- Co nang khieu kinh doanh tot.
- Nhanh nhen, co kha nang giao tiep tot, dam phan thuyet phuc khach hang, kha nang xu ly tinh huong tot.
- Trung thuc, Chiu kho, nhiet tinh, kien nhan, nhanh nhen, nang dong, ham hoc hoi.
- Co ngoai hinh. Tuoi doi tu 22-35 tuoi.
- Uu tien co kien thuc, ky thuat, kinh nghiem ve linh vuc camera, bao chay, bao trom... / CNTT / Mang.
- Uu tien nu.

3. QUYEN LOI (***): 
- Trong thoi gian thu viec: duoc huong nguyen luong, Phu cap xang xe, dien thoai, an trua va huong hoa hong 5% / doanh so ban hang + thuong dat doanh thu / thang. (Dieu kien cam ket: Hoan thanh dinh muc & hieu qua cong viec duoc giao)

4. Sau thoi gian thu viec: duoc huong them cac che do phuc loi sau (*): 
- Ky HDLD va duoc tham gia BHXH, BHYT va BHTN.
- Huong 12 ngay phep/ nam. 
- Duoc tham gia danh gia xet thuong va tang luong 2 lan/nam .
- Tham gia ky nghi mat thuong nien. 
- Duoc nghi va Thuong vao cac ngay Le Tet theo quy dinh cua Nha nuoc .
- Co qua vao ky sinh nhat.
- NV lam tren 1 nam se co them phan thuong tham nien trong bang luong hang thang .
- Co qua nhan dip Trung thu va qua cho con em nhan dip Tet thieu nhi 01/6 va rat nhieu khoan phuc loi khac ma don vi dem lai cho NV .

5. Ho so gom: 
- Don xin viec. 
- So yeu ly lich (co dan anh 3x4). 
- Bang mo ta kinh nghiem lam viec.
- Ban sao ho khau, CMND va cac bang cap co lien quan. (Cong chung)
- Giay Dang ky tam tru (neu ho khau tinh). 
- Giay kham suc khoe.
- Ho so chung minh da co lam linh vuc tren o cty cu.

6. Ho so nop tai: 
- Nop truc tiep: 186/31, Nguyen Suy, P.Tan Quy, Q.Tan Phu, TP.HCM.
- Nop truc tuyen: Gui ho so vao Email: info@vitinhkhanganh.com
Hotline: 0933 8422 85 Mr. Khang (Lien he truoc khi den nop ho so)

Luu y: HS vui long ghi ro vi tri ung tuyen.

Co bao gio ban tu hoi “ Tuoi Tho La Gi?” Co bao gio tren duong doi tap nap va ban ron, chung ta lai vo tinh nhac den Tuoi Tho” …

Dua tre nao roi cung se lon. Nhung cai tam hon tre con thi chang mat di bao gio.. vi mot hay nhieu luc, nguoi lon chung ta deu co gang tim lai nhung doan hoi uc tuoi tho. 
Mua Trung Thu nay hay cung ECO Vietnam Group tro ve nhung khoang troi trong veo cua tuoi tho qua dem nhac gay quy "Ngay Ay Dau Roi"

"Ngay Ay Dau Roi" se dua moi nguoi ve khong gian ky uc cua tuoi tho, voi cac tro choi than quen nhu danh du, ong thut, con vu, long den lon bia hay tro choi ma troi, ken trai cay, tat lon cua nhung nam thang o truong tam mua.
Do la dem nhac de chung ta tha minh vao dong chay ky uc voi nhung bai hat Ngay Xua Oi, Giac Mo Canh Co, Ve An Com, Cho Toi Xin Mot Ve Di Tuoi Tho,… de chung ta hoi tuong lai mot thoi qua khu vui ve, hon nhien, de chung ta thoat khoi cuoc song bon be lo au cua “ nhung nguoi lon”.

Dem nhac cung gop phan tao kinh phi cho chuong trinh Trung Thu y nghia danh cho cac em nho tai hai vung sau : Gia Bac- Lam Dong va Hoa Minh- Tra Vinh trong ngay hoi Lan Toa Yeu Thuong duoc to chuc vao ngay thu 7 21 thang 9.
THONG TIN DEM NHAC "NGAY AY DAU ROI"

                   Tu 19h30 – 21h30
                   
                   Thu bay, 31/08/2013
                   Tu 19h30 – 21h30

The winter is coming, It's getting colder. Large quantities of homeless people are stranded right now in the cold and soon to be freezing weather. We are very lucky to have coats and accessories to keep us warm. Just imagine the happiness and relief we can bring these individuals by collaborating and giving them hats, clothese, blanket and scarfs. By a simple donation of any kind we can reach out to hundreds of homeless people that might otherwise be left helpless. Not only are we keeping these people warm but we are also helping them survive freezing weather in their already harsh conditions. You can make a difference in a persons life. 
WE HAVE A VERY SPECIAL PROGRAM FOR YOU TO JOIN: Giving Food and warm clothes to the Homeless on Wednesday night November 28, 2015 (17:00 we will prepare the food; 22:00 we go out and deliver to the homeless around Hanoi capital) 
So, COME and JOIN with us!!!!! Register via the Event Link or send mesg to our FB. 

#chapcanhyeuthuong #compassionvietnam #compassionmovement #compassioninasia #compassion #oyim #oyimssd #oyimsaum #oyimculture #oyim4life #oyimvietnam #charity #share #love #hanoi #vietnam #handmade #winter  #capital #homeless
