Clouds of Sils Maria (France, 2014)

metacritics: 78/100
IMDB's score: 6.8/10
Rottentomatoes: 88%

Juliette Binoche and Kristen Stewart shine as independent, punk-intellectual women in Olivier Assayas’s Clouds of Sils Maria. Binoche is Maria Enders, a middle-aged actress who, despite still having a substantial career, is now asked to play Helena – the older character – in a revival of the theatrical play Maloja Snake. Maria’s career was launched by that very play 20 years before, when she took on the role of the young and captivating Sigrid, a role very close to the spirit of the actress. However this time around, the part is given to celebrity-bait Jo-Ann Ellis (played by Chloe Grace Moretz). Assayas wrote the character of Maria specifically for Binoche, so much so that it is considered a biographical account of the French actress’s artistic persona. The film is a delicate journey into these women’s lives, where the lines between reality and fiction are blurred and the ghosts of the past are very much alive.

(English subtitles available)

Entrance: FREE

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ten Phim: Nhung Bong May Cua Sils Maria
Nam san xuat: 2014
The loai: Phim Gia Dinh

Thoi luong: 124 Phut

Clouds of Sils Maria - Nhung Bong May Cua Sils Maria: Chuyen phim ke ve Maria Enders (Binoche), mot dien vien san khau dang o dinh cao su nghiep cua minh thi duoc moi tham gia mot vo kich duoc tai dan dung da tung mang lai danh tieng cho co hai muoi nam truoc. Nhung ngay do, Maria vao vai Sigrid, mot co gai tre da lam ba chu cua co ta – Helena tro nen than bai danh liet va cuoi cung tu sat. Oai oam thay, gio day thi co lai phai vao chinh vai Helena voi so phan bi tham do.

Thuat ngu “Entrepreneur” dung de chi nhung doanh nhan bat dau khoi tao su nghiep kinh doanh cua ban than tu xuat phat diem la con so khong. Dieu do co nghia la ho phai nghi ra duoc nhung sang kien kha quan, doi mat voi cac rui ro tai chinh, va giai quyet cac van de kho khan khac. Doi lai, doanh nhan se la nguoi thu hoach loi nhuan nhieu nhat tu nhung cong suc minh bo ra, co the chu dong lich lam viec, va la nguoi dua ra nhung quyet dinh quan trong trong cong ty.

De tro thanh mot doanh nhan khoi nghiep thanh cong, viec chuan bi that tot la dieu bat buoc. Ben canh nhung ly thuyet kinh te, viec tham gia cac du an cua truong cung se trang bi cho sinh vien nhung kinh nghiem thuc te quy bau, va DAI HOC BRIGHTON la noi mang den cho ban co hoi len ke hoach nhung buoc dau tien trong giac mo khoi nghiep cua minh.

La dai dien chinh thuc cua DAI HOC BRIGHTON tai Viet Nam, COMPASS Education rat vinh du moi duoc thay Barry Lee-Scherer  tu DAI HOC BRIGHTON den trinh bay chuyen de “KINH DOANH KHOI NGHIEP – KHOI DAU VA PHAT TRIEN MOT DOANH NGHIEP. THANH TUU GIANG DAY TAI DAI HOC BRIGHTON”

Barry Lee-Scherer la giam doc chuong trinh Thac si Quan ly tai DAI HOC BRIGHTON. Ong la giang vien chinh cua Khoa Quan ly Quoc te va Hanh vi To chuc, va dong giang day cac chuong trinh MBA, Thac si va Cu nhan Quan ly tai truong. La mot nha  nghien cuu, giao vien va giam sat vien cac ki thi, ong co rat nhieu kinh nghiem quoc te quan trong, cung nhu la mot chuyen gia ve linh vuc phat trien quan ly quoc te.

Buoi chuyen de se duoc dien ra tai so 07 Tran Quoc Thao, Phuong 6, Quan 3, Tp.HCM tu 18.00 den 20.00 ngay thu nam 26/11/2015.

De dang ky, vui long bam vao ben duoi  hoac nhan tin vao so dien thoai 0902.304.279 voi noi dung MBA <Ho va ten ban>.

De biet them thong tin ve hoc bong va chuong trinh hoc, vui long lien he

07 Tran Quoc Thao, Phuong 6, Quan 3, Tp.HCM
Tel: (84.8) 39 302 374/ 39 302 375

Nhung am thanh say dam, sau sac va doc dao se la giai dieu chu dao trong dem nhac, voi su quay tro lai lan thu ba cua phu thuy am thanh den tu Hong Kong - ROMI B.

La resident DJ cua nhung bua tiec Freesome lung danh tai thu phu cua cau lac bo danh rieng cho am nhac dien tu underground noi tieng OMA – Romi B da mang lai nhung am thanh duoc choi voi ki nang kheo leo va can than toi khan gia trong khu vuc trong hon 15 nam. O anh da phat trien mot kha nang tham my am nhac vo cung doc dao, tinh te, nghiem tuc va truyen nang luong, ma ve dep cua no chi co the duoc mieu ta va boc lo trong khi bieu dien. 

Trong lan choi nhac tai The Obs gan nhat, anh da khien san nhay chat cung khan gia nhun nhay khong ngung theo nhung giai dieu duoc hoa tron quyen ru giua house va techno cho toi binh minh. Ban khong the bo lo buoi bieu dien dac biet nay cua anh.

Chuong trinh bat dau luc 10PM/ MIEN PHI ve vao cua.

Moi ban vao cac duong link sau:

https://soundcloud.com/romib
http://www.cliche-booking.com/Artists/romi-b/

____________________ENGLISH____________________

Deep, profound and unique sound is the tune of the night, with the third return of Hong Kong-based wizard of the dance floor - ROMI B. 

Resident of the infamous Freesome parties in that metropolis that are hosted at what is arguably its only underground electronic music-focused club - OMA - Romi B has been providing a carefully crafted sound to audiences in the broader region for over 15 years, developing a very specific, ethereal, serious and energizing audio aesthetic that can only be described by its own unfolding beauty during a performance. 

Last time he played at The Obs, he had the packed room moving to his ensnaring blends of house & techno until sunrise. Don't miss him this time around.

10PM / FREE entrance all night!

https://soundcloud.com/romib
http://www.cliche-booking.com/Artists/romi-b/

VCI would like to invite you to join ICF Certified Professional Coach training program on 27 ,28, 29 Nov and 19, 20 Dec 2015. 

The program is designed for Passionate Leaders and Coaches who want to learn coaching methodology & skills to help & develop others and gain credibility as an ICF Certified Coach.

To seize – and save – the day.

Being a Director on a Board comes with lots of opportunities – and also lots of legal responsibilities.

    Are you positioned to seize the day – and build opportunities, networks and influence while generating an income from director’s fees?
    Are you prepared to save the day by minimising the organisation’s risk and ensuring that you don’t leave yourself legally exposed?

Serving on a board does have privileges – as well as responsibilities.

THE SPEAKERS

Bill Magennis is the Managing Partner of Allens Vietnam. He will explain the legal responsibilities and potential issues associated with serving on a board.

Simon Perkins currently serves on several boards in the region. He will detail the real opportunities and challenges faced by directors in the boardroom.

Stuart Munro will provide some insight into the program offered by AICD which equips and qualifies people to serve on the best boards. Not surprisingly, the best boards are actively seeking the best qualified candidates to fill vacancies as they arise.

Chau Ta, a director herself (including Auscham), will moderate the session.

BIOGRAPHIES OF SPEAKERS

Bill Magennis, Managing Partner, Allens Vietnam (Bronze Sponsor of AusCham)

billmagennisBill Magennis has lived in Hanoi and worked in Vietnam as a lawyer for 23 years.

He has been on the Vietnam boards of ABB, Chrysler, the first Hanoi apartment block Mayfair and so far has served 20 years on the LafargeHolcim Vietnam board.

In this time he has seen the company law and practice relating to boards/members’ councils grow from rudimentary to the complex situations currently faced by boards as they strive to oversee compliance with evolving Vietnamese law and in some cases (subsidiaries of global corporations) with anti-corruption systems required by foreign legislation such as the US Foreign Corrupt Practices Act”.

 

Simon Perkins

Simon PerkinsSimon has been in the Telecommunications Industry for nearly 40 years, with roughly half that time spent in the UK (early career) and the second half in Australia and Asia.

Over the last 15 years, Simon has been in CEO roles managing Telecommunication Network Operators in the region, ranging from start-ups of green-field operations to developing established businesses. Simon has extensive organic and inorganic business development experience, having undertaken a number of Merger and Acquisition projects as part of his CEO duties.

Simon has worked in many emerging markets in South East Asia: Vietnam, Cambodia, Laos and Myanmar and has a track record of success in demanding situations. He has Board experience as both a Non-Executive and Executive Director.

Qualifications and Professional Memberships

    University of Warwick – Master of Business Administration (MBA)
    Loughborough University Bachelor of Science (BSc), Electronic and Electrical Engineering
    Australian Institute of Company Directors
    FIET – Fellow Institution of Engineering and Technology (IET)
    Fellow Engineers Australia – FIEAust

Nha hat Nhac vu kich Viet Nam va Nha hat giao huong nhac vu kich Thanh pho Ho Chi Minh se cung bieu dien vo vu kich noi tieng "Kep hat de" voi phan am nhac cua tac gia Tchaikovsky (Nga) de chao don Giang sinh nam nay.

Nha hat giao huong nhac vu kich Thanh pho Ho Chi Minh bieu dien vo nay trong 3 dem 27, 28 va 29/11 tai Nha hat Thanh pho Thanh pho Ho Chi Minh.

Tai Nha hat Lon Ha Noi, toi 10&11/12, khan gia Thu do se duoc thuong thuc vo vu kich "Kep hat de" noi tieng nay.

Tai Thanh pho Ho Chi Minh, "Kep hat de" lan dau cong dien vao thang 12/2011, ke tu do, cu den dip le Giang Sinh, vo vu kich nay cua Nha hat giao huong nhac vu kich Thanh pho Ho Chi Minh da tro thanh mon qua Giang sinh duoc dong dao khan gia Viet Nam va nuoc ngoai tai dia ban Thanh pho mong doi.

Chuong trinh lan nay se co su tham gia bieu dien cua hai nu nghe sy ballet quoc te xinh dep va tai nang: nghe sy ballet nguoi Phap Chloe Glemot, va nghe sy ballet nguoi Nam Phi Michaela Griffin. Ho la nhung nguoi da bieu dien voi cac doan ba le lon nhat tai chau Au.

Chi huy dan nhac giao huong va hop xuong bieu dien truc tiep tai khan phong la nhac truong tai nang nguoi Nga Marius Stravinsky.

"Kep hat de" cua Nha hat Nhac vu Kich Viet Nam do cac nghe sy doan mua thuc hien, duoi su dan tap cua nghe sy nhan dan Ngo Thi Kieu Ngan. Noi dung cua vo da co thay doi mot phan so voi ban goc.

Vo vu kich hua hen se mang lai nhung cam xuc dep cho nguoi xem khi nghe thuat mua co dien chuan muc ket hop voi am nhac. Dac biet phuc trang, hoa trang va boi canh san khau tai hien duoc bau khong khi co tich ky ao.

Tuy duoc rut gon nhung "Kep hat de" cua Nha hat Nhac vu kich Viet Nam van giu nguyen cac doan mua dep mat, han am nhac tru tinh duoc mong cho nhu "Hanh khuc" (March) hay doan mua doi.

December 10: Mr. Nobody (Belgium-Canada-France-Germany 2009)
Jared Leto is Nemo, a 118-year-old man and the last mortal human living in the year 2092. The first English-language film by Belgian director Jaco van Dormael, Mr. Nobody is an ambitious psychological and existential sci-fi film that explores the human memory and the domino effect that an individual’s life choices may create. The fragmented narration plays out like a multi-storyline film divided in three central love stories. The contradictory recollections from Nemo’s life surface during his hypnosis session with Dr. Feldheim who wants to understand how the memory of a mortal person works. Despite the sleek and beautiful production sets, Mr. Nobody is ultimately a story that touches the heart with no room for rationality.

December 17: Black Mass (USA, 2015)
Black Mass sees a glorious return for Johnny Depp with a penetrating and chilling performance as real-life gangster James 'Whitey' Bulger. Bulger controlled Boston in the 70s and 80s as the boss of the Irish mob Winter Hill Gang. Black Mass does something that almost no other gangster film does: it focuses on the relationship between institutional power and organise crime and the role that government agencies as well as politicians have in supporting and spreading organise crime. Bulger became an FBI informant when his childhood pal John Connolly (Joel Edgerton) convinces him to give information about the rival Mafia gang. The line between law and crime rapidly starts to blur and Bulgar begins to exploit his connection with the FBI while Connolly starts to get increasingly fascinated by the criminal world.

December 24: The Martian (USA, 2015)
Matt Damon is astronaut Mark Watney on a mission to Mars in the latest film by Ridley Scott. Watney is stranded on the Red Planet after his crew believes him dead and are forced to quickly abandon their mission due to a dangerous windstorm. Unlike in Blade Runner and Alien, Scott takes an entertaining and optimistic approach in this survival-adventure sci-fi flick that sees Damon’s character – an expert botanist – use all his strength and inventiveness to find sustenance on the red planet. Although The Martian has an A-list cast – Jessica Chastain, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Jeff Daniels, Kristen Wiig and Danny Glover, among the others – it is a one-man show for Damon who manages to pull off the role of believable hero by creating a relatable but never dull persona.  

Written by Zelda Rudzitsky

Ban da tung thich thu truoc nhung quang cao day sang tao tren TV tu nhung thuong hieu hang dau the gioi nhu Coca-Cola, Dove, Heineken,... va uoc mong mot ngay nao do duoc la mot phan cua nhung chien dich tam co, cham den cam xuc cua hang trieu nguoi?

Ban mo uoc buoc chan vao nganh Tiep thi & Truyen thong nhung van chua biet bat dau tu dau, can chuan bi nhung ki nang can thiet nao, va lam sao de but pha nhanh nhat ma khong mac phai nhung loi thuong gap? 

Ban viet hay, thiet ke gioi, hoac nam rat ro nhung khai niem can ban trong Marketing nhu 4P (Product, Price, Promotion, Place) va tu tin la minh phu hop. Nhung lieu nhung ki nang do va kien thuc tu sach vo da du dap ung yeu cau thuc tien cua khoi nganh nang dong doi hoi su doi moi khong ngung?

Hay yen tam, ban khong phai la ke don doc trong hanh trinh nay. Chung toi, nhung nguoi da tung xong pha hang chuc nam trong nganh Marketing & Communications, rat thau hieu nhung tran tro thuc te tren. Vi le do, nhung chuyen gia tu AIM Academy mong muon duoc chia se kinh nghiem, giup ban vuot qua nhung tro ngai ve mat tam ly va tu tin xay dung ke hoach nghe nghiep lau dai qua chuoi Hoi Thao Huong Nghiep CAREER COMPASS - Kim chi nam nghe nghiep Marketing & Communications.

✔ NGHE chia se nhung ki nang can thiet de dap ung yeu cau tuyen dung cua tung phan nganh trong cac Client - Agency hang dau.
✔ GIAI DAP thac mac, tu van huong nghiep tu kinh nghiem cua nhung chuyen gia dau nganh.

Co bao gio ban hoi la minh con co the lam gi tren Internet ngoai viec luot web, xem phim, chat va Facebook chua? Co bao gio ban tu nghi minh se lam mot thiet bi gi do co the dieu khien duoc tu xa khong? Va chac chan ban se ngac nhien khi biet rang dang co rat nhieu nguoi tren the gioi dang tao ra nhung thiet bi tuong tu nhu vay tu he thong tat mo den tu xa bang dien thoai, he thong canh bao chay qua Internet, v.v..
Va dieu ngac nhien hon nua la ban co the tao ra mot he thong quan sat nhiet do va do am o ngoi nha cua ban thong qua Internet va mot he thong co the gui mot tin nhan len mang xa hoi nhu Facebook, Twitter hoac la email chi bang cach bam nut. Trong hon 2 tieng chung toi se huong dan ban xay dung mot he thong nhu vay. Nhung do chi la khoi dau cho nhung thu tuyet voi hon ma ban se xay dung trong tuong lai vi ban chac chan co the lam duoc nhieu hon the.
Gia ve: 280K mua truoc ngay 24/11 va 320K mua sau ngay 24/11 tai Ticketbox
Nhung gi ban co the co duoc sau khi tham du khoa hoc "Tu tao nut bam khong day & quan sat nhiet do qua internet" cua chung toi la:
Co khai niem cu the hon ve Internet-of-Thing goi tat la IoT, mot khai niem dang la xu the cua thoi dai so
Biet them ve cac thiet bi phan cung, phan mem va cac cam bien
Tu xay dung duoc he thong #IoT co ban
Kha nang sang tao cho nhung du an tiep theo
Tat ca thiet bi phan cung se duoc cung cap va ban co the mang no ve nha sau khi ket thuc khoa hoc bao gom:
Mo dun phan cung ket noi Internet NodeMCU
Cam bien nhiet do & do am DHT11
Nut bam
Day cam USB
Hay dang ky tham du khoa hoc lan nay va tu tao cho minh mot he thong ket noi Internet co ban di nao. Chung toi tin ban co the lam nhung dieu con tuyet voi hon ban than ban nghi.
Day chi lan phan 1 cua chuoi khoa hoc ve IoT, Fablab Saigon se con tao ra nhieu khoa hoc nang cao trong thoi gian toi. Hy vong se nhan duoc su quan tam tu ban.

What started in 2006 on the shoulders of two Dutch ladies and 10 vendors, has become a vibrant community event over the years.

Chung ta se noi chuyen gi voi nhau? Ai do ma ta quen vua di phau thuat tham my ve? Hay cac chuong trinh truyen hinh thuc te dao gan day that te, khien ta khong thay mot chut hai long? Mot ngoi sao ca nhac noi tieng vua gap su co “dao duc” gi do? Hay chi don gian la nen day con theo phuong phap nao, cho con an dam kieu Nhat, kieu My hay kieu Do Thai thi moi la tot nhat? Nhung noi dung, cau chuyen ta van trao doi, tranh luan hang ngay, van tung len “phay” khi thi duoi dang nhung status day tu hao, man nguyen, luc lai tran ngap buc xuc tuong chung co the nho the ma cuu duoc ca nhan loai khoi lam lac, toi tam; nhung co khi nao ta lui lai mot vai buoc, tu van xem cac tranh cai, buc xuc ay co thuc su di ve dau va huu ich cho ai ngoai viec giai toa cac cam xuc ca nhan, de nhan ra mot dieu gi do, suy cho cung lai het suc gian don?

Thanh pho Ho Chi Minh, nhung ngay cuoi thang 11, nhan dip ra mat tuyen tap Buc xuc khong lam ta vo can cua tien si - tac gia Dang Hoang Giang, Nha Nam to chuc buoi giao luu gap go cung tac gia de ban doc cung chia se cach nhin, quan diem, cam xuc va thai do ung xu truoc cac van de, su kien, hien tuong trong cuoc song hien dai ngay nay. Ngoai tac gia Dang Hoang Giang, buoi giao luu con co su gop mat cua ba Ton Nu Thi Ninh voi vai tro dan dat chuong trinh.

Bitcoin Saigon community about to host the first “Bitfilm Festival” in Saigon at 28th of November 2015

The world's most renowned Bitcoin Film Festival is continuing its worldwide tour and is taking place for the first time in Ho Chi Minh City / Vietnam.

The Bitfilm Festival will take place at Officience (117B Nguyen Dinh Chinh, Phu Nhuan District, HCMC) on Saturday, November 28th – starting at noon and ending at approx. 10 PM.

It will be followed by online voting for the best film/ best “BitFilm” and a worldwide tour which includes screenings in Amsterdam, Budapest, London, Madrid, Barcelona, Luxemburg, Mexico, Buenos Aires, Ubud/Bali and San Francisco.

Free entry to the event for all who are curious about Bitcoin and Blockchain technology.

Sponsored by:

Asian Dermatoglyphics Research Center

Future.travel – Vietnams first Bitcoin accepting merchant

Bitcoin Vietnam Co., Ltd. - Vietnams first Bitcoin Exchange

Officience – Offsharing in Vietnam

Crewfire – Your Social Media, Amplified

Le Crespo - Italian Farmhouse Pizza... slow-cooking Ribs

VBTC Vietnam Co., Ltd. - Vietnams largest Bitcoin Trading Floor

Stib Labs – The Powerful Bits of Peers to Peers

Art Deco la track 7 trong album Honeymoon 2015 cua Lana Del Rey, ten goi mot truong phai nghe thuat va trang tri mang tinh triet trung duoc bat dau tai thanh pho Paris vao thap nien 1920 va phat trien ra toan the gioi trong thap nien 1930. Phong cach nay anh huong den moi linh vuc va hien tai van con nhieu kien truc mang dam net Art Deco o HN va thanh pho HCM. 

Phong cach Art Deco duoc nu hoang Lana Del Rey cua chung ta uu ai va khai thac triet de. Ai cung da tung xem The Great Gatsby va me man nhung buoi tiec tung thau dem mang dam khong khi Art Deco va MV Young and Beautiful dep sau lang den ngo ngang cua Lana se tap hop tai day, cung nhau tao nen mot dem tran ngap nhung Lanatics, nhung Gangsters, Lolita, cung nhau dress-up/suit-up, khieu vu, ca hat, va am nhac cua Lana day dac trong khong khi. (Cac ban co quyen the hien thoi trang rieng cua ban than, nhung se co qua tang cho cac ban dress-code gan voi truong phai sang trong Art Deco nhat nhe).
ART DECO –Lana Del Rey Party- la dem party dau tien ket hop truong phai Art Deco va am nhac cua Lana Del Rey. Chung toi, to chuc vi nhung fans Lana tren khap Sai Gon, nhung ban tre co chung niem yeu thich am nhac sau lang sadcore cua Queen of SaiGon Lana Del Rey.

Buoi party bao gom live music duoc the hien boi band nhac tuyen chon va nhung giong ca ban chuyen cua Thanh pho, voi dong nhac cua mot nu hoang doc ton: Lana Del Rey. Ngoai ra, dung voi tinh chat party suot dem dai, chung ta se cung vui choi voi nhung tro choi dam chat hoi he: do vui, thach thuc, ket hop cung dong doi, thi trang phuc an tuong… Va khong the thieu phan thuong danh cho nhung ca nhan noi bat – nhung bong hoa long lay nhat cua bua tiec: Vua va Nu hoang Da tiec.

Noi dung chuong trinh: 
16:00 - 18:00: mini flea market, shopping quan ao, trang suc va boi tarot nha!!!
18:30 - 22:00: bieu dien am nhac, do vui, tro choi dong doi, bau chon cho outfit dep nhat, chon ra King & Queen of the Night... tat ca cac tiet muc deu co qua rieng!!!

ace minh dang ky tham gia truoc ngay 24-11-2015 de ban dieu hanh co the chuan bi tot nhat nhe, Tot Dep! :)

La doanh nhan, viec thuong thuyet dien ra hang gio, hang ngay va de ky nang thuong thuyet do tro thanh nghe thuat mang tam quoc te thi han ca nhan moi nguoi luon luon phai hoc hoi, trau doi kien thuc, tich luy kinh nghiem von song va tham chi co doi khi phai “tra gia” de co duoc nhung bai hoc va trai nghiem quy bau tu thuc tien.
Nghe thuat thuong thuyet trong kinh doanh duoc biet den tu rat som tai cac quoc gia phat trien. O moi thoi dai nghe thuat thuong thuyet van luon giu vai tro quan trong va la yeu to quyet dinh chien thang trong cac “cuoc choi”.

Nghe thuat thuong thuyet co nhieu cach hieu khong don thuan chi la nghe thuat cua loi noi, cua cach noi ma sau sac hon do chinh la nghe thuat cua tri tue, cua tam nhin, cua tam hon, cua su thau hieu “Biet nguoi biet ta. Tram tran tram thang”.

La mot doanh nhan, viec thuong thuyet dien ra hang gio, hang ngay va de ky nang thuong thuyet do tro thanh nghe thuat mang tam quoc te thi han ca nhan moi nguoi luon luon phai hoc hoi, trau doi kien thuc, tich luy kinh nghiem von song va tham chi co doi khi phai “tra gia” de co duoc nhung bai hoc va trai nghiem quy bau tu thuc tien.

Moi nen van hoa, kinh te cua moi quoc gia khac nhau se tac dong va tao dung nen nhung tam hon va tai nang khac nhau. De dua nghe thuat thuong thuyet len tam quoc te truoc het chung ta phai am hieu nen van hoa cua dan toc minh. Dac biet trong nhung nam gan day gioi doanh nhan Viet Nam thuong truyen tay nhau cuon sach “Mot doi thuong thuyet” cua Giao su Phan Van Truong voi cau chuyen dan gian “Thang Bom” an chua trong do rat nhieu y nghia sau sac, qua lang kinh va trai nghiem cua minh Giao su da duc ket thanh mot tac pham dinh cao cua nghe thuat thuong thuyet.
Giao su Phan Van Truong – chuyen gia cao cap trong linh vuc dam phan quoc te. Nguyen co van Chinh phu Phap ve thuong mai quoc te. Nam 2007, ong duoc Tong thong Phap trao tang Huy Chuong Hiep Si Bac Dau Boi Tinh (Chevalier de la Legion d’Honneur). Nam 2009, duoc Chu tich nuoc Viet Nam trao tang Huy Chuong “vi Su Nghiep Giao Duc” tai Ha Noi.

Hon 40 nam song va lam viec o nuoc ngoai, Giao su Phan Van Truong tung giu nhieu cuong vi cao tai mot so cong ty lon nhu: Pho chu tich Alstom Power, Pho chu tich Alstom Transport (thuoc tap doan Alstom cua Phap) va co nhieu co hoi giao thiep, thuc hien cac cuoc dam phan khap nam chau. Trong hon 10 nam lam viec cho tap doan Alstom, ong tung dam phan ve du an xay bay nha may dien o Iran (1989), du an xay duong sat cao toc tai Han Quoc, du an xay metro Santiago Chili, du an xay metro Bangkok…Cuon sach “Mot doi thuong thuyet” dung voi cuoc doi va su nghiep cua ong. Voi phong cach binh di gan gui cung nhung cau chuyen, bai hoc di ra tu trai nghiem cua ong luon thu hut va khien nguoi nghe rung cam.

Giao su Phan Van Truong tung chia se: “Toi da tung dan doan di thuong thuyet, cung nhu da duoc du nhung cuoc thuong thuyet hao hung hoi con la ky su tre tuoi. 40 nam lam viec rong ruoi khap 5 Chau, toi duc ket cho minh mot bai hoc: nhung cuoc thuong thuyet thanh cong my man la khi doi ben co nhung nha lanh dao sac sao ap dung nhung chien thuat don gian, ngoi vao ban dam phan voi long chan that nhat va biet ro “phe minh” muon gi, “phe truoc mat” muon gi.

Ca hai ben deu hieu duoc ly do tai sao cung ngoi lai voi nhau, du “di guoc trong bung nhau” van giup nhau dat den muc dich toi hau. Tat nhien, toi khong phu nhan tren thuong truong da co nhung cuoc dam phan thanh cong nho manh khoe, chien thuat lat leo, nghi mot dang noi mot neo… Nhung kinh nghiem cho thay nhung cuoc dam phan trong tinh than doi tra nhau thuong keo dai vo ich, va hai ben kho di duong dai cung nhau”.

De thuc su thau hieu moi goc canh cua nghe thuat thuong thuyet danh cho tang lop doanh nhan, Cong dong Doanh nhan PTI to chuc chuong trinh Small talk tai Thanh pho Ho Chi Minh voi chu de: “Nghe thuat thuong thuyet quoc te danh cho Doanh nhan” voi su tham gia dien giang cua Giao su Phan Van Truong.

Ben canh nhung cau chuyen thu vi va y nghia ve nghe thuat thuong thuyet, gan lien voi doanh nhan con la nhung van de thoi su lien quan den nen kinh te Viet Nam va khu vuc hay nhung van de dang duoc quan tam cua Hiep dinh Doi tac Kinh te Chien luoc xuyen Thai Binh Duong TPP…tat ca se duoc Giao su Phan Van Truong chia se trong chuong trinh theo hai chu diem chinh:

Nghe thuat thuong thuyet quoc te danh cho Doanh nhan
TPP – Nhung anh huong truc tiep va gian tiep – thai do tich cuc can phai co
Small talk “Nghe thuat thuong thuyet quoc te danh cho Doanh nhan” voi Giao su Phan Van Truong chac chac se mang lai cho quy vi nhieu dieu huu ich, tang cuong tinh than va tri tue giup tang lop doanh nhan Viet Nam ngay cang thanh cong hon nua trong su nghiep cua minh.
Phi tham du: 1.000.000 VND/ ve (phi chi ap dung voi khach moi khong phai la thanh vien Cong dong doanh nhan PTI)

Quan nho thoi,  rong vua du de ban cam giac khong bi lac long, yen a vua du de ban cam giac binh yen sau nhung met moi doi thuong, va cung  nao nhiet vua du de ban cam giac duoc nang luong cua tuoi tre van con chay bong ben trong ban!

Chung toi muon tao mot cong dong lanh manh, de cac ban co nhung dia diem vui choi giai tri bo ich, la noi de cho ban co the thu gian cuoi tuan, de  giao luu, ket ban va  tro chuyen cung nhau.

1st Visual Art Playground in South-East Asia
{ Entry fee: 130,000 VND }

1 night of:
# AV Live Performances
# Indoor 3D Mapping 
# VJ clash
# Electronic Music DJ-Sets 

KaleidoSoup aims to be the biggest international meeting of VJs and visual performers in South-East Asia. 

35 Artists from all over the World (Argentina, Mexico, USA, UK, France, Poland, Italy, Australia, Japan, Taiwan, Indonesia, Philippines, Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Vietnam) will gather for sharing the same love for digital art and music .. all will be performed live!

Kaleidosoup shows the power of imagination. 
On saturday night, right after the meeting, from 9pm till late, the VJ Arena will be operative and its large screens will be turned on showcasing several AV performances and some indoor 3D video mapping. 
Soon after, a VJ Clash will blow minds and eyes away on the beats of the best electronic music producer in Saigon.

Visual performers are usually the most innovative professionals of the creative industry, and they are invited to share tricks, solutions, insights, projects, knowledge, wrapped up in performances to show and shine. 

This meeting is designed to celebrate innovative forms of performances and is an unmissable occasion for artists and creatives to get inspiration and watch something new. 

KaleidoSoup is produced by Pandora Studio in collaboration with L.A.V. a collective of visual and sound artists based in Ho Chi Minh City, well-founded by Antonio Rosciano (vj paki), Daniel Long (DDL) and Tung Le (Crazy Monkey) and completed by Julien Noyer and Nhan Do (Solid Machine).

Tro lai Sai Gon, Rodion, nguoi duoc menh danh la Roman Disco Don (Ga quy toc Disco den tu Rome) se choi dem dau tien tai The Observatory. 

Lan cuoi cung toi tham Sai Gon vao nam 2013, anh da khuay dong san nhay trong dem nhac EA va da cung co vi tri dang cap vuot troi cua minh trong long nhung nguoi yeu nhac cua thanh pho.

Nhung sang tac cua anh duoc xuat ban tai cac hang dia nhu Eskimo, Slowmotion, hang dia cua rieng anh Roccodisco va gan day nhat la Nein. Am nhac cua anh thuoc ve tuong lai, la su pha tron dam say cua disco dam chat ket hop voi nhung the loai nhac nhay doc dao nhu techno Mexico, synthesizer funk va nhieu am thanh khac danh cho san nhay vuot ngoai kha nang dien ta cua ngon ngu. 

Nhung buoi bieu dien cua anh chua dung nhung mien va khoang am thanh rong lon menh mong cua nhung the loai nhac hiem co cung bat re tu disco va bien the techno manh me, duoc anh lua chon qua nhieu nam dj tai nhung noi xa xoi luon ngap tran nhung bua tiec am nhac cua the gioi, khuay dong san nhay bang nhung lan song am thanh khien ban khong the ngung nhun nhay.

Hay chuan bi san sang de tham gia vao mot dem nhac soi dong tung bung.

Ho tro boi NIC FORD (Madder Modes, The Observatory) 

Chuong trinh bat dau luc 10PM/MIEN PHI truoc 11PM / 150.000VND sau 11PM

THONG TIN NGHE SI RODION Rodion den tu Rome. Am nhac ma anh sang tac phieu dieu bay bong va luon di truoc thoi gian. Do la thu am nhac nam lo lung nam giua chieu sau cua am nhac vu tru vung Nordic nam phia tay bac cua day Scandinavia va am nhac synthesizer funk cua nguoi Phap, hoa tron voi nhung giai dieu kich tinh trong nhung bo phim kinh di cua Y. Bi anh huong manh me boi nhung nha soan nhac phim nhu Morricone va Goblin, boi nhung ban nhac phim hoat hinh gia tuong khoa hoc cua Nhat vao nhung nam 70 va boi nhac co dien, van hoa san nhay techno va balearic (the loai nhac house xuat hien vao nhung nam 80 va pho bien vao giua nhung nam 90), Rodion tap trung hoan toan sang tac the loai am nhac thuoc ve vu tru.  

Rodion da choi live va Dj o nhieu cau lac bo danh tieng nhat the gioi, tu Mat-xco-va toi Paris, tu Berlin toi Istanbul, tu Mexico City toi New York, tu Thuong Hai toi Kuala Lumpur.Va khong som thi muon, anh se toi tham va choi nhac o mot cau lac bo gan noi ban o nhat…

Moi ban vao duong link sau:
soundcloud.com/rodion_gomma
http://www.residentadvisor.net/dj/rodion/

______________________ENGLISH_____________________

The Roman Disco Don is back in our city to play at The Observatory for the first time ever. 

The last time he visited HCMC in 2013, he blew the roof off the EADJ party and cemented himself a place in the upper echelons of whoever was there’s palace of party memories.

His productions on labels - such as Eskimo, Slowmotion, his own roccodisco and most recently Nein - are spaced-out futuristic blends of heavy disco mixed with other very danceable obscurities such as Mexican techno, synthesizer funk, and other varied, dance-focused sounds that simply escape description. 

His sets encompass vast plains and soundscapes of the same kind of disco-rooted, gritty techno-mutant rarities that he’s picked up through years of djing in far flung corners of the world, packing sound waves into the dance floor that are simply impossible not to get up and ride. 

Be prepared to dance.

Supported by NIC FORD (Madder Modes, The Observatory)

10PM / FREE before 11PM / 150K after

RODION BIO

Rodion is from Rome. He makes freaked out music that’s ahead of its time. Somewhere between the depths of Nordic cosmic music and the French synthesizer funk, mixed with the dramatic melodies of Italian horror movies. Heavily influenced by soundtrack composers such as Morricone and Goblin, by the Japanese science fiction animation soundtracks of the 70’s and by classical music, techno and balearic club culture, Rodion is fully tuned into the extraterrestrial beat.

Rodion played live and DJed in many of the best clubs around the world, from Moscow to Paris, from Berlin to Istanbul, from Mexico City to New York, Shanghai and Kuala Lumpur.

So expect him to sooner or later visit a ballroom close to your hometown...

soundcloud.com/rodion_gomma
http://www.residentadvisor.net/dj/rodion/

Khi nen kinh te con dang o trinh do thap thi suc manh ve nguon von tro thanh yeu to quan trong bac nhat mang den thanh cong cho doanh nghiep. Nhung trong nen kinh te hien dai, khi ma thi truong da bao hoa ve san pham thi su khac biet va thanh cong cua moi doanh nghiep lai nam o nhung nhan vien, nhung con nguoi trong to chuc.

Khi ma nhan su tro thanh yeu to tao ra su thanh cong cho to chuc thi viec tim kiem va su dung nhan su lai cang doi hoi phai kheo leo va nghe thuat hon nua. Viec nhan su chuyen tu cong ty nay sang cong ty khac, hay ho khong con cam thay muon cong hien cho doanh nghiep, cho to chuc dang ngay cang nhieu hon. Va van de la tai sao, cac doanh nghiep deu biet tam quan trong cua ho, deu biet viec ho chuyen dich sang doanh nghiep khac nhung van de viec do xay ra lien tuc? Dung truoc nhung van de do, Truong Dao tao Doanh nhan PTI da xay dung chuong trinh “Tuyen, dung, giu, sa thai nhan vien”voi mong muon giup cac doanh nghiep, nhung nha quan ly co the lua chon duoc nhung nhan su tot nhat cho minh va phat huy duoc nang luc cua nhan vien mot cach toi da, dem lai nhung thanh cong cho doanh nghiep.

NOI DUNG CHUONG TRINH
Quy trinh tuyen dung
Nhung bai tuyen dung co ban cua mot CPO
Nghe thuat giu chan nhan tai
Nghe thuat duy tri nhan vien de dam bao muc tieu cua to chuc.
Phat trien nhung nhan vien tai nang
Cac yeu to anh huong den viec tuyen dung & duy tri nhan vien
Cac giai phap sa thai nhan su
Thanh cong tu nhung that bai

- Duy tri & su dung dung doi tuong nhan su theo chi tieu va ke hoach phat trien cua mot to chuc Doanh nghiep

SMARTCOM HCMC xin gui loi chao than thiet toi cac ban hoc tieng Anh tai TP HCM. Sau chuoi cac chuong trinh chia se ky nang hoc tieng Anh thong minh cua Thay giao Nguyen Anh Duc, CEO SMARTCOM VIET NAM, tai TP HCM thang 10/2015 va nhan duoc su huong ung nhiet liet cua hon 5000 sinh vien, hoc sinh va nguoi di lam. Tuan cuoi thang 11/2015, thay giao Nguyen Anh Duc tiep tuc thoi mot lan gio moi ve phuong phap hoc tieng Anh dac biet hieu qua cua Smartcom toi cac ban hoc tieng Anh tai TP HCM (hoan toan mien phi) voi chuong trinh 5 BUOC KHOA HOC DE KICH HOAT CO CHE NOI TIENG ANH TU DONG voi noi dung nhu sau:
 * Ky thuat Hoi - Dap Tich Cuc voi viec giai ma 5 mo hinh cau hoi va 16 kha nang hoi dap. Va chung ta se cung thuc hanh tai cho mo hinh cau hoi ECHO QUESTIONS cung voi 2 kha nang hoi dap AGREEING & DISAGREEING de thay ban co the giao tiep tieng Anh mot cach tu dong va hao hung nhu the nao.
 * Ky thuat "NAP" cum tu bang am thanh theo phuong phap Do Thai: thuoc sau & dung duoc ngay 20 CUM TU trong 10 phut. Ban se lam duoc dieu nay ngay tai buoi dao tao cua toi.
*  Ky thuat tu duy tieng Anh tren 5 dau ngon tay de co the dien dat bat cu y tuong nao cua ban bang tieng Anh mot cach tu nhien.
 * Luyen am chuan giong My bang cac quy luat am thanh logic de co the phan doan hau het cac kha nang phat am va bien doi am cua tu vung, cum tu, va cau. Ban se nam bat duoc quy luat logic de noi tieng Anh voi ngu dieu chuan va khoa hoc ngay tai hoi thao. 
 * Cong nghe hoc tieng Anh tich hop (Hybrid Learning) giup ban tiet kiem thoi gian va tang gap 3 lan hieu qua hoc. No giup ban hinh thanh va cai dat thoi quen su dung tieng Anh on dinh hang ngay.
  * 5 buoc KHOA HOC va toan dien de su dung cong cu hoc ky dieu va rat vui ve la PHIM va Video de thuc hanh va kich hoat co che noi tieng Anh tu dong hang ngay.
Cac ban lua chon thoi gian & dia diem de dang ky tham gia :https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1tqqnLgq2S29WsHVQ0JRdApRL8WaIfOTXZRbxS3IHMaI/viewform

Va cuoc thi IAE lan dau tien duoc to chuc da hoan thanh su menh mang den cho sinh vien dam me Tai chinh – Chung khoan  tren toan TPHCM  voi su tham gia cua nhieu truong dai hoc danh tieng khac nhu FTU, UEL, BUH,..... co hoi duoc khang dinh chinh minh qua 2 vong thi gay can.
Bang tai tri va no luc, 3 doi xuat sac nhat da vuot qua hang ngan doi thu de tham du vong thi chung ket I – EXPERT cua cuoc thi IAE 
Ban co muon cung cac doi thi chia se va lan toa niem dam me chinh phuc nhung dinh cao trong linh vuc Kinh te - Tai chinh hay dau tu Chung khoan? Hay den voi I – EXPERT – Dem thi duoc mong cho nhat voi nhung ai quan tam linh vuc nay.
Hay cung trai nghiem mot dem bung no voi cuoc tranh tai day kich tinh va thu vi cua 3 doi thi voi su tu tin, ban linh, nhiet huyet, dam me va tai nang. Mot dem thi hoi tu nhieu cam xuc dang nho va nhung kien thuc khong the bo qua.
Khong nhung the den voi dem chung ket cac ban con duoc nhieu phan qua hap dan khac, hay cung don xem nhe wink emoticon

:::Who we are:::
We're a group of people from a variety of different countries that meet once a week to chat, meet new people and practice speaking languages.

:::How it Works:::

We have little flag stickers from over 100 countries / regions. The first flag is your native language and goes at the top. The rest follow in order or ability. It's open to all nationalities and languages and you can talk about anything you like. You don´t have to be an advanced speaker, or even speak a second language - its for all levels!

:::Our spot:::

Our events are free for participants, and always will be. When you arrive just ask at the bar or look for the table with the flags. If you’re shy, send a message to us first and feel free to ask for any information.

The Reception and Drink Specials 7 - 9pm 

See you on Tuesday!

Nhom nhac mang toi am nhac va cac nghe si tai nang nhat cho khan gia cua Singapore quay tro lai The Obs lan thu ba, hua hen se cong hien mot dem nhac loi cuon khong ngung nghi cho nhung nguoi yeu nhac tai Sai Gon. Dem nhac cua MUGIC da noi tieng qua nhieu nam voi nhung bua tiec am nhac da dang, phong phu, co suc thuyet phuc manh me doi voi nhung trai tim yeu nhac tren the gioi.

Mugic da to chuc nhung dem nhac thanh cong o thanh pho que huong ho va toi phia nam trong hon 7 nam, loi keo mot so luong lon nguoi ham mo yeu nhac toi nhung buoi bieu dien cua ho de thuong thuc su ket hop giua thai do bieu dien vo cung thu gian voi su tap trung cao do vao chat luong cua nhung ban nhac nhay duoc lua chon ki luong da dang - tu jazz funk va afrobeat hiem cho den tat ca cac the loai nhac house va techno tinh te manh me tuyet voi nhat. 

Nhom nhac da moi nhung nghe si nhu Levon Vincent & Jus Ed, Anthony Shake Shakir, Aardvark va Kay Suzuki toi choi trong nhung chuong trinh cua ho, va tro nen noi tieng vi he thong nhung thiet bi am thanh ma ho mang theo khi toi tat ca nhung dia diem bieu dien, va qua thuc nhung noi do da phai rat dung cam khi moi Mugic toi choi nhac. Mac du voi danh tieng la mot nhom nhac day kinh nghiem va xuat sac dung hang dau ve chat luong am nhac underground trong thanh pho, Mugic luon duy tri nhat quan muc tieu khiem ton cua minh la mang toi nhung bua tiec am nhac voi khong khi thu gian, coi mo va than thien. Khau hieu cua ho la ‘Den la nguoi la, ra ve la ban be’, mot thai do hoan toan hop voi phong cach rieng cua The Observatory. 

Moi ban den tha minh trong am nhac cung Mugic. 

Chuong trinh bat dau luc 10PM / Mien phi truoc 11PM/ 150.000VND sau 11PM

______________________ENGLISH_____________________

The sound system responsible for providing some of the most high-calibre music and artists to the people of Singapore is back at The Obs for the third time, guaranteeing a night of continuous audio magic flow that has been honed through years of playing together as a diverse and potent party unit. 

Mugic Soundsystem has been putting on nights in the city state to the south for over 7 years, developing a following of like-minded party-enthusiasts that head to their shows to enjoy their combination of a relaxed attitude with a dead-serious focus on quality, eclectic dance music - from rare jazz funk and afrobeat to all sorts of delicious house and ruff and tuff techno. 

They have hosted artists such as Levon Vincent & Jus Ed, Anthony Shake Shakir, Aardvark and Kay Suzuki, and became notorious for the massive sound system they lugged around to all of the venues that were brave enough to host them. Despite their hi-profile credentials as some of the prime-purveyors of quality underground music in the city, they have kept true to their humble goal of promoting a laid-back, open and always-welcoming atmosphere and approach to their parties. Their motto is ‘Come as strangers, leave as friends”; an attitude that blends seamlessly with The Observatory’s own. 

Time for some Mugic tricks. 

10PM / FREE before 11PM / 150k after

La mot doanh nghiep hoat dong nhieu nam trong linh vuc cung cap cac giai phap phan mem quan tri cho doanh nghiep, Cong ty phan mem Vietsoft hieu rang mot giai phap phan mem hieu qua voi dich vu trien khai tot la nhung yeu to can nhung chua du de dam bao su thanh cong cho khach hang cua minh.

Ben canh do, Dao tao chuyen mon va ky nang van hanh moi la chia khoa dam bao su thanh cong lau dai cua cua mot du an trien khai, cung la buoc quan trong de khach hang cua Vietsoft chinh thuc lam chu cong nghe va ung dung hieu qua vao hoat dong san xuat kinh doanh.

Do do, cong tac Dao Tao luon duoc chung toi chu trong dau tu, cai tien khong ngung nham dem lai cho khach hang va nhung doanh nghiep quan tam den san pham nhung kien thuc nen tang giup nguoi dung hieu duoc nguyen ly hoat dong va cac tai nguyen thong tin trong he thong. Tu do kiem soat mot cach hieu qua nhat voi he thong phan mem, dam bao he thong luon sinh ra loi ich cho nha dau tu, gia tang muc do hieu qua khai thac he thong.
Buoi cong chieu ra mat phim dien anh Hung ALi voi Bao Chi cung Khach Moi dac biet.

Mot nhan vat huyen thoai trong nen am nhac dien tu quoc te, nguoi da cong hien mot trong nhung dem nhac xuat sac nhat tai The Observatory, ALEX FROM TOKYO se quay tro lai de choi buoi dau tien tai dia diem moi cua The Observatory. 

Alex From Tokyo la mot trong nhung DJ va nha san xuat am nhac ma tai nang duoc ket hop boi ba yeu to: tinh sang tao va tai nang bam sinh, ki nang va kinh nghiem. Khi choi nhac, anh dua khan gia vao mot chuyen phieu luu di xuyen qua va dam minh trong nhung dong chay am thanh ao at do xuong nhu thac nuoc voi mot su lich thiep tao nha va dan nguoi nghe di qua nhung khu rung nhiet doi cua nhung am thanh hiem co toa ra nguon nang luong day suc song manh me. Hieu biet cua anh ve/va moi quan he voi am nhac that su sau sac va uyen tham, va khan gia co the cam nhan ngay lap tuc tren san nhay. 

Dem nhac hua hen se mang lai nhung phut giay vui ve thang hoa va de lai nhung an tuong sau dam trong long khan gia.

Chuong trinh bat dau luc 10PM / Mien phi truoc 11PM/ 150.000VND sau 11PM

THONG TIN VE ALEX FROM TOKYO

Sinh ra tai Paris, lon len o Tokyo va hien dang lam viec tai New York, Alex From Tokyo la mot DJ quoc te nguoi Phap choi nhac o nhieu the loai da dang, anh cung dong thoi la mot nha san xuat am nhac va dieu phoi quoc te.

Song o Tokyo hon 20 nam ke tu khi la mot cau be con, anh da phat trien tro thanh mot trong nhung DJ tai nang nhat o Tokyo va cung la mot nhan vat chu chot ket noi giua the gioi va Nhat Ban (la dai dien cua F Communications Japan, Mr.Bongo/Disorient Japan, nha dieu phoi du an Yellow Productions/Bossa Tres Jazz…)

Tu nam 2004 den nay, anh lam viec tai New York. Alex da bieu dien thuong xuyen tren khap the gioi tai Nhat Ban, Chau A, New York va Chau Au. Alex van quay lai Tokyo hai thang mot lan de tiep tuc cong viec anh da lam trong 13 nam khi con song o do la choi nhac tai bua tiec am nhac chieu Thu Bay “Gallery” va bua tiec Timwarp cua anh tai cau lac bo Eleven (von da tung la noi cau lac bo Yellow hoat dong) va luu dien khap nuoc Nhat. 

Tai New York, anh choi nhac deu dan tai Club Cielo, La Bain (khach san Standard), tai Bellwether (Williamsburg, Brooklyn) voi DJ Nature cho dem nhac hang thang moi duoc to chuc cua ho “Sound Proof” va o mot so dia diem trong thanh pho nhu Santos Party House, Nublu and Submercer.

Alex da va dang rat nang dong trong viec san xuat am nhac duoi cai ten Tokyo Black Star voi nguoi cong su Isao Kumano, xuat ban nhung ban nhac goc tren hang dia Innervisions tai Berlin, dong thoi tren hang dia lien doanh Reincarnation cua nha tien phong nguoi Y Slam Jam, va tren hang dia nhac house cua DJ Deep. Tokyo Black Star da sang tac nhung ban remix cho cac hang dia nhu Flower Records, Yellow Productions, Frikyiwa, Bassmental, Disorient, voi nhung ban remix gan day nhu "Birds" cua Kuniyuki (Mule Musiq), "Sketches of NY" cua dan nhac Nublu (Nublu), "Home" cua Bing Ji ling (Lovemonk), "Coffee is ecstasy" cua Master H va Greg Oreck (Komplex De Deep), "Heritage" cua Arno E Matthieu (Clima Records) va "Reflections" cua Filipson+Lindblad (Mood Music). Vao mua he nam 2008, Tokyo Black Star da hop tac voi hang dia Duc Great Stuff trong album tong hop Olympic "Summer Games" voi ban nhac "Japan".

Ben canh viec choi nhac tai cac cau lac bo, gan day Alex da tham gia vao cong viec dieu phoi am nhac, dong thoi tu van va san xuat am nhac cho cac hang thoi trang nhu Y-3 va Louis Vuitton, va anh da duoc moi bieu dien trong bua tiec chinh thuc cua hoi tro nghe thuat noi tieng the gioi ART BASEL vao thang Sau nam 2007. Thang Chin nam 2006, anh dich tu tieng Phap sang Tieng Nhat xuat ban bang Tieng Nhat cuon sach "Electrochoc" cua Laurent Garnier. Trong thang Hai nam 2008, Alex da xuat ban CD thu 5 gom cac ban mix (mix CD) cua anh tai Nhat cho loat ban mix DJ "mi mix" phat hanh boi hang dia Octave Lab tai Nhat. Thang Hai nam 2009, Reincarnation da phat hanh nhan hieu chinh thuc tren mix CD "Dj Alex from Tokyo gioi thieu "Reincarnation" -  The Flashback mix".

Thang Tu nam 2009, Tokyo Black Star phat hanh album dau tay "Black Ships" tren Innervisions – album duoc cho doi kha lau boi nhung nguoi ham mo, va ho da luu dien live va DJ khap Chau Au va Chau A vao mua thu nam 2009. Tokyo Black Star da phoi lai ban nhac "Come into the light" cua Wagon Cookin (OM Records) va "Blizzard" trong EP moi cua Mezza Luna vs Felix Cage (Electronical Reeds) vao thang Mot nam 2011. Tokyo Black Star da phat hanh EP gan day nhat "Slam Jam" tren Reincarnation vao thang Chin nam 2011 va ho vua phoi lai ban kiet tac cho tam hon "Neurotic Behavior" cua Carl Craig danh cho le ki niem 20 nam cua hang dia Planet E.

Phat hanh sau do cua Tokyo Black Star "Together EP" tren hang dia Nhat Ban Tokyo House Underground/New World da duoc ra mat tren mang vao thang Nam nam 2012.

Vao mua xuan nam 2010 tai Nhat, Alex cung da bat dau hop tac voi Isao Kumano va 3 chuyen gia ve am thanh hang dau cua Nhat trong viec thanh lap hang thu am mang tinh “cach mang” moi duoc goi la Phonon (www.phonon-inc.com), dai dien cho hang hoat dong ngoai Nhat Ban.

Alex from Tokyo (Tokyo Black Star, Innervisions, World Famous NYC)

website: www.alexfromtokyo.comblog: http://alexfromtokyo.sakura.ne.jp/blog/http://www.mixcloud.com/alexfromtokyo/

______________________ENGLISH_____________________

A legendary figure in the international electronic music circuit who played one of the most incredible performances The Observatory has ever witnessed - ALEX FROM TOKYO is returning for his first set ever at the new venue. 

Alex From Tokyo is one of those rare breeds of DJ and producer that sits at the apex of the triangle of originality, skill and experience. He takes his audiences on a journey through and within flows of sound that cascade with an elegance and direction through vibrant jungles of rare sonic energy. His understanding of and relationship to music is deep and profound, and it can be felt immediately on the dance floor. 

This night will be something to behold, enjoy and remember. Don’t miss it. 

Supported by HIBIYA LINE (The Observatory)

10PM / free before 11PM / 150K after

ALEX FROM TOKYO BIO

Paris born, Tokyo raised NYC based international eclectic french DJ, producer and international co-ordinator.

Having lived in Tokyo more than 20 years since he was a kid, he has developed into one of the strongest crossover DJ's in Tokyo and also became a key person connecting the world and Japan (F Communications Japan representative, Mr.Bongo/Disorient Japan, Yellow Productions/Bossa Tres Jazz project co-ordinator etc.).

Now based in New York from 2004. Alex has been playing regularly all around the world in Japan, Asia, New York and Europe. Alex still travels back to Tokyo every 2 months to continue his 13 year residency at the Sunday afternoon party "Gallery", his Timewarp party at club eleven (where club Yellow used to be) and tour throughout Japan.

In NYC he regularly plays these days at Club Cielo, Le Bain (at the Standard Hotel), bellwether (Williamsburg, Brooklyn) with Dj Nature for their new monthly "Sound Proof" and in downtown venues like Santos Party House, nublu and submercer.

Alex has been also active producing music under the name Tokyo Black Star with his partner Isao Kumano, releasing original material on the Berlin based label Innervisions, as well as on the joint label Reincarnation by italian tastemakers Slam Jam, and on DJ Deep's deeply rooted house music records label. Tokyo Black Star have done remixes for labels such as Flower Records, Yellow Productions, Frikyiwa, Bassmental, Disorient, with recent remixes as Kuniyuki "Birds" (mule musiq), nublu orchestra "Sketches of NY" (nublu), Bing Ji ling "Home" (Lovemonk), Master H and Greg Oreck "Coffee is ecstasy" (komplex de deep), Arno E Matthieu "Heritage" (clima records) and Filipson+Lindblad "Reflections" (mood music). Tokyo Black Star collaborated in summer 2008 on the german Great Stuff's label "Summer Games" Olympic compilation with the track "Japan".

Besides the club scene, Alex has been recently doing some music co-ordination, consulting and production work in fashion for brands like Y-3 and Louis Vuitton, and he has been invited to play at the official party of the world famous art fair ART BASEL in June 2007. September 2006 saw the Japanese release of Laurent Garnier's book "Electrochoc", which Alex translated from French to Japanese. Alex released in February 2008 his 5th mix CD in Japan for the DJ mix series "mi mix" on the Octave Lab label in Japan. In February 2009, Reincarnation released the official label mix CD "Dj Alex from Tokyo presents "Reincarnation" -The Flashback mix-".

Tokyo Black Star released in April 2009 their first long-awaited Tokyo Black Star debut album "Black Ships" on Innervisions, and they toured live and DJ in the Fall 2009 in Europe and in Asia. Tokyo Black Star remixed Wagon Cookin "Come into the light" (om records) and Mezza Luna vs Felix Cage new EP "Blizzard" (electronical reeds) in January 2011. Tokyo Black Star released their latest EP "Slam Jam" on Reincarnation in September 2011 and they have just remixed Carl Craig's Psyche masterpiece "Neurotic Behavior" for the 20th anniversary of the Planet E label. 

Tokyo Black Star's next release "Together EP" on the japanese label Tokyo House Underground/New Worldwill be out digitally in May 2012.

Alex started also in Spring 2010 in Japan with Isao Kumano and 3 top professional japanese audiophiles a new "revolutionary" audio brand called phonon (www.phonon-inc.com) representating the brand outside Japan.

Alex from Tokyo

Tai chinh hoan toan khac voi ke toan. Hon nua, tai chinh cung hien nhien la moi quan tam hang dau cua Sep. Tuy nhien, khac voi “dan” tai chinh ke toan phai hoc tai chinh trong nhieu nam, Sep chi can hoc tai chinh trong 2 tuan la du. Boi vi cong viec cua Sep khac voi cong viec cua “dan” tai chinh.

Cac mang chuc nang nhu hanh chinh, nhan su, kinh doanh, san xuat,… doi khi nguoi ta co the quan ly theo cam tinh. Tuy nhien, mang tai chinh va mang ke toan la 2 mang co tinh chuyen nganh, chuyen sau rat cao. Do vay, khong the co su hieu biet day du va chinh xac ve tai chinh va ke toan, cung nhu khong the quan ly tai chinh va ke toan tot neu khong hoc ve tai chinh va ke toan.

Tuy nhien, tai chinh va ke toan lai la 2 mang rat khac nhau, cho nen viec hoc tai chinh va viec hoc ke toan cung khac nhau.

Hon nua, khong chi co su khac biet giua tai chinh va ke toan, ma con su khac biet rat lon giua Tai chinh danh cho “dan” tai chinh (Finance for Finance Managers) va Tai chinh danh cho Sep (Finance for Non-Finance Managers).

Su khac biet do la, thay vi phai mat nhieu nam nhu “dan” tai chinh, Sep chi can bo ra 2 tuan de co the linh hoi duoc nhung kien thuc cot loi nhat ve tai chinh va quan tri tai chinh ma mot nguoi Sep can phai biet.

Cong chieu mien phi 20 phim Viet Nam

Vua moi ra rap duoc mot thang va “thang lon” ve du luan cung nhu doanh thu, bo phim Toi thay hoa vang tren co xanh chinh thuc co ten trong 20 bo phim duoc tuyen chon trong hang muc phim du thi cua LHP Viet Nam lan thu 19 dien ra tai TP.HCM.

Diem dang chu y nua la ben canh phim Toi thay hoa vang tren co xanh, hang muc nay con co nhieu phim dang quan tam nhu Nguoi tro ve, Dap canh giua khong trung, Scandal - Hao quang tro lai, Quyen, Huong Ga, Trung so...

Tham chi co nhung phim vua moi ra rap nhu phim My nhan hoac duoc cong chieu lan dau nhu phim Cuoc doi cua Yen.

Cung giong nhu hai ky lien hoan truoc, 20 phim truyen nay se duoc ban to chuc cong chieu mien phi tai Ha Noi (chieu 12 phim tai Trung tam Chieu phim quoc gia 87 Lang Ha) va Da Nang (chieu 8 phim tai rap chieu bong Le Do, 46 Tran Phu) trong tuan phim chao mung lien hoan vao cac khung gio vang 18g hoac 20g, tu ngay 18 den 24-11.

Con tai TP.HCM, trong nam ngay dien ra lien hoan (tu ngay 1 den 5-12) ngoai cac phim truyen o hang muc du thi, khan gia con thuong thuc mien phi cac phim trong hang muc toan canh tai bon cum rap BHD (duong 3 Thang 2, quan 10), CGV Hung Vuong (quan 5), Galaxy Nguyen Du (quan 1), Mega GS Cao Thang (quan 3).

Theo ban to chuc, ve moi trong tuan phim chao mung cung nhu tai lien hoan duoc phat ngay o dia diem chieu phim tu 1-2 ngay truoc khi moi bo phim duoc trinh chieu. Moi suat chieu, khan gia co co hoi giao luu voi doan lam phim truoc hoac sau khi buoi chieu ket thuc.

Dong thoi khan gia duoc moi tham gia binh chon phim bang hinh thuc bo phieu cho giai phim duoc khan gia yeu thich nhat - lan dau tien duoc trao tai Lien hoan phim Viet Nam lan thu 19

Tieng Viet ben duoi 

Stencil paintings by TOM SMITH - 11th December – 10th January 2016 @ deciBel 

As a painter and printmaker I wanted to integrate two mediums into this project, paint and stencil spraying. 
Graffiti stenciling creates fast, striking, repeatable images.
With my stencil prints I want to express the beauty of the medium by using some of the pictures I’ve taken around Asia.
The images are touching, iconic scenes from Vietnam, the Philippines, Laos and Malaysia. 

Regarding the title for the exhibition‘SE4’? = 4 countries in the South East.

Tom Smith:Bio
•	Was born in Belfast, Northern Ireland
•	B.A. Fine Art at Shelly Park and The Arts Institute at Bournemouth, Dorset, England
•	Was a founder member of Contemporary-art Collective ‘The Artworks’ in 2004, Poole, Dorset, England.

Exhibitions - 
•	Numerous group shows in London and South West England
•	 Solo exhibitions in Dorset and London 
•	Moved to Asia in 2007 and is currently living in HCMC, Vietnam

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tranh Stencil boi TOM SMITH. 

La mot hoa si va printmaker toi muon tich hop hai phuong tien vao du an, son va stencil phun.
Stenciling Graffiti tao ra nhanh chong, an tuong, hinh anh lap lai.
Voi ban in stencil cua toi, toi muon the hien ve dep cua moi truong bang cach su dung mot so hinh anh toi da chup duoc khap chau A.
Cac hinh anh cam dong, nhung canh tuong tu Viet Nam, Philippines, Lao va Malaysia.

Y nghia ten trien lam 'SE4 '? = 4 quoc gia o Dong Nam.

Tom Smith: Bio
• Duoc sinh ra o Belfast, Bac Ai-len
• B.A cua mau tu Fine Art o Shelly Park va Vien Nghe thuat tai Bournemouth, Dorset, Anh
• La mot thanh vien sang lap cua nghe thuat duong dai - "'Cac tac pham nghe thuat " vao nam 2004, Poole, Dorset, Anh.

Trien lam:
• Nhieu trien lam nhom tai London va Tay Nam nuoc Anh
• Trien lam Solo o Dorset va London
• Da chuyen den chau A vao nam 2007 va hien dang song tai TP Ho Chi Minh, Viet Nam

Coming from UK, the singer - songwrite Billy Page is coming to Vietnam and Saigon Outcast will have the pleasure to host him!

Billy page began his musical career with a singing role in a musical production for the BBC, followed by major parts in musical theatre. He has gained extensive experience touring in Europe and making numerous television & radio appearances. In OCT 2005 he was one of the 14 musicians that broke the Guinness world record for the WORLDS HIGHEST GIG raising £30,000 for the nepal Balbalika trust charity www.music4children.org . More recently, he has spent several months touring in Asia. With several CD albums and radio airplay to his credit, he has evolved into a writer and performer of perspective and thoughtful songs. Having had rave reviews in magazines like Hi Fi choice Billy promises to be a force to be reckoned with in the future. 

http://www.billypage.com/   
www.myspace.com/billypageuk

Ban da bao gio tu minh dat nhung cau hoi nhu: 
Lieu uong ca phe co tot cho suc khoe?
Ca phe co keo dai tuoi tho cua ta?
Nguon goc ca phe la gi?
Ai la nhung nguoi phat hien ra loai do uong nay?
 
Ban mong muon so huu nhung cong thuc pha ca phe dac biet tot cho suc khoe: Ca phe Chanh voi cong dung chong met moi, Ca phe mat ong ngot ngao , Ca phe hat dieu danh cho nhung nguoi muon thuong thuc huong vi thom ngay mui huong,...
 
Hay den tham gia su kien hoc pha che ca phe tot cho suc khoe cung chung toi: "Coffee and Health" giai dap duoc thac mac cua ban than va mang ve nhung cong thuc pha che tuyet voi. 
                                   
Ban hay thay doi ke hoach cuoi tuan cua ban bang cach dang ki tham gia ngay su kien vui ve, huu ich va thu vi cung chung toi vi so luong ve tham du co gioi han (15 ve)

“Nhieu quan niem cho rang Giam doc nhan su chi la nguoi thua hanh menh lenh Ban giam doc, hay giam doc nhan su la nguoi gay phien toai, can thiep vao cac bo phan khac. Trong ba chan kieng cua mot he thong to chuc, ngoai von, chien luoc – Nhan su la mot trong nhung nguon luc chinh. Vay vai tro cua Giam doc nhan su nen duoc nhin nhan chuan muc nhu the nao"?

O cap do 1, cong tac nhan su chi don thuan la xu ly cac su vu hanh chinh: xep lich, cham cong, giai quyet tranh chap nho. O cap do 2, Cong tac nhan su duoc chuyen mon hoa. Bo phan nhan su tham gia vao viec len ke hoach Dao tao, gop tieng noi vao su thang tien va sa thai nhan vien. Tuy nhien, nhung nhiem vu do phu thuoc vao quan diem va chien luoc cua ban giam doc. O cap do 3, Bo phan nhan su dong vai tro vi tri chien luoc. Trong do Giam doc nhan su duoc xem nhu doi tac cua ban lanh dao. Giam doc nhan su la nha tu van va vach ra chien luoc phat trien nguon nhan luc cong ty theo don dat hang tu ban giam doc. Ho hoat dong doc lap va binh dang voi ban giam doc.

Giam doc nhan su: Mot chuyen gia tam ly – la nguoi biet lang nghe, thau hieu y kien cac phong ban. Khi biet duoc tam tu nguyen vong cua ho thi can truyen dat ro rang muc tieu, su menh, chien luoc cua cong ty toi toan bo he thong. Giam doc nhan su: Nguoi truyen tin hieu qua - khong ap dat nhung quy dinh, truyen dat nhung thong diep ro rang tu ban lanh dao de cac thanh vien vui ve thuc thi nhung quy dinh ay. Giam doc nhan su: Nguoi hoach dinh chien luoc – la nguoi co kha nang cung ban giam doc dua ra chien luoc phat trien nguon nhan luc. Tham chi Giam doc nhan su co the du doan duoc xu the phat trien cua nguon nhan luc va co ke hoach ung pho. Cac chuyen gia cua PTI da day cong nghien cuu, thiet ke va bien soan chuong trinh Dao tao “CHRO – Giam doc nhan su chuyen nghiep” voi mong muon cac cong ty/ cac to chuc luon co doi ngu nhan su manh va chinh sach nguon nhan luc hieu qua. Dieu nay chac chan se giup Doanh nghiep chung ta phat trien o mot dang cap moi”.

Nam 2013, La Grande Sophie tung duoc moi den Viet nam trong khuon kho nam Phap tai Viet Nam, du khong the bieu dien theo nhu du kien nhung Ha Noi da de lai dau an dep sau sac trong long co, va tro thanh ten mot bai hat moi cua co sang tac cho album phat hanh tai Phap mua thu nam 2015.

Va dung nhu loi hua, guong mat sang gia cua lang nhac pop-rock Phap La Grande Sophie sap tro lai Viet Nam. Tai TP Ho Chi Minh, vao ngay 11/12/2015, co se bieu dien tai san khau Cargo bar cung voi nghe si khach moi Le Cat Trong Ly.
Mot buoi dien khong the bo lo !
https://ticketbox.vn/event/la-grande-sophie-53922#

***
Invitee en 2013 pour les celebrations de l’Annee France-Vietnam, La Grande Sophie n’avait pu donner le concert prevu. Hanoi l’a pourtant marquee, puisqu’elle en a fait le titre d’une de ses nouvelles chansons, dans son album qui sortira en France a l’automne 2015.

Et comme elle avait promis, cette figure marquante de la chanson francaise pop-rock, reviendra bientot au Vietnam. A Hochiminh Ville, elle retrouvera sur la scene de Cargo bar, le 11 decembre, sa complice Le Cat Trong Ly pour des duos memorables, et donc a ne manquer sous aucun pretexte!

Outcast´s Farmers Market is coming back for our CHRISTMAS EDITION! 

Become a Vendor: http://goo.gl/forms/0OWSQjPt39

During the holiday season, we all enjoy the time with family and friends to relax and reminisce about the year past. Food and music are integral parts of our collective celebrations. So, in the spirit of the season, Saigon Outcast will hold the wildly popular Farmers Market on Sunday, December 13th. 

	The market is a family wide affair, including crafts for the young ones, live music for the old ones, and the same great beverages available for all you adults out there. 

	But, not to stop at the great entertainment available, Saigon Outcast has organized some of the tastiest treats and freshest produce available in Vietnam.

	50 stalls of fantastic home-made and organic products, from the 100% pure and natural honey of our sponsor Golden Bee, the freshest veggies from Da Lat courtesy of 4p’s Box delivery service, to Stone Hill Farms wide selection of Cocoa based beauty products, surely there will be something for every small elf to Santa Claus look-a-like. 

	Be sure to get there early as the freshest of the fresh will be grabbed for early Christmas shopping. But don’t worry as Saigon Outcast has arranged for great live music to keep you satisfied right up to dinner. 

	The well-heeled traditional band from Brittany, Gwennili will be playing from 4 to 6pm, with amazing covers of famous songs, while adding their own unique style to help you relax in the late day heat. 

	Into the evening, Zimbabwean sensation Stewart Gatsi will be lifting the energy with his soulful songs and acoustic rock style. 

	With so many amazing healthy organic products all in one place, for the low entry fee of 20,000 VND, this will be a great sunday at your favourite Saigon hangout spot.

Ghi chep chuyen di...

Tu Sai Gon, chung toi-4 thanh vien cua Y Tam miet mai chay 2 chiec xe gan may xuyen suot 6 gio dong ho de ve khao sat thuc te, tham ba con tai Ap  Phuong Thanh,  Xa Phuong Phu , Huyen Phung Hiep, Tinh Hau Giang.

O vung dat nay, viec di lai con gap nhieu kho khan, co luc chung toi phai bo xe gan may tren bo de di bang xuong ghe. Cung nho vay, chung toi moi co dip thi sat nhung cay cu ky cau nam vat veo tren song, vua chong chenh, vua thieu an toan.

Anh mat chung toi chot sung lai truoc hinh anh mot cay cau bi gay, no buoc chung toi phai tap ghe vao bo de hoi tham nguoi dan noi day.

Qua qua trinh tim hieu, chung toi duoc biet cay cau da bi gay hon ca nam nay ma nguoi dan chua co dieu kien de lam lai. Cay cau von di co nhiem vu bac qua song, noi lien duong bo giup nguoi dan di lai thuan tien hon. Hon nua, no con la phuong tien giup cho cac em nho di hoc vao moi sang som, luc chieu ve. Vay ma gio no bi gay, lieu nguoi dan va cac em nho qua song the nao day???

Ho ke voi chung toi, moi lan can qua song kha vat va, mot la di xuong qua, neu khong co thi boi qua, nhung em nho di hoc thi cho hom nuoc rut phu huynh cong qua. Co hom phu huynh chua toi don, cac em non ve doi tap sach len dau tu boi qua song, gap dong nuoc xiet manh da co em thiet mang...

Tu nhung gi tan mat chung kien, tan tai nghe duoc chung toi hieu rang, viec cap bach dau tien cua chung toi la xay dung mot cay cau moi giup cho ba con nguoi dan  va cac em nho o day.

I/ TIEN TRINH THUC HIEN

1/ So lieu thuc te:

Y Tam da truc tiep do so lieu thuc te cua cay cau nhu sau:

+ Khoang cach tu bo song ben nay qua ben kia 14m

+ Do sau muc nuoc luc binh thuong 2,5m

+ Do cao cong tu day len toi dinh cau du kien 5m

+ Do rong mat cau du kien 1,8m

+ Chieu dai tu me bo song len duong di moi ben 2m, tong 4m

2/ Ban ve

Tu nhung so lieu thuc te do Y Tam da len mot ban ve mo phong cay cau nhu hinh ben duoi, va chu thich ro tren hinh (co hinh anh)

Cac thong so co ban:

Tong chieu dai cay cau du toan 20m
Be rong mat cau 1,8m
Do cao dinh cau xuong mat nuoc 2,5m

3/ Du toan kinh phi

Y Tam da len bang du toan chi tiet kinh phi chi tiet de xay cau (co hinh anh) 

TONG KINH PHI DU KIEN XAY CAU: 121,275,000 dong

4/ Thi cong

Chuyen di khao sat vua qua, ben canh khao sat thuc te dia ban thi Y Tam cung tan dung luon quy thoi gian it oi ay de lam viec voi chinh quyen dia phuong va nguoi dan noi day. Khi nghe tin duoc xay cau moi nguoi deu rat phan khoi va ung ho het minh.

Dac biet vung dat nay chua co dien nen viec thi cong se gap khong it kho khan. Tuy nhien, chinh quyen dia phuong va nguoi dan se tao moi dieu kien tot nhat de ho tro Y Tam, cung Y Tam thuc hien thanh cong su menh nay.

Chinh vi  vay, Y Tam truc tiep dung ra khoi cong xay dung cay cau nay. Bao gom su dong gop cong suc cua:

+ Cac ban thanh vien, tinh nguyen vien chuyen mon co nhieu kinh nghiem trong linh vuc thi cong xay dung cau se truc tiep chiu trach nhiem giam sat thi cong.
+ Cac ban thanh vien, tinh nguyen vien khong chuyen mon: dong gop cong suc ho tro xay cau
+ Thue 10 tho xay chuyen nghiep tai dia phuong
+ Nguoi dan, chinh quyen dia phuong dong gop cong suc ho tro xay cau tren tinh than tu nguyen.

5/ Thoi gian thuc hien

- Le khoi cong dong tho: Dien ra vao sang ngay thu 5, 17/12/2015
- Cac ban thanh vien Y Tam xuong ho tro truc tiep ngay 19, 20/12/2015
- Thoi gian du kien hoan thanh: 1 thang tu 17/12/2017 den 17/1/2016

II/DANG KY THAM GIA TINH NGUYEN VIEN XAY CAU 

Y Tam rat can cac ban thanh vien, tinh nguyen dang ky tham gia dong gop cong suc tinh nguyen cua minh de cung Y Tam xay nen cay cau day y nghia nay.

So luong: 25 ban

1/ Thoi gian du kien de cac ban ve Hau Giang:

- 20h toi thu 6 ngay 18/12/2015
- Du kien 15h chieu chu nhat ngay 20/12/2015 len xe ve lai Sai Gon.
- Phuong tien: Xe khach 25 cho
- Dia diem don cac ban: Nha Y Tam, So X1, khu chung cu CMT8, duong Thep Moi (gan nga 3 Hoang Hoa Tham- Truong Chinh) phuong 12, Q Tan Binh TP HCM.
-Kinh phi: xe di lai 180,000dong/nguoi, Y Tam ho tro an uong cho cac ban trong 2 ngay.

2/ Cac ban dang ky tham gia bang cach:
- Dien thong tin vao ban dang ky theo link: http://bit.ly/1R0hWXg

III/ UNG HO KINH PHI XAY CAU

Dau tu vao nhung cong trinh cong dong luon luon co gia tri ben vung, lau dai, giup ich duoc rat nhieu nguoi. Gop phan cai thien cong dong. Con so 121,275,000 dong qua la khong nho, nhung neu moi chung ta se chia mot it thi nhat dinh se nhanh thoi chung ta co du kinh phi xay cau cho ba con o Phung Hiep - Hau Giang.

Chung toi luon tam niem, chinh Y Tam phai la chiec cau vung chac truoc moi co the ket noi nhung tam long, niem tin cua cac ban, cac Manh thuong quan trong va ngoai nuoc. Tu do, nhung cay cau nong thon ra doi moi that su y nghia, kien co.

Happy Holiday Season to everyone! Saigon Outcast has a special present for all those holiday hipsters that need a well deserved break. The 2nd Saigon Outcast BeerFest will be coming just in time for the snow to start falling (somewhere else). Soak up the sunshine, great music, delicious craft beer and cider, and internationally diverse cookery that will be sure to satisfy your palate. 

	Always outdoing itself, Saigon outcast has gathered even more vendors from the craft drink and food scene in Saigon to break bread (and beer) with each other. The event will feature Fuzzy Logic, Pasteur Street Brewing Company, Platinum Premium Ale, Phat Rooster, Eagle Pilsner, Te Te Wheat style beer, Kiss Cider, Saigon Cider, and all your favourite local adult beverages.

The many great beverage choices make this Saigon Outcast BeerFest a great option to keep cool this holiday season. Add great food, passionate brewers, and live music — this will be one you won’t want to miss.

Tickets at doors: 50.000 vnd

Kinh gui: Quy Anh Chi!

Tran trong kinh moi anh chi tham gia tro thanh thanh vien cua Cong Dong Doanh Nhan PTI - goi tat PEC.

Cong dong doanh nhan PTI (PEC) 2013 -2014 duoc xay dung va kien tao dua tren y tuong cua cac thanh vien/hoc vien/chuyen gia cua PTI. PEC thuc hien theo ton chi duy nhat: “Khai sang cong dong doanh nhan Viet” voi muc tieu su menh la ket noi doanh nhan voi doanh nhan, doanh nghiep voi doanh nghiep cung nhau kien tao mot san choi doanh tri.

Suc manh cua PEC la tap hop duoc hang van doanh nhan Viet Nam cung ket noi, chia se tri thuc, trai nghiem, y tuong... nham nang cao tinh chuyen nghiep cua doi ngu doanh nhan, doanh nghiep trong cong dong.

Trong hai nam hoat dong, PEC da trien khai duoc nhieu hoat dong nhu chuoi cac su kien dinh ky hang thang, hang quy, hang nam cho cac thanh vien, tu van va truc tiep ho tro doanh nghiep, cac chuong trinh dao tao – nghien cuu – tra cuu thong tin, tra cuu quang ba, cac chuong trinh tham quan kien tap tai nhung truong hoc, doanh nghiep uy tin tren the gioi...

Gioi thieu
PEC 3.0 _Hoc thuc, trai nghiem thuc va Gia tri thuc

Ten goi chinh thuc: CONG DONG DOANH NHAN PTI

Ten giao dich trong nuoc: CONG DONG DOANH NHAN PTI

Ten giao dich nuoc ngoai: PTI ENTREPRENEUR COMMUNITY


Ve “Tam nhin”

PEC la cong dong uy tin nhat tai Viet Nam tap hop doanh nhan tri thuc trong thoi dai hoi nhap toan cau va toan dien
PEC se tro thanh mot khong gian giao duc tap trung nhat, noi doanh nhan co the hoc tap, chiem nghiem tri thuc nhan loai
PEC la cong dong tap hop day du nhat cua doanh nhan hoat dong trong moi nganh nghe
Ve “Su menh”

PEC se xac lap ban do tu duy hoc tap cho cong dong doanh nghiep Viet Nam phat trien theo huong ben vung, nang cao doi song tinh than cua cac doanh nhan Viet.
Den voi PEC, quy vi se duoc chi ra buc tranh cua nen kinh te Viet Nam thong qua cac kinh nghiem va kien thuc thuc tien
PEC luon ton trong cac gia tri hoc tap va nghien cuu cua cac doanh nhan thanh cong
Ve “Gia tri”

PEC huong toi cac gia tri:

Gia tri tri thuc de kien tao tang lop doanh nhan tri thuc
Gia tri cong dong de kien tao thi truong va phat trien thuong hieu
Gia tri thuc hoc de phat trien ben vung
Ve “Muc dich”

 PEC hinh thanh voi muc dich:

Nang tam nhan thuc va tri thuc, gia tang gia tri pham chat, cot cach van hoa cho Doanh nhan thong qua cung cap va trao doi cac gia tri thuc hoc
Kien tao cong dong la san choi hoi nhap cua Doanh nhan va Doanh nghiep Viet Nan thong qua thuc day viec giao luu, chia se kinh nghiem
Xay dung nang luc va ket noi Doanh nhan voi Doanh nhan, Doanh nhan va doanh nghiep voi chuyen gia trong va ngoai nuoc.
Ve thanh phan doi tuong tham gia

Voi mong muon co them nhieu cac ca nhan , doanh nghiep duoc dat chan vao san choi doanh tri huu ich nay trong phien ban moi, Cong dong doanh nhan PEC da mo rong hon ve pham vi doi tuong tham gia bao gom:

Tat ca cac cap lanh dao , chu tich CEO,Hoi dong quan tri, Hoi dong thanh vien, Ban giam doc, Ban lanh dao – nhung nguoi mong muon thong qua PEC de co them san choi, moi truong giao luu, tro giup va tuong ho lan nhau trong kinh doanh.
Cac nha quan ly cap trung trong cac doanh nghiep, cac truong pho phong ban, bo phan muon tham gia PEC de co them trai nghiem va co hoi nghe nghiep.
Nhung nguoi co be day nhat dinh ve kien thuc hay kinh nghiem, ve quan ly va dieu hanh trong doanh nghiep mong muon tham gia PEC de trao doi, trau doi them kien thuc va kinh nghiem.
Nhung ca nhan va doanh nghiep co hoai vong tro thanh mot cong dan va to chuc “toan cau” trong mot the gioi mo

Do you love yoga, meditation and wellness? 
Do you want to share your love of being in great health physically and mentally? 
Do you want to become a teacher who truly shines?
Would you like to take part in a training that will transform your life, your own practices and set you on the road towards becoming an instructor who engages and inspires others? 
Do you simply want to learn more, become stronger and more knowledgeable about yoga, meditation and wellness? 

Join veteran yoga instructor Suzanne Vian and guests for this POWERFUL, TRANSFORMATIONAL, LIFE ENHANCING 200 Hour Yoga Alliance Teacher Training Course. 

Suzanne created this wellness, yoga and meditation teacher training course to address the whole person. This course goes way, way beyond learning about just yoga. It was designed for those who want to learn about total wellness and is perfect for students who wish to become teachers who are self aware and inspire. You will learn how to teach with compassion and intelligence, and to connect with your students in a very powerful way.

-----------------------------------------------------------
200 Hr - 8 Week Training (11 January - 11 March 2016)
Monday - Friday, 8:30am - 2:30pm, District 2
Training breaks from 5 February - 15 February due to TET Holidays, there will also be no training on 22 January.
Plus 2 x 1.5 hour nutrition evening lectures from 5-6:30pm (exact dates TBA) 
--------------------------------------------------------------

Tuition
To be eligible for the early bird discounted rate, full payment must be received by 11 November 2015.
Early Bird Rate: 2,600USD (see cut off dates for your chosen training, above). No exceptions. 

Standard Rate: 2,800USD

In order for Suzanne to maintain a high level of personal attention for each trainee, spaces are limited. 

If you would like to pay in 2 instalments, a 50% deposit holds your place and the remaining 50% must be paid 30 days prior to the start date of the training. Sign ups 30 days in advance or less, must be paid in full. 

GROUPS OF 3 OR MORE STUDENTS signing up and paying at once receive a 10% discount off the regular price of the course. 

There are no refunds for this course, but if you become unable to attend your selected course, you are welcome to attend from a later date or use tuition towards another training course. If Suzanne cancels for any reason, a full refund will be given.

This is a globally recognized training, accredited with the Worldwide Yoga Alliance.
Course reading material (reading materials may be collected once you are registered in the course)
Comprehensive training manual
200 Hour Teaching Certificate
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Phone No: 096.483.0101
See more at: http://www.suzannevian.com/yoga-teacher-training.html

「ベトナムに会社あるんすよね？！」

「あるよー」
「Dooooooooooooonnnnn！！」
　　※ベトナム通貨単位はドンなのです。
「すげーーー！！！！！」
「行きてーーー、ベトナム！！！」
「おーー！行こー行こーー！！！！！」
「いつ行く？」
「んーーと、２月。２月２４日で！」
「了解です！」
「んでもって、現地で各人集合ねー」
「おーー、それオモロイ！！」
「んじゃ、２月２４日、ホーチミンに集合で！！！！！！」

ってことで、決定しました。
ホーチミンに集まっとかNight！！！
前乗りしても全然OK！で、その後いつまで滞在するかも全てアナタ次第。
２月２４日にホーチミンのとある場所で乾杯する！
ということだけが僕らの約束事。

ではでは、皆様現地にて！

Cach TPHCM 120km xuoi ve vung bien gioi mien dat do Tay Ninh, tai xa Bien Gioi, Huyen Chau Thanh, hinh anh nhung dua tre chan bo, chan trau thue, chan vit,.. hay di mot lua, mot cu mi giua cac canh dong day nang de phu cha me kiem song da khong con xa la, cai nang gay gat ay da lam da cac em ram nang, nhieu em khong duoc den truong va do cung la cong viec hang ngay cua cac em. 

Xa Bien Gioi nam giap ranh voi Campuchia, la xa xa xoi nhat, da phan la ba con dan toc Khome..doi song ba con noi day rat kho khan chu yeu lam nong nghiep: trong lua, mi, mia, lam thue, so luong tre em khong duoc den truong chiem kha cao. Moi thu deu thieu thon, con duong dat do dan vao xa bat gap ngay la hinh anh nhung can nha tranh , vach dat lup xup, choi voi giua nhung canh dong, co nhung ngoi nha nhin vao khong thay gi ngoai cai guong da xieu veo. Hien tai toan xa co 42 ho ngheo va can ngheo va 700 tre tu 0-14 tuoi.

Voi mong muon ba con noi day co mot mua xuan tron ven hon, sung tuc hon va mang den nhieu niem vui, nu cuoi cho ba con va tao san choi cho cac em nho nhom CTVTT to chuc chuong trinh tu thien xuan voi ten goi “ XUAN BIEN GIOI – NGHIA TINH DAT DO “
* Thoi gian chuong trinh: tu 15h ngay 23 den 11h ngay 24/01/2016
* Phuong tien di chuyen: xe may
( Lich trinh cu the se duoc dang tai o cac bai viet ben duoi)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
*. NỌI DUNG CHUONG TRÌNH
+ Phat cac nhu yeu pham can thiet va qua tet cho 42 ho ngheo va can ngheo.
+ Tang dung cu hoc tap va qua tet cho 20 em hoc sinh ngheo hieu hoc.
+ To chuc chuong trinh van nghe Xuan phuc vu ba con.
+ To chuc gian hang tro choi voi cac tro choi soi noi.
+ To chuc buoi sinh hoat ky nang ve ve sinh chan tay, rang mieng.
+ Tang sua, banh keo, cho 500 tre em den tham gia chuong trinh.
+ Tang quan ao cu cho ca nguoi lon va tre em.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
* CHI PHI QUA TANG DU TINH:
1/ Qua tang 42 ho ngheo va can ngheo: 10kg gao + thung mi + nuoc mam + nuoc tuong + dau an + hop banh tet ( khoang 300.000d)
42 x 300.000d = 12.600.000d
2/ Qua tang 20 em hoc sinh hieu hoc : 20 quyen tap + viet + thuoc + but chi + tay,.. + hop banh tet ( khoang 150.000d)
20 x 150.000d = 3.000.000d
3/ Qua tang cho tat ca cac em den tham gia chuong trinh: 5.000.000d (du kien so luong 500 em, moi phan bao gom banh, keo, sua,...)
4/ Qua tang gian hang tro choi: 1.400.000d gom nhieu loai banh, keo, sua, do choi, tap, viet… danh cho tat ca cac em tham gia tro choi ( du kien 500 em)
------> TONG KINH PHI QUA TANG DU KIEN: 22.000.000D 
( Néu só tièn quyen góp duọc nhièu hon hoạc ít hon kinh phí dụ kién thì nhóm sẽ linh dọng dièu chỉnh quà tang cho phù họp )

After having visited Jordan, Moscow and Delhi recently, the EFR – Study Trip will take you to beautiful Vietnam in 2016!

Are you ready to see how the Vietnamese rebuild their country after the Vietnam War, do you want to discover the amazing rivers of the Mekong Delta, do you want to crawl through the Cu Chi tunnels and have you always wanted to taste real Vietnamese Spring Rolls and coffee? Then join us in your ESE-springbreak from April 23rd till May 1st. We will be discovering the streets, markets and sights of Ho Chi Minh (also known as Saigon), the Cu Chi tunnels, the Mekong Delta, the university, companies and much more.

The trip will only cost you €649,- (non EFR-members: €679,-). This price includes flight, accomodation, visa, breakfast and trips.

If you have any questions, please contact us via email (studytrip@efr.nl), or pass by the EFR office. The application deadline is on the 17th of february. We hope to see you in Vietnam!
