Neu cau tra loi cua ban la "Co" cho 2 tren 4 cau hoi tren, thi ban la mot trong nhung Cong Dan Toan Cau tiem nang day!
Hay cho tuoi 20 cua ban mot trai nghiem day y nghia cung voi cac du an cong dong cung chuong trinh Cong Dan Toan Cau cua AIESEC nhe!;)

❆Cong Dan Toan Cau la chuong trinh mang den co hoi cho gioi tre ra nuoc ngoai lam viec cho cac du an cong dong, tinh nguyen trong 6-8 tuan ve cac linh vuc day hoc; quyen phu nu; HIV/AIDS; tim hieu van hoa; cac van de ve moi truong,… o cac quoc gia chau A nhu Thai Lan, Malaysia, Sri Lanka cung nhu cac nuoc chau Au nhu Hungary, Tho Nhi Ky.

❆Sap toi, tui minh co to chuc 1 buoi cafe de gioi thieu chi tiet ve chuong trinh Cong Dan Toan Cau. Trong buoi cafe nay, cac ban con duoc nghe truc tiep nhung chia se tu cac ban thuc tap sinh cua chuong trinh. Day cung la dip de cac ban co the dat cau hoi truc tiep cho tui minh cung nhu cac ban thuc tap sinh.

►Hay nhanh tay dang ky tham gia su kien IFORMATION SEMINAR CAFE ngay hom nay de co co hoi tim hieu them ve chuong trinh va lang nghe nhung cau chuyen co thuc tu cac ban Cong Dan Toan Cau nha! ;)

Tet nay, ban da co du dinh nao chua?
Neu chua, hay cung AIESEC tham gia chuong trinh Cong Dan Toan Cau vao dip Tet nam sau nhe!;)

Ban than men,
Xin phep duoc ke ban cau chuyen: co mot nguoi da sinh ra va lon len trong mot gia dinh khong hanh phuc, tuoi tho da phai chung kien hang loat nhung bi kich cua su oan han va thu han, cua su danh doi, cua su vat lon tren danh nghia va tien bac. 
Co ay han canh do, muon thoat ra khoi no va khong muon cuoc doi minh trong vong lan quan ay nua. Viec do da thoi thuc co phai thanh cong, nhat dinh khong cho ban than minh that bai.
Nhung cuoc song khong he nhu trong doi, khi tat ca nhung du dinh, nhung tham vong va hoai bao da bi thuc te phu nhan mot cach phu phang voi het that bai nay den that bai khac. Va co chan nan, that vong, mang trong minh day su tu ti va chang con tha thiet tro chuyen voi me minh ve nhung du dinh hay uoc mo nhu truoc day nua. Co so nhin thay anh mat that vong cua gia dinh, hay net khac kho dong day tren guong mat nhung nguoi than yeu.
Co giu bo het tat ca, thu minh lai trong con tuyet vong va luon khong biet lam sao de thoat ra vung lay tam toi ay cho den khi tiep can voi NLP va gap chi Carla Phuong Cao.
NLP da cho co duoc gan hon voi the gioi noi tam cua minh, duoc hoa hop voi tiem thuc, duoc chua lanh nhung vet thuong dang ri mau tung ngay, de co duoc la chinh minh, doi dien voi chinh con nguoi that cua minh.
“Khi ban thay doi, the gioi se doi thay”. Cuoc song xung quanh van the, nhung suy nghi va tam thuc trong co thay doi, moi thu xung quanh cung dan chuyen bien theo.
Cau chuyen tren chinh la cau chuyen doi thuc cua Helena.
Va gio day Helena muon lan toa nhung gia tri mang ten NLP nay den voi cac ban, muon chia se den cac ban de cac ban cung co co hoi duoc nhu co ay, duoc cham den mot the gioi moi tran day su tinh tai cua tam an, cua yeu thuong va cua hanh phuc tron ven.
Buoi chia se gia tri NLP cua Helena dac biet o cho giup chung ta:
- Thau dat duoc su ket noi giua The Gioi Ben Trong va The Gioi Ben Ngoai;
- Trai nghiem suc manh cua tiem thuc va co che giao tiep voi tiem thuc;
- Trai nghiem suc manh cua kha nang hinh dung tuong tuong thuc hanh Luat Hap Dan thu hut muc tieu;
- Hieu duoc lam the nao ma ban tro thanh ban cua ngay hom nay, ban la san pham cua nhung lap trinh nao tu qua khu va tu ben trong con nguoi ban.
Chao ban cua toi,
HAN BAN DANG TU HOI VI SAO HELENA LAI CHIA SE VOI CAC BAN
Co bao gio ban thac mac :
- Vi sao minh tao dung moi quan he voi nguoi khac lai kho nhu vay?
- Vi sao minh da co gang rat nhieu nhung ket qua van khong co gi thay doi so voi nhung gi ma ban dang co?
- Vi sao de dat duoc ket qua minh mong muon lai truc trac mai nhu vay?
- Vi sao nguoi khac thanh cong, con toi lai khong?
Ban hay tra loi that voi chinh ban than ban la nhung cai vi sao do vi sao no van luon ton tai? Du rang ban da co gang hoc tap tu nhung nguoi khac rat nhieu, tham gia cac khoa hoc phat trien ky nang rat nhieu, no luc rat nhieu, nhung ma van lien tuc mac phai nhung cai vi sao, vi sao va vi sao?!
DUNG ngoi yen neu ban thay nhung cau hoi vi sao kia dang lan quan xung quanh ban, DUNG ngoi yen khi ban vuong mac du chi mot cai vi sao. Thoi gian khong cho ai, va cong nghe luon bo lai nguoi cham tre.
Vay thi NGAY BAY GIO, NGAY HOM NAY, hay cho minh mot co hoi.
Co hoi duoc cung nhau pha bo nhung rao can vo hinh kiem ham con nguoi ben trong day noi luc cua chung ta. 
Vay con cho gi nua, hay hanh dong thoi!

Ban biet gi ve Render?
Ve co ban, render la thao tac su dung phan mem may tinh chuyen dung de thiet lap, dieu khien cac yeu to tao nen mot phoi canh dien hoa va tien hanh ket xuat phoi canh do voi tat ca cac yeu to anh sang, vat lieu… ra file anh, phuc vu cho cong viec dien hoa. Noi mot cach “binh dan”, day chinh la qua trinh bien nhung hinh khoi “xanh xanh do do” tro thanh nhung phoi canh chan thuc, co du gia tri tham my va tinh chan thuc de minh hoa mot y tuong thiet ke.
Tai Viet Nam, V-Ray cua Chaos Group va 3DsMax la mot cap bai trung xuat hien trong gan nhu moi co may trong cac cong ty tu van thiet ke, thi cong va nhung truong dai hoc. Gan nhu moi sinh vien tai cac truong dao tao nganh thiet ke, dac biet la thiet ke noi that tai Viet Nam va thanh pho Ho Chi Minh noi rieng deu lua chon V-ray lam cong cu de the hien y tuong. 
Trong thuc te hien nay, ki nang su dung va lam viec voi V-Ray trong da so truong hop tac dong khong nho toi nang luc thuc hien cac do an trong nha truong noi rieng va kha nang the hien y tuong trong qua trinh lam nghe noi chung cua cac Designer noi that, dac biet o giai doan ung tuyen va vao lam viec tai cac cong ty chuyen nghiep lan trong cong viec thiet ke tu do.
Noi dung dao tao : sau khoa hoc, hoc vien se co duoc nhung ki nang sau.
•	Su dung V-Ray de tao nguon sang cho phoi canh : Su dung HDRI, V-Ray: Environment.
•	Dien hoa noi that ban dem. Mo phong nguon sang nhan tao bang V-Ray Light, V-Ray IES, Omni Light, V-Ray Light Mtl.
•	Tao View nhin cho phoi canh noi that : Dat va thiet lap V-Ray Physical Camera. Nhiep anh can ban. Khong che phoi sang bang Iso va Shutter Speed.
•	Tao vat lieu co ban voi V-Ray Mtl : Diffuse.
•	Ki thuat Ap vat lieu cho doi tuong. Khong che va hieu chinh mat do vat lieu bang UVWMap, UnWrap Map.
•	Hieu chinh be mat vat lieu co ban voi Reflection, Refraction, Hi-Light Glossiness, Reflect Glossiness. Phan xa la gi? Phan biet Fresnel Reflection va Metalic Reflection, hieu chinh khuc xa voi IOR. Tuong tac giua phan xa va anh sang.
•	Hieu chinh be mat vat lieu nang cao voi he thong Maps : Bump map, Displace map, Opacity map, R.Glossiness Map… Tao he thong Map ho tro kha nang the hien cua vat lieu bang Photoshop.
•	Ki thuat mo phong cac vat lieu thuc te : Kinh thuy, Guong, Inox, Sat, Nhom, Chrome, Vang, Plastic…v.v…Tao cac hieu ung mi thuat dac biet cho vat lieu go, gach, da hoa cuong…
•	Tao vat lieu phuc hop cao cap voi V-Ray Blend Mtl, V-Ray Override Mtl, V-Ray 2-Sided Mtl…
•	V-Ray Frame Buffer la gi? Tai sao V-Ray Frame Buffer lai quan trong den vay. Hieu chinh va toi uu hoa V-Ray Frame Buffer. Su dung cac cong cu tich hop de chinh sua anh truc tiep truoc khi ket xuat tren khung render.
•	Hieu duoc nhung gia tri co ban va quan trong nhat quyet dinh chat luong va toc do Render : Light Cache, Irradiance Map, Color Mapping…..Tinh chinh thong so Render khoa hoc, hieu qua.
•	Su dung nhung tinh nang moi cua V-Ray 3.0 : Render Mask, Render Progressive. Tinh nang Use Embree de toi da hoa thoi gian thuc hien dien hoa.
•	Ki nang xu ly hau ki : thuc hien cac thao tac long hau canh, xoa phong va Retouch can ban bang Photoshop. Su dung Photoshop de dien hoa ban ve ki thuat mat bang, mat dung. Layout do an thiet ke. 
Thoi gian hoc : 5 tuan (15 buoi).
Hoc phi : 2 tr 00 . Hoc vien co hoan canh kho khan co the lien he nhom de duoc huong dan ho tro thanh toan nhieu dot va cac hinh thuc uu dai rieng.
Thoi gian khai giang du kien : 
Thu Tu : 02/12/2015
Thoi gian ket thuc du kien : 8/01/2015

Nhung loi the khi theo hoc tai cac khoa dao tao 3D tai D5 Attic :
1. Tat ca giang vien,tro giang 3D tai The D5 Attic deu la nhung sinh vien/cuu sinh vien chuyen nganh Thiet Ke Noi That, co kien thuc/ky nang su dung 3DsMax va V-Ray dang ke, da duoc kiem nghiem qua thuc te moi truong lam viec thuc te.
2. Giang vien,tro giang 3D tai The D5 Attic deu la nhung Freelancer hoac dang lam viec trong cac moi truong thiet ke chuyen nghiep, co trong tay nhung cong trinh thuc te duoc trien khai thiet ke hoac phac thao bang 3DsMax cung nhu kinh nghiem trai qua day du nhung do an trong chuong trinh dao tao Dai hoc chinh quy nganh Thiet ke noi that.
3. Co so vat chat tot : khong gian hoc tap nam trong khoi lam viec chung cua nhom thiet ke, phong hoc duoc trang bi dieu hoa nhiet do thuong truc, mien phi nuoc uong va ca phe, co bai dau xe rieng, hoc vien duoc thoai mai su dung nhung sach bao, tai lieu chuyen nganh cua nhom trong thoi gian hoc tap tai Gac.
4. Voi tinh than cua mot CoWorking Space. Tat ca thanh vien cua The D5 Attic luon san sang ho tro,thuc day viec hoc cung nhu cong viec cua hoc vien. Tao moi co hoi co the de thanh vien duoc ung dung ki nang ve may vao cong viec thuc te, tu do kiem tra va nhanh chong nang cao nang luc cua minh. The D5 Attic han hoan chao don nhung ca nhan co y muon cong tac voi nhom trong cong viec thiet ke sau khi man khoa hoc.
5. The D5 Attic cam ket ho tro hoc vien vo thoi han ve mat kien thuc va ki thuat ca trong va sau khi ket thuc khoa hoc. Moi thac mac cua hoc vien se duoc giai dap nhanh nhat co the. Cam ket hoan lai 100% hoc phi neu hoc vien khong co ki nang sau khoa hoc.
Ngoai ra, Hoc vien dang ki hoc trong thang 10 se nhan duoc nhung phan qua tu D5 Attic Interior Design :
1. Giam ngay 10% hoc phi cho hoc vien dang ki theo nhom 6 nguoi. 
2. Qua tang tu The D5 Attic: 1 ao thun Polo, 1 so ki hoa.
3. Mien phi toan bo giao trinh phuc vu khoa hoc.

Vao ngay 2/12/2015 -  thu 4 toi tai Capella se co to chuc buoi hoc ve Internet Mar mien phi cho moi nguoi va Nhu muon ban banh con cua pho mai vao ngay hom do. 
Nhu se "nhay gian giao" tu tren xuong lan nua va lan nay la ... ngoai doi thuc.  Nhu.. can, rat can su giup do va ho tro tu phia cac dong doi cua minh ngay khi Nhu "nhay" phat dau tien nay. 

Ngay hom qua chung ta da cam nhan duoc suc manh cua tinh dong doi no khung khiep nhu the nao roi phai khong may anh chi em ! Nhu cam nhan duoc rang Let it go chung ta la mot nhom that su dac biet va chac chan rang se lam nen nhieu dieu khac biet nua.

That su..that su va that su  Nhu rat can su ho tro cua moi nguoi, ho tro tinh than hay tham gia vao ngay hom do deu duoc. Va Nhu cung mong sau lan nay dong doi chung ta se co them nhieu lan "nhay gian giao" lan 2, 3,4,5... tu cac anh chi em khac trong nhom nua nhe. Hay de tat ca nhung con ga dai bang chung ta co the leo len ngon nui va sai canh bay cao du co trai qua bao nhieu thu thach chong gai di chang nua. Cam on tat ca moi nguoi !

CHUONG TRÌNH PHÁT TRIẺN SIEU GIÁC QUAN CHO TRẺ TÙ 5 - 15 TUỎI
Chuong trình SSD se giup cho tre cai thien nao bo va kha nang hoc tap nhanh. SSD la ten viet tat cua khoa hoc SUPER SENSORY DEVELOPMENT, khoa hoc Sieu Giac Quan. Cach chung ta hoc hoi va tiep nhan thong tin la thong qua cac giac quan gom: thi giac (nhin), thinh giac (nghe), xuc giac (van dong, so cham), vi giac (nem), khuu giac (ngui) va bao gom truc giac. Trong do, co 3 cach tiep nhan thong tin thuong hoc o truong:
    V (Visual): hoc bang cach nhin: hoc hoi, tiep nhan thong tin thong qua thi giac (nhin)
    A (Auditory): hoc bang cach nghe: hoc hoi, tiep nhan thong tin thong qua thinh giac (nghe)
    K (Kinesthetic) hoc bang cach van dong: hoc hoi, tiep nhan thong tin thong qua xuc giac (cham), khuu giac (ngui), va vi giac (nem).
Bang thu gian, nghe nhac, nghe am thanh, choi game, lam cac bai tap ren luyen nao bo. Sau 2 ngay cua khoa hoc, cac giac quan cua hoc vien se duoc cai thien ro ret.
Chung toi co nhung bang chung tren nhung khach hang cu the, dieu nay da duoc chung minh bang ket qua that. Video xem TAI DAY: http://bit.ly/1NVEq5z
 
Tre co the nhan dang hinh anh trong tinh trang bit mat. Dung tai de nghe hoac dung mui de ngui va nhan biet duoc the bai co mau xanh, do, vang… Hay tuong tuong ve toc do tiep thu thong tin cua be khi cac giac quan cua chung duoc cai thien va nang cap.
Anh chi hay tin tuong va dat ky vong vao khoa hoc vi nhung ly do sau:
- Chuong trình của chúng toi là do nhà phát minh Tien si David Ting, Hoc vien Genius Mind Academy thành lạp. Tien si David da co 10 nam dao tao, nghien cuu va thuc day phat trien nao bo cho tre em va nguoi lon. Bang ca trai tim va cong trinh nghien cuu cua minh, ong da giup cai thien cuoc song va giai quyet cac van de cua ho. Do la ly do Genius Mind Academy co mat tai Viet Nam thong qua khoa hoc phat trien sieu giac quan nham danh thuc thien tai tiem an ben trong moi con nguoi do I-Talents to chuc.
- Khoa hoc SSD da duoc to chuc tai Ha Noi và Hò Chí Minh vua qua rat thanh cong cac be tu 5- 15 tuoi da cai thien giac quan mot cach ro ret, cu the la cac be co the phan biet mau sac, hinh anh, to mau, di chuyen, doc sach, bao….. trong tinh trang bit mat.

SSD MANG LAI CHO CON BAN NHUNG GIA TRI NAO?
Co rat nhieu loi ich cua viec hoan thien sieu giac quan.

    Giup con vui ve va tich cuc hon
    Giam thoi gian, tang toc do hoc.
    Cai thien viec hoc, ket qua xuat sac
    Dao tao kha nang tap trung, hap thu cua nao bo
    Kha nang sang tao, dien dat ngon ngu
    Cai thien truc giac
    Kha nang ung bien
    Trang thai tinh than hoc tap tu duy

Trong thoi dai cong nghe so hien nay, digital marketing da tro thanh mot phan khong the thieu doi voi startups. Tuy nhien, khong phai startup nao cung van hanh hieu qua bo may online marketing cua minh.

Trong khoang vai nam tro lai day, khai niem ve mo hinh Inbound Marketing da xuat hien, lam thay doi hoan toan chien luoc marketing online cua rat nhieu startup, dem lai hieu qua rat cao nhung ton rat it hoac khong ton chi phi nao.

Chang han, ngan sach phan bo cho Content Marketing de nang cao chat luong noi dung ngay cang tang. Trong nam 2014, chung ta da thay rang 93% cac nha tiep thi B2B tham gia vao Content Marketing. Dong thoi, hau nhu cac doanh nghiep deu day cac kenh co the phat tan noi dung viral nhu social media (Facebook, Instagram, Linkedln),... 

Vay mo hinh Inbound Marketing la gi? Vi sao no quan trong va co tac dong manh me den hoat dong kinh doanh voi cac startups? Ban se duoc giai dap khi den voi buoi Digital Morning Talk do Markus Marketing School to chuc: “Creative Inbound Marketing?”.

Den voi Workshop Startup Basic ve Creative Inbound Marketing de duoc nghe chia se ve:

- Vai tro cua mo hinh Inbound Marketing, Pull/ Content Marketing va cac nguyen tac thanh cong doi voi hoat dong online marketing cho startups.
- Nhung tac dong cua Inbound Marketing, dac biet la Content doi voi qua trinh tim kiem, tham khao va quyet dinh mua hang cua khach hang trong thoi ky cong nghe so.
- Cac truong hop thanh cong dien hinh tai Viet Nam cua: Hotel Quickly, Uber, Kenh 14, iVivu,… cung nhu nhung vi du tren the gioi ve Pull/ Content Marketing cua Buffer, DKNY PR Girl, MarieForleo/Gary Vaynerchuk va The Daily Muse courses.

Ve dien gia: 

1. Mr. Nguyen Thanh Long - Head of Coc Coc Marketing School.

Voi hon bay nam kinh nghiem trong linh vuc Tiep thi Tuong tac So, Thanh Long da trai qua nhieu vi tri chu chot nhu: 
- Phu trach Marketing mien Nam cua Kenh14.vn; 
- Giam doc Thuong hieu cua FPT Online; 
- Phu trach Marketing cua iVIVU.com; 
- Dieu hanh chuoi thuong hieu thoi trang Nam Nguyen Sa Shop. 

Hien nay Thanh Long dang dan dat mang dao tao cua Coc Coc – trinh duyet tim kiem dang rat duoc ua chuong hien nay.

2. Ms. Tran Thanh Thu (Ella Tran) – PR Manager, Hotel Quickly. 

Tot nghiep cu nhan ve truyen thong tai University of California, Davis, Thanh Thu co nhieu kinh nghiem khung trong profile cua minh:
- Truong ban truyen thong cua TEDxUCDavis California, 
- Phu trach lien ket va mua ban quyen phim tai SnagFilms, New York
- Phat thanh vien cua Kenh truyen hinh quoc te Viet Nam (VTV4)
- Phu trach Marketing Uber Ha Noi 

Hien tai, chi Thanh Thu dam nhiem vi tri PR Manager cua Hotel Quickly – ung dung dat phong khach san truc tuyen co mat tren 15 quoc gia trong khu vuc Chau A Thai Binh Duong 
(https://www.hotelquickly.com/invite/ETRAN12).

Voi nguoi co dieu kien thi mot bua an sang la chuyen binh thuong, nhung doi voi nhung nguoi co hoan canh kho khan, lai dang nam vien thi that vo cung quy gia. That vay, nhung benh nhan ngheo, duoc nhan 1 bua an sang khong chi giup cho ho bot mot phan chi phi ma con lam am long nguoi benh vi nhan duoc tinh yeu thuong va su se chia. 

Nhieu benh nhan ngheo khong co tien phai an banh my khong, hoac co nguoi nhin bua sang. Nhung o banh my nong hoi, pho mai, chuoi va sua tuoi se la bua an day du dinh duong giup ho giam bot kho khan, tin yeu vao cuoc song va dieu tri benh hieu qua hon. 

“Mot mieng khi doi bang mot goi khi no”, hon ai het nhung benh nhan ngheo rat can nhung tam long se chia de voi bot kho khan, de dong vien ho vuot qua benh tat. 

Tren tinh than do, Hoi thien nguyen Phat oi Ngai goi con ket hop voi Hoi Hoi nhung nguoi thich di Chua tung kinh, phong sinh, phat com tu thien - Chua Thien My to chuc chuong trinh : “NANG LUONG NGAY MOI” - 300 SUAT AN SANG PHAT TANG BENH NHAN BENH VIEN PHAM NGOC THACH, than moi su cong tac ho tro cua quy anh chi em va cac ban tren Facebook.

Neu ban nghi Thien la nham chan va chi danh cho nguoi lon tuoi hay khong con ham muon song thi hay nghi lai!

Ban co biet nguoi hien dai co the den voi Thien qua cac ki thuat tu dong den tinh? Khi do ban co the nhay mua, boc lo cam xuc, quan sat tam tri va gui di yeu thuong. Du bang ki thuat nao, Thien la con duong giup ta cham den nguon nang luong ben trong, thang hoa cam xuc, va tim lai ban the cua chinh minh.

Theo ket qua nghien cuu cua Khoa The chat va Tinh than tai Dai hoc Harvard, Thien giup dieu hoa song nao, phat trien cac giac quan, giup ghi nho va tap trung tot hon, giup giam dau va tang he mien dich. Vi vay Thien la mot trong nhung phuong phap tot nhat de thu gian, tap trung, chuyen hoa nang luong cua con nguoi, giup ho dat trang thai can bang the chat, tam tri, cam xuc va tinh than.

Neu ban dang cam thay:
- Luc nao cung bat an, lo lang, bon chon;
- Cam xuc len – xuong that thuong, khong the kiem soat duoc;
- Mat phuong huong, cam hung trong cong viec va cuoc song;
- Thuong xuyen cang thang met moi, khong ngu-nghi tot;
- Khong tu tin khi boc loc ban than, cam xuc hay suy nghi that cua minh.

Thi buoi trai nghiem tuyet voi nay chinh la danh cho ban.

Thong thuong khi noi den chien luoc phat trien kinh doanh trong cac doanh nghiep san xuat, tu ban lanh dao den truong cac bo phan den moi nhan vien deu chu trong den linh vuc phat trien thuong hieu, mo rong thi truong voi cac ke hoach marketing hoanh trang, PR, quang cao ram ro ma quen mat cai gi se duoc dua ra thi truong, cai gi tao nen thuong hieu,... SAN PHAM voi chat luong uu viet nhat moi la dieu dang quan tam dau tien.

Tuy nhien, da co bao nhieu doanh nghiep quan tam dung muc den quy trinh san xuat? Bao nhieu giam doc doanh nghiep nhin nhan dung duoc vai tro cua nhan su san xuat ma dung dau la cac Giam doc san xuat (CPO)? Co bao nhieu Giam doc san xuat thuc su dap ung duoc yeu cau chuan cua mot CPO chuyen nghiep trong thoi dai moi? Hien nay, viec ung dung phuong phap quan ly trong san xuat con rat han che. Cac CPO dang quan ly dua tren kinh nghiem.

De giai quyet duoc tinh trang tren, cac chuyen gia cua Truong dao tao Doanh nhan PTI da thiet ke len chuong trinh dao tao “CPO – Giam doc san xuat chuyen nghiep” nham mang lai nhung cong nghe quan ly san xuat tien tien nhat va hieu qua nhat cua cac tap doan hang dau the gioi den voi cac doanh nghiep Viet Nam voi mong muon cac CPO chuyen nghiep se nang cao hieu qua cua hoat dong san xuat mang toi cho khach hang nhung san pham hoan hao ve chat luong va gia thanh.

Lien tuc thay doi cong viec, lang phi thoi gian, khong tich luy duoc kinh nghiem, do la nguyen nhan khien cac ban bo qua rat nhieu co hoi nghe nghiep.

Tren thuc te, nganh Tiep thi & Truyen thong co rat nhieu canh cua co hoi voi cac phan nganh khac nhau. Dieu quan trong nhat la ban xac dinh duoc, minh se lam viec trong loai cong ty nao: Client (nhan hang) hay Agency (cong ty tu van) roi moi den phan nganh nao: Trade, Research, Media, hay PR, Event, Digital,…?

✔ NGHE chia se nhung ki nang can thiet de dap ung yeu cau tuyen dung cua tung phan nganh trong cac Client - Agency hang dau.
✔ GIAI DAP thac mac, tu van huong nghiep tu kinh nghiem cua nhung chuyen gia dau nganh.

Kinh nguyet lien quan mat thiet den suc khoe, dac biet la suc khoe sinh san cua nu gioi. Bangkok Night Market la mo hinh cho dem Thai Lan duoc to chuc voi quy mo lon. Du kien cho dem Bangkok bao gom 120 gian hang gom nhung khu vuc chinh nhu: khu am thuc, khu thoi trang, khu quang cao, su kien, event.
.
Hua hen se thu hut hon 10.000 luot khach/ngay toi tham quan va mua sam... Va co mot khong khi cho dem duoc thu nho cua dat nuoc chua vang ngay tai long Sai Gon.
.
Den voi cho dem Bangkok tai Pandora City cac ban se chim dam trong khong gian thoi trang, voi rat nhieu gian hang bay ban quan ao, giay dep, phu kien, qua luu niem, do handmade. Cac ban tre tha ho lua chon mua sam cac mat hang co xuat xu tu Thai Lan ma khong can qua tan ben Thai.
.
Chua het, noi day con la diem den cho cac tin do co tam hon an uong va thich kham pha van hoa am thuc cac nuoc. Vi ngoai khu vuc thoi trang, cho dem Bangkok con danh ra mot khu vuc lon voi ten goi Interfood Zone voi day du cac mon an duong pho mang dam van hoa am thuc cac nuoc nhu Thai Lan, Viet Nam, Nhat Ban, Han Quoc… voi muc gia kha re.
.
* Cho hop tu 14:00-23:00 cac toi thu 6, thu 7 va chu nhat hang tuan, xuyen suot trong vong 6 thang. 
* Thoi gian bat dau tu ngay 27/11 tai 2 truc duong chinh la Truong Chinh va Ho Dac Di, xung quanh TTTM Pandora City. 
.
Cac ban muon tham gia cho dem Bangkok vui long lien he heart emoticon Hotline: 0983 231 232 or Inbox de duoc tu van nha !

Chien tranh da qua di cung voi mot thoi khoi bom, dan lua. Nhung du am cua no thi van con mai voi noi dau da cam.
Lang Huu Nghi, nam binh yen o ngoai o Ha Noi – ngoi nha chung cua nhung em be sinh ra da bi thiet thoi vi chat doc mau da cam va ca nhung cuu chien binh da mot thoi lam nen lich su. 
Cac em o day thieu thon ve tinh than cung nhu vat chat, hau nhu cac em it choi dua, ngoi nhin len man hinh ti vi mot cach vo than, hoac u ru neo minh duoi mot tan cay xanh, hay duoi nhung mai hien nha. 
De danh thuc nhung tieng cuoi, nhung doi mat tu lu va nhung doi chan dang “ngu quen” nay, mang niem vui, su yeu thuong cua Thuong De den “Suoi Am Trai Tim” tat nguyen cua cac em, CLB Compassion In Vietnam - Chap Canh Yeu Thuong se to chuc chuong trinh “Suoi Am Trai Tim 2” vao luc 7h00 ngay 6/12/2015. Mundo Lingo Free Language Exchange: 
Suscribe to be updated on upcoming events: 
https://www.facebook.com/MundoLingoVN/events
Keep in touch with everyone at the Saigon Group:
fb.com/groups/ML.Saigon

:::Who we are:::
We're a group of over 100 people from a variety of different countries that meet once a week to chat, practice speaking languages and make new friends.

:::How it Works:::

We have little flag stickers from over 100 countries / regions. The first flag is your native language and goes at the top. The rest follow in order or ability. It's open to all nationalities and languages and you can talk about anything you like. You don´t have to be an advanced speaker, or even speak a second language - its for all levels!

:::Our spot:::

Our events are free for participants, and always will be. When you arrive just ask at the bar or look for the table with the flags. If you’re shy, drop us a message and feel free to ask for any information.

The Reception and Drink Specials 7 - 9pm (or we call 'Happy Hour)

See you on Tuesday!

*For further information about Mundo Lingo worldwide: 
http://mundolingo.org/

Steve Jobs tung noi: "Calligraphy that lich thiep, tinh te va chua day lich su theo mot cach ma khoa hoc khong the nam bat duoc. Va toi thay no that ky dieu"

Va chung ta hay cam nhan dieu do theo cach cua minh.
San pham chan dra Thai Lan cao cap, nhan hang Mamoru se tham gia hoi cho Thai Lan vao thang 12 sap toi, nhieu chuong trinh khuyen mai hap dan.

ArtKglass – nghe thuat ve thuy tinh ung dung trong cuoc song noi chung va trong my thuat noi rieng. ArtKglass co mot uy luc thi giac manh me va an tuong. Anh sang tao nen cac sac mau ao giac cho cac vat pham thuy tinh vi the ma thuy tinh tro nen lung linh va huyen dieu vo cung. Do la cuoc hon phoi cua anh sang va mau sac tren kinh mang den bau khong khi sang trong, tinh te, mot ve dep vo song.

Loai hinh nghe thuat nay da ra doi cach day hang tram nam o Chau Au nhung o Viet Nam van chua duoc nhieu nguoi biet den nen da phan cac ban tre dam me yeu thich nghe thuat ve tranh tren kinh can tu minh may mo tim hieu. Chinh trong qua trinh may mo, hoc hoi, sang tao do da mang lai  nhung net rat rieng cho nhung tac pham cua nguoi nghe si.Trong gioi nhung nghe si ve tranh tren kinh tai thanh pho Ho Chi Minh moi nguoi thuong nhac den anh mot chang trai sinh nam 1988: Do Tuan Khoi.

Cau chuyen ve mot chang trai Khanh Hoa sau 2 nam no luc da co mot thuong hieu rieng mang ten ArtKglass, chuyen cung cap san pham ve thu cong tren moi chat lieu kinh, thuy tinh, gom su…Ben canh do, Khoi con phat trien cac dong tranh thu cong nhu kinh mau, guong nghe thuat, den chan nen, den ngu... Dong thoi, anh cung tu san xuat nguyen vat lieu nhu mau trong ve kinh, mau vien ve noi. Ben canh ve tranh thuy tinh, Khoi con nhan them cac cong viec nhu hoa trang, ve body painting trong cac dip le hoi, su kien, party… 
Hay den voi Makers Meet-up thang 12 voi chu de: Makers va ArtKglass, cung gap va lang nghe cau chuyen thanh cong cua chang hoa si dep trai va day tai nang nay nhe.
 
* Ngon ngu: Tieng Viet
* Su kien co phuc vu nuoc uong va do an nhe.
Ban co the dong gop tu 40k den 100k tuy thuoc vao cam nhan cua ban sau khi su kien ket thuc. Su dong gop cua ban se gop phan vao ho tro hoat dong cua Fablab Sai Gon va cong dong Makers.
Ngay hoi mua sam giam gia cho cac san pham giat xa quan ao thuong hieu Enfant danh cho tre so sinh, tre em va gia dinh. San pham duoc nhap khau truc tiep tu Thai Lan.

 Am nhac cua nha san xuat va nghe si rat doc dao nay la su ket hop cua nhung giai dieu dien tu va am thanh tao ra tu cac nhac cu, chuyen dong soi noi va su bung chay cua minimal disco. 

ROSCIUS – mot nha san xuat am nhac, nghe si phoi nhac, DJ va mot tay phu thuy ung bien trong nhung chuong trinh bieu dien nhac song – co kha nang lam bung chay san nhay bang nhung am thanh nguyen so, hiem co, da dang, duoc tao ra tu bo go va nhung thiet bi dien tu analog. Nhung am thanh va ban nhac loi cuon tu nhung mien dat xa khuat nhat cua the gioi duoc phan chieu trong tam hon cua khan gia voi mot nhip dieu va su dieu khien day me hoac va co tinh lan toa ngay lap tuc.

Ngap tran hanh phuc, tho so, sang tao vuot bac lai vua co dien, tham mi am nhac cua anh la su hoa tron that su hai hoa cua nhung anh huong lon trong chinh ban than, duoc the hien trong mot ly cocktail cua am thanh day kich thich va bung no danh cho san nhay.

Dem nhac hua hen se dua nguoi nghe qua nhung mien dat ki la, ngot ngao va goi cam nhat cua the gioi am nhac.

Ho tro boi DAN LO (EAOC)

Chuong trinh bat dau luc 9PM / Mien phi truoc 10PM / 100.000VND sau 10PM 

THONG TIN VE ROSCIUS

Roscius, mot nghe si da phong cach duoc dao tao trong moi truong am nhac co dien (tot nghiep Hoc vien Am nhac Quoc gia Toulouse & Pau va C.R.R. Paris), hien tai dang tap trung vao nhung chuong trinh bieu dien nhac song ung tau, voi phong cach chiu anh huong manh me boi World Minimal Disco duoc tao ra voi nhip dieu tu nhung am thanh dien tu.

Cung nhu cac DJ, anh hoa tron nhung chu de am nhac ung tau khac nhau hoac cung voi hoac bo qua nhung quang chuyen nhac trong nhung chuong trinh bieu dien hoac khi choi tai cac cau lac bo. Loi choi nhac nay duoc thuc hien voi hi vong tao nen su ket noi va tap trung vao ban than am nhac hon la gioi han am nhac trong nhung chiec may, tat ca de duy tri mot khong khi le hoi soi dong.

Nguoi ta thay anh xuat hien o nhieu dia diem khac nhau: nhung bua tiec chao mung giai London Grammar, nhung le hoi, tai cac cau lac bo, nhung phong tranh nghe thuat. Ben canh viec tap trung sang tac nhac danh cho san nhay, anh cung tham gia sang tac cho cac du an thuong mai, cac cuoc trung bay, nhung bo phim ngan va nhung chuong trinh chieu video-mapping.Roscious da phat hanh dia nhac dau tien cua minh vao mua xuan nam 2014.

Phong cach am nhac: World Minimal Disco/Deep House/ Minimal ElectroNhung anh huong: Debussy, Chopin, E.S.T. Keith Jarrett, Gonzales, Four Tet, Ricardo Villalobos, Steve Reich, LCD Soundsystem...

Moi ban vao cac duong link duoi day:

soundcloud.com/williamserfass youtube.com/channel/UCvd8xi7D2BMZNLCV5eKtOYw facebook.com/pages/Roscius/219162018209459 twitter.com/WilliamSerfass

______________________ENGLISH_____________________

Electronic pulse meets organic rhythms, jazzed up movement and minimal disco fire in this highly unique producer and artist. 

ROSCIUS - producer, remixer, DJ & live improvisation wizard - fuses an eclectic-organic, rare sound involving acoustic percussion and analog electronic instrumentation. Sounds and samples from the most hidden corners of the planet are projected into the souls of his audience with a rhythm and direction that is entrancing and immediately infectious. 

Blissed-out, rugged, cutting-edge and ancient simultaneously, his sound aesthetic is a dead-serious blend of his own vast influences that manifest in an audio cocktail that is explosive and designed for dancing. 

Expect a night of powerful music that will undulate through exotic and luscious corners of the audio galaxy.

Supported by DAN LO (EAOC) 

9PM / free before 10PM / 100K after

ROSCIUS BIO

Roscius, a polymorphous artist with a classical upbringing (graduate from the Toulouse and Pau National Conservatory of Music and the C.R.R. Paris), today is concentrating on his live improvised performances, which are strongly influenced by World Minimal Disco styled rhythmic electronics.

Much in the way of DJs, he blends together different improvised themes with or without breaks in a club/performance format. All this is done in the hopes of getting back to the music rather than shutting ones self within the machines, all while keeping up a festive dynamic.

One can find him in various venues: premiere parties in London Grammar, festivals, clubs, art galleries the dance scene but also composing for commercials, installations, short films and projections for video-mapping. Roscius is preparing the release of his first vinyl for spring 2014.

Musical Style: World Minimal Disco/Deep House/ Minimal Electro

Influences: Debussy, Chopin, E.S.T. Keith Jarrett, Gonzales, Four Tet, Ricardo Villalobos, Steve Reich, LCD Soundsystem...

Co hoi gap go truc tiep Giam doc tuyen sinh cua truong DH Curtin Uc & Curtin Malaysia tai hoi thao: 

== “HOC BONG VA HO TRO TAI CHINH 2016 CUA DH CURTIN” ==

==> Hoi thao tai TP. HCM: 
Thoi gian: Thu Bay, 12/12/2015, 9:30 - 11:30
Dia diem: Van phong ATS, Tang M, Toa nha ITAXA, 126 Nguyen Thi Minh Khai, Q. 3

==> Hoi thao tai Ha Noi: 
Thoi gian: Chu Nhat,13/12/2015, 17:00 - 19:00
Dia diem: 330 Ba Trieu, Ha Noi 

Nam 2015, Dai hoc Curtin co buoc tien nhay vot tren bang xep hang danh gia “Academic Ranking of World Universities” khi lot vao Top 300 truong Dai hoc co chat luong giao duc tot nhat tren the gioi. Dai hoc Curtin hien dang duoc xep hang thu 11 tai Uc. Day la mot thanh qua dang tu hao, the hien su no luc khong ngung cua truong. Khong chi duoc danh gia cao ve mat chat luong giao duc, Dai hoc Curtin con duoc to chuc uy tin Time Higher Education danh gia la mot trong 10 truong Dai hoc tren the gioi co suc thu hut sinh vien quoc te nhat trong nam 2014/2015.

Co so chinh cua Dai hoc Curtin duoc dat tai Perth (Bang Tay Uc) – thanh pho luon duoc xep hang trong Top 10 thanh pho co chat luong song tot nhat the gioi trong suot 11 nam qua. Co so hoc tai Perth cung cap cho sinh vien nhieu su lua chon voi cac khoa hoc da dang va hang tram chuyen nganh o moi cap do hoc tu cac chuong trinh Cu nhan cho toi Tien si. Co so vat chat phuc vu cho viec hoc tap va sinh hoat cua sinh vien tai day deu dat tam co quoc te.

Se chang phai la van de lon khi cac ban chua dat duoc yeu cau dau vao ve ca hoc luc va Anh ngu cua Curtin. Truong Cao dang Curtin cung cap cac chuong trinh Du bi Dai hoc va Cao dang chuyen tiep, tao dieu kien cho nhung sinh vien chua du dieu kien vao thang co the lien thong mot cach de dang vao cac chuong trinh Cu nhan cua Dai hoc Curtin. Trung tam Anh ngu Curtin voi hon 40 nam kinh nghiem trong viec giang day Anh ngu cho sinh vien quoc te la noi dao tao va ho tro cho sinh vien quoc te tang cuong cac ky nang ngon ngu cua minh.

Khong chi gioi han trong pham vi nuoc Uc, Curtin con vuon ra tam quoc te voi viec thanh lap co so hoc tai Malaysia. La co so hoc lon nhat cua Dai hoc Curtin tai nuoc ngoai, Curtin Malaysia dang chuan bi ky niem 15 nam thanh lap truong voi danh tieng la co so giao duc dao tao dat chuan quoc te hang dau tai Malaysia. Truong duoc cap chung nhan 5 sao boi Bo Giao duc Malaysia ve chat luong dao tao. Dac biet, Curtin Malaysia la mot trong 8 truong Dai hoc duy nhat tai Malaysia duoc cong nhan boi Co quan Quan ly Chat luong Bang cap cua Chinh phu Malaysia (Malaysian Qualifications Agency).

Voi muc hoc phi chi bang 1/3 hoc phi tai Curtin Uc, theo hoc tai Curtin Malaysia, sinh vien duoc hoc tap trong mot moi truong da van hoa va thu huong mot chat luong giao duc va bang cap hoan toan tuong duong nhu sinh vien hoc tai Curtin Uc. Dac biet, sinh vien se co co hoi chuyen tiep sang Curtin Uc va duoc cong nhan so tin chi chuyen tiep.

Xem them ve Curtin Malaysia tai http://ats.org.vn/su-kien/hoc-chuan-bang-uc-tai-dh-curtin-malaysia-voi-hoc-phi-chi-bang-1-3-tai-uc-1898

Neu theo hoc khoa hoc ve Kinh doanh cua Curtin Malaysia, sinh vien co the chon hoc Cu nhan Quan tri Kinh doanh, Cu nhan Thuong mai (Ke toan hoac Tai chinh), hoac cac chuong trinh lay bang doi, bao gom: Ke toan - Ngan hang, Ke toan - Doanh nghiep, Ke toan - Tai chinh, Ngan hang - Tai chinh, Doanh nghiep - Marketing, Tai chinh - Quan tri, Tai chinh - Marketing, Quan tri - Marketing, Marketing - PR, Quan tri va Du lich Khach san - Marketing.

Curtin Malaysia nam tren khu vuc rong 1.200 mau, la noi hoc tap cua hon 3.500 sinh vien den tu 45 quoc gia. Co so vat chat va cac trang thiet bi hien dai cua truong dap ung cac yeu cau hoc tap, cac nhu cau ve the thao, giai tri va sang tao cua sinh vien. Curtin Malaysia cung cap cac khoa hoc o cac bac hoc khac nhau, bao gom cac chuong trinh tieng Anh hoc thuat, Du bi Dai hoc, Dai hoc va Sau Dai hoc.

===============================================
HOC BONG VA HO TRO TAI CHINH 2016 CUA DAI HOC CURTIN:
Hoc bong 25% hoc phi nam dau tien tai Curtin Uc (chuong trinh Cu nhan va Thac si) cho hoc sinh va sinh vien co thanh tich hoc tap xuat sac.
Hoc bong 10% hoc phi khoa tieng Anh tai Trung tam Anh ngu cua Curtin Uc cho tat ca cac sinh vien truoc khi vao khoa hoc chinh.
Ho tro tai chinh cua Curtin Malaysia danh rieng cho cac sinh vien dang ky nhap hoc qua ATS: 100% chi phi nha o trong 4 thang(tuong duong 8.500.000 VND) cho 6 sinh vien dang ky cho ky hoc dau tien cua 2016.

==============================================
De biet them thong tin ve hoi thao, moi cac ban lien he ngay voi cac tu van vien nhieu kinh nghiem cua ATS:  http://ats.org.vn/su-kien/hoc-bong-va-ho-tro-tai-chinh-2016-dai-hoc-curtin-1901

D-STYLES (Beat Junkies | Invisibl Skratch Piklz | LA)

In underground hip hop circles around the world; D-Styles is the name most associated with innovative turntable scratching. Thanks to the popularity of the Internet and the explosion of scratch videos, D-Styles is influencing turntablists and scratch artists around the world. His approach differs from the highly technical, yet repetitive scratching that currently dominates the scene, in that it emphasizes musical composition and style.

D-Styles developed his world-renowned turntable skills growing up in San Francisco’s Bay Area, which by 1992, was at the forefront of the turntablism scene. After many years of musical development and experimentation with different styles, D-Styles began to be recognized as one of the region’s foremost turntable instrumentalists. In 1997 he was invited to join the world’s most elite group, the Invisibl Skratch Piklz (ISP). ISP was an ensemble group of
deejays, each of who was acclaimed in his own right. As a group, ISP completely changed the way the world viewed the turntable: Due to their incredible innovations and dazzling performances, the turntable went from being a record player, to a musical instrument.

During his time with ISP, D-Styles grew to international prominence with the group touring all over North America,Europe, and Asia. ISP had evolved from the first ever group of scratch deejays to perform as a band, and ISP continued that tradition, inspiring countless turntable groups around the world. Other members of ISP included the world-famous Q-bert, DJ Shortkut and Mixmaster Mike, now with the Beastie Boys.

After ISP disbanded, D-Styles returned to solo projects, and in 2002 released the groundbreaking album Phantazmagorea.
Phantazmagorea was the first album of its kind to be produced e
ntirely from scratching. D-Styles used scratching to play each individual musical element of his songs. The result was a classic, and is a feat yet to be excelled.

After the solo effort of Phantazmagorea, D-Styles joined four other gifted scratch musicians to form the Bastard Language Tour, a quintet of avant-garde and highly skilled scratch musicians who are also featured in a DVD by the same name, which documents their live performances.

D-Styles is currently a Resident DJ at the famous Los Angeles bea
t scene club-LOW END THEORY along with his mates Gaslampkiller,DJ Nobody,Daddy Kev & resident MC Nocando. D-Styles continues to be at the forefront of turntable music, helping to design a new turntable with Vestax called the Controller One, and developing
his own line of turntable slip mats TABLECLOTH.

----------------------------------------------------------------------
D-STYLES (Beat Junkies | Invisibl Skratch Piklz | LA)

Trong gioi hiphop underground tren the gioi, D-Styles la ten tuoi duoc gioi ham mo gan ket nhieu nhat voi phong cach "cha dia than" moi va day sang tao. Nho vao su pho bien cua internet va su bung no cac doan clip, D-Styles dang la nghe si dau tren the gioi co mot suc anh huong lon. Phong cach cua anh co khac biet so voi kieu lap di lap lai day tinh ky thuat cua gioi DJ truyen thong, anh tap trung vao giai dieu va phong cach.

D-Styles phat trien tai nang cua minh tu be tai San Francisco, vao thoi diem 1992, noi nay di dau the gioi trong truong phai "cha dia than" . Sau nhieu nam phat trien ve am nhac va trai nghiem voi nhieu phong cach khac nhau, D-Styles bat dau duoc nhin nhan la nghe si cap tien nhat trong khu vuc nay. Vao nam 1997, anh duoc moi tham gia vao nhom "The Invisibl Skratch Piklz" (ISP). ISP la mot nhom tap hop cac DJ noi itieng nho cac the manh rieng biet. Nhom nay da hoan toan thay doi cach nhin nhan cua the gioi doi voi dia than: nho vao su cach tan va cach trinh dien dang ne cua ho, nhom nay da bien dau dia than tu mot may nghe nhac thanh mot nhac cu.

Trong suot thoi gian voi ISP, D-Styles da phat trien thanh mot bieu tuong quoc te khi di luu dien khap Bac My, Au Chau va A Chau. ISP da phat trien tu mot nhom DJ thanh mot ban nhac, va tiep tuc truyen thong do, ISP da bien thanh nguon cam hung cho vo so cac nhom DJ dia than khap the gioi. Cac thanh vien khac cua ISP bao gom Q-bert, Shortkut va Mixmaster Mike, va bay gio la The Beastie Boys.

Sau khi nhom ISP giai tan, D-Styles tro lai voi cac du an solo cua minh, va vao nam 2002, anh cho ra doi album "Phantazmagorea" day dot pha. "Phantazmagorea" la album dau tien cua duoc san xuat hoan toan dua tren dong tac "cha dia than". D-Styles su dung phuong phap loai hinh nay de tao ra cac giai dieu trong moi yeu to am nhac cua anh. Ket qua la mot tac pham kinh dien, xuat sac va noi bat nhat.

Sau no luc cua anh voi "Phantazmagorea", D-Styles tham gia voi 4 tai nang khac trong gioi "cha dia than" de tien hanh 1 tour ten la "The Bastard Language" Tour, mot su ket hop ve am nhac cua cac tai nang khac nhau. Tour nay duoc thu live DVD cung ten

D-Styles hien la DJ thuong xuyen tai club LOW END THEORY o Los Angeles, cung voi Gaslampkiller, DJ Nobody, Daddy Kev & MC Nocando. D-Styles van luon la nghe si di dau ve DJ dia than, hien dang giup hang Vestax thiet ke mot model may choi dia than moi ten la Controller One.

“Thap Muoi - dep nhat bong sen” cau ca nhu goi nho ve ve dep thuan khiet cua vung que chan chat, mang net hoang so nhung day chat lang man giua bon be xanh mat boi nhung canh dong lua mon man trong gio va nhung canh co trang. Dong Thap con la noi noi tieng voi am thuc khan hoang, nhung mon an dan da tu chuot dong, ca loc trui rom, canh chua bong dien dien vao mua nuoc lu, com huyet rong… hoac mua sam mot so dac san nhu: hat sen say, ruou Hong Sen Tuu, nem va quyt hong Lai Vung… lam qua cho nguoi than, ban be. Ngay nay, den voi Dong Thap du khach se co dip tham quan nhieu dia danh nhu: Khu di tich Xeo Quyt, lang hoa Tan Quy Dong ruc ro moi do Xuan ve, chua Kien An Cung co kinh, nha co Huynh Thuy Le doc dao...

<3  Doi tuong tham gia:
- Cac be thieu nhi trong do tuoi tu 4-9 (sinh nam tu 2006 – 2011), khong phan biet truong hoc va ho khau.
- Doi tuong tham gia duoc chia lam 02 nhom de tham gia thi:
+ Nhom 1: cac be tu 4-6 tuoi (sinh nam 2011, 2010, 2009)
+ Nhom 2: cac be tu 7-9 tuoi (sinh nam 2008, 2007, 2006)

<3 Noi dung <3:
- Cac be tham gia cuoc thi bang hinh thuc ve mot buc tranh ve “nguoi ban trong mo” ma be yeu thich. Do co the la con vat, do vat, nhan vat co tich hay mot nguoi ban do be tuong tuong ra.
- Di kem voi buc tranh ve “nguoi ban trong mo” nay, be phai giai thich, gioi thieu ve nguoi ban ay bang cach noi (doi voi nhom nho), hoac viet (doi voi nhom lon).
- Hinh thuc thi: thi tap trung.
- Thoi gian thi: 120 phut (Sau khi hoan thanh, cac buc tranh se duoc Ban to chuc tap hop ve de cham diem, doi voi cac be nhom nho, Ban kham khao se di den tung be de nghe be gioi thieu ve nguoi ban cua minh roi moi thu bai)
- Tat ca tac pham du thi se duoc dang tren fanpage cua chuong trinh de co co hoi nhan giai thuong qua binh chon tu khan gia. Ban to chuc khong gui tra bai du thi cho cac thi sinh.

<3 Giai thuong <3:
Co cau giai thuong:
- Giai thuong danh cho moi nhom tuoi bao gom:
+ Mot giai nhat: San pham nem thu bong Goc xanh mo phong nguoi ban trong mo” cua tac gia, cung cup luu niem cua chuong trinh.
+ Hai giai nhi: San pham nem thu bong Goc xanh mo phong “nguoi ban trong mo” cua tac gia, cung giay khen cua chuong trinh.
+ Ba giai ba: San pham nem thu bong Goc xanh mo phong “nguoi ban trong mo” cua tac gia, cung giay khen cua chuong trinh.
+ Giai thuong danh cho tac pham duoc binh chon nhieu nhat tu khan gia: San pham nem thu bong Goc xanh mo phong “nguoi ban trong mo” cua tac gia.

Dac trung lon nhat ve phong cach tai doanh nghiep Nhat Ban co le nam trong cach thuc tiep dai khach hang. Trong tieng Nhat, co tu “Omotenashi”, nghia la don tiep khach hang bang ca tam long. Do la su quan tam va nhung hanh dong giup khach hang cam thay thoai mai, vui ve. Vi vay, neu hieu ro “Omotenashi”, chung ta co the ap dung dieu do o nhieu hoan canh khac nhau. 
Omotenashi co the hieu la khi nguoi ban hang co the doan truoc duoc nhu cau cua khach hang va dua ra san pham va dich vu tot nhat ma khach hang khong ngo toi. Quy luat 80/20 cung cho thay 80% doanh so co duoc la tu 20% trong tong so khach hang. Do vay, chat luong cua san pham va dich vu se quyet dinh su thoa man cua khach hang va viec tiep tuc su dung dich vu hay mua san pham cua cong ty trong tuong lai hay khong. Su thoa man do chinh la ket qua cua tinh than Omotenashi.
Nham giup cac doanh nghiep cam thu duoc tinh than Omotenashi cua Nhat. Trung tam Hop tac Nguon Nhan luc Viet Nam-Nhat Ban da moi ba Sugaya Masami - chuyen gia cap cao JICA ve linh vuc quan ly chat luong dich vu chia se nhung kinh nghiem quy bau cua minh.

Keep in touch with everyone at the Saigon Group:
fb.com/groups/ML.Saigon

:::Who we are:::
We're a group of over 100 people from a variety of different countries that meet once a week to chat, practice speaking languages and make new friends.

:::How it Works:::

We have little flag stickers from over 100 countries / regions. The first flag is your native language and goes at the top. The rest follow in order or ability. It's open to all nationalities and languages and you can talk about anything you like. You don´t have to be an advanced speaker, or even speak a second language - its for ALL levels!

:::Our spot:::

Our events are free for participants, and always will be. When you arrive just ask at the bar or look for the table with the flags. If you’re shy, drop us a message and feel free to ask for any information.

The Reception and Drink Specials 7 - 9pm (or we call 'Happy Hour)

See you on Tuesday!

*For further information about Mundo Lingo Worldwide: 
http://mundolingo.org/

HOC DE LAM. Tap trung vao cac yeu to quyet dinh su thanh cong cua du an, ngan ngua va xu ly cac van de trong du an. Ung dung hieu qua tieu chuan Quan Ly Du An Quoc Te PMBOK quan ly thanh cong cac du an o cac linh vuc khac nhau

CLB Khoi nghiep Sang tao (ISC) - la CLB khoi nghiep dau tien duoc ho tro boi NIIC tai truong Dai hoc Nguyen Tat Thanh voi pham vi hoat dong vuon den toan thanh (Tp.HCM).

Muc tieu cua ISC la tro thanh noi:
•	Danh thuc tu duy sang tao, khat khao kinh doanh 
•	Trang bi va trai nghiem nhung ky nang mem thiet thuc ma doanh nghiep nao cung mong doi o cac ung vien sang gia
•	Tim thay dinh huong cu the cong viec trong tuong lai

Hay dang ky tham gia ung tuyen Nhan su nguon CLB ISC ngay hom nay de co co hoi:
1.	Tham gia nhung buoi dao tao cac ky nang lam viec quan trong ma Doanh nghiep nao cung mong muon o doi ngu nhan su.
2.	Truc tiep dieu hanh cac su kien Khoi nghiep lon quy mo toan thanh.
3.	Tiep xuc voi cac doanh nhan thanh dat va chon cho minh co hoi kien tap, thuc tap va ca cong viec nhu mo uoc.
4.	Duoc tao dieu kien va tu van trien khai cac y tuong kinh doanh ma cac ban van ap u
5.	….va nhieu nhieu quyen loi hap dan khac do chinh cac ban sang tao ra :)

***** Han cuoi nhan dang ky: cuoi ngay 16/12/2015
***** Khong gioi han sinh vien den tu truong nao, chuyen nganh nao nhe, ISC mong muon tao ra moi truong da dang de cac ban co co hoi giao luu hoc tap lan nhau.

THONG DIEP DONG HANH

Thua Quy anh chi,

Ban to chuc Chuong trinh Ngay Dong Hanh xin gui loi cam on chan thanh den cac anh chi da dong hanh cung du an thoi gian qua va mong rang Ngay Dong Hanh V se tiep tuc nhan duoc su ung ho do.

Ngay Dong Hanh do cac tinh nguyen vien cua Chuong trinh hoc bong Ngoi Nha Dong Hanh kien tao la noi các anh chi o bat ky nganh nghe nao co tam long thien nguyen deu co the dong gop chut cong suc va kinh phi thong qua viec mua ve an uóng, den de giao luu va chung tay vi cong dong sau gio lam viec cang thang. 

Voi chu de Ngay Dong Hanh V – “Doanh nhan, gioi tre chung tay vi cong dong” – ban to chuc thiet ke tiec buffet chay voi su hien dien cua hang chuc doanh nhan, gioi van phong, cac luat su, ky su, giang vien va tri thuc o cac nganh nghe den de cung nhau an uong va chi dong gop tu viec trich tu nguon thu cua ve buffet chay do. Lua chon Nha hang Bong Sen nam ngay trung tam Sai Gon voi thuc don 40 loai thuc an chay truyen thong hop khau vi voi nhieu nguoi cung khong gian rong rai, Ngay Dong Hanh mong muon mang den cho Quy anh chi thoi gian cuoi tuan an uong thu gian ben ban be, nguoi than.

Song song do, Ngay Dong Hanh thiet ke bua “An trua cung doanh nhan” voi 15 cho ngoi trong phong VIP cung Doanh nhan Nguyen Lam Vien – Chu tich HDQT kiem Tong giam doc Cong ty Co phan Vinamit. Trong bua an than mat ay, vi doanh nhan thuoc the he dan anh se chia se voi cac doanh nhan tre va khach moi ve cong viec kinh doanh va cuoc song.

CHUONG TRINH DAC BIET ”AN TRUA CUNG DOANH NHAN”

An trua cung doanh nhan la chuong trinh dac biet cua Ngay Dong Hanh V, cac doanh nhan va khach moi se duoc phuc vu an uong tai phong VIP rieng trong mot khong gian am ap, than mat va thoai mai chuyen tro cung nhau. Khach moi dac biet lan nay la Doanh nhan Nguyen Lam Vien – Chu tich HDQT kiem Tong giam doc Cong ty Co phan Vinamit. Anh Nguyen  Lam Vien la doanh nan thuoc the he dau cua Viet Nam trong qua trinh hoi nhap kinh te quoc te. Cac san pham cua Vinamit da di tien phong trong viec dua cac hang hoa Viet Nam noi chung va cac san pham nong nghiep cua Viet Nam ra nuoc ngoai. Anh Nguyen Lam Vien khong chi la doanh nhan thanh dat, ong la nguoi an chay truong va la nguoi dat biet quan tam ho tro gioi tre va sinh vien. Trong bua an than mat hom ay, vi doanh nhan thuoc the he dan anh se chia se voi cac doanh nhan tre va khach moi ve cong viec kinh doanh va cuoc song.

CHUONG TRINH HOC BONG NGOI NHA DONG HANH

Chuong trinh hoc bong Ngoi Nha Dong Hanh, tien than la Du an Hoc bong Dong Hanh Den Giang Duong, la dụ án phi loi nhuan cua nhung nha tài trọ cung chung tay ho tro hoc sinh – sinh vien ngheo hieu hoc tai Viet Nam. Cac phan Hoc bong Dong Hanh trao tang den tan nha cac em hoc sinh ngheo vuot kho hoc gioi dang chuan bi du thi vao cac truong Dai hoc. Cac em trung tuyen vao Dai hoc se duoc tiep tuc ho tro ve cho o tại Ngoi Nhà Dòng Hành trong nam dau tien, co huán luyẹn vien kèm cạp, duoc dao tao ky nang mèm, duoc tu van dinh huong nghè nghiẹp va cac ho tro khac trong thoi gian sinh vien cho den khi tot nghiep va co viec lam. 

Ngoi Nha Dong Hanh (184/48A Nguyen Xi, Q. Binh Thanh, Tp. Ho Chi Minh) khong chi la noi o cac em sinh vien cua du an ma con la noi cac sinh vien co hoan canh kho khan den tu cac tinh thanh co noi tam tru de on dinh viec hoc tap tai Tp. Ho Chi Minh. Day la can nha duy nhat tai tai Tp. Ho Chi Minh do cac Nha tài trọ va Tinh nguyen vien chung tay dong gop va ho tro cac sinh vien vuot kho hoc gioi duoc sinh song va hoc tap hoan toan mien phi. Vi hoat dong tren nguon tai tro, cac Tinh nguyen vien to chuc cac chuong trinh gay quy de van dong su dong gop, do la Chuong trinh gay quy Ngay Dong Hanh – noi cac Nha tai tro, cac thanh vien va cac trai tim thien nguyen chung tay cung du an.

Nghe thuat gap giay Origami la gi?

Nghe thuat gap giay Nhat ban Origami hay Chiep chi (摺紙) la nghe thuat gap giay (hay nghe thuat xep giay) co xuat xu tu Nhat Ban. Origami la nghe thuat tao hinh ma thong qua cac nep gap nguoi ta co the bien cac to giay vo tri tro thanh mot the gioi day mau sac. Ban co the thoa suc sang tao voi chi 1 to giay, khong can bat ky dung cu nao khac nhu: dao, keo…

Hay de be yeu duoc thoa suc sang tao, thu gian, phat trien tu duy hinh hoc khong gian, logic, truu tuong. 

Hay de be yeu duoc ren luyen tinh tap trung, ti mi, can than quan sat va lam theo tung huong dan thao tac chi tiet.

Phi tham gia su kien : 100K/1 be bao gom nguyen vat lieu + khau phan an uong nhe danh cho be.
Nhanh tay dang ki tham gia su kien cho be de co buoi sang cuoi tuan thu vi va bo ich vi so luong ve co han. ( 15 ve).

Su kien se dien ra luc 9.00 - 11.00, Chu Nhat , ngay 20/12/2015 tai Fablab Sai Gon, 44/10 Nguyen Van Dau, Phuong 6, Quan Binh Thanh.

Theo kinh nghiem va duc ket tu viec tu van nhan su cho cac doanh nghiep hien nay cua PCG Viet Nam, viec tuyen dung cac nhan su that su co kha nang thang tien trong cong ty ngay cang tro nen kho khan hon khi cac ung cu vien ngay nay khong bat kip su doi hoi ve KY NANG MEM can thiet cho vi tri ung tuyen.

Kien thuc chuyen mon dong gop 15% vao su thanh cong cua mot nhan vien, va 85% con lai do KY NANG MEM quyet dinh DO BAT xa cua mot nhan vien se thang tien den dau trong mot doanh nghiep. Chinh vi vay, cac doanh nghiep hien nay hau het deu chu trong tim kiem cac ung cu vien co nhung ky nang mem can ban de bo tro cho hieu qua cong viec, do chinh la:

- KY NANG GIAO TIEP
- KY NANG TRINH BAY - THUYET TRINH
- KY NANG LAM VIEC NHOM

Kinh thua dai chung !

Trong vo so phap mon ma Duc Phat da chi day, chi co phuong phap phong sanh la de thuc hanh nhat de truong duong long tu bi cua chung ta. Luan Dai Tri do day rang: "Trong tat ca cac toi ac, toi sat sanh la nang nhat. Trong tat ca cac cong duc, khong giet hai la cong duc lon nhat". Sau day xin trich dan MUOI CONG DUC PHONG SANH :

1. Khong co nan dao binh, tranh duoc tai hoa chien tranh tan sat.

2. Song lau, manh khoe, it benh.

3. Tranh duoc thien tai, dich hoa khong gap cac tai nan.

4. Con chau dong duc, doi doi hung thanh noi doi khong ngung.

5. Cho mong cau duoc toai nguyen.

6. Cong viec lam an phat trien, buuon ban gap nhieu thuan loi.

7. Hop long troi, thuan tanh Phat, loai vat cam on, chu Phat hoan hy.

8. Giai tru oan han, cac deu ac tieu diet, khong co lo buon sau nao.

9. Vui huong an lanh, quanh nam deu duoc an on.

10. Tai sanh ve coi troi huong phuoc vo cung, neu co tu Tinh Do thi duoc vang sanh ve the gioi Tay Phuong Cuc Lac.

>>> De thiet thuc kinh mung dai le Khanh via duc PHAT A DI DA kim chuong tiep chung (ban tay vang cuu kho do sanh) …  pho bien rong khap y nghia cao thuong ve  nghi le phong sinh … Hoi nhung nguoi thich di Chua tung kinh, phong sinh, phat com tu thien - Chua Thien My va Hoi thien nguyen “Phat oi Ngai goi con” xin moi goi su hun phuoc cua dai chung phat tam AN TONG CUNG DUONG 10.000 ban "VAN KINH PHONG SINH" 

* Noi dung nghi thuc : Dai bi chu – Van phong sinh – Ba phep tro ve nuong tua -  Phuc nguyen hoi huong. 

* Gia tien : 4.500 VND / 1 ban .

* Tong kinh phi an tong 10.000 ban van kinh : 45.000.000 VND

 * Dai duc Thich Le Minh – Truong ban to chuc chuong trinh an tong kinh du kien se cung duong ban kinh nay den voi cac noi : Lop hoc giao ly An Quang  (500 ban kinh) + Chua Thien My (1.000 ban kinh) + Chua Hoi Ton (500 ban kinh) + Chua Tan Long (500 ban kinh) + Hoi 14 Chu (1.000 ban kinh) + Hoi thien nguyen “Phat oi Ngai goi con” (1.000 ban kinh) + CLB Ha Noi 14 Chu  (1.000 ban kinh) + CLB Da Nang 14 Chu  (500 ban kinh) + Cac dao trang sinh hoat tu hoc tai TP.HCM, Ha Noi, Tien Giang, Ben Tre (1.000 ban kinh) ... va nhung dao trang khac co nhu cau doc tung.

>>> Ban to chuc chuong trinh AN TONG CUNG DUONG  10.000 ban "VAN KINH PHONG SINH" rat mong dai chung hoan hy phat tam hun phuoc tinh tai yem tro cho Phat su noi tren duoc thanh tuu vien man. 

* Moi su hun phuoc an tong kinh, xin vui long lien he :

DAI DUC THICH LE MINH (HO DAC THAO) 

Chua Thien My, so 197/20 Cao Dat, P.1, Q5, TP.HCM

Dien thoai : 090 887 1357


* Hoac dai chung co the gui tinh tai phat tam an tong vao tai khoan :

* Ten TK : HO DAC THAO

Ma so TK : 0071002408603

Ngan hang Vietcombank TP.HCM - Phong giao dich Ben Nghe.

>>> Noi dung chuyen khoan : "VAN KINH PHONG SINH"

About Your Trip
See what being a DreamTrips Member is all about on this Welcome DreamTrip! Journey through Ben Luc and take a boat down the Mekong River to Vam Xep canal. Experience a day in the life of a local villager and join in on traditional festivities. There will also be optional training available to help you get the most out of your membership!

Ho Chi Minh City, also known as Saigon, is a southern Vietnam metropolis surrounded by mountains, dense jungle and ancient temples. The Mekong Delta’s maze of canals and islands are home to floating markets, rice paddies and isolated village communities. 


What's Included

4 days and 3 nights at Hotel Pullman Saigon Centre, 148 Tran Hung Dao Boulevard, District 1, 70000 Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
Featuring superior accommodations with king or twin beds and complimentary Wi-Fi.
3 breakfasts, 1 lunch, 2 dinners.
Full-day Mekong Delta excursion.
Welcome gift upon check-in.
An In-destination Support Specialist will be provided when 20 or more adults book this trip. Their goal is to ensure you have a great DreamTrips experience from landing to liftoff. They host a welcome reception on arrival day, attend scheduled activities throughout the trip, notify the group of itinerary updates and more.
Your trip includes 2 airport transfers:
January 3 at 10 a.m., 1 p.m., 4 p.m. or 6 p.m.: From Tan Son Nhat International Airport to hotel.
January 6 at 6 a.m., 9 a.m., noon or 3 p.m.: From hotel to Tan Son Nhat International Airport.
To take advantage of round-trip airport transfers, you must provide your flight information to the DreamTrips Specialist no later than December 17. These transfers are available only for the airport(s) and dates listed above. Click here to give us your flight information. Transfers will not be offered if the flight information is not received by the deadline and transfers at any other time will incur a separate charge. Do not email flight information to the DreamTrips Specialist.
Air transportation is not included. The closest commercial airport is Tan Son Nhat International Airport (SGN).
For any questions regarding this trip, contact the DreamTrips Specialist at DreamTrips@rovia.com.

Check-in: 2 p.m. Check-out: noon.

Enjoy your visit to Ho Chi Minh City to the fullest with your stay at Pullman Saigon Centre.

Loud Minority & Pasteur Street Brewing Company present:

LYDMOR
+ support

Doors: 8pm
Date: 19/01/16
Venue: Cargo, 7 Nguyen Tat Thanh
Tickets: 150k (adv) / 200k (door)

On sale via ticketbox.vn from 4th Dec.

#################################################

Loud Minority & Pasteur Street Brewing Company are excited to announce our next headline show with Denmark's most hotly-tipped artist for 2016, Lydmor.

Behind the curious and quite self-ironic name Lydmor (Danish for “Mother of Sound”), you find the 25-year old, Danish singer, songwriter and producer Jenny Rossander. 

Despite of her young age, Lydmor has experienced more than most musicians ever will. She have toured most of mainland Europe and southeast Asia on her own, been on “trust tours” all across the European continent, where she performed, lived and slept in the homes of her fans, collaborated with renowned artists such as Arsenal (BE), Alle Farben(DE), Amanda Palmer (US), Bottled in England (DK), etc. and finally established herself as one of the most promising underground artists in her native Denmark.

Now Lydmor is ready to launch her solo career onto a whole new level. Fearlessly the young Dane exposes all of herself in the quest of achieving true artistic integrity, and with the release of her new album “y”, Lydmor has done just that. Stacked with intensity, emotion and personal experience, the album portrays a woman far beyond her age telling stories of love, intoxication and deprivation with Lydmor’s fragile and yet breathtaking voice, on top of an ambient and oddly catchy, electronic soundscape. 

Lydmor is truly one of a kind, but to really appreciate her uniqueness, you have to hear it for yourself. Welcome to the Lydmor experience!

Giai viet da Tp. Ho Chi Minh (HCMC Run) la su kien the thao quy mo cap thanh pho duoc to chuc chuyen nghiep nham khuyen khich loi song nang dong va lanh manh trong cong dong. Tiep noi thanh cong tu cuoc thi nam 2013, HCMC Run 2016 voi su ho tro tu Lien Doan Dien Kinh Tp. Ho Chi Minh se duoc to chuc voi quy mo lon hon va nhieu cai thien hon.

Chay bo khong chi de cham den dich ma con la khong khi hao hung, nao nhiet xung quanh, la canh dep kich thich tinh than nguoi tham du. Voi lo trinh chay xoay quanh khu vuc Ho Ban Nguyet va cau Phu My, nguoi chay hay chuan bi san sang de thuong ngoan canh quan tuyet dep cua khu do thi cung canh song nuoc thoang dang bat ngat khi ban len den dinh cau Phu My, cay cau dep nhat thanh pho Ho Chi Minh.

Chi con hon 7 tuan nua la dien ra giai, cac ban nho dung bo lo nhe!

-------------------------------------------


[THONG TIN]

* Thong tin tu BTC: www.hcmcrun.com
* Nhung thong tin lien quan va can thiet cung se lien tuc duoc cap nhat ngay tai trang event nay

-------------------------------------------

[LUYEN TAP]

Nham muc tieu ho tro cho cac runner co duoc su chuan bi tot nhat huong den HCMC Run 2016, giai doan luyen tap chuyen sau trong 6 tuan cua VietRunners bao gom:

1. Seri 3 buoi tap chu de "Master The Bridge": 

* Huong dan ki thuat chay uphill va downhill, giup cac ban lam quen voi viec chay cau va tu tin tinh toan phan phoi suc de chinh phuc cau Phu My.
* Buoi tap dau tien trong seri 3 buoi, cung la de kick-off giai doan tap luyen chuyen sau, da dien ra hom Chu Nhat 22/11 tai cau Phu My (http://bit.ly/VR_MasterTheBridge_Session1)
* Hashtag #Master_the_Bridge #mtb
* Thong tin 2 buoi tiep theo cua chu de "Master The Bridge" se duoc cap nhat truoc 1 tuan.

2. Cac buoi tap chuyen de cua VietRunners trong tuan: 
(hotline Khoi 0915307783 - Tin 01656175167)

* [Tue] #HerdRunning - chu de Speed
- Thoi gian: tu 18h30 den 20h30
- Dia diem: SVD Hoa Lu & Cong vien Gia Dinh

* [Wed] #RunningTechnique - cac bai tap ki thuat
- Thoi gian: tu 18h45 den 20h15
- Dia diem: SVD Hoa Lu

* [Thu] #TimeTrial - chu de Stamina
- Thoi gian: tu 18h30 den 20h30
- Dia diem: SVD Hoa Lu & Cong vien Gia Dinh

* [Fri] #FreeRun - chay tu do
- Thoi gian: tu 18h30 den 20h
- Dia diem: SVD Hoa Lu & Cong vien Gia Dinh

* [Sat] #RoadRunning - ren luyen ki nang chay ngoai duong
- Thoi gian: tu 5h30 den 7h30
- Dia diem: Trung tam TDTT Rach Mieu
- Route: doc theo bo ke
- Cu li: tu 10km den 16km

* [Sun] #LongRun - cai thien Endurance
- Thoi gian: tu 5h30 den 8h30
- Route: tuy tung event
- Cu li: tu 21.1km tro len

3. CHAY KIEM TRA:

* De ho tro cho viec tap luyen cua ace runner hieu qua hon, ngay thu Ba dau tien cua thang se danh cho buoi chay kiem tra chi so.
* Dia diem: SVD Hoa Lu
* Hashtag: #VR_TestRun

-------------------------------------------

[DONG LUC]

* Dong luc luyen tap se duoc tang them 200% khi co 1 muc tieu cu the de phan dau :D
Moi cac ban chia se muc tieu cho HCMC Run 2016 tai day de cung "un" nhau nao: http://bit.ly/VietRunners_HCMCRun

* Viec luyen tap se tro nen thu vi hon, de dang hon, hieu qua hon khi co them su giao luu trao doi, khich le lan nhau tu cac runner.
- Cac runner co the lien tuc cap nhat qua trinh chuan bi cua minh tai trang event nay, hoac 
- Trong group page VietRunners (www.facebook.com/groups/Viet.Runners.and.Friends), hoac
- Tai bat cu dau voi hashtag #hcmcRun2016 

-------------------------------------------

Chuc cac ban luon chay vui va dat thanh tich tot tai HCMC Run 2016!

Happy running,

#hcmcRun2016
#VietRunners #Challenge_Your_Limits

ProPak VietNam 2016: Su kien thuong mai gioi thieu giai phap toan dien cho nganh cong nghiep Thuc pham, Nuoc uong va Duoc pham tai Viet Nam.

Trong lan thu 11 tro lai, ProPak Vietnam 2016 van se la su kien thuong mai quoc te hang dau ve nganh cong nghiep Thuc Pham, Nuoc uong va Duoc pham cua Viet Nam.

Trien lam ProPak Vietnam nam vua qua da thu hut 6937 khach tham quan thuong mai tu 28 quoc gia voi hon 38% la ban quan ly cap cao. Tu khao sat sau ProPak Vietnam 2015 cho thay hon 82% cac ban khao sat khach tham quan cho thay ho dang tim mua may moc va dich vu moi de nang cao nang luc dau tu trong 12 thang toi. 99% Khach mua hang nhat dinh se quay tro lai tham quan trien lam ProPak Vietnam 2016.
ProPak Vietnam 2016 nam nay bao gom tap trung vao nhu cau tang truong cua Viet Nam ve May moc, Cong nghe va Dich vu Dong goi, Che bien Duoc pham...

ProPak Vietnam 2016 nhan duoc su ho tro tu cac Hiep hoi chuyen nganh hang dau cung voi cac su kien dac biet gom cac chuong trinh hoi thao chuyen de gop phan nang cao tam voc trien lam va thu hut khach tham quan. Hay tham gia ProPak Vietnam 2016 vi su phat trien hon nua cua thuong mai Viet Nam.

• Thoi gian: Ngay 01-03 thang 3 nam 2016.
• Dia diem: Trung tam Hoi cho va Trien lam Sai Gon (S.E.C.C) –799 Nguyen Van Linh, Quan 7, Thanh pho Ho Chi Minh.
• Doi tuong khach tham quan chuyen nganh:
	- Nong nghiep 
	- San xuat nuoc giai khat 
	- Dong chai 
	- Ruou bia 
	- Dong hop 
	- San xuat hoa chat 
	- San xuat banh keo 
	- San xuat hang tieu dung 
	- Dong goi theo Hop dong 
	- San xuat my pham & cham soc suc khoe 
	- San xuat bo sua 
	- Cac phong thi nghiem chan doan 
	- San xuat thuc pham say kho 
	- Che bien Ca & Hai san 
	- Xuat khau thuc pham 
	- Phan phoi / Ban si va le thuc pham 
	- Chuyen gia thuc pham 
	- San xuat thuc pham dong lanh 
	- Co quan Chinh phu 
	- Giao duc & Hiep hoi 
	- Tu van cong nghiep 
	- Nhap khau & Phan phoi May moc 
	- San xuat vat lieu dong goi bao bi 
	- San xuat duoc pham 
	- San xuat thuc pham che bien & bao quan 
	- Quan ly chat luong 
	- Ky su Kho lanh / Bao quan lanh 
	- Nghien cuu & Phat trien (R&D) 
	- Dong goi bao bi le 
	- San xuat thuc an nhe 
	- Ky su Moi truong & Xu ly nuoc

• Quyen loi cho khach tham quan dang ky theo MESLAB:
- Chup hinh luu niem
- Lam the VIP (Voi doi tuong management level).
- Su dung phong VIP hoi hop / nghi ngoi (co phuc vu tra banh)
- Buffet trua
- Free danh ba trien lam (so luong co han)
- Qua tang luu niem
- Xe dua don tu khach san den trien lam (tu khach san tai Quan 7 qua Hall)
- Dat hen truoc voi don vi trung bay theo yeu cau.
- Chuong trinh tham quan dac biet danh rieng cho khach tu mien Bac va huong dan tham quan.

DAC BIET: Cac cong ty dang ky tham quan ProPak theo doan cua MES LAB, ngoai nhung quyen loi giong nhu doi voi cac doan tham quan khac, quan khach con duoc tham du MIEN PHI buoi dao tao co ban cua MES LAB ve Phat trien san pham.

Dang ky tham gia: http://goo.gl/forms/HVZc030ifI.
Thong tin lien he: Van phong MES LAB tai Ha Noi.
Dia chi: P301 CT8B The Sparks, Q.Ha Dong, Tp.HN.
Tell: 04 3640 8534 – Fax: 04 3640 8535/ 091.751.9900
Email: meslab@meslab.vn

Muc dich cua Hoi thao la nham chia se kinh nghiem cua Israel trong viec giai quyet nhu cau cua nguoi khuyet tat thong qua cac mo hinh xa hoi va cong nghe tien tien va de ho tro Viet Nam trong qua trinh thuc hien Cong uoc Quoc te ve cac Quyen cua Nguoi khuyet tat (CRPD).

Don vi to chuc: Truong Dai hoc San khau Dien anh Tp.HCM

Muc tieu: Huong nghiep cho sinh vien Dien tu, Tin hoc de tro thanh nhung chuyen gia cong nghe trong linh vuc San khau Dien anh.

Phi tham du: Khong.

Trong boi canh mang xa hoi dang ngay cang phat trien nhu hien nay, moi nguoi chi tro chuyen, trao doi hay tham chi bay to tai cam voi nhau qua ban phim thi viec so huu kha nang thuyet trinh loi cuon, quyen ru se tro thanh mot VU KHI BI MAT cua ban. Thanh cong cua mot nguoi chi bao gom 15% la kien thuc chuyen mon va den 85% la cac ky nang mem. Va thuyet trinh la mot trong so cac ky nang quan trong bac nhat ma ban can trang bi cho min ngay tu bay gio

Hay dang ky ngay de nhan duoc ve moi tham du buo hoi thao" Bi quyet thuyet trinh quyen ru" cua dien gia Phan Phuc Thang. Ban co muon biet nhung bi quyet de 
-Thuyet trinh 1 cach luu loat, cuon hut, di dom.
-Lam chu cam xuc, loi noi de thuyet trinh mot cach tu tin.
-Van dung toi da ngon ngu co the cua minh de tang hieu qua thuyet trinh len 10 lan.                                                                          -Cach to chuc va xay dung 1 bai THUYET TRINH AN TUONG

Dien gia : PHAN PHUC THANG
* Quan quan Speakers Got Talent 2013.
* Top 3 Cuoi Xuyen Viet 2015.
* La tam guong tap luyen de co giong noi day quyen ru.

----------------- THONG TIN DANG KY BUOI HOC ----------------
Thoi gian : 18h00 - 21h00 TOI THU TU (09/12/2015)
Hotline : 0946341648
Dia diem : 46 Nguyen Van Thu, Dakao, Quan 1, TP. HCM

Ethical fashion- Linda Mai Phung:
The fashion industry has a tremendous negative impact on our environment. It uses a lot of water, pollutes soils and water through the culture of cotton and dyeing processes, and creates huge waste of clothes people throw away. These are some of the reasons making that industry the second most polluting one after the oil industry.

On another hand, the textile and fashion industry is often condemned for not respecting human rights, and for good reasons, as shown in several documentaries. Child labor and modern slavery allow some of the biggest players in the fashion world to make millions by selling very cheap clothing.

Some brands and companies, including Kering, started to make commitments in order to improve both their impact on the planet and the respect of the workers of the industry. “Fair trade” and “Organic cotton” products have become more popular in some countries, for consumers looking for more sustainable ways of consuming.

Some companies use certifications to show their improvement.
At Linda Mai Phung, working ethically is in the brand’s DNA. We are trying to be responsible within our means on every subject. One of those is to work with cooperatives and promote Vietnamese handicraft.


About the Speaker:
Florence Bacin is the marketing and sales director of Linda Mai Phung.
In 2007, Florence graduated from Audencia, School of Management in France, thus getting her Master degree in management with a major in marketing.

During her studies and since then, she worked in communication and project management in various fields of sustainable development : fair trade, water, waste, microfinance.
After working for NGOs in Vietnam, Florence officially joined Linda Mai Phung in January 2012, when she became Linda's associate.

Nganh cong nghiep thoi trang co tac dong tieu cuc manh me toi moi truong cua chung ta. Nganh nay su dung rat nhieu nuoc, gay o nhiem dat va nuoc thong qua viec trong bong va cac quy trinh nhuom, dong thoi tao ra rat nhieu chat thai (quan ao ma chung ta bo di). Day la mot vai ly do khien cho nganh nay tro thanh nganh cong nghiep gay o nhiem thu hai, chi sau dau mo.

Mat khac, nganh nay con duoc xem la khong ton trong quyen con nguoi, va voi nhieu ly do, nhu la duoc trinh bay trong nhieu tai lieu. Lao dong tre em va lao dong qua suc giup cho mot so nguoi co vai tro lon trong nganh thoi trang tren the gioi kiem hang ti dong bang cach ban quan ao voi gia rat re.

Mot vai nhan hang va cong ty, bao gom ca Kering, bat dau cam ket giam thieu nhung anh huong cua ho toi Trai dat va ton trong nguoi lao dong hon. “Ban hang cong bang” va nhung san pham duoc lam tu “vai bong huu co” da tro nen pho bien tai mot so nuoc, cho nhung nguoi mua muon tim kiem nhung giai phap tieu thu ben vung hon.

Mot so cong ty su dung nhung chung nhan de the hien nhung cai thien cua minh. Tai Linda Mai Phung, dao duc nghe nghiep duoc xem la DNA cua thuong hieu nay. Chung toi co gang chiu trach nhiem bang nhung phuong tien co the trong tat ca moi lanh vuc. Mot trong nhung phuong tien do la lam viec voi nhung tap doan va quang cao cho cac san pham dia phuong cua Viet Nam.

Florence Bacin la giam doc quang cao va ban hang cua cong ty Linda Mai Phung.

Nam 2007, Florence tot nghiep truong quan ly Audencia, Phap, va nhan bang thac si ve Quan tri voi chuyen nganh quang cao. 

Trong qua trinh hoc va sau do, co phu trach mang truyen thong va quan ly du an cho nhieu du an phat trien ben vung: thuong mai cong bang, nuoc, chat thai, tai chinh nho.

Sau khi lam viec cho nhieu to chuc phi chinh phu tai Viet Nam, Florence chinh thuc gia nhap Linda Mai Phung vao thang 1/2012 khi co tro thanh cong tac cua Linda.

Chao mung anh em den voi Saigon Cypher, san choi cho Mcs, Djs va cac Producers trong Sai Gon, Vietnam

Day la du an voi muc dich ket noi cac nghe si voi nhau, nham trao doi va thao luan voi tat ca nhung ai muon chia se dam me Hiphop
Anh em MCs co the freestyle, hoac vut vai doan lyrics len day choi....

O day ko rang buoc luat le gi nhieu, tuy nhien

- KHONG ca deu, cu ban, chim lon

- KHONG hung hang, lac cac, cap kenh, loi lom

- KHONG thai do tieu cuc

DJs co the choi nhac, the hien 1 vai set ngan. Chi can cho chung toi biet truoc de chuan bi.

Producers co co hoi cu trinh bay y tuong de anh em MC rap tren cac track cua ban. Biet dau anh em se tim duoc ca cung de hop tac voi nhau o day.

Anh em co the upload nhac moi hoac 1 vai thong tin ve san pham am nhac cua minh, nhung lam on dung quang cao qua dang mat cong xoa lam.

Ok, anh em hiphop thich thi nhich nhe. 

Hoan nghenh anh em tham gia voi chung toi, tai bar "La Canalla" - 44e Pasteur, q1

Free entry. 18:00-late.






Welcome to the Saigon Cypher, a platform for MCs, DJs and Producers in the southern capital of Vietnam

It´s a project with the intention to connect artists, to exchange and to have some good sessions with people who share the same passion for Hip Hop.
MCs can freestyle or spit lyrics, there are no rules...except:

NO Beef

NO Aggressive battle

NO bad vibes

DJs can play beats and show skills with short sets, just let us know before in this group, so that we are prepared.

Producers get the chance to show their work, have different MCs rapping on their tracks and maybe find a good cobination to work with others.


So if you enjoy and love Hip Hop, you are welcome to join us at the "Canalla" bar at 44e Pasteur. in district 1.

Join the group and get involved.

Listen to Me Marlon (USA, 2015)
8.2/10·IMDb
97%·Rotten Tomatoes
4/5·The Guardian
4/5·The Independent

Marlon Brando on Marlon Brando. Few people know that throughout his life, the great American actor recorded a vast amount of personal audio tapes, self-hypnosis sessions and business meetings. Like a sci-fi film, Stevan Riley’s documentary opens with a digital recreation of Brando’s face – he himself ‘mapped’ his face digitally years before – and that unmistakable voice comes back booming from the dead. Riley juxtaposes selected audio sessions with archival footage, film reels and still images from the tumultuous and tragic life of Brando. From his theatrical breakthrough in A Streetcar Named Desire, his thoughts on acting, his mentor Stella Adler, his political views to his family life, Listen to Me Marlon is the ultimate intimate portrayal of a great but complicated artist that changed the art of acting forever.

Variety just published the Oscar nominations for Best Documentary and Listen to Me Marlon happens to be under consideration for the prestigious award.

(English subtitles available)

Ap dung Phuong phap Chi phi Du hanh vao Kinh te hoc Suc khoe (An Application of Travel Cost Method into Health Economics)

Nguoi trinh bay (presenter): Le Thanh Nhan

11h00, thu Nam, 10-12-2015
Hoi truong H.001, Khoa Kinh te UEH

Noi dung: Phuong phap Chi phi Du hanh (TCM) ban dau duoc dung de uoc luong nhu cau doi voi cac canh quan, noi vui choi giai tri, tu do xac dinh gia tri cho nhung canh quan nay. Sau do, phuong phap nay duoc mo rong ra cho mot so linh vuc khac, trong do co lien quan den linh vuc kinh te suc khoe nhu xac dinh gia tri loi ich cua vaccine hay lua chon co so kham chua benh... Buoi semnar STBI nay se tap trung vao 3 noi dung chinh:
- Gioi thieu tom tat ve phuong phap chi phi du hanh (TCM)
- Nhung van de dat ra khi ap dung phuong phap chi phi du hanh vao trong nghien cuu thuc te
- Nghien cuu tinh huong: Uoc luong gia tri loi ich tu trong viec cung cap vaccine phong chong benh ta o Beria, Mozambique - Tiep can bang chi phi du hanh (Jeuland, Lucas, Clemens, Whittington, 2010)

Outline: (i) An overview about Travel Cost Method (ii) Challenges for Travel Cost Method (iii) Application into Health Economics: Case-study "Estimating the private benefits of vaccination against cholera in Beira, Mozambique: A travel cost approach" (Jeuland, Lucas, Clemens, Whittington, 2010)

http://auschamvn.org/events/auscham-hcmc-luncheon-briefing-why-asean-why-now/

[This event will also be held in Hanoi on 9 December 2015.]

Australia’s Trade and Investment Minister, Andrew Robb, recently released a strategic report titled, “Why ASEAN and why now?”. The report highlights the importance of ASEAN as a key trading partner for Australia, accounting for 15 per cent of Australia’s total trade with a value of A$90 billion – this is larger market than any other single country, except China.

More than 600 million people live in ASEAN, half of whom are under the age of 35. It has a booming middle class, rising per capita incomes, increased discretionary and discerning consumer behaviour, rapid urbanisation and heavy demand for infrastructure investment and value added services.

AusCham, together with Austrade, will host a business briefing that brings together government and private sector representatives with Australian interests to explore the impacts of imminent change in ASEAN on Vietnam and Australia.

Simon Merrifield, Australia’s Ambassador to ASEAN based in Jakarta, will provide a key note address on the opportunities and challenges he sees for Australian businesses operating across ASEAN and other expert speakers from AusCham member businesses will share their practical observations and local experiences.

This event is not to be missed if your business is developing its strategy in ASEAN.

Guest Speakers

    Opening: John McAnulty, Australian Consul-General, HCMC
    Key note speaker: Simon Merrifield, Australian Ambassador to ASEAN
    Panelists: Dennis Hussey, CEO, ANZ Vietnam; Scott Croll, General Director, Linfox Logistics (Vietnam); Pham The Tran, Vice President of Marketing, Bluescope; and Justin Gisz, Partner, Frasers Law Company.
    Closing Remarks: Janelle Casey, Austrade Senior Trade Commissioner

In this year, Renaissance International School Saigon will organize the Winter Fair on December 10th, 2015. This Winter Fair 2015 will be held with the aim of tightening connection between pupils, teachers, and social community. At the fair, not only pupils will have opportunity to take part in real business to organize themselves their own selling corner but also business can sell goods and connect with our pupils. 

You will enjoy very special prize at this fair

TOA DAM "HIEN TANG - SE CHIA" - Ngay 10.12.2015

A./ MUC DICH TO CHUC TOA DAM 

Truyen thong van hoa Viet Nam luon de cao hai pham chat quy gia cua con nguoi - do la phuoc va duc. Phuoc la nang luong duoc tao ra tu hanh dong huong toi ke khac de giup do, con duc la nang luong duoc tao ra tu qua trinh chuyen hoa nang luong xau va phat huy nang luong tot cua ban than. Nhung thuc chat phuoc cung chinh la duc, va nguoc lai. Vi trong khi huong toi ke khac de giup do, ta khong ngung quan sat thai do bam viu va doi hoi cua minh de buong bo, nhu vay la ta vua co phuoc ma cung vua co duc.

Tinh thuong chan that la tinh thuong khong co dieu kien hay rat it dieu kien. No rat nhe. Nhe den noi gio co the cuon di khap ngan phuong - “Song trong doi song, can co mot tam long. De lam gi em biet khong? De gio cuon di, de gio cuon di”.

Tinh thuong dung la mon qua cao quy nhat ma ai cung can. Du ta hien tang bat cu mon qua nao di chang nua thi tam long chan that moi that su quyet dinh nen gia tri dich thuc cua su hien tang.

“Tat ca cung tan phai - Chi tinh thuong o lai

Nhung gi trao hom nay - Se theo nhau mai mai”

We will do our very first informal Fintech meetup in Saigon and will give you an exclusive handout of the first Fintech Vietnam Startup Study.

Join us, whether you are working in a fintech startup, in banking/insurance or if you are just about to know Fintech.

8.10 to 8.30 Chat and Drinks

best regards
