VIPsearch is going to organize the "Leadership With EQ" Workshop on this 11 December, 2015, focusing on how to successfully apply EQ in leadership & talent acquisition and organizational development to stay competitive in today's market. 
We consider this as a chance to express our sincere thanks and deliver the most grateful and practical gift towards all of our partners and candidates on the way to close such a successful business year. 

Please refer to the following information for further details:

WORKSHOP: LEADERSHIP WITH EQ

OUTCOMES 
1. Distinguished the significant differences between Intelligent Quotient (IQ) and Emotional Quotient (EQ). 
2. Develop the 5 key competencies of emotional intelligence. 
3. Improve self-management and empathy. 
4. Improved relationship-management. 
5. Develop effective leadership skills and establishing winning teams.

SPEAKER
Dr. Pete Ooi Pit Tatt, CTP, ACIS, CFP, MBA, PhD, is the President of Global Leadership Academy (GLA), Malaysia.
He has conducted lecturing and training in management and leadership programs extensively for more than 20,000 people, including entrepreneurs, senior managers, managers and executives from various industries such as multi-national companies, public listed companies, small medium enterprises, non-government organizations and government and private universities and other organizations in Malaysia, Vietnam, Philippines and the Kingdom of Qatar, Bahrain and Saudi Arabia.

TIME AND VENUE:
08:00-12:00, Friday December 11, 2015
Floor 9, Kim Do Royal Hotel, 133 Nguyen Hue, Ben Nghe, D.1, HCMC

AGENDA:
            08:00 – 08:30           Checking & Networking
            08:30 – 09:15           Section 1: IQ vs EQ
            09:15 – 10:00          Section 2: Emotions & Behavior 
            10:00 – 10:15          Teabreak & Netwoking
            10:15 – 11:00          Section 3: Leader With EQ
            11:00 – 11:45          Section 4: Leadership Skills
            11:45 – 12:00          Summary and Closing

Cau lac bo Kien truc Xanh TP. Ho Chi Minh duoc thanh lap vao thang 09/2011 la noi tap hop cac thanh vien tu nhieu linh vuc, co cung quan tam va nhiet huyet trong viec thiet ke va xay dung cac Cong trinh Xanh tai Viet Nam. 

Trai qua gan 4 nam hoat dong, cung su ho tro cua Trung tam Tiet kiem Nang luong TP.HCM va Hoi Kien truc su TP.HCM, Cau lac bo (CLB) ngay cang phat trien voi so luong thanh vien chinh thuc gan 300 nguoi, to chuc duoc 8 Hoi thao chuyen nganh lon ve kien truc, vat lieu, trang thiet bi va cong nghe xanh,... Cac hoi thao duoc CLB to chuc theo huong "trao doi" kien thuc, "chia se" giai phap va "ung dung" thuc tien,voi su tham gia cua cac cong ty va chuyen gia trong cung linh vuc. 

Ben canh do, CLB con to chuc duoc nhieu hoat dong ngoai khoa khac nhu: tham quan cong trinh thuc te (Dai hoc RMIT, President Place Building, Nha tre PouChen, Green Square BigC, Vattanac Capital, Vista Verde, Van phong cong ty TTT Architects,…), tham gia giang day (Dai hoc Bach Khoa TP.HCM, CanTho, Da Nang, ...), tham gia thuyet trinh tai cac hoi thao va su kien chuyen nganh (Hoi thao cua VGBC, ECC, ...) va to chuc cac buoi Chuyen de co tinh chuyen mon cao.

Hoi thao danh 100 suat tham du cho cac ban sinh vien quan tam giao duc dai hoc tai Phan Lan, cac ban nhanh tay dang ky nhe.
---
Khach moi: Dai hoc Eastern Finland, Dai hoc Turku, Dai hoc Tampere
Phan Lan la mot trong so cac quoc gia phat trien co nen giao duc tien tien va mien hoc phi (mot so truong con tra luong cho sinh vien)

CHUAN BI CHO CHUYEN DI
---------------------------------------

THIET BI

Tieu cu tu 16 den 35mm de chup ho
35-70mm chup nui tuong doi khong xa lam.
70-200 F4 co the mang theo du bi chup nui xa neu co.

Filters Grad ND, ND neu co de phoi

Bao nylon trum may de chong suong hay van nuoc
Khan micro fiber va giay lau lens, filter.

Den pin de di va ho tro gan thiet bi luc troi toi
Thuoc xit muoi

QUAN AO

III. LICH TRINH CHI TIET
NGAY 1 : TP.HO CHI MINH – BEN LUC – TP.MY THO – CHO GAO – TX.GO CONG (110 Km)
Buoi sang: 08h00 ngay 12/12/2015 xe don doan tai Cung van hoa Lao dong khoi hanh di con duong hoa muoi gio o Ben Luc.
Sang tac anh tai con duong hoa muoi gio, noi day duoc menh danh la con duong hoa muoi gio dep nhat Viet Nam voi hai ben thang tam tap la nhung bong hoa khoe sac no tu 9h00 sang den 12h00 trua, nhung bong hoa muoi gio ngoai tac dung lam dep them cho khung canh thien nhien tho mong con co tac dung thu hut nhung loai con trung co loi den de diet tru sau ray cho dong ruong.
Tham quan lang Nguyen Huynh Duc la mot trong nhung kien truc lang mo co nhat o Long An con ton tai gan nhu nguyen ven cho den ngay nay. Day la mot quan the kien truc bao gom cac cong trinh chinh nhu cong, lang mo, den tho Kien Xuong Quan cong Nguyen Huynh Duc, mot cong than khai quoc cua Trieu Nguyen. Lang duoc xay dung nam 1817 bang da ong va vua tam hop theo huong Bac-Nam theo loi co, co vong thanh hinh chu nhat dai 35m, rong 19m, cao1.2m.
Doan khoi hanh ve thanh pho My Tho dung com trua.
Buoi chieu: 
Doan tham quan di tich Go Thanh o Cho Gao, Tien Giang, noi day noi tieng la mot dia diem khao co lon voi nhieu di chi mo tang, kien truc, cu tru cua van hoa Oc Eo thuoc nien dai the ky thu IV – VI Truoc Cong Nguyen. 
Doan nhan phong va nghi ngoi o Go Cong.
Chup hoang hon o bien Tan Thanh.
Buoi toi: Doan dung bua toi dac san dia phuong va tu do kham pha thi xa Go Cong ve dem.
NGAY 2 : TX.GO CONG – TAN QUY DONG -  TP.HO CHI MINH (80 Km)
Buoi sang: Chup anh phoi sang steel wool tren bai bien Tan Thanh.. 
Sang tac anh canh day xiep va don binh minh tai gac ngheu.
Sang tac doi thuong canh cao ngheu, hang chuc nguoi lon nho do ra bai bien Tan Thanh de cao ngheu. Ngheu Tan Thanh dac biet to va ngot thit va la mon da lam nen ten tuoi cua vung bien Tan Thanh.
Doan dung bua sang.
Di chuyen qua huyen Tan Phu Dong chup thu hoach sa cua ba con nong dan.
Buoi trua: Doan dung com trua.
Tham quan va sang tac anh tai ngoi co Tan Dong con goi la dinh Go Tao, mot ngoi dinh co doc nhat vo nhi o Viet Nam vi nam duoi goc mot cay bo de hang tram bui re bao boc tron than dinh. Ngoi dinh voi loi kien truc co hang tram nam nay, voi loi kien truc va anh sang ket hop voi nhung bo re doc dao da lam nen ten tuoi cua ngoi den.
Khoi hanh ve thanh pho Ho Chi Minh. 
Buoi chieu: 16h00 ngay 13/12/2015: Tra doan tai diem Cung van hoa lao dong, ket thuc chuyen sang tac.

Mot co gai dep luon co suc hap dan voi cac chang trai, va de giu duoc ho thi dep thoi la chua du. Tuong tu, mot san pham muon thu hut duoc nguoi dung it nhat no phai dep (visual branding), va de giu chan duoc khach hang thi trai nghiem trong qua trinh su dung (UI / UX) phai tuyet hao.

Tuy nhien, khong nhieu startup co team du manh de co the lam moi van de. Co nhieu startup  van chua co duoc cac mau thiet ke giao dien tot, chua xay dung trai nghiem nguoi dung ung y cho san pham cua minh, hoac doi khi khong tu danh gia duoc thiet ke hien tai co du hap dan va lam hai long khach hang hay khong?
Do do, SHIELD cung voi C.hub mang den cho ban mot workshop voi chu de: “Review your brand identity and UI/UX design ”

Workshop danh cho cac startup muon cai thien thiet ke thuong hieu va UI/UX, cung nhu cac ban  co mong muon hieu ro ve cac tieu chi danh gia mot mau thiet ke, lang nghe bai hoc kinh nghiem tu cac chuyen gia trong linh vuc thiet ke thuong hieu va thiet ke UI/ UX, de co the tu danh gia va hoan thien thiet ke cua minh tot hon.

Khach moi:
- Anh Hoang Nguyen, Senior Product Designer - iLabs, Silicon Valley, USA.
- Chi Huynh Nguyen Thao:
Design Manager - Pham Nguyen Confectionery Corporation
Former Senior Designer – Masan Consumer
Co-founder – C.Hub.

Noi dung:
6:00 – 6:30: Check-in, gioi thieu khach moi
6:30 – 7:15: Chi Nguyen Thao chia se ve thiet ke thuong hieu
7:15 – 8:00: Anh Hoang Nguyen chia se ve UI/ UX
8:00 – 8:30: Q&A
8:30 – 9:00: Networking

Thoi gian: 6:00 ­ 9:00 PM, ngay 11/12/2015
Dia diem: Dreamplex, 21 Nguyen Trung Ngan, Q.1, TP.HCM

De dap ung nhu cau cua cac ban, nhom chung toi da mo ra workshop lam do handmade de cho cac ban den vui choi, giai tri va giao luu cung nhau. Workshop lam do da lan dau tien dien ra vo cung tot dep, nhin thay cac ban vua lam viec, vua vui dua tro chuyen, nhom nhan ra rang can tiep duy tri nhung san choi bo ich nhu the nay de cac ban co nhung hoat dong xa hoi lanh manh, thiet thuc va y nghia.

Nhung mon qua tu lam luon mang mot net doc dao rieng, no the hien duoc ca tinh cua nguoi su dung. Ngoai ra, bang chut tai le nay, ban con co the lam de tang cho nhung nguoi than yeu cua minh. Khong gi y nghia bang viec tang cho ban be, nguoi than nhung mon qua doc dao, cuc chat, khong dung hang ma lai duoc lam tu chinh tay nguoi tang.

Tuan nay, van se co workshop lam do da cho cac ban chua kip dang ki hoc tuan vua roi. De lop hoc hieu qua, so luong nguoi tham gia se duoc gioi han. Cac ban vui long dang ki som nhe, de minh chuan bi du nguyen phu lieu cho cac ban dung.

Thoi gian: 9am - 11am

Theo mot thong ke, toi hon 60% sinh vien ra truong lam trai voi nganh dao tao. Do viec thieu dinh huong, khong it cac ban roi vao tinh trang chan nan voi “me cung” trai nganh. Lien tuc thay doi cong viec, lang phi thoi gian, khong tich luy duoc kinh nghiem, do la nguyen nhan khien cac ban bo qua rat nhieu co hoi nghe nghiep.

Tren thuc te, nganh Tiep thi & Truyen thong co rat nhieu canh cua co hoi voi cac phan nganh khac nhau. Dieu quan trong nhat la ban xac dinh duoc, minh se lam viec trong loai cong ty nao: Client (nhan hang) hay Agency (cong ty tu van) roi moi den phan nganh nao: Trade, Research, Media, hay PR, Event, Digital,…?

Nham giup do cac ban tre tim duoc huong di phu hop va xay dung mot ke hoach nghe nghiep kha thi, AIM Academy gioi thieu "CAREER COMPASS” - chuoi hoi thao huong nghiep chuyen nganh Tiep thi & Truyen thong duoc to chuc moi thu Bay hang tuan.

3 dieu ban nhan duoc ngay khi den voi CAREER COMPASS:
✔ THAY duoc buc tranh toan canh nganh Tiep thi & Truyen thong, nhung phan nganh khac nhau, su khac biet giua 2 “phe” Client – Agency va cau chuyen thu vi dang sau moi cong viec.
✔ NGHE chia se nhung ki nang can thiet de dap ung yeu cau tuyen dung cua tung phan nganh trong cac Client - Agency hang dau.
✔ GIAI DAP thac mac, tu van huong nghiep tu kinh nghiem cua nhung chuyen gia dau nganh.

Tai AIM Academy, anh Alex cam ket mang lai cho hoc vien nhung trai nghiem tot nhat va dinh huong nghe nghiep lau dai. Ban da hai long voi du an Internet-of-Thing (IoT) tu tao nut bam khong day va quan sat nhiet do tu xa lan truoc chua? Hay la ban muon nhieu hon nua la tao ra thiet bi co the dieu khien thiet bi dien tu khac tu xa? Lan nay chung toi se cung ban xay dung he thong IoT co the dieu khien duoc cac thiet bi dien tu khac trong nha qua Internet hay cu the hon la qua nen web. Ban thu nghi ban co the tao ra thiet bi dieu khien den ban, TV, may lanh hoac noi com dien qua web thi sao? Ban co thuc su hung thu voi dieu do khong? Neu cau tra loi la co thi hay den voi khoa hoc phan 2 "Dieu khien thiet bi dien tu tu Web" duoc to chuc tai Fablab Saigon vao ngay 12/12 toi day. 
Nhung noi dung ma ban se co the hoc them khi den voi khoa hoc phan 2 cua chung toi la:
1. Xay dung web server co ban tren module NodeMCU
2. Bat tat thiet bi dien tu thong qua web bang POST, GET hay dung websocket
3. Cac cach thong dung de bat tat thiet bi dien tu nhu relay, hong ngoai, hoac co khi.
4. Mo rong xa hon ve giao thuc MQTT duoc dung pho bien trong IoT 
Cac thiet bi phan cung sau day se duoc cung cap:
1. Relay 5V
2. Mat hong ngoai
Neu ban chua co thiet bi phan cung NodeMCU thi chung toi co the cung cap rieng cho ban voi gia 200K/1 module + cap USB.
Con cho gi nua ma khong cung chung toi xay dung he thong thong minh IoT cho nha ban di nao.

Cau chuyen ve chiec tat Giang sinh

Theo truyen thuyet cua nguoi Ha Lan, rang vao the ky 16, co mot nghi thuc le truyen thong cua tre em Ha Lan danh cho vi thanh mang ten Sinterklaas. Sinterklaas co nguon tu tieng Tay Ban Nha la Sint Niklaas (Saint Nicholas – Thanh Nicholas). 
Tre con rat yeu quy ong va chung se dang tang cho ong cac loai ngu coc va nhung doi guoc go day rom de ong co the nuoi dan lua cua minh. Va dap lai tam long do, ong Sinteklaas se de lai trong guoc cua chung qua va banh keo. Ve sau, khi nguoi My tiep nhan van hoa nay, ho da doi ong Sinterklaas thanh “Santa Claus”, dan lua thanh xe tuan loc va guoc go thanh nhung chiec vo cho den ngay hom nay.

Hoa vao khong khi Giang sinh nam nay, cac be truong Mam non Sao Sang se tu tay minh sang tao nen chiec tat that dac sac de chao don Ong gia Noel ve chung vui voi cac be. Cac ban oi, cung tham gia nao!

Tham thoat da duoc 20 nam biet nhau, thoi gian du dai de tat ca chung ta nhin nhan lai nhung gi da thuc hien duoc, nhung gi da qua, de tat ca cac thanh vien chung ta hieu ve nhau hon, cung chuc mung nhau vi nhung thanh tuu, chia se nhau nhung kho khan trong cong viec… lop chung ta se to chuc buoi hop lop vao ngay 12/12/2015, hy vong day se la mot cot moc dang nho trong cuoc doi cua moi thanh vien BTX12A3

• Ky niem 20 nam biet nhau tu pho thong trung hoc.

4. Thu moi: facebook, dien thoai.

a. 17h00: Don tiep Thay co giao.
b. 17h30: Khai mac
Dai dien lop dung ra mo dau buoi hop lop, tong ket nhung thong tin cua thanh vien nhu: Cong viec, tinh trang hon nhan, nhung hoat dong cu the tang tinh doan ket, nhung ke hoach cho nhung nam toi cua lop…, co ai ca nhan xuat sac Khong, neu luon …

h. 20h00: Ket thuc nhau
i. Sau 20h00: di tang 2, tang 3 … khong nam trong ke hoach

7. Cong tac chuan bi:
Do mot so ban o xa, hoac co cong viec rieng, nen cac hoat dong cua lop tam thoi co mot so ban dai dien nhu sau:

Dau hieu ngung tho khi ngu la trieu chung thuong gap cua nguoi bi ngung tho khi ngu la ngay, buon ngu vao ban ngay, dau that nguc ve dem, giat minh thuc giac kem theo tho gap, ngat tho...Neu khong chua tri kip thoi se gay hai cho tim mach, tham chi co the dot quy.

Nham  tao dieu kien cho cong dong co co hoi tam soat phat hien, du phong va dieu tri som chung ngung tho khi ngu Thac si - Bac si Nguyen Duc Long Benh vien Da Khoa Hong Duc se tu van ve nhung nguyen nhan va cach dieu tri hieu qua ve chung ngung tho khi ngu va ngu ngay va tang phieu kham mien phi. 
Co nhieu nguoi mac benh ngay hoac ngung tho nhieu lan trong khi ngu. Khoang 80% nam gioi va 60% nu gioi thuong ngay khi ngu; con ngay va ngung tho khi ngu thi gap o 4% nam gioi va 2% nu gioi. Cac trieu chung roi loan giac ngu bao gom: mat ngu, ngung tho khi ngu, benh Narcolepsy (ngu guc khong cuong duoc), hoi chung chan khong yen, benh Parasominias (noi mo, mong du…). Trong do, ngung tho khi ngu la pho bien nhat.
Chuong trinh do Cong Ty TNHH MTV OneHealth va To Truyen Thong - Giao Duc Suc Khoe (T3G) Benh Vien Da Khoa Hong Duc cung phoi hop to chuc chuong trinh tu van suc khoe: “Tam soat  hoi chung ngung tho khi ngu & ngu ngay”.

SPARKLING PROM 2015

Sparkling Prom la chuong trinh da hoi tot nghiep mang tinh nhan van ket hop vui choi danh cho cac ban sinh vien dai hoc Hoa Sen noi chung va khoa Ngon Ngu va Van Hoa Hoc noi rieng.

Dac biet thong qua chuong trinh nay chung toi mong muon danh tang cho cac ban tan cu nhan cung cac giang vien mot bua tiec than tinh am ap noi co, thay va tro co the cung nhau chia se nhung ki niem, nhung tinh cam gan bo, nhung tam tu suy nghi cua minh va cung nhau truyen di ngon lua cua nhiet huyet va hy vong vao tuong lai truoc ngay le tot nghiep. 

Chuong trinh se bao gom:
+ Hoat dong truyen lua tiep noi nhiet huyet cua giang vien voi cac sinh vien, tan cu nhan.
+ Tham du buoi tiec buffet ngoai troi voi nhieu mon an da dang hap dan trong khong gian xanh, lang man.
+ Thuong thuc Sparkling Wine va nhieu thuc uong khac.
+ Cac tiet muc am nhac sau lang nhung khong kem phan soi dong nhu acoustic, nhay hien dai,... 
+ Chuong trinh khieu vu cuc ki dac sac.
+ Hoat dong tang sach cua giang vien cho sinh vien dac biet la cac ban tan cu nhan.
+ Co hoi tham gia rat nhieu tro choi thu vi va soi dong voi rat nhieu phan qua co gia tri.
+ Va rat nhieu chuong trinh hap dan khac nhu kich, trinh dien ao thuat, ve Henna, boi Tarrot...

The AmCham Board of Governors cordially invites you to the 20th Annual AmCham Governors’ Ball, this year to be held on Saturday, December 12, 2015, from 6:30 pm. Our theme is A Northern Christmas ... where there's always a "White Christmas."

2015 marks the 20th year of not only our Governors’ Ball, but also the normalization of relations between Vietnam of U.S. and Vietnam. As such, it is indeed a special year and one worth celebrating in perhaps even greater style than years’ past.

This year’s holiday fete will feature unsurpassed gourmet fare, currently under creation by the InterContinental’s new chef, diverse and first-class musical entertainment, and, of course, the usual abundance of holiday fellowship and cheer.

The Governors’ Ball brings together the extended American community of our members, spouses and friends, together with U.S. and Vietnamese business and government leaders, in a festive and charitable setting. All proceeds from the 2015 Governors’ Ball will go to support AmCham’s flagship CSR initiative, the AmCham Scholarships Program. The Scholarships Program recognizes top Vietnamese students at Vietnam National University and other select HCMC schools, and helps prepare them to become local leaders in business, education and society. The Program is managed entirely by  AmCham Alumni(ae) and HR associates at AmCham member companies, and it annually awards approximately 80 coveted scholarships to outstanding local students.

Hoac quy vi co the gui email xac nhan xin gui ve dia chi: info@saigonclassical.vn, voi tieu de: Dang ky tham du chuong trinh [ten chuong trinh], noi dung: Ho va ten, Email, Dien thoai, neu co nguoi di kem vui long dien thong tin tuong tu de ban to chuc dua vao danh sac tham du.

De nghi trang phuc trang trong, lich su.

Khong dan theo tre em duoi 6 tuoi.Vui long co mat truoc buoi bieu dien 15 phut. BTC se dong cua khi chuong trinh bat dau.

Neu quy vi den tre vui long cho den het 1/2 chuong trinh.Saigon Classical va cac nghe si luon huong den muc dich phi loi nhuan va no luc mang den nhung chuong trinh hoa nhac chat luong den voi cong dong. Tuy nhien, de co the duy tri va phat trien cac hoat dong, chung toi rat can nhung dong gop ve mat tinh than cung nhu vat chat tu quy vi. Moi dong gop du it du nhieu cung la dong luc de chung toi tiep tuc hoan thien nhung chuong trinh tiep theo.
Quy vi co the dong gop tai ban le tan trong dem bieu dien voi muc toi thieu la 50.000VND/nguoi. Chung toi xin chan thanh cam on.

❤❤❤ NGAY HOI "Tiep Lua Tinh Nguyen" ❤❤❤

Mot hoat dong khong the bo lo vao giua thang 12 sap toi, Ban Tinh Nguyen Truong DH KHTN se to chuc ngay hoi “Tiep lua tinh nguyen”. Day la hoat dong mang tinh moi me, tao cho cac ban sinh vien mot san choi vo cung y nghia va dam chat tinh nguyen.
- Thoi gian: tu 7h00 den 11h00 ngay 13/12/2015
- Dia diem: San truong Dai hoc Khoa hoc Tu nhien – co so 2 (Thu Duc-Di An)
Den voi ngay hoi, cac ban se co dip cam nhan duoc su hap dan qua nhung hoat dong co trong ngay hoi nhu sau:


<3 LE KET NAP THANH VIEN MOI BAN TINH NGUYEN <3 
Nhung con nguoi mang trong minh ngon lua dang ruc chay vi suc tre, nguyen mang het suc luc va su tam huyet cua minh de cong hien cho nhung hoat dong mang day tinh nhan van – Doi truong cua Doi CTXH va Doi truong tat ca cac Doi SVTN cua cac khoa.
- Thoi gian: tu 8h30 den 8h40.
- Dia diem: Khu vuc san khau chinh


<3 CHUNG TOI YEU TINH NGUYEN <3 
- Thoi gian: Tu 7h00 den 11h00
- Dia diem: San truong.
Khi tham gia ngay hoi, cac ban se co co hoi chiem nguong hinh anh ghi nhan lai nhung khoanh khac y nghia nhat trong nhung hoat dong tinh nguyen da duoc to chuc tu truoc den nay.
Dac biet hon nua, co hoi trai nghiem 11 gian hang tro choi vo cung hap dan duoc cac Doi chuan bi ky luong. 
Va neu cac ban chien thang duoc 6/11 tro choi, cac ban se co co hoi nhan duoc phan qua tren duoi hang trieu dong tu BTC. 


<3 MON QUA TINH NGUYEN <3 
Tu ngay bay gio, cac ban hay thu thap ve xe buyt di nhe! Boi vi vao ngay hoi nay, nhung ve xe buyt ma cac ban quyen gop duoc rat co the se doi duoc nhung chiec xe lan de danh tang cho cac ban khuyet tat.
Hon the nua, ngay hoi se co “Khong gian tinh nguyen”, chu ki cua cac ban co the se duoc luu lai tai khong gian nay. Moi chu ki duoc luu lai, cac ban hay quyen gop 2.000d. That nhieu chu ki, that nhieu mon qua y nghia duoc gui tang den ap Tan Lap de phan nao do giup do cho cac em nho co hoan canh kho khan. 
- Thoi gian: Tu 7h00 den 11h00
- Dia diem: San truong.


<3 CHIA SE YEU THUONG <3
 Den voi ngay hoi, cac ban con duoc nhung bac tien boi da tham gia rat nhieu hoat dong xa hoi chia se nhung cam nhan, nhung cung bac cam xuc cua ban than trong qua trinh tham gia cac hoat dong tinh nguyen.
- Thoi gian: Tu 08h00 den 8h30 
- Dia diem: San khau chinh.


Con rat nhieu rat nhieu phan bi mat khac ma cac ban se duoc trai nghiem khi va chi khi tham gia ngay hoi. Vua duoc vui choi, vua co co hoi nhan duoc qua, vua co co hoi thuc hien nhung hanh dong mang dam chat tinh nguyen. Con chan cho gi nua ma khong tham gia ngay nao!!!

Hay la 1 trong 50 nguoi dau tien ghe tham cua hang de nhan duoc nhung phan qua that hap dan tu Kiehl’s, va tham gia vao nhung hoat dong cuc cool va bat ngo trong ngay khai truong cac ban nhe. 
Kiehl’s that vinh du duoc chao don va phuc vu quy khach tai cua hang dau tien cua chung toi o Viet Nam va o TP.HCM.

BILLY PAGE bat dau hoat dong am nhac cua minh voi vai tro la ca sy trong chuong trinh san xuat am nhac cho dai BBC, hoat dong trong cac linh vuc chinh trong vai tro nhac sy cua nha hat. Ong da co nhung trai nghiem lon trong cac chuyen luu dien o Chau au va tren vo so cac chuong trinh truyen hinh va radio. Thoi gian gan day, ong da danh nhieu thoi gian hon cho cac chuyen luu dien o Chau A, voi cac albums va ban thu rieng cua minh ong muon tro thanh mot nguoi viet nhac va nghe sy trinh dien thuc thu de co the truyen tai quan diem am nhac cua minh mot cach truc quan nhat.

Hay cung don xem phan trinh dien cua Billy trong chuyen luu dien lan nay cua anh tai Viet Nam.

https://myspace.com/billypageuk

Thoi gian: 21h
Vao cua tu do.
--------------------

Billy page began his musical career with a singing role in a musical production for the BBC, followed by major parts in musical theatre. He has gained extensive experience touring in Europe and making numerous television & radio appearances. In OCT 2005 he was one of the 14 musicians that broke the Guinness world record for the WORLDS HIGHEST GIG raising £30,000 for the nepal Balbalika trust charity www.music4children.org. 
More recently, he has spent several months touring in Asia. With several CD albums and radio airplay to his credit, he has evolved into a writer and performer of perspective and thoughtful songs. Having had rave reviews in magazines like Hi Fi choice Billy promises to be a force to be reckoned with in the future. 

http://www.billypage.com/

https://myspace.com/billypageuk

Free entry.

Su kien hot nhat thang 12 chinh la IEF TRIP . Day la su kien duoc doan khoa KTQT len ke hoach rat lau va co su chuan bi het suc chu dao, dam bao se dem den cho cac ban nhung gia tri thiet thuc
Mo dau cho IEF TRIP chinh la chuyen di tham quan cong ty Cang Quoc Te Tan Cang vao 7h30-11h Thu 2 ngay 14/12/2015.Hay den ngay giang duong A vao ngay thu 3 ( 8/12/2015)  de co the gianh cho minh nhung tam ve dau tien cac ban nhe!
Vi sao Doan khoa Kinh Te Quoc Te chon diem den lan nay la Cang Quoc te Tan Cang ?
Nham trang bi kien thuc ly thuyet gan voi thuc te cung nhu tang cuong chuong trinh hoc tap tuong tac danh cho sinh vien Nha truong noi chung cung nhu sinh vien chuyen nganh KINH TE QUOC TE.Doan khoa Kinh te Quoc te to chuc chuyen tham quan thuc te voi hy vong mang lai cho sinh vien nhung trai nghiem bo ich voi bo mon Logistics tai Tan Cang Sai Gon.
Ket hop cung cac buoi bao cao chuyen de, chuyen tham quan nay tao co hoi cho cac ban sinh vien co dip thuc hanh nhung van de ly thuyet ve Logistics da duoc trau doi, gop phan dinh hinh nhung chuc danh, vi tri cong viec cu the ma cac ban co the gan bo trong tuong lai. Co cai nhin thuc te ve hoat dong dieu hanh, marketing, quan ly XNK, van tai bien cua Cong ty. Va con rat nhieu dieu thu vi nua dang cho cac ban.
Tan Cang la cong ty lien doanh giua tong cong ty Tan Cang Sai Gon va 3 hang tau nuoc ngoai la Mitsui O.S.K Lines ( Nhat Ban), Hanjin ( Han Quoc), Wanhai Lines ( Dai Loan). Cang co quy mo hon 500 nguoi va co nhieu dich vu nhu kiem dem va xep do hang hoa, dich vu cung ung tau bien, dich vu ve sinh tau, dich vu trung chuyen container. 
Hay den voi chuyen di lan nay, nhung dieu ban nhan duoc la tren ca mong doi day.
Va bat ngo lon hon nua la chung ay nhung dieu ban co the hoc hoi duoc ma chi voi  25K/ve ( bao gom chi phi xe di chuyen). Con chan cho gi nua ma khong nhanh tay den giang duong A (8-9-10/12/2015) de nhan duoc nhung tam ve vo cung gia tri nay!Hay ru ban be minh di cung! Luu y:So luong ve CO HAN cac ban nhe ^^
Doan khoa hua hen se mang den cho cac ban mot chuyen di that bo ich va nhung trai nghiem tuyet voi.Doan khoa hen gap lai

Bao lau roi ban khong the hien yeu thuong voi me cua minh?

Da bao lan ban muon chay lai om me va noi “ Con yeu Me” roi lai thoi?

Tai sao ban co the tu nhien the hien tinh cam voi ban be ma lai khong the lam nhu the voi me cua minh?

Dieu gi ngan ban lam dieu do?

Phai chang la nhung ngan ngai, rut re?

Phai chang la suy nghi “Minh khong can noi me van hieu”?

Nhung ban oi, ban co biet rang nhung loi yeu thuong du vung ve cua ban van luon co mot y nghia dac biet voi me cua minh???

Vay con chan cho gi nua, hay den voi chuong trinh  “3000 Loi yeu thuong”, chung toi se giup ban chuyen nhung thong diep yeu thuong do den tan tay khong chi la me, ma la bat ky nguoi phu nu nao ban yeu men!

Tai chuong trinh cua chung toi, ban se nhan duoc mot tam thiep dac biet tu BTC de viet nen loi yeu thuong ma bay lau nay ban chua dam noi. “3000 Loi yeu thuong” se la cau noi, giup ban phan viec con lai -  dua thiep thong diep nay den tan tay nguoi phu nu ma ban yeu thuong!
 Hap dan qua phai khong nao?
 Hay danh cho nguoi phu nu cua minh mot mon qua that dac biet nhan dip Giang sinh nhe!

Ben canh do, khi den voi “3000 Loi yeu thuong”  ban con co co hoi tham gia vong chung ket cuoc thi  “Dancing with Teddy – Hanh trinh se chia” voi nhung tiet muc duoc dau tu cong phu tu 4 nhom nhay xuat sac nhat cung 500 ban Tinh nguyen vien va cac em nho. Tat ca hua hen se mang lai mot ngay cuoi tuan sau lang va bung no danh cho cac ban!

Hen gap cac ban tu 17h – 21h , ngay 13/12/2015 tai Ho Ban Nguyet, Phu My Hung nhe!

MUA NHIEU DUOC NHIEU, HON 3 LA SI
Ngay 15/12/2015 Minh Thu Store chinh thuc khai truong cua hang ban si, bao gom cac mat hang thoi trang Nam va Nu.
- Thoi trang Nam duoc tinh gia si khi mua tu 3 san pham cung loai. (VD: 3 cai ao thun/3 cai ao so mi/3 cai quan jean...)
- Thoi trang Nu duoc tinh gia si khi mua tu 2 san pham cung loai. (VD: 2 cai dam, 2 cai ao...).
Ben canh do se co mot so mat hang Nu khuyen mai len den 50%. Dac biet voi Gio Bertotti nhap khau tu CANADA MUA 1 TANG 1.

Giac Mo Dem Mua Dong la chuong trinh am nhac Giang Sinh ma truong nhac MPU cung TTT Corporation va cac don vi bao tro ket hop thuc hien nham gay quy ho tro chuong trinh Uoc Mo Cua Thuy cua bao Tuoi Tre.

Voi hon 30 nhac cong, 80 thanh vien hop xuong tham gia cung cac ca si dang theo hoc hoac than thiet voi truong, va nhom Doanh nhan hat.

Tat ca cac nghe si deu tham gia bieu dien khong nhan thu lao de muon so tien ban ve thu duoc lam mon qua tang cac em be dang dieu tri ung thu nhan dip Giang sinh.

Bang am nhac, chung toi muon chuyen tai hoi am den cac be va rat mong moi nguoi ung ho.

Chuong trinh dien ra vao dem 14/12 tai GEM center.

Hien nay OneCAD Vietnam la doi tac chien luoc cua Autodesk trong mang MFG tai thi truong Viet Nam va la dai ly cap cao nhat phan phoi cac san pham: Autocad, Mechanical, Inventor. Ben canh do OneCAD Viet Nam co doi ngu ho tro ky thuat va phat trien ung dung chuyen nghiep. San sang dap ung moi y tuong va mong muon cua khach hang. Chung toi tu tin mang den cho quy khach hang giai phap toi uu nhat nham rut ngan thoi gian lam viec cua nguoi su dung phan mem thong qua hoi thao: GIAI PHAP TOAN DIEN DANH CHO THIET KE. Minh la Vu - Technical cua OneCAD xin goi thu nay den cac anh, chi, ban be, cac em sinh vien, hoc tap va lam viec trong linh vuc ky thuat den tham du de nhan duoc nhung thong tin chuyen nganh, cach lam viec theo tieu chuan Autodesk va nhan duoc nhieu phan qua hap dan.

KÉ HOẠCH
“NOEL 2015 – HOI AM TRAO TAY ”

I. GIOI THIEU:
Chuong trinh  Noel 2015 la su kien truyen thong do Chien dich Viet Nam Oi phat dong to chuc nham dem den niem vui cho nhung hoan canh kho khan co mot mua Noel y nghia hon.
II. NOI DUNG:
Chuong trinh Noel 2015 bat dau tu ngay 01/12/2015 va ket thuc vao ngay 24/12/2015.
Chuong trinh Noel 2015 huong den doi tuong la nhung em nho dan toc thieu so (dong bao dan toc Churu va dan toc K’Ho) tai Xa Ka Don, Huyen Don Duong, Tinh Lam Dong de dem toi cho cac em mot mua Giang sinh am ap.
III. THÒI GIAN VÀ DỊA DIẺM:
1. Thòi gian: Tù ngày 18/12/2015 - 20/12/2015
2. Dịa diẻm: Xa Ka Don, Huyen Don Duong, Tinh Lam Dong
IV. SÓ LUỌNG THAM GIA CHIÉN DỊCH:
Bao gòm 50 thành vien tinh nguyen vien tai 2 khu vuc TP. Ho Chi Minh va TP. Can Tho.
V. NỌI DUNG KÉ HOẠCH:
1. Hoạt dọng chính:
- Hoạt dọng 1: Phát tạng 1000 phàn quà cho tre em ngheo dan toc Churu va K’Ho tai Nha tho Ka Don, Xa Kadon, Huyen Don Duong, Tinh Lam Dong.
- Hoạt dọng 2: Tham hoi nguoi dan trong lang va trao tang 5 phan qua cho cac ho dan ngheo va nguoi gia neo don.
- Hoạt dọng 3: Tang 5 hoc bong khuyen khich hoc tap cho hoc sinh trung hoc co so dat thanh tich gioi trong hoc ki vua qua.
2. Ké hoạch cụ thẻ:
a. Hoạt dọng 1:
- Mục dích: Cung nhau sinh hoat vui choi voi cac em nho (choi tro choi tap the, dung rap chieu phim thieu nhi) nham mang den mot khong khi vui ve, am ap doi voi cac tre vung cao. 
- Quà tạng: Dụ kién 1000 phàn quà, mõi phàn quà bao gòm:
•	Qua banh, keo luc xem phim: 5.000 dong/phan
•	Phat sua, qua (bo dung cu hoc tap: thuoc, viet, tay): 10.000 dong/phan
•	Ao khoac, quan ao cu.
	Dụ tỏng 1000 phàn quà: 15.000.000 dong
*Luu y: tuy dieu kien kinh phi quyen gop cho phep
b. Hoạt dọng 2:
- Mục dích: De ba con dan toc thieu so co mot mua dong am ap hon, nghia tinh hon.
- Phan bỏ só luọng: 45 thành vien chia thành cac nhóm den tham hoi nguoi dan trong lang, va trao tang 5 phan qua den cac ho gia dinh ngheo, nguoi gia neo don.
- Quà tạng: Tri gia 500.000 dong/phan, bao gom:
•	 20 kg gao/gia dinh: 200.000 dong/phan
•	 Tien hay nhung phan qua thiet thuc (tuy tung ho gia dinh): 300.000 dong/ho gia dinh.
•	Quan ao cu.
	Tỏng kinh phí hoạt dọng 2: 2.500.000 dong
c. Hoạt dọng 3:
- Mục dích: De khuyen khich tinh than hieu hoc cua cac tre mien cao va giup do mot phan kinh phi trang trai cho viec hoc cua cac em.
- Hoc bong: 500.000 – 1.000.000 dong/phan (tuy dieu kien quyen gop) bao gom hoc phi nam hoc.
- Qua tang:
•	Tap, sach
•	Ao khoac, quan ao cu.
	Tỏng kinh phí hoạt dọng 3: 2.500.000 – 5.000.000 dong

--> Du tong: 20.000.000 - 22.500.000 dong

a. Lọ trình: 
1)	TP. Càn Tho – TP. Ho Chi Minh: tu tuc
2)	Dia diem tap trung TP. Ho Chi Minh - Xa Ka Don, Huyen Don Duong, Tinh Lam Dong.
b. Thòi gian: Tù ngày 18/12/2015 -20/12/2015

"Is your professional image pushing you forward or holding you back?"

Many professionals are promoted to middle managers in recognition of their superior performance, technical knowledge, commitment and management skills. Could a confident, modern and professional image help high-performing professionals achieve top leadership roles, which could be a vital ingredient of leaders?

Our speaker Ms Huong Nguyen at Inspired Image will share her knowledge of “PIIs” –  Professional Image Indicators, which will benefit our talents in building a professional and modern image, and successful careers in the corporate world.

Dong va huong Bao Hiem Xa Hoi (BHXH) nhu the nao?
Thuc te huong cac che do om dau va thai san?
Huong tro cap mot lan va luong huu nhu the nao?

Ngay 01/01/2016, Luat BHXH 2014 va Nghi dinh 115/2015 ND-CP chinh thuc co hieu luc thi hanh; tuy nhien, cho toi hien nay van con rat nhieu vuong mac xoay quanh viec ap dung va tuan thu. De ho tro cac doanh nghiep kip thoi, NVM Group to chuc chuong trinh tap huan "AP DUNG THUC HIEN LUAT BHXH 2014" voi su huong dan truc tiep cua Ba Tran Thi Thuy Nga, Vu truong Vu BHXH - Bo Lao Dong Thuong Binh va Xa Hoi.

Noi dung chuong trinh tap huan:
- Quy luong dong BHXH tu 01/01/2016 va tu 01/01/2018
- Cac che do BHXH ngan han
- Cac che do BHXH dai han
- Cac thu tuc hanh chinh ve tuan thu va thuc hien Luat BHXH: bao cao, trich nop, thanh tra va xu phat ...

Den voi chuong trinh tap huan, cac ban se duoc:
- Huong dan ap dung Luat BHXH 2014 cho doanh nghiep
- Trao doi va duoc giai dap cac vuong mac cu the cua chinh doanh nghiep minh.
- Nhan tai lieu huong dan chi tiet, tap hop cac cau hoi va cau tra loi tu chuong trinh tap huan.

Dong va huong Bao Hiem Xa Hoi (BHXH) nhu the nao?
Thuc te huong cac che do om dau va thai san?
Huong tro cap mot lan va luong huu nhu the nao?

Thau hieu nhung kho khan cua cac Doanh Nghiep, NVM to chuc chuong trinh tap huan "AP DUNG THUC HIEN LUAT BAO HIEM XA HOI 2014" voi su huong dan truc tiep cua Ba Tran Thi Thuy Nga, Vu truong Vu Bao Hiem Xa Hoi, Bo Lao Dong Thuong Binh Xa Hoi Viet Nam.

BAN SE NHAN DUOC GI KHI THAM DU HOI THAO?

+ Duoc tim hieu ve tiem nang, xu huong phat trien cua thi truong va cua nghe bat dong san
+ Duoc trao doi truc tiep voi cac vi lanh dao cua Khai Hoan Land ve quy mo, vi tri, tiem luc cua don vi nay
+ Duoc thao luan ve muc luong, che do dai ngo, tuong lai nghe nghiep, co hoi thang tien neu trung tuyen vao Khai Hoan Land.
+ Duoc uu tien dang ky ho so ung tuyen vao Khai Hoan Land

***Dac biet, khi tham du su kien hoi thao ban se co co hoi nhan duoc 20 suat hoc dao tao ve BDS chuyen nghiep do Khai Hoan Land tai tro.

DOI TUONG THAM DU HOI THAO

+ Sinh vien sap tot nghiep, co niem dam me linh vuc bat dong san
+ Nhan vien kinh doanh tu cac nganh bao hiem, xe hoi, tai chinh, ngan hang,…muon thay doi moi truong va tim hieu ve bat dong san

Get ready!!!
Agrithon is launching in collaboration with Start Dojo this Dec 2015. The first Agrithon will focus on mobile and web apps. We believe there is great potential for mobile and web applications that can deeply integrate into current agriculture practices and vastly improve their business. 

If you are 
- a current agriculture startup and you believe that mobile or web application is what your business needs, 
- a developer who wants to make change in the Vietnamese agriculture industy
Join us to the first step bridging between tech and agriculture.

Please apply through this Google Form http://bit.ly/agrithon2015 by Dec 12th. 
If you are selected, we will contact you through email for the hacking session on Dec 19th.


*****************************************
The full Agrithon includes three parts.
- Agrithon - Hacking
- Agrithon - StartDojo
- Agrithon - CrowdPitch
To participate, please register at: http://bit.ly/agrithon2015

**Agrithon - Hacking - www.agrithon.com
We will select 10 teams of current agriculture startups which are at prototype stage or beyond, as well as inviting mobile product teams.
In 10 hours, they will work together to propose 10 ideas for mobile or web applications for agriculture. The 10 ideas will then be evaluated by our advisory board. Top 4 ideas will be selected to join Agrithon - StartDojo.
Time: 8am - 8pm, Dec 19th 2015
Venue: DreamPlex Coworking Space, Level 10, 21 Nguyen Trung Ngan, District 1

**Agrithon - StartDojo - www.startdojo.com
Top 4 teams will receive 4 weeks of mentorship and coworking space, allowing them to fully focus on developing a mobile solution.
The 4 weeks of mentorship will cover:
- Mobile application
- Market Fit
- Product Strategy
- Investment and potential of agriculture startups

**Agrithon - CrowdPitch - www.crowdpitchvn.com
CrowdPitch is a pitching event with a crowdfunding element. After the 1st successful season in 2015, CrowdPitch will be back with season 2, premiering with an agriculture episode.
4 teams from StartDojo will participate to determine who will be the crowd favorite. Each vote from the audience will equal $5 from the crowd, and the winner will also win $1,000 from our sponsor plus more prizes to be confirmed.

Free register link: http://8bitrockr.com/php7/
------------------------
Eleven years after the PHP 5.0 release, a new major version is finally coming our way! PHP 7.0 is scheduled for release before the end of the year, bringing many new features and an impressive performance boost.

We want to celebrate the arrival of PHP 7.0, learn more about it, offer a chance to talk with other PHP developers, and enjoy that PHP is still going strong after more than 20 years.

What about food and drinks? 
We will have beers, food and a FREE PHP7Rocks T-shirt!

Speakers:
PHP Core Developer: Pierre Joye
Pierre Joye is a PHP Core Developer and open source contributor for more than a decade. He leads the PHP team at Microsoft, is the main developer from LibGD, and works on many open source projects. After many years as a freelancer, Pierre now works with the Microsoft OpenSource Technology Center in the US and in Asia.

Founder 8Bit Rockstars: Lars Jankowfsky
Lars is a successful tech entrepreneur, investor and CTO. He helps tech startups around the world to scale - mostly by creating and scaling powerful tech teams. Lars founded many companies, among them OXID eSales, a German ecommerce market leader, whose clients generate over USD 7 billion gross and swoodoo AG which he later successfully sold to kayak.com , where he helped the US team to solve the scaling issues and stability problems that arose due to the tremendous success of kayak.com , one of the biggest travel websites on Earth.

Time And Place: 
Dreamplex - Basement Level, 21 Nguyen Trung Ngan Street, Dist.1, Ho Chi Minh City , Vietnam 
Saturday, December 19, 2015 from 6:00 PM to 9:00 PM (ICT)

Thu tan, dong sang, thang 12 sap sua ua ve cung nhung con gio heo may va nhung dem dong lanh cat. Nhung cung la cai thang 12 lanh leo ay se dem den 1 mua Giang sinh an lanh cung 1 nam moi tran day han hoan.
Trong nhung ngay cuoi nam, tai 1 goc nho be cua Sai thanh, hay cung SFA lang nghe va thuong thuc nhung giai dieu than quen cua mua dong, cua Giang sinh va cua Nam moi theo mot cach hoan toan moi la cua the loai Guitar Fingerstyle. Chi voi cay dan Guitar cung nhung doi tay day lua dam me cua cac ban tre trong hoi, Fingerstyle Guitar nhat dinh se dem lai cho cac ban mot su trai nghiem am nhac moi me va phong cach.
Tiep theo sau su kien ra mat SFA ngay 18/10 vua roi, Liveshow “December Nocturne – da khuc thang 12”. Neu ban thich nghe tieng dan guitar, thich tim den mot cai gi do moi me ve the loai Guitar hay muon co mot trai nghiem that “la tai” trong mua Giang sinh nay, hay den voi su kien cua SFA chung toi.

CHARLIE BANKS (Dirt Crew - Anh) / ho tro boi NIC FORD (MadderModes, Millions Of Moments) & KIN (The Observatory)

Nhung ban nhac house hay nhat duoc choi boi mot tai nang am nhac, nguoi ma gan day da gay su chu y cua nhung chuyen gia sanh soi nhat ve am nhac dien tu toan cau: Charlie Banks se co mat tai The Obs de cong hien mot dem nhac dac biet voi kha nang khuay dong san nhay xuat chung. 

Nhung sang tac cua Charlie Banks manh me voi su du doi va chin chan sau sac cung nhung giai dieu du duong muot ma, lam nguoi ta nham tuong ve tuoi doi con rat tre moi co 22 cua tai nang am nhac nay. Nhung xuat ban gan day cua anh tren hang dia danh tieng Dirt Crew Recordings da duoc lua chon va nam trong bo suu tap dia cua nhung DJ tai nang duoc kinh trong nhat the gioi va duoc choi trong nhung cau lac bo va nhung bua tiec am nhac noi tieng nhat. Nhung giong hat mang am sac huyen ao, tinh te, ma mi chuyen doi qua lai giua nhung nhip dieu bass manh me day dan, trong khi am dieu synths ru nguoi nghe vao giac mo - chim dam trong mot hanh tinh nhiet doi bao phu boi nhung am thanh duoc sang tac voi su kheo leo va nguon nang luong vo cung doc dao va day me say. 

Nhung buoi bieu dien DJ cua Charlie Banks giao dong nhip nhang giua nhung anh huong lon trong nhung sang tac cua anh, chuyen doi giua disco va techno sau sac toi nhung giai dieu house day qua quyet khien nguoi nghe phai nhun nhay theo. 

Charlie Banks la mot cai ten ban khong the bo qua, va nhat dinh phai den va lang nghe. Mot dem nhac dac biet danh cho nhung giai dieu house doc dao, manh me va day bat ngo.

Ho tro boi NIC FORD (MadderModes, Millions Of Moments) & KIN (The Observatory)

Chuong trinh bat dau luc 10PM / Mien phi truoc 11PM/ 150.000VND sau 11PM

THONG TIN VE CHARLIE BANKS

Nam 2015 qua la mot nam dang nho cua Charlie Banks. Mac du chang trai 22 tuoi nay da co mot khoi dau day hua hen khi buoc chan vao the gioi am nhac voi EP dung dau trong bang xep hang cua hang dia Dirt Crew Recordings tai Berlin, con co rat nhieu co hoi va thanh cong dang den voi tai nang nay, nguoi da bieu dien DJ khap bo bien phia Nam cua nuoc Anh trong nhieu nam qua.

Su nghiep am nhac cua Charlie chiu anh huong boi nhung nguoi nhu Craig Richards, Jamie Jones, Shonky va Matt Tolfrey. Su anh huong nay duoc the hien trong nhung buoi bieu dien cua anh tai Berlin, Bo Dao Nha, le hoi am nhac Gottwood Festival va nhung mua he choi nhac o Ibiza. Anh noi tieng tai nhung cau lac bo o Anh nhu Stealth, Junk, Sankeys va Motion, nhung buoi bieu dien da mang lai cho anh nhieu nguon cam hung de phan hoi trong nhung sang tac sap toi cua minh. Khong con nghi ngo gi nua, nhieu nam dam chim trong am nhac dien tu tu khi con rat tre da nuoi duong trong Charlie mot thai do va tham mi am nhac xuat sac.

Tai nang, dam me khong the ban cai va su tap trung khong the lay chuyen la diem noi bat trong am nhac va nhung buoi bieu dien DJ cua anh. Vao thang Tu nam 2015, Charlie da co mot xuat ban trong du an am nhac moi Unsound Mind cua hang dia Skream. Cac nghe si nhu Eats Everything, Huxley va Richy Ahmed la mot trong so nhung nguoi da ho tro Charlie trong nhung nam bat dau su nghiep.

Tren day chi la su khoi dau khi noi ve Charlie, cung nhu viec lang nghe nhung sang tac moi va doi theo nhung buoi bieu dien sap toi cua anh tai mot trong rat nhieu thanh pho va le hoi am nhac khap nuoc Anh va xa hon nua.

Moi ban vao cac duong link sau:

https://soundcloud.com/charliebanks
http://www.residentadvisor.net/dj/charliebanks


______________________ENGLISH_____________________

Top-Shelf house music from something of a prodigy that has recently smashed his way into the attention of electronic music connoisseurs globally: Charlie Banks is hitting The Obs to show us exactly what makes his sound so special.

Charlie Banks’ productions thump with a deep severity and melodic maturity that belies the age of this 22 year-old mastermind. His recent releases on the highly-respected Dirt Crew Recordings have made their way into the bags of some of the planet’s most respected DJs and out onto the dance floors of some of its finest clubs and parties. Subtle, ghost-like vocals shift in and out of thick bass lines, while synths taken out of a dream on a tropical planet powered by sound round off his productions with a finesse and energy that is unique and addictive. 

His DJ sets swing a lasso around the vast influences that have been drawn on in his productions, shifting between dubbed out disco and techno to no-jokes determined house workouts that you just need to move to. Powerful stuff. 

Charlie Banks is a name to watch out for, and definitely one to get down and listen to on this night. Bring down the house. 

Supported by NIC FORD (MadderModes, Millions Of Moments) & KIN (The Observatory)

10PM / free before 11PM / 150K after

CHARLIE BANKS BIO

There’s a good chance 2015 will be Charlie Banks’ annus mirabilis. Though the 22 year old has already made an auspicious entry into the scene with a chart topping EP on Berlin’s Dirt Crew Recording’s, there’s plenty more to come from a talent who has been DJing around England’s South Coast for years.

Charlie’s career in music has been influenced by the likes of Craig Richards, Jamie Jones, Shonky and Matt Tolfrey. It’s these sorts of sounds Charlie has championed during sets in Berlin, Portugal, Gottwood Festival and his summers spent in Ibiza. He is famed at UK spots such as Stealth, Junk, Sankeys and Motion, with plenty of inspiration picked up along the way to feedback into his upcoming productions. After years of immersing himself in electronic music from a young age there is undoubtedly a distinctive groove to Charlie’s attitude and ear for music. 

Charlie’s undisputed talent, passion and unshakeable focus is prominent in his music and DJ sets. In April 2015 Charlie is set to have a release on Skream’s new imprint Of Unsound Mind. Artists such as Eats Everything, Huxley and Richy Ahmed are amongst just some of the names that are supporting Charlie in the early beginnings of his career. 

This is only the very beginning for Charlie, as well as listening out for his new productions keep an eye out for his upcoming gigs in one of the many cities and festivals around the UK and beyond.

LINKS

http://www.residentadvisor.net/dj/charliebanks

Va day se la cac CON LOC chinh | Hua hen se cuon bay tat ca trong Spirit BASS lan nay:

⚡ DJ Ty Ty: TOP 4 DJ Viet Nam (BUDjs 2015). Kinh nghiem duoc choi nhac cung voi cac DJ hang dau The gioi nhu: VINAI, Ferry Corsten, Dyro (Escape Party 2015) va sap toi se la "huyen thoai" DJ Tiesto (Budweiser Festival 2015)

⚡ DJ King Lady: Top 100 DJ nu the gioi. Khang dinh tai nang cua minh qua show truyen hinh The Remix 2014 va nhung tour luu dien Chau A qua cac nuoc Phillipines,Malaysia va Nga 

⚡ DJ Popo Duong: nu DJ xinh dep va day tai nang.Da de lai dau an cua minh qua set nhac tai le hoi am nhac FutureNow Music Festival. Hien dang la DJ chinh cua Chill Sky Bar va Avalon Bar

⚡ Rapper F: Nha vo dich cuoc thi MC Battle 2015. Se mang den nhung ban Rap do chinh anh sang tac cung nhung Skill nhac chat nhat.

⚡ DJ Rhyskai: Chang trai DJ voi dong nhac Hiphop va Trapstep, chac chan cau ay se khien doi chan cua ban se khong dung yen boi set nhac day thoi mien cua minh.

⚡ TPAL: DJ/Producer tre den tu Ha Thanh. Hien anh dang la nha san xuat nhac cho nhung website lon tren the gioi 

⚡ To Rich & Juni Pham:  Bo doi MC - Rapper dang lam mua lam gio hien nay chac chan se dem den su cuong nhiet trong Party lan nay

⚡ DJ Sun: Chang DJ cung voi nhung track nhac dinh dam.

⚡ DJ Small T: Chàng DJ duọc biét dén vói rát nhièu show diẽn tại Sài Gòn và Hà Nọi, Vói chát nhạc Trap, Hiphop Small T luon mang cho mình mọt phong cách rieng biẹt.

Chu hang dia va dai ly am nhac thong tri khu vuc Cliche Records tai Hong Kong va nhung nguoi ban DJ cua The Obs quay tro lai trong mot dem nhac de dua khan gia vao nhung cuoc phieu luu day mau sac qua the gioi cua disco, house, techno va bat ki the loai nhac nao khac ma anh muon mang den de khuay dong khong khi tung bung khong ngot noi san nhay. 

Da choi nhac voi mot so nhan vat tien phong nhat cua nen am nhac dien tu va la nguoi truyen suc manh cho nen am nhac danh cho san nhay co chat luong hao hang tai Hong Kong, noi anh dang song va lam viec, voi viec len chuong trinh moi cac DJ, nghe si toi choi nhac va cac hoat dong khac thong qua hang dia va dai ly am nhac cua rieng anh Cliche Records, Visa la mot nguoi lao luyen trong viec to chuc nhung bua tiec am nhac, lam bung chay khong khi noi san nhay voi tat ca cac the loai am nhac va am thanh, ket hop voi nhau trong mot ton chi nhat quan: “NHAY”. Khi bieu dien, Visa luon gay bat ngo bang nhung ban nhac khuay dong va truyen cam hung nhat ma ban chua bao gio nghe.  

Hay den voi dem nhac va khong ngung nhay mua.

Ho tro boi HIBIYA LINE (The Obs) & DAN LO (EAOC)

Chuong trinh bat dau luc 10PM / MIEN PHI truoc 11PM / 150.000VND sau 11PM 

THONG TIN VE VISA

La mot nguoi co con mat tinh tuong khi nhin ra nhung tai nang, VISA da mang den cho The Observatory va cung da choi nhac cung voi nhung nhan vat nhu The Magician, Gigamesh, Hercules & Love affair, Classixx, Bicep, San Soda, Cassian hay Aeroplane.

Nhanh nhay, doi hoi khat khe voi ban than, thu am nhac doc dao cua anh luon chua dung nhieu dieu bat ngo va mo ho – duoc hoa tron mot cach thong minh tu nhung ban nhac cua nhung nghe si khong ten tuoi va nhung nghe si dang noi len, voi nhung buoi bieu dien khien nguoi nghe nhay mua mot cach say sua trong nhung giai dieu loi cuon, tran day anh sang va co tinh lan toa cao – mang den cho cac tin do cua the loai nhac NU-disco nhung trai nghiem dau tien trong nhieu trai nghiem sau do tai nhung bua tiec ‘Cliche-Parties’ noi tieng cua anh va lam thoa man cho nguoi yeu nhac va nhung ke sanh soi ve am nhac dang khat khao tim kiem thu am nhac hao hang trong thanh pho. 

Song trong mot moi truong hoi ha va dat minh tai trung tam cua su phat trien trong nen am nhac o Hong Kong, VISA va cac dong su cua minh da nhanh chong gat hai duoc danh tieng la dai ly am nhac chu dao lam viec ket noi giua nhung nghe si quoc te tim kiem co hoi choi nhac o Chau A, va da nhan duoc su kinh trong nhiet thanh tu cac dong nghiep khac dang hoat dong trong linh vuc nay trong viec da nhan ra cho trong can duoc lap day trong nen am nhac va khuech truong the loai nhac NU-disco va nhung the loai am nhac khac dang noi len o Hong Kong.   

MOI BAN VAO DUONG LINK SAU:

http://www.cliche-booking.com/Artists/ouissam/

_____________________ENGLISH_____________________

The boss of region-dominating Cliche Records in Hong Kong and a long-standing ally of The Obs is back in the booth to send us on one of his wide-ranging journeys through the worlds of disco, house, techno and anything else he decides to throw at his perpetually-moving dance floor. 

Having played alongside some of the most cutting-edge players in the game and energizing the entire quality dance music scene in his Hong Kong base with his bookings and movements through his own Cliche Records agency, Visa is adept at developing a party, fusing all types of genres and sounds into one consistent character that just says “DANCE”. He comes armed to every gig with some of the most foot-moving tracks you’ve never heard of, and this will be no exception. 

Keep Dancing. 

Supported by HIBIYA LINE (The Obs) & DAN LO (EAOC)

DOORS 10PM / FREE before 11PM / 150K after 

VISA BIO

A wirehead when it comes to spotting talent, VISA has brought us and played alongside the likes of The Magician, Gigamesh, Hercules & Love affair, Classixx, Bicep, San Soda, Cassian or Aeroplane.

Fast in demand, his signature tunes are often amazing and obscure – cleverly mashing up stuff from unknown and emerging artist, with sets that are lyrical, light and contagious to dance to – giving virgins of the NU-disco genres their first of many experiences at his well known ‘Cliche-Parties,’ and providing food for thought for those in the know and music connoisseurs who’ve been starved in the city.

Living in the fast lane and putting himself at the centre of development in the music scene in HK, VISA and his team have fast gained a reputation for being the primo agency to work with among international artists looking to play in Asia, and have warmly gained respect from others in the industry for recognizing a gap in the dance scene and for promoting NU-disco and other emerging genres in HK.

LINKS
http://www.cliche-booking.com/Artists/ouissam/

Lam sao song khoe, song tho?
   
Cach nhin nhan, suy nghi ve suc khoe cua hau het chung ta thuong thien ve benh tat, moi khi nhac den kiem tra suc khoe, la nghi ngay den benh va so hai khi phai kiem tra suc khoe, so se phat hien ra benh, roi so se ton kem tien bac de dieu tri…
   
Chi can thay doi suy nghi 1 ti thoi chung ta co the song khoe va song tho. Thay vi nghi ve benh, chung ta hay nghi ve suc khoe. Kiem tra suc khoe nham biet duoc tinh hinh suc khoe cua moi nguoi tai thoi diem ay, biet duoc the trang co the hien tai nhu the nao, tu do co cach dieu chinh de co the can bang lai mot cach khoe manh.
   
Ban hay tham gia “HANH TRINH KHAM PHA BI MAT SUC KHOE – Noi ban tim thay suc khoe tron ven” de duoc tim hieu lam the nao de thay doi suy nghi tich cuc ve suc khoe tu nhung vi Bac sy yeu nghe, nhieu nam kham chua benh trong cac benh vien lon.
   
Hay dang ky tai day:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1a9Ru6YIs56L2vFVUmHmDfjoRYcIcFgBfXS5GYAUP6Eo/viewform
   
Ban hay tuong tuong cac can benh hiem ngheo se khong den khi ban khoe, tien bac, tinh yeu luon den voi nguoi khoe manh nhu ban, moi nguoi xung quanh se ngac nhien lam sao ma ban so huu duoc 1 co the nang dong va tran day suc song nhu vay,moi nguoi nguong mo ban biet duong nao…
   
Rat don gian de co 1 suc khoe tot va song tho. Ban chi can chu y den 2 dieu:
   
1. Ve tinh than (quyet dinh 50% suc khoe cua ban): suy nghi tich cuc, giu tinh than luon on dinh, thoai mai trong moi tinh huong, moi moi quan he trong cuoc song.
   
2. Ve the chat (quyet dinh 50% suc khoe cua ban): luon giu the trang can bang bang cach thuong xuyen van dong the luc dung cach, hit tho dung cach, biet cham soc xuong khop phu hop, tang cuong nhung hoat dong mang lai gia tri cho cong dong, giam bot nhung hoat dong huong thu, dieu chinh che do an uong phu hop, cach sinh hoat dieu do.

TRIEN LAM HARRY POTTER DA CO MAT TAI VIET NAM!

Lan dau tien tai Viet Nam, trien lam vat pham Harry Potter hoang trang duoc mo ra phuc vu cac fan cua cau be phu thuy voi vet theo tia chop. L'EXPOTRONUM la su kien hop tac giua to chuc fan Hogwarts Viet Nam, Diagonoutlet, Octiviander, va Hogwarts Shop VN nham mang den cho cac ban mot mua Giang sinh that mau nhiem.

1. L'EXPOTRONUM se dien ra o dau?
Thi tran Ba Cay Choi Xu Dau Do  - Lang Gia tinh, The Vista Walk, 628C Xa lo Ha Noi, phuong An Phu, quan 2.

2. L'EXPOTRONUM to chuc khi nao?
• Ngay Thu Bay 26/12/2015, su kien se don khach tu 15h00 - 21h00. 
• Ngay Chu Nhat 27/12/2015, su kien se don khach tu 10h00 - 21h00. 
Voi mot ve, ban se duoc chon tham du 1 trong 2 ngay, co the lui toi su kien so lan khong gioi han trong ngay.

3. Gia ve L'EXPOTRONUM? 
• Ve thuong: 250k VND (tai cong 300k)
• Ve phu huynh: 120k VND (chi ap dung cho phu huynh di kem con em duoi 12 tuoi)

4. Ve L'EXPOTRONUM da bao gom:
• Voucher an uong cac mon theo thuc don Thi tran Ba Cay Choi tri gia 200k (cho ve thuong), 100k (cho ve phu huynh). 
• Lui toi thoai mai su kien mien la trong cung mot ngay de tham quan trien lam va choi moi tro choi. 
• Xe dua di va ruoc ve chay moi tieng dong ho tu Cong vien Le Van Tam den The Vista Walk cho cac ban co nhu cau (vui long dang ky khi mua ve).

5. L'EXPOTRONUM co gi?
La mot trien lam ve Harry Potter, nen chung minh se tai hien nhung vat pham tu phim va truyen. Ngoi truong phu thuy Hogwarts, dong phuc cac hoc sinh, vat dung mon the thao Quidditch, quay dua phep theo xi-tai Ollivander, Truong Sinh Linh Gia, cac vat pham trong ky thi Tam Phap Thuat, chan dung Ba Beo va cac giao su, gia tinh Dobby, Giam Nguc biet hon, va hang tram dieu hap dan khac. Bat mi la moi vat pham deu duoc phu phep that song dong, khong phai hang Muggle dau nha!

6. Cach thuc mua ve L'EXPOTRONUM:
• Bon minh ban truc tiep tai nhung dia diem khap thanh pho duoc update thuong xuyen tren trang event. Vui long theo doi cho nao tien nhat voi ban.
• Chuyen khoan nhan ve qua buu dien, vui long PM page de biet cach thuc.
• Nhan ve va dua tien truc tiep tai nha, nhan tin so ve can mua + dia chi den so 01202990016.

7. Nhung thac mac va lien he ve ve xin vui long goi so 01202990016 (Nhi). 
Thac mac khac vui long lien he O9O 234 6984 (An).

Khoa hoc ‘Phan tich nghiep vu chuyen nghiep – Business Analysis Professional” duoc thiet ke dac biet  tuong thich voi BABOK phien ban moi nhat (v3) cua IIBA. 

Noi dung cua khoa hoc giup cac chuyen gia phan tich nghiep vu, quan ly du an, truong nhom phat trien phan mem, cac IT… co the dua ra cach tiep can phu hop de thu thap, ghi chep, phan tich, giao tiep va quan ly cac yeu cau tu nguoi dung trong danh nghiep hoac khach hang. Voi cach day theo workshop, ngoai viec linh hoi kien thuc chuan, hoc vien se duoc thuc hanh kien thuc ngay tai lop voi muc tieu giup hoc vien ap dung kien thuc vua hoc vao cong viec thuc tien ngay de tao ra giai phap gia tri giai quyet van de cua khach hang. 

Hoc vien se duoc hoc cung voi chuyen gia dao tao nhiet huyet, nhieu kinh nghiep thuc tien voi nhieu loai du an khac nhau va da tung dao tao cho hon 300 BA cho cac danh nghiep hang dau Viet Nam.

Ban hang kieu cu truoc kia chi don gian la day san pham / dich vu ra toi khach hang – Ban hang hien dai la cham soc khach hang tu do khach hang tu than su dung san pham va dich vu mot cach tu nhien nhat. Ban hang truyen thong don gian chi la mot nghe can ky nang – Sale dinh cao gio day phai hoa than la “mot nha nghe thuat day duyen dang”. Ban hang truoc kia chi quan tam toi doanh so - Ban hang bay gio nham toi doanh so tang cao nhung luon dong hanh voi su hai long cua Khach hang. Theo cac Doanh nhan thanh dat co 9 bi quyet sau danh cho nhung nguoi ban hang chuyen nghiep: Ban loi ich chu khong ban dac diem – Tim kiem khach hang tiem nang – Tao su khac biet – Tiep can truc tiep – Xay dung quan he ben chat – Tham do ky - Nghe nhieu hon noi – Cham soc bang hau mai chuyen nghiep – Khong duoc “Mom mep”.

Khoa hoc Ky nang ban hang va cham soc khach hang hieu qua cua Truong Dao tao Doanh nhan PTI giup nguoi nhan vien kinh doanh khang dinh minh la doi tac tin cay voi moi khach hang, du ho co kho tinh den dau. Hoc vien khong chi duoc hoc cach su dung ky nang ban hang va cham soc khach hang ma cac chuyen gia trong khoa hoc se tu van cho ban, giup ban thuc hanh cac ky nang ban hang dinh cao qua cac bai tap tinh huong thuc te. Cuoi cung mot quy trinh ban hang va cham soc khach hang tung buoc chuyen nghiep se giup khach hang o lai lau dai voi Doanh nghiep chung ta”.

SU HAI LONG CUA QUY KHACH LA THUOC DO SU THANH CONG CUA CONG TY

Mien Phi 200 Khach Hang Dang Ky Dau Tien

(See Vietnamese below)

Join us for the Vernissage of 'Passers By' a solo exhibition of new watercolour paintings by Vietnamese artist Ho Hung.

Ho Hung’s watercolours capture the ephemerality and the subtle sensuousness of the everyday. Dappled light, warm colours and empty spaces characterize his style and his view onto the landscape of his homeland of Southern Vietnam.

Travelling from place to place and painting on the street Ho Hung records people passing by and is himself a stranger and a passerby to his subjects. 

The fragility of these encounters surfaces in the free flowing and unpredictable quality of the watercolour. Similarly his views of Old Saigon and its weathered buildings remind us that everything is temporary and life itself is just passing by.

A technically skilled painter, Ho Hung has exhibited in multiple exhibitions across the country including solo exhibitions at Hue Fine Arts University and at the Fine Arts University HCMC.  He is continuously gaining acclaim and notoriety for his work.

NGUOI QUA KE LAIHO HUNG23/1/2016-19/2/2016Vin Gallery han hanh gioi thieu trien lam tranh muc nuoc Nguoi Qua Ke Lai, mot trien lam ca nhan cua Hoa si nguoi Viet, Ho Hung.

Tranh mau nuoc cua Ho Hung bat duoc cai hon du ngan ngui va mo ho cua moi ngay qua. Nhung vet sang loang lo, mau sac am nong va nhung khoang khong mong lung dem lai ca tinh rieng cho tranh Ho Hung va the hien cam quan cua anh doi voi hinh anh mien Nam Viet Nam.

Du ngoan giua doi, sang tac ngay tren duong, Ho Hung ve nguoi qua ke lai, cung tu coi minh la mot trong nhung ke la vo tinh luot qua nhau va luot qua cuoc doi nay. Cai mong manh cua nhung gi thoang qua lai hien len ro rang trong dong chay tu do, vo dinh va phong khoang cua muc nuoc.

Sai Gon xua voi nhung can nha duoc mo ta ti mi duoi cai nhin cua Ho Hung nhac nho nguoi ta rang, moi thu deu la nhat thoi, va cuoc song, tu no van dang troi di.

Voi ki thuat ve dieu luyen, Ho Hung da tung tham gia nhieu trien lam tren toan quoc, trong do co hai lan trien lam ca nhan tai Dai Hoc My Thuat Hue va Dai Hoc My Thuat Thanh Pho Ho Chi Minh. Anh dang ngay cang thu hut duoc nhieu su chu y boi nhung sang tac cua minh.

Nam Mo A Di Da Phat 
Kinh thua quy vi than men 
Mua xuan la mua hanh phuc muon hoa dua no , nguoi nguoi nha nha deu xum vay cung ben nhau , nhung ben canh ay co mot so hoan canh khong nhung mong doi , ho phai don xuan cung voi mot tap the nguoi cung canh ngo . Do chinh la cac cu gia neo don hien dang tru tai Chua Lien Buu Vien Duong Lao ngu tai Ap Qui Nong - Xa Hoa Loi - Tinh Chau Thanh do Ni Truong Thich Nu Buu Ly tru tri . Hien nay vien duong lao dang nuoi duong 45 cu gia , do tinh hinh chua kha xa tp nen viec cung duong kho khan . Chinh vi dieu kien ay cho nen Nhom Tu Thien Tu Tam to chuc chuong trinh phat qua tet cho cac cu dem lai su yeu thuong chia se nhung cu gia tuoi xe chieu khong co con chau gia dinh vao ngay 24/1/2016 ( 15/12 / at mui )
Chuan bi cho chuong trinh gom 45 phan qua cac thu nhu sau : banh Solite  45 hop , sua vinamik moi phan 5 bich sua can 5 thung , dau xanh 45 chai , 45 phong bao li xi moi bao 50.000 , ho tro cho bep an cham lo cac cu 2.000.000 . Tong kinh phi la 9.000.000 . 
Nhom tu thien to chuc xe tu thien ket hop tham quan tinh Tien Giang - Tra Vinh ngay 24/1/2016 ( ram thang chap nam At Mui ) gia ve ung ho chuong trinh tham quan 250.000 ( khong phi an uong , phi tham quan neu co ) . Khoi hanh luc 3h00
Doan se huong dan quy vi tham quan cac chua kien truc khomer co tai tinh tra vinh nhu chua hang , chua qui nong , chua xa net , to dinh vinh trang tien giang , tham quan mua sam lo keo dua Thanh Long Ben Tre . Thoi gian di ve trong ngay 
Kinh mong quy vi phat tam chia se ho tro cho cac cu gia co duoc mon qua nho tuy khong la bao nhung chua dung tinh cam sau sac nhat 
Nhom Tu Thien Tu Tam xin keu goi su tham gia ho tro quy vi gan xa manh thuong quan giup do cho Nhom 
Moi thac mac dang ky tham gia xin vui long lien he

HCMC RUN 2016

Chay bo khong chi de cham den dich ma con la khong khi hao hung, nao nhiet xung quanh, la canh dep kich thich tinh than nguoi tham du. Voi lo trinh chay xoay quanh khu vuc Ho Ban Nguyet va cau Phu My, nguoi chay hay chuan bi san sang de thuong ngoan canh quan tuyet dep cua khu do thi cung canh song nuoc thoang dang bat ngat khi ban len den dinh cau Phu My, cay cau dep nhat thanh pho Ho Chi Minh.

Hy vong rang giai chay viet da Thanh pho Ho Chi Minh lan thu III - HCMC Run 2016 se tiep tuc la noi de tat ca nhung ai co niem dam me the thao tim den va chinh phuc thu thach. 
-----

#I CONQUER la chien dich lan toa cam hung tu Giai chay viet da HCMC Run. Trong do, cac cau chuyen co that ve vuot qua gioi han, tu pha vo ki luc ban than, chinh phuc thu thach va cham tay vao chien thang duoc chia se mot cach gian di nhung day cam hung tu cac van dong vien tham gia.

Huong ung phong trao bang cach tham gia dang ky HCMC Run 2016 de ung ho va nuoi duong phong trao the thao cua thanh pho, cung nhu nhung tai nang tre tuong lai cua nuoc nha. 

Moi dang ky = Ung ho 10.000d*

Chi tiet: www.hcmcrun.com/i-conquer.html

Hay cung chung tay de HCMC Run la niem tu hao cua chinh chung ta, cua thanh pho. 
==========================================

To us, running is never just about reaching the finish line but also about the vibes, the excitement and the beautiful sceneries along the way that will stimulate the runners’ senses. With the route around Crescent Plaza and Phu My Bridge, get ready to enjoy the beautiful view of the new urban development Phu My Hung when you reach the top of Phu My Bridge, the most beautiful bridge in Ho Chi Minh City. 

The shout and cheers of supporters will also motivate the athletes to conquer the finish line.
--

#I CONQUER is the campaign aims to share the stories from individuals who have set goals for themselves and explain how they achieved it. Their stories are inspiring and can help motivate the runner in you.

Join us in the Ho Chi Minh city Run and be part of the sport community who are helping to promote and contributing to the further development of the youth sports department of Vietnam. 

EACH REGISTRATION = DONATE 10.000d*

*Please visit: www.hcmcrun.com/i-conquer-en.html for details

Cac ban vui long dang ky vao link tren de duoc don tiep chu dao hon.
Australia duoc danh gia la thi truong day tiem nang va tao co hoi cho cac nha dau tu tren the gioi trong nhieu linh vuc, dac biet la bat dong san (BDS) boi moi truong dau tu thuan loi cung cac chinh sach day no luc va khon kheo cua Chinh phu Uc nhu khuyen khich nhap cu, dau tu, vay von ngan hang... Theo danh gia cua cac chuyen gia, thi truong BDS tai Uc minh bach va co tinh thanh khoan kha cao, toc do phat trien nhanh, on dinh va muc tang truong von dat toi 7 – 10%/nam, dac biet trong nam 2014, toc do tang truong o thanh pho Melbourne da len toi 14%.
Tuy nhien, BDS tai Uc van la mot linh vuc moi me doi voi cac nha dau tu cac nha dau tu Viet Nam. Nham giup cac nha dau tu co day du thong tin ve linh vuc nay, Iwealth Pro ( Tap doan BDS Uc do nguoi Viet lam chu, co tru so tai Viet Nam) lien tuc to chuc cac buoi hoi thao tai Tp.HCM va Ha noi dinh ky vao thu 7 va chu nhat hang tuan voi chu de “Bat dong San Uc- Dau tu Hieu qua, An toan & Phat trien ben vung”
Voi nhung giai phap va dich vu toan dien trong linh vuc tai chinh , phap ly, Iwealth Pro tap trung ho tro cac nha dau tu Viet Nam trong qua trinh giao dich dau tu BDS tai Uc. Cac chuyen gia Bat dong san den tu Uc se phan tich thi truong BDS, cac vi tri chien luoc, den viec cung cap cho khach hang nhung su ho tro day du nhat bang viec chuyen giao cac chien dich tai chinh lien quan den BDS da duoc cong thuc hoa gom bao hiem thue trong 10 nam va bao hiem von dau tu tang truong it nhat gap doi sau 7 nam.

AGEAC ( Geophilosophical Association of Anthropological and Cultural Studies) invites you to a new conference : The Inner Path and Life 

Friday 11 December 18:30 at Sharing Coffee , 69 Vo Van Tan, Ho Chi Minh City

Why we dream? What is happening in these 7-8 hours when we dream? What are the messages that we receive during our dreams. The dreams offer, in their symbolic depth, a transcendental sense to the human being's life. C.G. Jung said with good reason that we should not underestimate the dreams, and the Talmud said that a dream which has not been understood is like a letter which has not been opened.


Conference schedule:
- 18:30 Check-in. Order drinks.
- 18:45 Starting the lesson.
- 20:15 Ending the lesson.
- 20:15 - 20:30 Free time to talk, sharing and asking question

The lecture will be followed by a series of lectures: 
the Psychic Study of Man; the Centers of the Human Machine the World of Dreams, the Awakening of the Consciousness; Return, Reincarnation and Recurrence.

Sau nhieu nam thieu vang cac hoat dong don nam moi hoanh trang tai TP Ho Chi Minh, nam nay YAN phoi hop voi Unilever mang den chuong trinh COUNTDOWN PARTY 2016 – Journey to wonderland voi su tham gia cua 8 ca si hang dau Vbiz cung 4 DJ dinh dam. 

Chuong trinh duoc to chuc tai Ho Ban Nguyet quan 7, bat dau tu 16h00 den nua dem ngay 31.12.2015.

Voi chu de la dong nhac dang len ngoi – EDM, COUNTDOWN PARTY 2016 se mang den cho khan gia mot dem giao thua bung no cam xuc voi hieu ung am thanh anh sang an tuong. Do la chua ke den man bieu dien ve nghe thuat tren co the nguoi cung con duong giang sinh lung linh trai doc hanh trinh den voi san khau noi tren mat ho.

Voi nhieu diem doc dao moi la, dai tiec Countdown 2016 – Journey to wonderland hua hen se la diem den khong the bo qua cua khan gia Sai Gon trong dip Tet Duong lich nay.

Dac biet, ngoai khu vuc VIP danh cho cac khach hang doi ve khi mua san pham cua Unilever, cac khu vuc con lai duoc vao tu do, chao don tat ca khan gia den trai nghiem va don nam moi cung nhau.
Thong tin: www.yan.vn | bit.ly/countdown2016

“Gai Gia Lam Chieu” la bo phim dien anh dau tay cua bo doi dao dien Bao Nhan & Namcito, tung gay sot cong dong mang voi tac pham online “Can Ho So 69” va series phim truyen hinh “Mua Oai Huong Nam Ay”. 
Noi dung phim xoay quanh cuoc song cua mot co nang vua buoc vao tuoi 30 (Diem My 9X), thanh dat, xinh dep bong mot ngay phat hien minh mac can benh quai go. Bang moi cach, co phai  mang bau trong hai thang truoc khi "cai trung cuoi cung rung xuong”. Co cung nhung nguoi ban than lap tuc len ke hoach tim chong. Co mot anh chang hang xom dep trai, khoe manh tro thanh doi tuong nam trong “tam ngam" cua nhom “gai gia lam chieu” nay.
Phim “Gai Gia Lam Chieu”, phat hanh boi BHD, du kien ra rap vao 19/02/2016 tren he thong rap toan quoc.
